<p>21a.7</p>dag gi byang chub sems ni gang zhe na/ de ni sbyong ba'i rgyud 'di las rgyu'i ye shes byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis dang / 'bras bu gsum ste lnga yin pas/ de ni gzhan gyi byang chub las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir na bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems de su'i yul yin
<p>21b</p>
<p>21b.1</p>zhe na/ rtog gyur pa zhes bya ste/ bla zhes bya ba ni mdun du'am sngon du zhes thal ba la bsnyag par bya'o/ /de yang rgyud 'di'i sngon du ni rtsa ba'i rgyud de kho na nyid bsdus pa byung ba las byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas rtogs par gyur pa gang yin pa'o/ /gang
<p>21b.2</p>rtogs par gyur na byang chub kyi sems lnga'o/ /gang gis rtogs par byas she na/ rgyal bas zhes bya ste/ sngon du sangs rgyas pa'i rgyal ba de rnams kyis so/ /gang du rtogs par byas na byang chub kyi snying por ro/ /de yang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i sems dpa' rnams ni sngags kyi
<p>21b.3</p>don slob dpon la rag las pa yin gyis/ rang gi thug thub tu spyad pa ni mi rung ba'i phyir don thams cad grub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub ni sangs rgyas snga ma la rag las pa ltar snang ngo / /de'i phyir rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas de dag gis btul zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad
<p>21b.4</p>pa las dgongs te/ 'dir yang byang chub kyi sems de brtan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs zhes bya'o/ /pa'i zhes bya ba'i don yang sngon du song ba la snyegs pa'i don te/ 'di yang sngon du dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud du don thams cad grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
<p>21b.5</p>chen bo stug po bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byang chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pa las sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsngags shing phul ba zhes bya'o/ /ye shes gang zhes bya ba ni ma log pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba las/ yul so sor rtog par rig pas
<p>21b.6</p>rang gi sems rig pa stong pa chen po dang / gnyis pa byang chub tu sems bskyed pa me long ye shes dang / gsum pa chos kyi skur gnas pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / bzhi pa brtan par byas pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / lnga pa skur gyur pa bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes zhes bya'o/ /
<p>21b.7</p>yang slob dpon la la dag gi bzhed lugs kyis byang chub kyi sems rnam pa lnga las rang gi sems so sor rig pa dang / byang chub kyi sems skyes pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis rgyu'i ye shes zhes bya ste/ de la ci'i phyir rgyu'i ye shes zhes bya zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dang po ni sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i
<p>22a</p>
<p>22a.1</p>mtshan nyid de/ mthong ba'i lam gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/ /de'i 'og ma byang chub kyi sems ni sa gnyis pa nas sa bcu pa'i bar gyi ye shes te/ bsgom pa'i lam mo/ /de'i phyir de gnyis ni rgyu'i ye shes 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin no/ /de ltar rgyu'i ye shes
<p>22a.2</p>te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'bras bu'i ye shes rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms te/ ci'i phyir ye shes lnga la 'bras bu zhes bya zhe na/ ye shes lnga ni chos kyi sku/ chos kyi sku de yang rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi don dang / sku gnyis 'byung ba la mthu yod par bya ba'i phyir brtag par bya'o/ /
<p>22a.3</p>gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por gyur pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ma lus pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu dpag bsam gyi shing dang / yid
<p>22a.4</p>bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'i ngo bo kun du bzang po byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan pa/ cis kyang mi shig cing 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyal po rang gi sems byin gyis brlabs
<p>22a.5</p>nas brtan pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang snying por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs zhes bya'o/ /rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de'i don yang 'di ltar snyegs te/ dang por yon tan bcu dang ldan pas gnas yid du 'ong bar
<p>22a.6</p>khrus la sogs pa bya ste/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bdag nyid/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyi bsgom par byas pas ni/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /zhes bya ba la sogs
<p>22a.7</p>pa gsungs pa'i don gyis bsams la/ de la byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang dang mchod pa yan chad byas nas/ nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig mas bskyed nas ngan song nas drang zhing 'gugs pa la yan man gyi dbang gis rnam par grol ba'i lam la bzhag nas/ des ngo
<p>22b</p>
<p>22b.1</p>mtshar gyi stong pa nyid gzhal yas khang bskyed pa dang gdan bsams nas gong gi mngon par byang chub pa lngas bdag rnam par snang mdzad du 'og min du sangs rgyas pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas nas rin po che dbang bskur ba dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
<p>22b.2</p>phrin las la bzhag ste/ seng ge'i khri'i steng du 'dug ste/ dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ltar lha rnams sku bskyed pa dang / 'og nas 'byung ba'i las rgyal mchog ltar las rnams byas nas/ de nas las la rjes su sbyor ba'i spyan drang ba dang / bzhugs su gsol ba dang / phyag rgya bzhis
<p>22b.3</p>rgyas gdab ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs shing mchod pa dang / sngags kyi don la gnas pa yan chad byas nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya ste/ bdag kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur gsal bar byas pa las/ de'i thugs kar rnam par snang mdzad chen po bsams te/ 
<p>22b.4</p>sangs rgyas de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya ste/ ci 'dra ba zhe na/ rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don gsungs pa/ rtsibs kyi lte ba yang dag 'dzin/ /rtsibs rnams lte ba la gnas pa/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung sbyor bas/ /
<p>22b.5</p>'khor lor 'di ni gyur pa yin/ /zhes so/ /yi ge b+h+rUM las bskyed pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa mu khyud bzhi dang ldan pa shin tu bkod pa'i lte ba de'i dkyil du yi ge hUM bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig gi rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa bsam par bya ste/ yi ge'i kha
<p>22b.6</p>dog ni dkar ba bsam mo/ /de la 'khor lo'i lte ba la re'u mig dgur byas pa la kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags dang / yum gyi sngags rnams dgod do/ /de nas dang po'i mu khyud la oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A
<p>22b.7</p>ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ zhes pa'o/ /de'i phyir mi mu khyud gnyis pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis brjod pa sgra'i yi ge bcu gnyis bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas dang po lce nas brtsams nas ji tsam du bita bcu gnyis bkod pa ni rigs kyi mdog dang sbyar ro/ /
<p>23a</p>
<p>23a.1</p>de'i phyi rim gyi mu khyud la rtsa ba'i sngags oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti sarba durga ti zhes bya ba'i sngags ring pos bskor ba'o/ /phyi rol gyi mu khyud gnyis pa la ka kha la sogs pa nas ha'i mthar thug pa'i yi ge dgod par bya'o/ /de ni 'khor lo'i sngags dgod pa'i rim
<p>23a.2</p>pa'o/ /'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'i yi ge hUM las rdo rje/ rdo rje'i lte ba la thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rkyen/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i dngos po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang
<p>23a.3</p>ye shes kyi dngos po'o/ /don dam pa'i yig 'bru tshig 'bru thams cad kyi rkyen gyi dngos po yi ge hUM dgod do/ /de nas de las 'od byung bas nang gi sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal lo/ /de nas mi mdzes kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gsal lo/ de nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab
<p>23a.4</p>par sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams su song nas ma lus pa'i sems can gyi don byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor yang snang bar byas te/ slar ye shes kyi rdo rje lan gsum bskor nas
<p>23a.5</p>shes rab kyi ye shes de drangs te chos bdag med pa nyid kyis rang gi sgo nas btsud nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil na gnas pa'i rdo rje dang hUM la thim nas gnas par bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar rgyun du bsgoms pa la chags pa'i rnal 'byor pa sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa'i
<p>23a.6</p>byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i sgo nas dmigs so zhes pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi sgo nas de'i gzugs rjes su bsam mo zhes pa dang / yi ge hUM gi gzugs kyi sgo nas de'i gzugs rjes su bsgom mo zhes so/ /
<p>23a.7</p>de ltar rnam pa gsum gyi tshul gyis bsgoms pas de nyid sprul pa'i gzugs kyi skus dus ring mo ma yin pa kha nar 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste mngon du byas so/ /nam mkha' bzhi la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku
<p>23b</p>
<p>23b.1</p>dang lhan cig tu gnas pa yang mngon du bya'o zhes so/ /de ltar bsgom pa'i dbang de las tshe 'di kho na la sangs rgyas nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob bo zhes so/ /de ltar rim pa 'dis ngan song sbyong ba'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa'i sangs
<p>23b.2</p>rgyas kun gyis byang chub kyi sems gsungs te/ de la re zhig dang po'i sbyor ba kun sngon du byas nas/ shAkya thub pa'i thugs kar yi ge hrIHlas bskyed pa'i snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa bsgoms te de'i thugs kar lce brgyad pa'i 'khor lo'i mu
<p>23b.3</p>khyud bzhi dang ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas lce brgyad pa la sa bon rnams ni oM sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha na badzra hUM phaT ces pa la sogs pa bkod de/ 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus na yi ge hrIHlas gyur pa'i pad+ma rdo rjes mtshan pa
<p>23b.4</p>bsam mo/ /de la yi ge hrIHsa mtshan pa'o/ /spro ba dang bsdu ba gong ma bzhin du rim pas byas nas bsgom par bya'o/ /de kho na bzhin dang po'i sbyor ba byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' de'i thugs kar bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po sa gnon gyi phyag rgya
<p>23b.5</p>can bsgoms nas/ de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa mu khyud bzhi dang ldan pa bsams la/ mu khyud dang po la oM puN+ye puN+ye zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /lce bzhi la/ oM a mi te a mi ta a mi tod b+ha be zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /de'i lte bar rdo rje hUM gis mtshan pa'o/ /
<p>23b.6</p>de kho na bzhin du spro ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /yang de kho na bzhin du yi ge b+h+rUM las bskyed pa'i rnam par snang mdzad de'i thugs kar rnam par snang mdzad chen po bsams te/ de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa cig bsams te/ oM trAM swA hA zhes bya ba la sogs pa bkod
<p>23b.7</p>la de'i lte ba la b+h+rUM las 'khor lo b+h+rUM gyis mtshan pa bsam mo/ /de kho na nyid spro ba dang bsdu ba bya'o/ /de kho na bzhin du sngon du 'gro ba byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ kun du bzang po'am/ bde ba chan po gang yang rung ba bsgoms pa'i thugs kar rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pa'am/ 
<p>24a</p>
<p>24a.1</p>rin chen 'byung ba'am/ rnam par snang mdzad gang yang rung ba bsgoms la/ de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa bkod la/ 'khor lo la badzra hUM phaT ces pa la sogs pa bkod la/ dbus su rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa bsams la/ de las 'od
<p>24a.2</p>zer spro ba dang bsdu ba gong ma ltar ro/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i ni logs na'o/ /de yan chad kyis ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byang chub sems/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan to/ /da 'di yan chad ni slob dpon gyi las kyi rim pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad
<p>24a.3</p>de/ de la yang dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / lha la sogs pa dgod pa dang / mchod pa gsum gyis bstan pa ste/ de la yang dkyil 'khor bri ba ston te/ de la yang tshon dgye ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de yang byin gyis brlabs pa ston te/ de la yang sngon du 'gro ba'i
<p>24a.4</p>yan lag bsnyen pa bstan te/ dam tshig dang / dbang bskur ba thob pas zla ba gcig gam lo gcig gi bar du rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o/ /de la dang por khrus byas la de nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas nyi ma re re zhing sdom pa bzung ba yang lan drug
<p>24a.5</p>tu bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa dral ba dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnal 'byor chen po bya'o/ /de nas snying gar dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin bsgom par bya'o/ /yang na rnal 'byor chen po dang / dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal po
<p>24a.6</p>mchog rnam par bsgoms nas/ bsdu ba bya ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / ched du brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thams cad blangs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / 
<p>24a.7</p>gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang / dbang du byas nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas chos dang las dang / phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab pa dang dbang bskur te las rnams la nges par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de la dang po re zhig kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi
<p>24b</p>
<p>24b.1</p>phyag rgya chen po bcings la sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus par mdzod cig ces rang gi las la nges par sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa nas/ byams pa la sogs pa la dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer yongs su skyongs shig ces bya ba yan chad kyis thams cad kyi thams cad du phyag rgya chen
<p>24b.2</p>po bcings la rang gi las la mngon par sbyar ba yin par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar las kyi mchog nges par bsgoms nas/ yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bsdu ba byas nas bstod pa dang dgug gzhug bcing ba la sogs pa bya ba dang / phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang
<p>24b.3</p>dbang bskur ba dang / mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyi'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug dang / yid kyis mchod pa ste/ mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad kyis
<p>24b.4</p>kyang legs par mchod la phyag bzhi byas nas sngags gsum gyi don gyis thams cad kyang bdag nyid do zhes bsgom mo/ /de nas mchod cing bstod de nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin la gnas te/ yang mchod cing bstod la phyag rgya bkrol la dbang bskur te/ go cha
<p>24b.5</p>bgos nas mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par byas la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos nas mchod yon phul te/ slar byon pa'i phyir bskul te gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bsrung ba dang / /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyis bdag nyid bsrung ba
<p>24b.6</p>byas nas mchod rten gyi las la sogs pa'i bya ba bya'o/ /de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rig pa'i brtul zhugs rtogs par bya'o/ /de ltar rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni gtsug lag khang ngam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ mchod rten nam/ lha khang ngam/ kun
<p>24b.7</p>dga' ra ba'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi char yid dang rjes su mthun pa shin tu mnyam zhing snum pa/ shar du gzhol ba shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ tsha sgo med pa'i sa'i cha der/ /ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis/ /gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsams/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i
<p>25a</p>
<p>25a.1</p>gnas der ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /zhes pa la/ ji bzhin pa'i cho ga yis zhes bya bas ni rgyal pos khru gang lnga bcu'am brgya'o/ /blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru gang lnga bcu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /tshong dpon nam sde dpon gyis khru nyi shu rtsa
<p>25a.2</p>lnga'am de'i phyed do/ /sgrub pa pos ni bcu gnyis sam drug par bya'o/ /de la dang por re zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma dang / khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dang / mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog nas bdag dang
<p>25a.3</p>slob ma dang sa bdag la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sa sbyong ba byed du gzhug ste/ 'dom gang tsam mam/ lkog ma'am/ lte ba'am/ pus mo nub pa tsam du brkos la gyo mo la sogs pa bsal la/ spos chu dri zhim pas
<p>25a.4</p>bran pa'i las bkang nas rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i chag chag btab ste/ 'thas par bcags la shin tu mnyam par byas la/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la/ sgo bzhi dang skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba/ 
<p>25a.5</p>mtha' ma dril bus gtams pa'i rgyal mtshan dang bla re la sogs pa bres pas nye bar mdzes par byas la/ sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang / sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grwa bzhir gzhag pa'i spos snod rnams legs par btul la/ 
<p>25a.6</p>me tog dang / mar me dang / dgos pa'i yo byad rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i sa dris nye bar byugs nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus yongs su bsangs la/ sa la lag pa bzhag ste rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /sa sbyong
<p>25a.7</p>pa dang yongs su bzung pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rang nyid khrus byas shing lus dri zhim pos byugs la/ ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo ba dang / me tog phreng ba gdags pa dang / shing thog dri zhim po bca' ba byas la yar gyi tshes brgyad nas
<p>25b</p>
<p>25b.1</p>brtsams te/ tshes bcu'am/ bcu gsum mam/ tshes bcu bzhi nas brtsams te bco lnga'i bar du'am/ tshes bco lnga'i thun mtshams nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/ /de la smyung bar gnas pa'i sa'i char ni phyag dar dang skyong nul la sogs pa byas la/ de bzhin du
<p>25b.2</p>lag pas reg pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / yi ge brgya pa bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'jug la/ bdag nyid smyung ba dang / bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor
<p>25b.3</p>sprul la/ phyag btsal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sdom pa bzung la rnal 'byor chen po dang / gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa yang bskyed la/ sems dpa'i skyil krung du 'dug ste/ deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /ces bya ba nas/ ding bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no/ /zhes bya
<p>25b.4</p>ba'i bar gyis bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la spos snod lag tu thogs te/ ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo / /de nas yang dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal
<p>25b.5</p>po mchog rnam par bsgoms la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas shing oM sarba bti badzra satwa hUM zhes zlos pa brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa la kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bri pa'i phyir sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga
<p>25b.6</p>rgyal dang ldan pas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug pa las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas la 'di skad brjod
<p>25b.7</p>par bya'o/ /bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod la/ dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg ste nam mkha' la bzhag la/ bdag nyid yang byin gyis brlabs te/ oM sarba bid+ta dr-iSh+Ta ma Ta/ zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la/ a zhes bya ba las rkang pa gnyis su sna tshogs
<p>26a</p>
<p>26a.1</p>rdo rje bskyed la/ g.yas brkyang la sogs pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / nam mkha' dang / sa bcings pa dang / ra ba dang / dra ba dang / sa gzhi rdo rje rgya gram yan chad byas nas phur bu'i bsrung ba yang bya'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor cho ga las bshad pa'i tshul gyis
<p>26a.2</p>lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad par bya'o/ /de la ni gnas ni byin gyis brlabs pa tsam zhes bya'o/ /de nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni nang par nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis nam mkha' la btegs la thig gdab par
<p>26a.3</p>bya'o/ /de yang / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ dang po ras bal rin mi brtseg par nyos la/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu tshon rtsi dri zhim po sngon po/ dmar po ljang gu ser po/ dkar pos so sor kha dog bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis gzhag
<p>26a.4</p>pa la/ hUM trAM hrIHoMHa zhes bya ba'i rang gi sa bon gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de/ dIp+ta dr-iSh+TAM ku shi dza zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la/ /rab tu g.yo zhing 'bar pa'i mig /mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni/ /zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i lta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das dkyil
<p>26a.5</p>'khor chen po thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i thig gdab pa bdag la stsol cig ces brjod pas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pas rang rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis srad bu btang ba 'bar ba'i lta bas bskul la rang gi lag na gnas
<p>26a.6</p>pa'i srad bu bkal la/ oM a n+yo n+yA nu zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsgril bar bya'o/ /ma dang Ta gnyis kyi g.yas pa dang g.yon pa nyi ma dang zla bar bskyed la/ /badzra dr-iSh+Ta ma Ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas thig skud de gser la sogs pa'i snod dris byugs par bzhag la/ dri dang
<p>26a.7</p>me tog la sogs pas mchod la/ rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la/ oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas sarba bti bcu gnyis bzlas pa'i dris dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la me tog gis kun nas mdzes par byas la/ bar
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod pa byas te dkyil 'khor bteg par bya'o/ /de nas las kyi thig gdab par bya ste/ de la re zhig tshon dkar po las thig sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin thig gdab par bya'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /zhes 'byung
<p>26b.2</p>bas/ gru bzhi pa ni shar dang nub dang byang dang lho'i thig gdab pa'o/ /de bzhin du kha khyer gyi thig dag kyang phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor kun gyis gdab pa'o/ /de la shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi'i thig la bya bas na/ sgo bzhi pa zhes bya ste/ nang gi sgo ni phyi'i dang 'dra ba la rta babs med pa'o/ /
<p>26b.3</p>phyi'i ni rta babs dang bcas pa'o/ /rta babs bzhi dang bcas pa'o zhes pa ni go sla'o/ /them skas ni rta babs bzhi'o/ /seng ge ni mi 'jigs pa dang / stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'i glang po ches sgo'i glo gnyis su brgyan pa'o/ /rnams ni rdzu 'phrul bzhi rnam par dag pa dang / thogs
<p>26b.4</p>pa med pa nam mkha' lding ngo / /rta babs 'degs pa'i ka ba rnams kyi mgul dang rta babs kyi steng du rdo rje rin chen gyi mgul du dar te ba dan dang do shal gyi phreng ba dang / dril bu dang rnga mas brgyan pa'o/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / rgya gram pa'i phyag rgyas bcings pa ni zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i
<p>26b.5</p>rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / rgya gram gyis brgyan pa'i rgyan gyis dkyil 'khor gyi grwa dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud rnams su brgyan par thig gdab bo/ /srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /zhes bya ba ni phyogs thig bzhi tshangs pa'i thig bzhi ste/ brgyad dang ldan par byas so/ /phyi'i rta
<p>26b.6</p>babs dang bcas pa'i sgo'o/ /la la dag sgo gsum pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bdag gis dkyus kyis kyang sgo gsum par ma mthong ste/ sgo gnyis par bzhed do/ /dgu yi char ni bgos pa las/ /zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor cha dgur bgos pa la phyi'i sgo khyud la sum cha gcig gtad
<p>26b.7</p>ces 'byung ngo / /de ltar rdo rje srad bus phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab bo zhes gsungs so/ /da ni dbus kyi rdo rje'i thig gis dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa ston te/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ /zhes bya bas ni seng ldeng gi phur bu smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu stod rdo rje rtse
<p>27a</p>
<p>27a.1</p>lnga pa lta bu byas la/ rdo rje phur bu'i sngags yongs su bzlas la/ rdo rjes brdungs pa de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang ldan nas brtsams te/ bskor phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o/ /de nas pho brang gi rim pa
<p>27a.2</p>gsum du bskor phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo zlum por bskor ba la bya'o/ /lte ba ni rim pa dgur byas pa'o/ /bcas pa ni re'u mig dang bcas pa'o/ /rtsibs bcu drug 'khor lo rdo rje 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i gnas rtsibs bcu drug tu byas pa'o/ /rim pa
<p>27a.3</p>gsum ni phyi rol gyi rdo rje ra ba dang / 'khor lo dang lte ba'o/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / ngan song sbyong ba'i gnas kyi nyis 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thig gdab pa yang rdo rje rtse mo las/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /'khor lo rim pa rtsibs bcu drug /rdo rje phreng
<p>27a.4</p>bas yongs bskor bar/ /dkyil 'khor dbus ma bri bar bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de bas na 'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /de yang 'khor lo ltar bskor ba kho na la yang mi bya ste/ saM gra ha las/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yin par bshad/ /ces gsungs pa na spyir
<p>27a.5</p>bshad kyi gcig tu ni nges pa med do/ /de yang de nyid las/ rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba/ /zhes gsungs pa 'dis kyang 'di tha dad par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba na gnas pa'i phur bu yi ge hUM bzhis bton la 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon
<p>27a.6</p>sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la mnyam por byas nas hi zhes bya bas mig g.yas dang / g.yon nyi ma dang zla bar bskyed la/ khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la sgo rnams dbye bar bya'o/ /thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /thig le tshon gyis dgang ba dang / tshon gyi rim pa 'di ltar shes
<p>27a.7</p>par bya'o/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes pas phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon thams cad la lan bdun bzlas na rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis la ni/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo mnyam sbyar bas/ /byas na tshon rtsi thams
<p>27b</p>
<p>27b.1</p>cad ni/ /'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya/ /hi zhes bya ba'i mthar khro bo ti rIn+ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la sbar bar bya'o/ /de la tshon rtsi dkar po ni de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i rdul phra rab rnams gzhug par bya'o/ /ser po la ni ser po'o/ /sngon po la ni sngon po'o/ /ljang gu
<p>27b.2</p>la ni ljang gu'o/ /dmar po la ni dmar po bcug nas ji skad du bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i lta bas mngon par sbyang ba'i dus su yang dang po'i rdo rje thog mar tshon dgye ba brtsams par byas la/ tshon thams cad dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ bskor phyogs su oM sarba bti kyi
<p>27b.3</p>sngags zlos shing dgye la/ de'i 'og tu ji ltar dga' bar tshon dgye bar bya'o/ /tshon dgye ba'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ dang por dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po ni thams cad kyi nang du'o/ /dbus kyi sa'i cha gnyis ni dkar po'o/ /shar du dmar po'o/ /
<p>27b.4</p>lho ru sngon po'o/ /nub tu ser po'o/ /byad du ljang gu'o/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs ni rigs kyi kha dog go/ /sgo khyams ni shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang gu'o/ /tshon gyi rim pa'o/ /des ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rim pa bstan to/ /da ni lha rnams dgod pa
<p>27b.5</p>bstan te/ dbus su mkhas pas kun rig ni/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ dbus su kun rig rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po dung dang kun da ltar dkar zhing snum pa zhal bzhi pa ni ye shes bzhi dang / sku bzhis brgyan pa'i rtags su bstan yang sku bzhi ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang / 
<p>27b.6</p>rnam par smin pa'i sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku'o/ /de yang dus gsum du kun rdzob tu gzugs su bzhugs kyis don dam par yod pa ma yin no/ /de yang / /gang 'di rgya chen du ma yi/ /kha dog dbyibs dang gdan rnams dang / /phyag mtshan brgyad sogs
<p>27b.7</p>dbye ba ni/ /sku yi gsang bar 'di zhes bya/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje'i rigs ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o/ /rin po che'i rigs ni rnam par smin pa'i sku'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs thams cad ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo'o/ /las kyi rigs thams cad ni
<p>28a</p>
<p>28a.1</p>sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid do/ /rgyu dang ye shes dang sku bzhir sbyar ba ni 'dir ma bris so/ /de la rnam par snang mdzad ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o/ /ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rnam par smin pa'i sku'o/ /gzhan rdo rje'i
<p>28a.2</p>rigs la sogs pa thams cad ni sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no/ /de skad du tshogs mtho ba las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas/ /kun rig nyid ni ngo po'i sku/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur bas/ /ngan song sbyong ba longs spyod rdzogs/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje sems sogs rnam
<p>28a.3</p>par smin/ /rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas/ /sprul ba'i sku ni sku zhes ni/ /rdo rje rigs ni 'dod par grags/ /zhes so/ /de thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni kun rig rnam par snang mdzad de rdo rje zhes bya'o/ /de la ni rgyal mchog skyes bus gang ba zhes bya'o/ /mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i gdan steng na
<p>28a.4</p>ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bzhugs so/ /de nas bar snang gi phyogs nas spyan drangs la gzugs dang gcig tu bsre bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad la shes par bya'o/ /shar phyogs su seng ge'i gdan la ngan song sbyong ba sku mdog zla ba rgyas pa
<p>28a.5</p>dang 'dra zhing 'jam pa rgyan cha la sogs pas brgyan pa phyag gnyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya steng na rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /rgyab tu shAkya thub pa sku mdog gser btso ma lta bu la phyag rgya bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya pad+ma rdo rjes mtshan pa bsnams te/ gdan seng ge la bzhugs pa'o/ /
<p>28a.6</p>g.yas kyi re'u mig la rin chen dpal sku mdog sngon po bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya rin po che'i myu gu bsnams pa/ gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa bsam mo/ /byang phyogs su me tog cher rgyas sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje
<p>28a.7</p>bsnams pa/ gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'o/ /re'u mig gi grwa rnams su lo tsa na dang mA ma kI zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ sangs rgyas spyan la lo tsa na zhes bya ba ste/ sku'i rnam par ram rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma zhes 'byung bas na/ rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna
<p>28b</p>
<p>28b.1</p>tshogs rdo rje rnams bkod kyang rung ngo / /de yang / mu stegs can la phan gdags phyir/ /sangs rgyas btsun mo rab tu gsang / /zhes so/ /da ni ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dgod pa ston te/ rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 
<p>28b.2</p>rtsibs kyi nang ni 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug gi nang ngo / /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog gi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcu drug ste/ bti las bskyed pas na mchog go/ /mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na rdzu 'phrul che ba'o/ /go rims bzhin du bri bar bya/ /
<p>28b.3</p>zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i bar dag kyang pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa yin te/ de yang / rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i mgon/ /rdo rje phyed pa'i gdan la bzhugs/ /zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /de la rdo
<p>28b.4</p>rje sems dpa' ni sku mdog dkar po g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur dril bu dang bcas pa'i bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis dkur brten pa phyag g.yas pas snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bzhag pa'i gung mo la dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bzhugs so/ /
<p>28b.5</p>de nas rim pa bzhin du thams cad de ltar gnas so/ /rdo rje rgyal po ni gser gyi mdog can rdo rje lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud par mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje chags pa ni sku mdog dmar po mda' dang gzhus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bigs pa'i
<p>28b.6</p>tshul du mdzad pa'o/ /rdo rje legs pa ni mar gad kyi mdog can phyag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur dang bcas pas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje rin chen ni sku mdog ser po g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rin po che'i dril
<p>28b.7</p>bu bsnams shing mnyes pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa g.yas pa khu tshur gyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa dpral ba'i steng na bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma ni nyi ma'i mdog can phyag g.yas na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
<p>29a</p>
<p>29a.1</p>kyi snang bar mdzad pa/ phyag g.yon pa gdan la brten pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i mdog can phyag g.yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan phyag g.yon gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje bzhad pa dung dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar
<p>29a.2</p>ba phyag g.yas kyis so'i phreng ba rtse mo na rdo rje yod pa bsnams te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dzum pa la nges par sbyor ba/ phyag g.yon gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje chos sku mdog dkar dmar phyag g.yon dkur brten nas rdo rje pad+ma bzung ste/ phyag g.yas pas de'i 'dab ma rang gis
<p>29a.3</p>thugs kar 'byed pa'o/ /rdo rje rnon po nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g.yon gyis rang gi thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa/ g.yas kyis ral gri bsnams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'debs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje
<p>29a.4</p>rgyu gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas kyi gung mo'i rtse mo na rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bskor bar mdzad pa/ g.yon pa gdan la brten par bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje smra ba zangs kyi mdog can phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje'i lce bsnams nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang smra bar mdzad cing / 
<p>29a.5</p>g.yon stan la brten pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje las zhal dkar po rked pa'i bar dang phyag gnyis sngo skya/ lhag ma mdog sngo ba/ zhal gyi 'og logs nas rked pa'i bar du dmar skya/ brla gnyis ser skya/ lhag ma byin pa gnyis nas zhabs kyi bar du dkar po/ phyag g.yon gyi rdo rje
<p>29a.6</p>khu tshur gyis sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis dkur 'jog pa phyag g.yas kyi gung mo la sna tshogs rdo rje rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje srung ba gser gyi mdog can phyag gnyis rdo rje go cha bsnams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go
<p>29a.7</p>bskon pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin lto ba yangs pa nag po zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis zhal gyi mtha' gnyis su mche ba gnyis 'dzin cing bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog ser po rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis kyi nang du/ rdo rje chud pa dam tshig gi rdo rje
<p>29b</p>
<p>29b.1</p>khu tshur gnyis kyis btsir zhing bzhugs pa'o/ /mkhas pas lA s+ya la sogs pa/ /grwa bzhi'i phyogs su bri bar bya/ /zhes bya bas ni sgeg mo dkar ba'i sku mdog rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa re bsnams te/ rdo rje 'gying pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa la g.yon du cung zad
<p>29b.2</p>'dud pa'o/ /phreng ba ma sku mdog ser po rin po che'i phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbang bskur ba'o/ /glu ma sku mdog dmar skya pi wang brdung pa'o/ /gar ma sku mdog rdo rje las lta bu rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams te phyag gnyis kyis gar mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o/ /bdug
<p>29b.3</p>pa ma sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje spos snod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par mdzad pa'o/ /me tog ma ser mo phyag g.yon gyis rdo rje me tog gi snod thogs te phyag g.yas kyi me tog gi char 'bebs pa'o/ /mar me ma sku mdog dmar skya mar me'i sdong bu bsnams te
<p>29b.4</p>snang ba'i tshogs kyis mchod pa mdzad pa'o/ /byug pa ma gar ma ltar sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag g.yon na dri'i dung chos bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas kyis dri'i sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bzhugs pa'o/ /sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo ba bzhi po bri bar bya/ /
<p>29b.5</p>zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar po rdo rje lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gzhug par mdzad pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar skya rdo rje lcags sgrog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'ching bar mdzad pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag
<p>29b.6</p>g.yas kyi dril bu bsnams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'bebs par mdzad pa phyag g.yon gdan la brten te bzhugs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa zhi ba'i gzigs stangs dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rab tu dgyes
<p>29b.7</p>pas spyan gdangs pa/ sgeg pa'i nyams dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /rta babs khyams ni thams cad du/ /byams pa la sogs bri bar bya/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
<p>30a</p>
<p>30a.1</p>rta babs khyams ni rta babs dang bcas pa'i khang pa dang / rta babs med pa'i nang gi sgo'i bar la ni khyams zhes bya'o/ /la la dag sgo gsum par 'dod de/ bdag gis ni gsum par rig par dkyus kyis kyang ma mthong ngo / /'og nas kyang sgo yod par ma mthong
<p>30a.2</p>ngo / /ci'i phyir na/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /zhes so/ /khyams der byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dgod la/ byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / mya ngan mun pa
<p>30a.3</p>kun 'dzoms dang / /nam mkha'i mdzod dang / ye shes tog dang / spos kyi glang po dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / rdo rje snying po dang / zla 'od gzhon nu dang / kun du bzang po dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / bzang skyong dang / dra ba can gyi 'od do/ /de dag kyang zla ba dang / 
<p>30a.4</p>sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs la/ shar phyogs kyi rdo rje/ lho'i rin po che/ nub kyi pad+ma/ byang gi rnam pa rdo rje rgya gram mo/ /rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dpe med pa ste/ gong gi dang spel mar bri zhes 'byung ste/ de la shar du thub mchog dpe med bzhi
<p>30a.5</p>ste/ nyon mongs 'joms byed dang / mun sel dang / sdug bsngal 'joms byed dang / 'khor ba rgyun gcod de rnams ni lcags kyu'o/ /lho phyogs su ni yon tan dpe med bzhi ste rin chen mdzod dang / dge ba'i blo gros dang / bde ba'i 'byung gnas dang / legs pa'i tog rnams bri'o/ /de rnams
<p>30a.6</p>ni rin po che'i mchod sdong she dag bsnams pa'o/ /nub tu gsung mchog dpe med bzhi ste/ de yang nga ro snyan pa dang / don mthun yid 'ong dang / bde ba'i 'byung gnas dang / the tshom yid myur ro/ /de dag gi phyag na me tog ut+pa la she dag bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs su las mchog dpe med bzhi
<p>30a.7</p>ste/ dran pa'i stobs mchog dang / tshad med yon tan dang / thams cad kun 'grol dang / brtson 'grus mi ldog go/ /de dag ni phyag na me tog she dag bsnams pa'o/ /sku mdog ni dkar po dang / sngon po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu rim bzhin du shar dang lho la sogs pa'o/ /nyan thos
<p>30b</p>
<p>30b.1</p>ni ston pa'i zhabs 'bring sprul pa'i sku'i 'khor yin pas snam bu gnyis pa la shes rab can gyi mchog shA ri'i bu dang / rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog mod gal gyi bu dang / 'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i mchog rab 'byor dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog ma 'gags pa dang / khyim pa
<p>30b.2</p>dad pa bskyed pa'i mchog nag po 'char ka dang / ston pa la dam pa'i chos thos pa snga ba kau Di n+ya dang / bdud kyi gtso bo dad pa bskyed pa snga bas na rta thul dang / 'dul ba 'dzin par byed pas na nye ba 'khor dang / 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pas na ba lang bdag dang / sras su gyur
<p>30b.3</p>pa'i sgra gcan 'dzin dang / zham 'bring gnyug mar mdzad pa'i kun dga' bo dang / nyid kyi gcung pos na dga' bo dang / shAkya rnams kyi skra 'dreg mkhan yin pas na ming chen dang / bslab pa la gus pa'i nor sbyin dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa'i gang po dang / 
<p>30b.4</p>zhal ta ba sku bgres pa'i 'od srungs rnams ni sku mdog ser po chos gos dang ldan pa phyag na par pu dang bsil yab dang / rin po che dang / mar me rim pa bzhin du shar la sogs pa nas bskor phyogs su bsnams pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi snam bu la rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang spel mar bri bar
<p>30b.5</p>bya'o/ /de yang / de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams/ /zhes gsungs te/ de yang bcu gnyis te/ 'jigs par byed pa dang / snang ba brtsegs dang / dpa' bo 'dul ba dang / nyon mongs gdung sel dang / shes rab mgyogs chen dang / rdzu 'phrul cher ston dang / 'khor ba dug
<p>30b.6</p>sel dang / sgra chen dang / bse ru lta bu dang / ri bo'i rgyal po dang / seng ge lta bu dang / yid myur te/ de rnams ni bsil yab dang / zla tshes dang / me 'bar ba dang / drang srong rnams bsnams te/ de yang shar la sogs pa rim pa bzhin no/ /sgo de'i sgo khyams g.yas g.yon du/ 
<p>30b.7</p>khro bo brgyad bri bar bya ste/ /de yang / khro bo mngag pa pho nya sogs/ /bri ba'am yang na ming yang rung / /zhes gsungs so/ /bcas bcos gnyis dang ldan pas sam khro ba'i tshul dgu dang ldan pas khro bo'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i las mdzad pas mngag pa'o/ /sprul pa'i
<p>31a</p>
<p>31a.1</p>khro bo mang po 'byung bas pho nya ste/ de'i phyir na brgyad de/ 'jig rten gsum snang dang / 'jig rten gsum 'ching dang / 'jig rten gsum 'jigs dang / 'jig rten mthar byed dang / bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang / be con sngon po dang / mi g.yo mgon po dang / rta mgrin te de rnams ni shar
<p>31a.2</p>la sogs pa'i sgo khyams g.yas g.yon du rim pa bzhin no/ /de rnams kyang yang na ming ngam ste/ snying po'am/ brda'am ste phyag mtshan nam/ thig le ste gdan nam gang yang rung ba bri zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ /de rnams ni rab mchog dang po yongs su dag pa'i 'khor te/ lha brgya
<p>31a.3</p>lnga bcu pa'o// //da ni 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don te/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /zhes smos te/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rta babs dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor te sgo gnyis pa'o/ /de'i phyi rol du ni rdo rje ra ba'i nang logs kyi khor yug gi dkyil 'khor la bya'o/ /gling bzhi po ni bri
<p>31a.4</p>bar bya/ /zhes 'byung ste/ gling bzhi po ni khor yug gi dkyil 'khor la lhor 'dzam bu gling gi gzugs su bri ba dang / nub tu ba lang spyod kyi dbyibs su bri ba dang / byang du sgra mi snyan gyi dbyibs su bri ba dang / shar du lus 'phags po'i gling gi dbyibs bri bar bya'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling du
<p>31a.5</p>tshangs pa bri/ /zhes pa ni gling de'i steng du tshangs pa'i gzugs phyag na gun+d+d+he bsnams pa/ btsun mo tshangs ma pi wang 'dzin pa/ 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya/ /zhes 'byung bas pho nya mngag pa ste/ pho nya pad+ma bsnams pa dang / mngag gzhug yid du 'ong ba ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /byang
<p>31a.6</p>phyogs su ni dbang phyug che/ /zhes pa ni byang gi gling du dbang phyug chen po phyag na tri shU la bsnams pa/ yum dka' thub bzlog ma phyag na pad+ma kha bye ba bsnams pa'o/ /pho nya rnam par snang ba mda' gzhu dang / mngag gzhug sde dpon nag po mdung bsnams pa bri'o/ shar dang nub kyi gling dag tu/ /
<p>31a.7</p>brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams cad kyang / /zhes pa ni shar gyi gling gi steng du brgya byin te rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams pa'o/ /btsun mo bde sogs dgu po rgyud mang 'dren/ mngag pa yid du 'ong ba dang / pho nya kun du snang ba ral gri bsnams pa zhes pa'o/ /gtogs 'dod ni khyab 'jug ste/ phyag na 'khor lo
<p>31b</p>
<p>31b.1</p>bsnams pa dang / btsun mo dpal gyis lha mo phyag na gsal shing bsnams pa/ mngag gzhug rdo rje bde ba phyag na mtshon cha bsnams pa bre'o/ /pho nya ba rdo rje sde dpon phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa bri'o/ /gzhan dag kyang ni de bzhin te/ /zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba la yang btsun mo dang / mngag gzhug
<p>31b.2</p>pa dang / pho nya ba la sogs pa shes par bya'o zhes pa'o/ /lha min dri za nam mkha' lding / /zhes pa ni lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnam par snang byed mda' gzhu bsnams pa dang / sgra gcan 'dzin zla ba bsnams pa dang / sum brtsegs ri rab bsnams pa dang / rab sim bdud rtsi bsnams pa dang / kau shi ka rdo rje
<p>31b.3</p>bsnams pa de rnams btsun mo dang bcas pa'o/ /dri za ni zur phud lnga pa me tog bsnams pa dang / yul 'khor srungs pi wang bsnams pa de ni btsun mo dang bcas pa'o/ /nam mkha' lding ni gser mig lcags kyu bsnams pa dang / g.yog du ma can rdo rje bsnams pa dang / bya khyung ka ru Na sbar zhags
<p>31b.4</p>bsnams pa de rnams kyang btsun mo dang bcas pa'o/ /de rnams ni byang shar nas brtsams te shar drang por bri bar bya'o/ /gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che/ /zhes pa ni gnod sbyin brgyad de/ shar du yang dag shes zla tshes bsnams pa/ shar lhor gang ba bzang po bum pa bsnams pa/ 
<p>31b.5</p>lho ru 'brog gnas rin po che'i sgrom bsnams pa/ lho nub tu ku be ra be con bsnams pa/ nub tu nor bu bzang po nor bu bsnams pa/ nub byang du pany+tsi ka rin po che'i mdzod bsnams pa/ byang du dzaM b+ha la ne'u le'i rkyal bu bsnams pa/ byang shar du nor lha'i rgyal po shing thog bsnams pa de rnams
<p>31b.6</p>btsun mo dang bcas pa'o/ /srin po ni 'jigs shing gsod pa ste/ lad ka mgrin bcu mda' gzhu/ u pa kar+Ni ral gri/ bum rna dbyug to/ btsun mo dang bcas pa'o/ /lto 'phye che ni ltos 'gro ba ste/ rab brtan rdo rje bsnams pa/ khyus 'gro rin po che bsnams pa/ de yang btsun mo dang
<p>31b.7</p>bcas pa'o/ /'byung po yi dgas 'dre rnams dang / /zhes pa ni dbang ldan tri shU la bsnams pa btsun mo dang bcas pa'o/ /yi dgas ni phyi'i sgrib pa can dang / nang gi sgrib pa can dang / rang bzhin gyi sgrib pa can dang / me lce'i 'khor lo can dang bzhi'o/ /'dre ni bar du gcod par byed pa'o/ /
<p>32a</p>
<p>32a.1</p>log 'dren nag po chu ltar g.yo ba sprul te/ gnye'u thung rna rnon me/ spyi'u tshugs thur blta bya/ se'u men ta ga snying du 'jug pa'i 'dre dang / dar dpyangs de ta ka lce la 'jug pa dang / mur rgad ta ka myur bar 'jug pa ral gri bsnams pa dang drug go/ klu dang
<p>32a.2</p>sbrul dang rigs rnams dang / /zhes pa ni klu ni byol song gi rigs rnams te/ rigs bzhir gnas so/ /mtha' yas ut+pal bsnams pa dang / 'jog po dgra sta bsnams pa dang / chu lha pad+ma bsnams pa dang / dung skyong 'bud dung bsnams pa dang / nor rgyas bum pa
<p>32a.3</p>bsnams pa dang / stobs kyi rgyu gshol mda' bsnams pa dang / pad+ma chen po pad+ma kha phye ba bsnams pa dang / rigs ldan rin po che'i rgyal bu bsnams pa dang / dga' bo sprin phung bsnams pa dang / nye dga' bo rin chen phyag rgya bsnams pa'o/ /sbrul ni rigs bzhi'o/ /
<p>32a.4</p>rigs rnams dang zhes pa ni phyogs skyong ba bcu ni bgegs kyi rigs su gtogs pas rigs rnams so/ /brgya byin rdo rje/ gshin rje thod dbyug /chu lha sbrul zhags/ gnod sbyin be con/ me lha bgrang phreng / bden bral ral gri/ rlung lha ba dan/ dbang ldan rtse gsum/ sa
<p>32a.5</p>bdag mche zhags/ sa'i lha mo bum pa/ nyi ma pad+ma/ zla ba ut+pal/ btsun mo so so nas 'khyud nas gnas pa'o/ /de ltar lha chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad so so'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ /rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya/ /zhes pa ni yul 'khor srung pi wang thogs pa shar
<p>32a.6</p>du'o/ /lhor 'phags skyes po ral gri thogs pa/ nub tu mig mi bzang sprul zhags thogs pa/ byang du rnam thos sras rin chen rkyal bu thogs pa/ btsun mo dang bcas pa'o/ /gza' dang skar ma rgyu skar zhes pa ni gza' ni 'phel ba dang 'grib par byed pa ste/ pa ba
<p>32a.7</p>sangs me tog /phur bu po ti/ lag pa mchog sbyin/ zla ba ku mu ta/ mig dmar bdud rtsi bum pa/ sgra gcan 'dzin pad+ma'i sdong bu/ nyi ma pad+ma/ spen pa dbyug to bsnams pa btsun mo dang bcas pa'o/ /rgyu skar ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad de/ dbang ldan nas brtsams te/ 
<p>32b</p>
<p>32b.1</p>shar du bri ba ni smin drug mdog dmar bum pa'i steng na bzhugs/ snar ma mdog ljang gu ba dkar po zhon/ mgo ser po sha ba zhon/ lag dmar po sbrul la zhon/ nab so ser po pad+ma la 'dug /skag ljang gu bya rog la 'dug /phyag na rin po che'i snyan cha dang / gdu bu she
<p>32b.2</p>dag bsnams pa'o/ /me nas brtsams te lho'i phyogs su dngar ba la/ mchu ser po ma he la zhon/ gre ljang gu khri la 'dug /dbo ser po gser khre la 'dug /me bzhi ser po glang po che la 'dug /nag pa ljang gu rma bya la 'dug /sa ri dmar po 'phyang mo nyug /sa ga
<p>32b.3</p>dkar po rta zhon pa phyag mtshan rin po che'i me tog she dag bsnams pa'o/ /bden bral nas nub tu dngar ba la lha mtshams mdog ser khyim bya la zhon/ snron dmar po stan nang tshangs can la 'dug /snrubs mdog ljang gu sa bdag la 'dug /chu stod mdog ser phub la 'dug /
<p>32b.4</p>chu smad mdog ljang gu mi la zhon/ byi bzhin mdog sngo sre mo la zhon/ gro bzhin mdog dmar kurma la 'dug pa'o/ /phyag mtshan ni pad+ma'i sdong bu she dag bsnams pa'o/ /rlung gi phyogs nas byang phyogs su bri bar bya ste/ mon dre ljang gu glang khyu ba la 'dug /mon gru dmar
<p>32b.5</p>po stan bar tshangs can la 'dug /khrums stod ljang ser khri la 'dug /khrums smad ser po rin po che'i khri la 'dug /nam gru mdog dmar ngang pa la zhon/ tha skar mdog dmar mi la zhon/ bra nye mdog sngo 'khor lo'i steng la 'dug /phyag mtshan ut+pal she dag
<p>32b.6</p>bsnams pa'o/ /de ltar nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /khro ba ma rungs 'tshe ba yi/ /zhes pa ni dmyal ba srung chen po rnams la bya ste/ yang sos dang thig nag la sogs pa brgyad dang / chu bur dang / chu bur rdol ba la sogs pa brgyad na gnas shing grang ba'i brgyad de
<p>32b.7</p>bcu drug po la bya'o/ /'tshe ba'i zhes bya ba ni las kyis skyes pa'i sems can de rnams la srung ma de rnams kyis 'tshe bar byed pas na'o/ /bgegs bi na ya ga ni zhes pa la bgegs ni bar du gcod pa ste/ tshangs pa dang srin po'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon
<p>33a</p>
<p>33a.1</p>dang / gnon po dang / skem byed dang / grib gnon dang / ma mo'i gdon dang / bi na ya ga btsun mo dang bcas pa ste brgyad do/ /sems can kun la phan sems pa'i/ /drang srong skal ba chen po rnams/ /zhes pa ni drang srong ni brgyad de/ me bzhi rin po che 'bar ba bsnams
<p>33a.2</p>pa'o/ /nag pa 'khor lo/ yang dag shes rdo rje 'khor lo/ mdun bdar rtse gsum/ gya gyu rin po che'i sgrom/ gyur mid dgra sta/ a gur me dpung / g.yog 'dor 'khor lo bsnams pa ste/ me lha'i 'khor yin pas shar lho mtshams nas bri'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang bud med bri/ /zhes
<p>33a.3</p>pa ni las dang rdzu 'phrul gyis mkha' la 'gro la/ mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis mkha' la 'gro ba ste/ drag mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / za ba mo dang / rdo rje'i mchu'i chung ma dang / nor lha'i chung ma dang / phag mgo ma'o/ /bud med ni rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub
<p>33a.4</p>par byed pa'i sring mo gsum ste/ dga' ba mo dang / 'joms par byed pa mo dang / sbrang rtsir 'dzin pa mo'o/ /de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma/ /zhes pa ni sring mo ni bzhi ste/ rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / mi pham ma dang / rig sngags 'chang ma rnams so/ /de ni nub nas byang logs
<p>33a.5</p>su'o/ /rnal 'byor ma ni pad+ma can dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / rnam rgyal ma dang / mdangs can ma dang / 'od ldan ma dang / dri med ma dang / yid bzang ma ste brgyad do/ /'byung ba bzhi'i lha chen po/ /zhes pa ni me lha dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / sa'i lha rnams so/ /khyim dang ri la gnas
<p>33a.6</p>pa dang / zhes pa ni khyim gyi lha kun snang ba dang / ri'i lha rab tu brtan pa'i blo gros so/ /shing dang kun dga' gnas la sogs/ /zhes pa ni shing gi lha kun nas 'od zer dang / kun dga' ra ba'i lha kun du snang ba'i blo gros dang / gnas kyi lha tshogs sgo'o/ /dur khrod kyi lha 'byung po
<p>33a.7</p>dge ba dang / grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams dge ba'i blo gros so/ /ming ngam brda 'am yang na ni/ /thig le rnams kyang bri bar bya/ /zhes pa ni ming ni snying po'o/ /brda ni phyag mtshan/ thig le ni gdan tsam byas pa la bzhag pa'o/ /de la rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du shing sna tshogs kyi nang du shar lho
<p>33b</p>
<p>33b.1</p>mtshams su khro bo ma rungs 'tshe ba ste dmyal ba rnams bri bar bya'o/ /lho nub mtshams su 'byung po yi dgas 'dre rnams dang zhes pa ste/ yi dgas rnams bri bar bya'o/ /nub byang du bgegs dang bi na ya ga ste bgegs dang byol song rnams bri bar bya'o/ /byang shar du mi'i
<p>33b.2</p>'gro ris rnams bri bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyang ming ngam brda'am thig ler bri bar bya'o/ /gzhan rnams ni khor yug la ci rigs su bri bar bya'o zhes slob dpon rgyal ba 'od kyang bzhed do/ /de yan chad du dkyil 'khor bri ba dang lha dgod par bya'o// //da ni dkyil 'khor
<p>33b.3</p>gyi rgyan dgod pa'i rim pa 'byung ste/ de la'ang 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang / slob ma dbang bskur ba dang / sbyin gtor bsngo ba'o/ /de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la/ /bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang / /gdugs dang rnga ma lda ldi dang / /'phan dang sna
<p>33b.4</p>tshogs na bza' mchod/ /ces pa ni rgyan dgram zhing 'phags pa mchod pa'o/ /gser las byas pa'i bya rnams ni/ /brgyad dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung / /zhes pa ni 'phags pa mchod pa'i bum pa gang ba rgyu gser la sogs pa las byas pa brgya'am lnga bcu'am bcu drug
<p>33b.5</p>gam brgyad las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i/ /bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya/ /zhes pa ni rnam par rgyal ba la sogs par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa slob ma dbang bskur ba'i bum pa lnga 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin byin gyis brlabs la gzhag
<p>33b.6</p>par bya'o/ /gzhan yang mchod pa'i khyad par/ /mar me gtor ma bum pa dang / /mdzes pa'i bshos rnams gzhag par bya/ /zhes pa ni phyi ma ni go sla'o/ /bum pa ni gsang ba'i bum pa ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i las thams cad pa'i bum pa'o/ /gzhan yang
<p>33b.7</p>bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang / gtor ma cha bcu gnyis la sogs pa sna tshogs pa las byas pa gzhag go/ /me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang / /zhes pa la sogs pa ni khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ste/ byin gyis brlabs pa tshul ltar byas la shi ba'i
<p>34a</p>
<p>34a.1</p>rus pa dang ming bkru ba dang / slob ma snod du rung bar bya ba'i ched du bstan pa'o/ /bum pa la yang dbye ba bum pa gang ba mchod cing dbang bskur ba byed pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i bum pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gsang ba'i
<p>34a.2</p>bum pa las thams cad par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i bum pa bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba dang / khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa khrus kyi bum pa dang lnga ru shes par bya'o/ /de yang yo byad ni rin po che sna lnga las byas pa mchu 'phyang ba nag po ra
<p>34a.3</p>ri med pa mgrin pa ring ba'o/ /las thams cad pa dang khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gnyis ni lce'u dang bcas pa'o/ /sman lnga dang / snying po lnga dang / 'bru lnga dang / dri lnga dang / spos lnga dang / rin po che sna lnga la sogs pa 'byor tshad du bshams la byin gyis brlabs pa
<p>34a.4</p>ni/ las bum bskyed la de'i nang du ting nge 'dzin ni bye brag gis shes par bya'o/ /bum pa bzhag pa ni dgongs ka'i dus su 'jug pa la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin byas la gzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bkod nas gnas par bya'o/ /de nas khrus la sogs byas la/ /zhes bya ba
<p>34a.5</p>la sogs pa gsungs pa la/ de nas ni bkra shis pa'i don te/ dkyil 'khor bris pa'i rting thogs so/ /khrus byas la zhes pa ni dang por re zhig rang gi sdom pa la gnas pa'i nang gi bdag nyid can ni khrus dang / phyi'i yang ci nus par bya'o/ /de la sdom pa gsum la rab tu gnas shing skyong ba ni khrus
<p>34a.6</p>gcig pa'o/ /bshags pa dang gsol ba 'debs pa la sogs pa ni gnyis pa'o/ /phyag rgya dgrol ba ni gsum pa'o/ /chu'i khrus ni bzhi pa ste/ 'di dag dang gos gsum brje bar yang bya'o/ /de la sdom pa gsum la gnas pa ni gos dang po'o/ /ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni gnyis pa'o/ /
<p>34a.7</p>phyi'i gos gtsang ma ni gsum pa zhes bshad do/ /chu dang sa'i khrus la sogs pa byas la/ lus dri zhim pos byugs la/ ji snyed pa'i gos dang / rgyan gdags shing shin tu ser ba'i gos bgo ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba gdags pa dang / shing thog dri zhim pos kha bkang ste dbu rgyan la sogs pas
<p>34b</p>
<p>34b.1</p>mdzes par byas la gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang / /me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug /ces pa ni dkyil 'khor bris pa'i rting la phyi rol kun du spos chus byug cing me tog sil ma bkram la/ dgongs ka'i dus su badzra satwa hU~M zhes bzlas shing rdo rje sems ma'i dam tshig
<p>34b.2</p>gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba thogs la rdo rje shugs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs la/ yang rdo rje dril bu dkrol te dkyil 'khor lan bdun du bskor ba byas la/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis lhag pa dang / ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
<p>34b.3</p>de la phul la rdo rje gar byas te blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya zhing badzra satwa hU~M zhes bar ma chad par bzla bar bya'o/ /de yang rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /mkhas pas ma tshang yongs su bkang / /lhag ma gang yin dor byed de/ /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas gong gi
<p>34b.4</p>bum pa rnams dkyil 'khor du dgod par bya ste/ de nas yi ge hU~M las bdag nyid rdo rje hU~M mdzad du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ /rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi'o/ /yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya/ /oM badzrod g+ha Ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya hU~M zhes bya ba phyag rgya
<p>34b.5</p>dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa la rdo rje dang bcas pa'i me tog gis lhag ma rdo rje sems dpas yongs su bzung
<p>34b.6</p>ba las/ oM badzra satwa hU~M zhes bya ba 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la yang badzrod ta ka hUM gi sngags stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar legs par gzhag go/ /bum pa lhag ma rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sngags sho d+ha ni la sogs
<p>34b.7</p>pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun du gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bum pa gang ba la rnam par snang mdzad dam bti la sogs pa bzlas la phyi rol du gzhag par bya'o/ /yang bum pa gcig la rdo rje sems dpa' brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs te gzhag
<p>35a</p>
<p>35a.1</p>par bya'o/ /ma 'byor na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la bum pa re re dbul bar bya'o/ /oM badzras twa muSh+Ti a zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi bum pa la'o/ /oM rat+na muSh+Ti taM rin chen 'byung ldan kyi rigs kyi bum pa la'o/ /
<p>35a.2</p>oM badzra d+harma muSh+Ti khaM zhes bya ba ni shAkya thub pa'i rigs kyi bum pa la'o/ /oM karma muSh+Ti haM zhes pa ni me tog cher rgyas kyi rigs kyi bum pa la'o/ /de rnams lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la rigs de la dbul bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bum pa gang ba yang dbul bar bya ste/ bcu las nyung ba mi bya'o/ /las
<p>35a.3</p>thams cad pa'i bum pa la ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la ni de nyid sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te lho sgor bya ba'i cho ga yin te/ stegs bu khru gang ba pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad bris pa'i steng du bzhag
<p>35a.4</p>la khrus la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha yid kyis mngon sum lta bur mngon du byas la/ mchod pa lnga dang kha zas kyi bye brag rnams kyis ci nus pas yang dag par mchod pa nas rang gi gdong ji lta ba bzhin du g.yogs te/ phyogs bzhi nas sdom pa bzung ba'i bar du byas nas/ phyi rol na
<p>35a.5</p>gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la mchod pa lngas mchod de/ sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas sems ma rdo rje ma bcings la/ slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas 'jug go/ gtso bo rgyal ba sras dang 'khor/ /mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste/ dang por
<p>35a.6</p>khrus la sogs pa byas nas/ de nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung la/ de nas sdig pa dral ba dang / phyag rgya dgrol ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnal 'byor chen po bya'o/ /de nas sbyor ba dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog rnam par bsgoms nas/ bsdu ba byas la phyag
<p>35a.7</p>btsal ba dang ched du brjod pa brjod pa dang / rang gi snying gar gzhug pa dang / phyir phyung nas ched du brjod pa nas rang rang gi gnas su gnas par byas nas/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las phreng ba la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba blangs la
<p>35b</p>
<p>35b.1</p>de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs te/ gtso bo rgyal ba ni kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o/ /sras ni 'khor sems dpa' dang sems ma'o/ /'khor ni 'jig rten pa'o/ /mang po rnams ni brjod kyis mi lang ba'o/ /spyan drangs te ni tshigs bcad dang sngags dang
<p>35b.2</p>phyag rgyas so/ /de yang 'di skad ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas 'jig rten pa yan chad dang bcas pa'o/ /de rdo rje dbyings kyi khang pa brtsegs ma na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par mdzad de/ rdo rje slob dpon
<p>35b.3</p>gyis brtags pa'i dkyil 'khor bye ba mtha' yas pa'i gzhal yas khang du bzhugs te/ kun nas yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'dus par gyur cing tshogs par mdzad do zhes pa'i bar du'o/ /phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing / /zhes pa ni bdag dang dam tshig la sogs pa
<p>35b.4</p>phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /de yang chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po dang las kyi phyag rgyar bshad pa gang yin pa de ni bdag ldan zhing ngo / /de la yang bsgrub pa'i yan lag bcu drug tu bstan pa ni/ phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / dgug
<p>35b.5</p>pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa'o/ /'di dag ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa re re zhing so sor
<p>35b.6</p>bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir gsungs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bsgrubs pa ni phyag rgya bzhi bzhir bstan pas na phyag rgya zhes bya'o/ /lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhis bzhag pa de bzhin du/ sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa byed
<p>35b.7</p>pa por gyur pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya zhing bdag nyid kyi dbang du bya'o/ /ci zhig smra zhing dbang du byed ce na/ dzaHhU~M baM hoHthugs rje'i bdag /ces bya ste/ 'dis ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi spyi'i yi ge bzhi po bsgrub pa'i snying por gsungs pa yin no/ /la la dag dzaHhU~M baM hoH zhes bya ba 'dis bdag
<p>36a</p>
<p>36a.1</p>rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo srung gi phyag rgya'i snying po yin par 'dod do/ /yang ji ltar shes she na/ dgug pa la sogs pa'i don gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan dag ni dzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes brjod la/ legs pa'i cho gas yid kyis ni/ /lus la
<p>36a.2</p>sangs rgyas kun gzhug go/ /zhes bya ba 'dir yang yin gyi/ sgo srung rnams kyi snying po yi ge bzhi yin par khas blangs na ni a zhes bya ba dbab pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir dang / hoHzhes bya ba rdo rje chags pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi don 'di bshad par
<p>36a.3</p>mdzad pa yin te/ /de nas kun mchog la sogs pa/ /mngon bris nas ni yang dag bsgrub/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcing nas kyang / /dzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes brjod do/ /zhes bya'o/ /don de dag kyang bstan pa tsam du mdzad pa yin gyi/ bsgrub pa'i go rims ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje
<p>36a.4</p>bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcing la/ /rdo rje se gol brdab pa'i sgra byed cing / /oM dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa ma ya zhes brjod cing / tshur gshegs zhes ni brjod nas kyang / /zhes gsungs te/ tshigs su bcad pa mang po yang brjod do/ /de nas brjod pa tsam gyis bsti gnas kyi sar byon pa dang / 
<p>36a.5</p>pus mo gnyis kyi lha nga sa la btsugs la/ rdo rje thal mo bskor nas shis pa brjod pa'i tshul du snying gar 'jog pa'i phyag rgya dang / nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba bcings sa nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis
<p>36a.6</p>lcags kyu'i tshul du bya/ /zhes pas ni sgo dbye ba byas nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgya 'dis rnam par snang mdzad dang / ngan song sbyong ba'i rigs bkug la shar sgor gzhag par bya'o/ /rin chen dpal gyi rigs ni lho sgo dang nye bar ro/ /shAkya thub pa'i rigs ni nub sgo
<p>36a.7</p>dang nye bar ro/ /me tog cher rgyas kyi rigs ni byang sgo dang nye bar ro/ /de'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur las mkhrig ma mdud la mthe'u chung gnyis sbrel te/ mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo ngos sbyor ba ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste/ des rang rang gi sgo nas rang
<p>36b</p>
<p>36b.1</p>rang gi gnas su gzhug par bya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo bsdams pa ni lcags sgrog gi tshul lo/ /des ni phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bkug nas phyag rgya bskor ba ni dril bu'i phyag rgya ste/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dbang du bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin
<p>36b.2</p>gyis bgegs bsal ba dang / ra ba dang dra ba byas nas/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la/ rdo rje go chas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod yon phul la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa blta bar byas nas rim pa
<p>36b.3</p>'dis bsgrub par bya'o/ /kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /shod+ha ni'i sngags kyi rjes la badzra d+hA tu dr-i sh+ya dzaHhU~M baM hoH sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM badzra d+hA tu zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ 
<p>36b.4</p>badzra a be sha dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM badzra a be sha zhes lan gsum brjod pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos gzhag par bgyi zhes bya ba dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par dag par bsgrubs la de'i 'og tu chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen
<p>36b.5</p>pos gzhag par bya'o/ /'di dag ga las shes she na/ bshad pa las ston te/ dpal mchog dang po las/ dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams la yang rnal 'byor gyis tshul thams cad las/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang dag par bsgrubs nas de'i rjes la phyag rgya gzhan sbyar bar bya'o
<p>36b.6</p>zhes don 'di ston la/ de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las kyang / rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin/ /bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su/ /sems dpa' chen po de bsgom mo/ /ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas/ /rang gi lus su bsgom par bya/ /bkug
<p>36b.7</p>cing bcug la bcings pa dang / /dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas dang po kho na dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings par gsungs so/ /de yang rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bskyed nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i phyir sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /de nas chos dang las dang / 
<p>37a</p>
<p>37a.1</p>phyag rgya chen pos lha rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas badzra rat+na zhes brjod cing rdo rje rin chen gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur ba dang / byams pa la sogs pa dang / dpe med pa yang de nyid kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /
<p>37a.2</p>rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /arga mchog btags bsang la sogs pa yi/ /dbyangs snyan pa yis bstod pa lha rdzas kyi/ /mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod/ /ces pa ni de
<p>37a.3</p>nas arga ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod yon phul ba'o/ /mchod pa btags nas s+pha ra Na khaM zhes pas me tog gi shing brgya'am shing bzhi'am me tog thams cad la yang rdo rje me dang me tog gi sngags mngon par bzlas pa dang / dri zhim po thams cad dang / 
<p>37a.4</p>kha la bsgo ba'i dri rnams la yang rdo rje me dang dri'i rig par bzlas pa dang / ga pur dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan+dan la sogs pa dang bcas pa/ bdug spos kyi snod du sbyar ba'i spos snod 'bum mam/ khri'am stong ngam brgya'am/ ma 'byor na spos snod bcu la rdo rje ma dang / bdug pa'i
<p>37a.5</p>rim pa mngon par bzlas te/ lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /swa ti ka la sogs pa yon tan 'bum dang ldan pa/ shin tu legs par sbyar ba'i kha zas bza' ba dang / bca' ba'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i snod 'bum mam/ khri 'am stong ngam brgya 'am bcu la rdo rje me mngon
<p>37a.6</p>par bzlas shing / a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twA ta ces bya ba bzlas la dbul bar bya'o/ /mar la sogs pa'i mar me grangs stong ngam tha na snod chen po bzhi gtams pa la rdo rje me dang mar me'i rig pa bzlas shing lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /rol mo'i cha byad bcu la
<p>37a.7</p>dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rol mo'i rig pa mngon par bzlas la/ badzra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes bya bas dbul bar bya'o/ /gar mkhan dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang oM dang hUM mngon par bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o/ /
<p>37b</p>
<p>37b.1</p>gzhan yang ras zung re 'bum mam khri'am stong ngam rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa la re re zhing ras zung re'am/ so sor ma 'byor na thams cad spyi la ras zung gcig dang / bla re rnam pa sna tshogs pa gcig dang / grwa bzhir ba dan sna tshogs gdags pa dang / gdugs
<p>37b.2</p>dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / yi ge oM lan bdun bzlas te/ lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /gdu bu dang / rna cha dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan la sogs pa yang ngo / /rdo rje rin chen gyi dar dpyangs sbyang par bya'o/ /
<p>37b.3</p>me tog gi chun 'phyang spros shing brgyan pa dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa dang / zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i rta babs yid du 'ong ba'i dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pa dang / rta dang glang po che dang / ba lang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang yi ge hUM dang
<p>37b.4</p>oM mngon par bzlas shing badzra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /gsang ba la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis dkyil 'khor gyi lha
<p>37b.5</p>thams cad mnyes par byed pa'o/ /dbyangs snyan pa yis bstod pa dang / /lha rdzas kyis zhes bya ba ni lA s+ye la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pa dbyangs dang bcas pas bstod do/ /mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod/ /ces pa ni gong
<p>37b.6</p>gi don bsdus pa ste/ gong gi mchod pa de rnams kyis mchod pa'i don to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la slob dpon gyis dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi don mdzod cig par gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /da ni gtor ma'i mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ de nas 'byung
<p>37b.7</p>po rnams kyis gtor ma bya/ /sems can bkres shing skom la btung ba dang / /phyogs skyong gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag /de yi gtor ma ji ltar mthun par bya/ /zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan las 'byung ba bzhin yo byad tshogs par bsags la/ tshangs pa la sogs pa gling bzhin gnas pa
<p>38a</p>
<p>38a.1</p>la gcig /lha min dri za la gcig /gnod sbyin srin po la gcig /'byung po yi dgas la gcig /klu sbrul rigs la gcig /rgyal po bzhi la gcig /gza' dang rgyu skar la gcig /dmyal srung bcu drug la gcig /bgegs kyi rigs la gcig /drang srong
<p>38a.2</p>chen po rnams la gcig /mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gcig /'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams la gcig dbul bar bya'o/ /yang na mgon po rnams la gcig /'gro ba ris drug rnams la spyir gcig /klu rnams la klu sman sna tshogs la sbyar ba gcig /mkha' 'gro ma dang srin po la sha khrag
<p>38a.3</p>sna tshogs las byas pa gcig /bgegs kyi rigs thams cad la gcig go/ /de'i phyir na/ gtor ma ji ltar mthun par bya/ /zhes so/ /de rnams la yang dang po rgyu bstan pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs brjod pa dang / mgron rnams bsam pa dang / spyan
<p>38a.4</p>drangs pa dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / gtor ma bsngo ba dang / smon lam gdab pa dang / phrin las bcol ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / de ltar rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i cho gas phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin no/ /de nas sbyin sreg
<p>38a.5</p>gi cho gas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags sam sarba bita kyis zhi ba'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ dpal kun rig la sogs pa'i snying pos kyang sreg blugs bdun bdun dbul bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la ji srid dkyil 'khor thog ma dang tha ma med par mthong bar gyur pa'i sgra'am gzugs la
<p>38a.6</p>sogs pa'i mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o/ /de'i phyir na/ de nas mtshan ma skyes te mgu nas ni/ /thog ma tha ma med par mngon sum mthong / zhes so/ /da ni slob ma dbang bskur ba ston te/ de la yang sta gon la gnas pa dang / dbang bskur ba
<p>38a.7</p>gnyis kyis bstan te/ de nas sngags pa bla med byang chub kyi/ /gnas su slob ma yongs su smin par bya/ /zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa ni de nas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i rjes thogs la bya'o/ /sngags pa ni slob dpon no/ /bla med byang chub kyi gnas ni dkyil 'khor chen po'o/ /slob
<p>38b</p>
<p>38b.1</p>mi yongs su smin par bya ba ni sdom pa la gnas shing dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /'gro la phan phyir zhes pa ni slob dpon gyis slob ma de la phan par bya ba'i phyir te/ myur du byang chub thob par bya ba'i ched du byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug go/ /de'i don yang 'di yin te byang chub sems bskyed pa la yang
<p>38b.2</p>don dam pa dang kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bskyed du gzhug go/ /de yang gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /zhes bya ba nas/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /zhes bya ba yan chad dang / /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /
<p>38b.3</p>zhes bya ba nas/ sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /ces bya ba yan chad kyis sdom pa bzung ba dang / bdag byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du zhes bya ba nas/ sems can gyi don byed par gyur cig ces pa yan chad kyis sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni
<p>38b.4</p>slob ma de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su bskyed nas/ gnas bzhir byin gyis rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgyas brlab par byas nas/ rdo rje bzhad pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho gas so shing sbyin pa dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i srung skud gdags pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang
<p>38b.5</p>rdo rje rnon pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i ku sha sbyin pa dang / rdo rje bsrung ba'i chus kha bkru ba dang / smon lam gdab pa'o/ /zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bsgrags la zhes pa ni zab pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan/ rgya che ba ni sdong pos brgyan pa'i don bstan pa'o/ /bsrung ba byas nas
<p>38b.6</p>zhes pa ni rdo rje go cha dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsrung pa byas la/ shes ldan nang par dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas gnas su gtong ba'o/ /des ni slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'o/ /da ni slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ de yang brtul zhugs sdom gnas pa/ 
<p>38b.7</p>zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i dam tshig dang / rigs lnga'i sdom pa la gnas pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /rab zhi kha nas sngags brjod ces bya ba ni las kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyis so/ /gzhug par bya zhes pa ni slob ma sems rnam par dag pa de'o/ /dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs
<p>39a</p>
<p>39a.1</p>nas ni/ /zhes pa ni le brgan rtsi'i kha dog dmar pos gdong g.yogs byas la/ sogs pas ni stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs rdo rje 'dzin ma'i sngags sam rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i chus bsang ngo / /rdo rje 'dzin ma dpal gyi pad+mar lag gnyis bya/ /zhes pa ni rigs
<p>39a.2</p>kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la 'dir sems ma rdo rje ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ni ma yin no/ /rin chen me tog la sogs de brgyan la/ /g.yon gyi lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya/ /zhes pa ni phyag rgya de rin po che sna lnga'am/ me tog gam/ slob dpon mnyes par byed
<p>39a.3</p>pa'i yon gyis bkang la gzhug par bya'o/ /oM badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha hU~M gis rdo rje sems dpar slob ma byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hU~M ni phyag rgya bcing ba'o/ /oM badzra pra be sha ya badzra hU~M ni mig gdab ba'o/ /a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye hU~M ni chos gos gsum bskon zhing sems
<p>39a.4</p>dpa' chen por bya'o/ /yang slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /sems can kun la sman slad du'o/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi/ /zhes pas rjes su gnang ba nod par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas
<p>39a.5</p>gsol ba gdab pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / slob dpon la gsol ba gdab pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon gyis rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma la bskur ba dang / sdom pa
<p>39a.6</p>sbyin pa dang / slob mas sdom pa blang ba dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / ye shes dbab pa dang / 'og nas 'byung bas dam tshig bsgrags pa dang / snang ba dri ba byas nas/ de nas/ sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ /zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub ni bla
<p>39a.7</p>na med pa'i byang chub po/ /de thob par bya ba'i phyir kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas gtso bo khyed rnams kyis bzhes su gsol zhes pa'i don to/ /oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na zhes pa la sogs kyis me tog dor ro/ /oM pra tIts+tsha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM gyis me tog blangs la slob ma'i
<p>39b</p>
<p>39b.1</p>mgo la bcing pa'o/ /me tog rin chen la sogs pa de bsgyur bar me tog gang la bab pa de rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yi dam gyi lha yin gyis gtso bo'am rigs te sems dpa' gang la bab pa de khyod kyis bsgrub par gyis shig de bsgrubs na khyod kyis thun mong dang khyad par gyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom
<p>39b.2</p>med do/ de nas sngags la mkhas pa yis/ /zhes pa ni rdo rje slob dpon no/ /des slob ma la sngags 'dis dam tshig sbyin par bya'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT ces pa la sogs pas ni dam tshig sbyin pa dang / bstan pa dang / thob par bya ba'o/ /de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o/ /
<p>39b.3</p>zhes pa ni dam tshig ni mi 'da' ba'o/ /gang las mi 'da' zhe na/ bsgrags pa 'di las so/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /zhes pa ni rdo rje'i chu 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'od du zhu bar byas pa'i chu 'dis slob ma rdo rje 'dzin par bsgoms pa la blud pas sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig chu
<p>39b.4</p>'dis grub par gyur cig /ci ste dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i chu 'dis snying la reg nas de ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pas snying bkas nas dmyal bar bsgyur ro/ /der ma zad de bdun rgyud kyi rigs kun kyang rlag par byed do/ /gtan tshigs de bas na bu khyod kyis zhes
<p>39b.5</p>pa ni bod par bya'o/ /rgyal bas te shAkya thub pas so/ /des gsungs pa'i sdom pa dang dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba'o/ /de la sdom pa ni thun mong dang khyad par ro/ /dam tshig ni sku gsung thugs so/ /de ltar bla mas phog pa'i bka' las ma 'da' bar bsrung bar gyis shig pa'o/ /
<p>39b.6</p>sdom pa phyi ma ni dkyus na gsal bas ma bkrol lo/ /bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ de ltar 'jug pa'i rim pa byas nas bdag gi de kho na nyid de rigs kyi lha gang bsgom pa'i rim pa'i man ngag me tog gang la bab pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pa
<p>39b.7</p>bstan pa dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid bzlas pa'i rim pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang / lha'i de kho na nyid bzhi de bzhin du bstan no/ /mos pa brtan dang ldan par dam bcas nas/ /zhes pa ni mos pa ni gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa la mos pa'o/ /brtan pa ni las dang 'bras bu
<p>40a</p>
<p>40a.1</p>bden pa dang / dkon mchog la mngon par yid ches pa'i dad pa dang brtson 'grus la ldog pa med pa'o/ /dam bcas nas zhes pa ni sdom pa dang tshul khrims la gnas pa ste/ thun mong dang khyad par gyi dam tshig la gnas pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi dam
<p>40a.2</p>tshig la gnas pa'o/ /sarba bita kyis ji ltar dbang bskur te/ /zhes pa ni dbang la rnam pa bzhi ste/ rig pa'i dbang dang / slob dpon gyi dbang bcu dang / rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang ste bzhi'o/ /de la sarba bi ta kyis ji ltar bskur ba de ni sar+b+ba bita ni rdo rje
<p>40a.3</p>sems dpa'i bum pa ste/ rig pa'i dbang bskur bar bya ste/ sar+b+ba bita kyis bum pa'i dbang dang / cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang dang / rdo rje'i dbang dang / dril bu'i dbang dang / bdag po'i dbang dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba'o/ /te zhes pa ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'i tshig dang / slob dpon
<p>40a.4</p>gyi dbang bcu la sogs pa dang 'brel to/ /yang na rigs rnams kyi bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel to/ /slob dpon gyi dbang bcu ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar gyi sgor khru gnyis dor bar dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i phyed kyi tshad tsam gyi zur bzhi pa sgo nub tu btod la 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin bris par
<p>40a.5</p>dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang byang du yang de bzhin du bris la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de yang / bum pa la sogs ji snyed mang thogs pas/ /bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur/ /zhes gsungs te/ nyon mongs pa lnga 'joms pa rigs lnga'i bum pa'i dbang dang / 
<p>40a.6</p>thabs mkhas pa phreng ba'i dbang dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi cod pan gyi dbang dang / mi 'da' ba phyag rgya'i dbang dang / rgyal ba'i sras kyi ming gi dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las la bzhag pa las kyi dbang dang / 'khor ba gting nas 'joms pa 'khor lo'i dbang dang / gnyis su med pa
<p>40a.7</p>gzungs kyi dbang dang / chos nyid kyi don mthong ba gsang ba'i dbang dang / bde ba chen po thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang dang bcu'o/ /de bcus ni slob dpon du 'os pa rnams la ci dga' ste rigs kyi dbye bas gcig gam/ lnga char la sogs pa ji ltar dga' bar bskur ro/ /de nas gsang ba shes rab
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>ye shes kyi dbang sbyin te/ de yang rigs kyis shes par bya'o/ /de nas lag tu dril bu dang rdo rje sbyin/ /zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang dril bu sbyin no/ /rdo rje'i rigs la ni khro bo'i rdo rje dang dril bu sbyin no/ /rin po che'i rigs la ni rdo rje rin po che dang dril bu sbyin
<p>40b.2</p>no/ /pad+ma'i rigs la ni rdo rje pad+ma dang dril bu sbyin no/ /las kyi rigs la ni rdo rje sna tshogs dang dril bu sbyin no/ /de rnams kyis rdo rje'i de kho na nyid dang / dril bu'i de kho na nyid dang / phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid bstan to/ /'dir rdo rje dril bu'i ni smos la phyag rgya chen po ni ma smos na dgos pa ci yod ce na/ rigs kyi
<p>40b.3</p>sku gsung thugs las thugs dang gsung smos pas sku ma smos kyang rgyud gzhan las gsung smos pas nyes pa med do/ /'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la/ /mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo thob pa dang / /sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang rnams bskur bar bya/ /zhes pa ni sa dang po la sogs pa'i
<p>40b.4</p>sa la gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun dang / bkra shis brgyad dang / nye ba'i rin po che sna bdun dang / brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / gzengs bstod pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang bskur ro/ /de la/ mi yi dbang phyug 'khor lo thob pa dang / /zhes pa ni mi'i dbang
