<p>98b.3</p>tshad ni ji tsam par gtor ba byas nas/ sa'i lha mo nam mkha' la gshegs su gsol bar byas la/ sa sbyang ba'i cho ga ni/ ji tsam 'dod pa'i gnas su gru bzhir dmigs la klu'i bdag po bsams te brko bar bya'o/ /de la klu'i gtso bo don zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te/ ston zla gsum
<p>98b.4</p>la glo g.yas pa sa la phab ste/ kha lho phyogs su bltas te nyal lo/ /dgun zla gsum la lhor mgo bstan la nub tu kha bltas la nyal/ dpyid zla ba gsum la mgon tu blta kha byang du blta'o/ /dbyar zla ba gsum la byang du mgo blta shar du kha bltas te nyal/ de nas klu'i
<p>98b.5</p>mgo bo dang rgyab dang 'phong bor nas sa brko bar bya/ mngon par dag pa'i dngos grub kyi don du brang gi phyogs su/ lkog ma dang / lte ba dang / pus mo tsam gyi bar du/ dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum 'dod pa'i phyir/ g.yas g.yon du bzhugs par bsam zhing brko bar bya ste/ 
<p>98b.6</p>sa phyung la gzhan bzang po nub pa dang / rdo ba dang mgal dum dang / sol ba dang / rus pa dang / gyo mo dang bong ba la sogs pa med par byas nas yang dri zhim po dang sa bsres/ yang na ni dri zhim po dang chu bsres pa'am/ yi ge hU~M bzlas pa'i chu dang bsres shing 'thas par bcags
<p>98b.7</p>shing bkab la/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa'i steng du gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi dang rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la/ skar khung dang skar khung dra ba can la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i nang du chud par bsam/ ngos thams cad du sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang dril bu dang / 
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>me long gdags rgyal mtshan bzang po gzugs pa bla re dam pa bre ba dang / sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ras ris kyis nye bar mdzes par byas la/ gtso bo'i bzlas pa byas pa'i sman dang / 'bru dang / rin po che dbus su gzhug par bya'o/ /
<p>99a.2</p>zug rngu'i nyes pa thams cad ni/ /gal te dbyung bar mi nus na/ /lag pas brdabs te sngags 'di bzla/ /dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ /khang pa chen po dang / brag phug dang / ba lang gi lhas dang / lha khang la sogs pa dang / 'bab chu'i 'gram dang / sngar byas
<p>99a.3</p>pa'i sa la yang sbyang mi dgos kyi 'di ltar yang bya ste/ rang gtso bor bsgom zhing khro bo'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad pa dang / chu dang yungs kar dang thal ba la bzlas te/ snga ma bzhin du gtor zhing / shar phyogs nas brtsams te/ ba'i rnam pa lngas byug par bya zhing / dri chab
<p>99a.4</p>kyis kyang gtor/ khro bo'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pa'i sman dang / 'bru dang / rin po che dbus su gzhug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi gnas sbyang ba'i rim pa gnyis su byas pas dag pa'i cho ga'o/ /de bzhin du lha khang dang / mchod rten dang / rgyal po'i khang pa dang / 'du
<p>99a.5</p>khang la sogs pa byed na yang sa sbyang bar bya'o/ /de nas de lta bu'i gnas la nyin re'am/ zla re'am/ lo re'i bar gyis dkyil 'khor bya bar 'dod na/ yon bdag gi 'byor pa dang ci dga' bas bya'o/ /ji ltar mos pa bzhin du zhag dang / gza' skar la sogs pa'i dbus su
<p>99a.6</p>gzung bar bya ste/ de la slob dpon rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa'i rim pas bgegs bskrad de/ snying ga nas byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo las sprul pa byung bas/ nam mkha' khyab par bsams te/ phyogs
<p>99a.7</p>bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa khyed rnams bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ byin gyis brlab cing bsrung ba'i phyir bzhugs su gsol zhes bskul zhing / snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje'i dbus su bsdus te bcug la gcig tu gyur par bsams te/ de nas rang gi lus
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal du byas la/ snying po brjod cing sems dpa'i skyil mo krung phye la langs nas/ mig g.yon pa la yi ge Ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ g.yas pa la yi ge ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bras bu gnyis la yi ge hUM shin tu g.yo ba bskal pa'i me ltar
<p>99b.2</p>'bar ba'i rdo rje'i mig byas te/ lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje gsor zhing / g.yon pa dril bu dkrol zhing bzung la/ mgo dang mig g.yon du cung zad btud la/ a las sna tshogs rdo rje rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams te/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i khro bo'i nga rgyal bskyed de/ thams
<p>99b.3</p>cad du blta zhing rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor bar bya zhing / bgegs thams cad bskrad pa'i phyir 'di skad ces brjod do/ /slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya
<p>99b.4</p>ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po ming 'di zhes bya ba bri'i/ lha dang lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang yi dgas dang / sha za dang brjed byed dang / 'byung po dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnon po dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / 
<p>99b.5</p>rig sngags sgrub pa rgan po dang / rgan mo dang 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas/ myur ba nyid du dengs shig gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni/ phyag na rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can
<p>99b.6</p>gyis ye shes kyi rdo rje chen po rab tu 'bar bas/ mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /hU~M zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas rang gi gtso bo las sprul pa'i khro bo grangs med pa shin tu 'jigs pa byung ste/ bgegs rnams shin tu skrag cing bskrad par byas nas/ nam mkha'
<p>99b.7</p>khyab par 'khyil zhing bzhugs so/ /de nas gar gyi g.yas brkyang ba dang / g.yon brkyang ba la sogs pa'i stang stabs 'dir bya'o/ /de nas mtha' yas dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / sprin sgra dang / stobs bo che dang / rgyal ba la sogs pa phur bu lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyi/ khro bo
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>gzugs 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa dbus su btsugs la/ de nas dbang ldan nas brtsams te bskor phyogs su/ oM bai ro tsa na hU~M sarba big+h+nAM u tsa ta ya hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba'i sngags kyis phur bu rnams la bzla zhing 'og nas/ gser gyi sa gzhi la thug pa'i bar du
<p>100a.2</p>gdab par bsam mo/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te hU~M brjod cing nga rgyal bskyed de/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa la snga ma bzhin sprul la/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings shing sngags brjod la/ de'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ nam mkha' la mi bskyod
<p>100a.3</p>pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya nga rgyal bskyed cing / grogs po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir bdag nyid la gsol ba gdab par bsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag po med
<p>100a.4</p>pa'i mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs/ /kun du bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung / /ye shes spyod pa
<p>100a.5</p>rnam spyod pa/ /kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /de nas langs te de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>100a.6</p>thams cad kyis nam mkha' khyab par mthong ste/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA da ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas langs la nga rgyal bskyed par bya/ bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang
<p>100a.7</p>nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag /phyag na rdo rje bstan bdag ste/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag /byin gyis brlab cing bzhugs so gsol/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu blangs la/ oM badzra u tiSh+Tha zhes
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor rnams snga ma bzhin du nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol lo/ /g.yas brkyang ba la sogs pas bgegs bskrad par bya ste/ sa gzhi thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la/ gzhal yas khang nam mkha' la dmigs la/ rdo rje'i mig
<p>100b.2</p>gis phyogs mtshams su bgegs med par mthong nas/ sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye ste/ sngags pas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje rgyu'i gzugs su/ lto ba che ba dbu bzhi pa/ rdo rje dang 'khor lo/ pad+ma dang dril bu bsnams pa/ sku mdog ser por bsgoms te/ sngags
<p>100b.3</p>'di dang rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bkug la/ oM badzra maN+Dal hU~M dza/ zhes rdo rje rgyu nyid bsgyur bas phyag rgya dang sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi grub par gyur te/ byin gyis brlabs pa bya/ oM ma hA badzra tsakrA d+hi tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha hU~M/ zhes pa rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ 'khor lo bzhin du
<p>100b.4</p>bskor bar bya/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo'i tshul gyis ni/ 'khor lo byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya 'di'o/ /de nas mtha' yas dang rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa sngar dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phur bu gdab/ tsan+dan dmar po dang / dar dang sku'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ g.yon pa'i
<p>100b.5</p>khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ g.yas pas 'bar ba'i tho ba tsan+dan dmar po dang / me tog dmar po dang / dar dang srad bu dang bcas pa'i tho ba blangs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol dbang ldan nas brtsams te brdung bar bya/ sngar bshad pa'i sngags sam/ yang na oM badzra kro d+ha kI li kI
<p>100b.6</p>la ya sarba bi g+h+n+'aM hUM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba ni phur ba gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra mud+ga ra A ko Ta ya huM/ tho ba'i sngags so/ /de nas rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya phyogs bcur bstan cing bgegs bskrad par bya/ oM AHhUM/ yi ge gsum gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du 'khor lo'i rim pa dang / 
<p>100b.7</p>pad+ma'i rim pa dang / rdo rje'i rim par bsams la/ de'i phyi rol du rdo rje dra ba dang / sa gzhi yang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas la/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od dang bcas pa bsgoms la/ bgegs bskrad cing / rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo rnams bcing bar bya/ de nas
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>yi ge laM las byung ba'i sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo bum pa lag na thogs pa rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs te/ dgug pa la sogs pa bya zhing tshigs bcad 'dis sta gon du bya/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad
<p>101a.2</p>par ni/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar bya ste dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /mchod pa byas la sa'i lha mo dga' ba'i mdangs
<p>101a.3</p>kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces bya zhing 'og tu thim par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i phyag rgya dang / /sngags 'dis sa gzhi gzung bar bya'o/ /oM badzra b+ha hUM/ zhes brjod de/ oM badzra d+ha d+ha a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ zhes pas byin gyis brlabs/ 'di ni sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga'o/ /
<p>101a.4</p>de nas dri bzang pos byugs nas/ me tog sna tshogs kyis chal mar bkram ste/ zla ba la sogs pas lha rnams ji ltar gnas pa'i ming brjod de/ maN+Dal re re bya'o/ de'i 'og tu rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ drwa ba dang ra ba la sogs pas/ mtshams bcad nas
<p>101a.5</p>mchod pa dang / bstod pa byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ ji ltar rang gi sgrub thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du bgegs bsal nas rnal 'byor chen po byas te/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bsgyur nas/ nga rgyal bskyed cing
<p>101a.6</p>sems dag par bya zhing / /deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi bsod nams 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gi mnyam par/ /gyur pa bdag ni the tshom med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig las/ /mi bdog par ni bdag gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
<p>101a.7</p>rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gis chos sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>ba gdab par bya'o/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum brjod
<p>101b.2</p>do/ /snga ma bzhin du bsams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ oM la sogs pa rang gi yi ge bkod la/ lha 'khor dang bcas pa so so'i gnas la bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de'i 'og tu ye shes sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa dgug pa dang / 
<p>101b.3</p>gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas te/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang gcig tu gyur par bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / so sor gnas la bzhugs su gsol te/ oM bai ro tsa na/ ar+g+haM pratIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor la mchod pa
<p>101b.4</p>rnam pa lnga phul la/ bstod pa dang phyag bya'o/ /gser ram dngul lam zangs las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bya/ ma 'byor na kham pa las bya/ de nyid dngos po med par bsams la/ yi ge baM las byung ba nag po ra ri med pa/ mgrin pa ring ba lta ba che ba mchu 'phyangs pa bsgoms te/ 
<p>101b.5</p>de'i nang du d+hi las pad+ma de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ snga ma bzhin du lha'i 'khor lo bsams la/ de rnam par gyur pa las bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsgoms te/ de nas dri blugs la/ sman la sogs pa dang ldan par byas te/ shwe ta br-i
<p>101b.6</p>ha ti a pa ra dzi ta daN+DA ut+pa la kaN+Da ka ri ha sa de ba la sogs pa'i rtsa ba las byas te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rtags su byas pa'o/ /nas so ba dang / sran ma sha dang / nas dang / til dang / gro 'di rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
<p>101b.7</p>kyi rang bzhin no/ /shel dang / dngul dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / bye ru ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mdog gi rtags so/ /nang gi bum pa la ni 'di rnams gzhug par bya ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma dang / chu dang dri dang bza' ba rnams su gzhug go/ /bum pa la
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>'khor lo'i bdag po'i mtshan ma la sogs pa lnga dang ldan par bya zhing dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po'i rigs rnams kyis mgul pa bcing bar bya'o/ /ma 'byor na ras cung zad cig gis spyir bya'o/ /shing 'o ma can 'bras bu dang
<p>102a.2</p>bcas pa kha brgyan par bya'o/ /gtso bo'i phyag rgya'am rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bstan cing / gtso bo'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad dam brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la gzhag par bya'o/ /yang na spyi'i sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la gzhag /oM badzra u ta ga hUM/ zhes bya bas so/ /de nas bum
<p>102a.3</p>pa'i gzhi me tog dkar po chal bar bkram pa'am/ ras bting pa'i steng du gzhag go/ /de bzhin du mchod yon gyi snod gnyis chu dang bcas pa bzhag la/ dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i zhag gi bar du nyin re lan gsum du phyi nang gi mchod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang bzlas pa bya'o/ /de
<p>102a.4</p>nas dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor bskor la dang po dbus su gzhag /de nas lha so so'i gnas su gzhag go/ /bum pa'i grangs ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha du yod pa de tsam du bya'o/ /de ma 'byor na bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes rgyud las 'byung / sman dang / 'bru dang / rin po
<p>102a.5</p>che dang ldan pa ras zung dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / tsan+dan dang gur kum la sogs pa'i dri bzang pos bskus pa'i bum pa/ rang gi lha'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i rim bzhin du gzhag par bya/ de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa la bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags bzla zhing / sna tshogs rdo rjes
<p>102a.6</p>mtshan pa la mchod pa bya ste/ phyi rol du byang shar mtshams su gzhag par bya ste/ 'di skad gsol ba gdab par bya/ khyed kyis dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs kyi bar du/ bgegs ma rungs pa rnams bsrung du gsol zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i sta gon gyi cho ga'o/ /phyi rol du song ste rnam
<p>102a.7</p>par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du gnas la/ phyogs skyong la gtor ma btang ste zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sar zhugs te snga ma bzhin du ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /oM pad+ma sa ra swa dwa a ba ra ta ya sho d+ha ya hUM hrI d+hi/ lce byin gyis
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>brlabs pa byas nas/ lag par bdug spos thogs te/ pus mo sa la btsugs nas 'di skad gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la brtse bar gyur nas su/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed
<p>102b.2</p>rnams la yang brtse ba'i phyir/ /sa 'dir dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas snang ba mdzad pa'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon brtse dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang / /gsang sngags lha gzhan gang lags dang / /
<p>102b.3</p>'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang / /gang su lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag ming 'di la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming / /'di zhes
<p>102b.4</p>bgyi ba ci nus kyis/ /cho ga bzhin du bri lags na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas bsam pa thag pa nas/ bstod
<p>102b.5</p>pa dang phyag byas te/ phyi rol du byung nas slob ma sta gon du gnas par bya ste/ de nas lus bkru ba dang / dag pa dang gos gtsang ma bgos la/ snyim pa me tog gis bkang la/ slob dpon la phyag byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas/ slob
<p>102b.6</p>dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po
<p>102b.7</p>bdag ni 'jug par bgyi/ /'di skad ces lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas slob dpon gyis mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma bos te/ 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul go cha ni/ /khyod la yang
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /de bzhin gang dag ma byon pa/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan zhing bzhugs pa dag /de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bos byang
<p>103a.2</p>chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen par mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /rtog
<p>103a.3</p>pa mang po legs par bsdus nas ni/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon/ /brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /de nas cho ga 'dis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug /bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis dang / /
<p>103a.4</p>bgyid du stsal la yi rang ba/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su/ /de dag bdag gis bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyi/ /bsgom dang bzlas brjod bsod nams kyi/ /de dag bdag ni yi rang ngo / /sems
<p>103a.5</p>bskyed mngon par sangs rgyas dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa' tshogs spyod dang / /de nas bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta bar/ /skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar/ /de ring nyid du
<p>103a.6</p>sems bskyed do/ /mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /ma lus bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dus 'di nyid nas 'tshang rgya'i bar/ /bla med bdag la gzigs su gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas
<p>103a.7</p>rnal 'byor sdom pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>zhing ni lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung / /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag
<p>103b.2</p>nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /bdag gi dge ba'i chos rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten
<p>103b.3</p>mi ring sangs rgyas myur bsgrub nas/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/ /bla med byang chub nyid du bsgral bar bgyi/ /zhes zhus pa/ slob dpon gyis slob ma la bsrung ba bya ste/ khro bo'i sngags kyis tshems shing la bzlas pa bya'o/ /so shing cho ga ni 'di'o/ /u dum+WA ra
<p>103b.4</p>a shwad+tha/ me tog bcings shing dri yis byug /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /ma yo ma gas 'bus ma zos/ /lci bas pa yi ko ba tsam/ /sa gzhi maN+Dal byas nas ni/ /slob ma de yi steng bzhag nas/ /me tog la sogs mchod pa bya/ /slob ma'i tshogs la sbyin par bya/ /de
<p>103b.5</p>nas shar phyogs kha bltas te/ /mi smra bar ni so shing bca'/ /bca' ba zin nas mi dgab shing / /phan tshun du yang mi dor ro/ /de tshe bdag la blta ba dang / /rtse mo gyen du 'greng gyur na/ /de ni dngos grub mchog ces bya/ /de bzhin shar du kha bltas na/ /de yis dngos grub 'bring
<p>103b.6</p>du bshad/ /mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/ /'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'grub/ /so shing bor ba brgya zhig la/ /gal te thur du kha bltas na/ /de ni nges par sa 'og gi /dngos grub de la the tshom med/ /de nas dri'i chus lag pa bkrus te/ 'thor 'thung bya'o/ /yang oM hri
<p>103b.7</p>bi shud+d+ha s+sarba d+harmA s+sarba pA pa ni tsas+ya saM sho d+ha ya sarba bi kalpA pa nA ya hUM/ zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas pa'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug par bya ba'i phyir sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu slob ma rnams la sems dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan par bya'o/ /bar 'dir chos bstan
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>pa'i cho ga gzhan du ltos/ de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ku sha la bzlas la/ 'og gi phyogs su zhog ces bsgo/ /bgegs kyi dgra'i sngags bzlas pa/ /stan du yang ni gding bar bya/ /grangs drug mdud drug byas pa yi/ /srung skud dpung pa g.yon par gdags/ /
<p>104a.2</p>yi ge brgya pas brtan byas pa/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni gdags par bya'o/ /de nas bzhin bzang rnams longs shig /sang gi nyin mo khyed rnams kyis/ /thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /grong khyer chen po mthong 'gyur gyis/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du mchod pa rnam pa lnga byas nas/ gtor ma
<p>104a.3</p>btang ste nang du zhugs nas dkyil 'khor la phyi nang gi mchod pas yang dag par mchod de/ gnas de nyid du ku sha'i stan la slob ma dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du seng ge'i nyal stabs su 'dug la/ rmi lam gyi mtshan ma blta ba'i phyir/ mi smra bar bsam pa'i sems kyis nyal bar bya'o/ /
<p>104a.4</p>de nang par mtshan mo'i mthar rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba dri bar bya/ dri ba thos nas rmi lam bzang ngan 'dzem pa med par bstan par bya'o/ /rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba ni/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos/ rmi lam bzang po mthong na slob ma la rjes su
<p>104a.5</p>yi rang ba dang / dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma bstan par bya'o/ /ngan pa mthong na ba'i rnam pa lnga la khro bo'i sngags bzlas te/ 'thung du gzhug cing bsrung ba bya/ 'grub na drag po'i sbyin sreg kyang bya zhing rtog pa bsal bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon phyag rgya chen po dang ldan par byas te/ 
<p>104a.6</p>snga ma bzhin du phur bu dang dra ba dang ra ba dang phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /yi ge gsum las ri rab bskyed/ de'i steng du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms te/ /de las sprul pa byung bas srad bu 'dzin par bsams la/ nges par dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ /su zhig gis
<p>104a.7</p>ni bya bar nus/ /lha yi rnal 'byor rang gnas na/ /dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes rgyud las 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o/ /glu dang rol mo me tog
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>la sogs pa/ /mchod pa rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu srad bu so sor byas te/ dkar po dang ser po dang / sngon po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu rnams la/ oM hUM trAM hrIHkhaM/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'bru lnga bzlas la/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
<p>104b.2</p>bsgoms te/ mig g.yas g.yon la nyi ma dang zla ba bsams te/ oM di ba d+h+ra riSh+Tha oM ku dzaH/ zhes bzlas la/ lcags kyu 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin 'byung bas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bskul te/ ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab
<p>104b.3</p>par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa'i rdo rje srad bu stsal du gsol/ de nas ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i thugs nas phyung ste/ lcags kyus bskul ba'i tshul du/ rang gi lag tu 'ong bar bsams te/ rnam
<p>104b.4</p>par snang mdzad mdun du dmigs la/ oM dzi na dzikaswA hA/ zhes brjod la bsgril bar bya'o/ /de nas tsan+dan bzang po la sogs pas/ legs par bskus pa'i gser gyi snod la sogs pa'i nang du legs par bzhag la/ me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ rdo rje'i mig byas la/ 
<p>104b.5</p>rdo rje khu tshur gyis srad bu bzung la/ oM badzra be ya ma sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /oM oM hUM/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /yang dkyil 'khor dri bzang pos byugs te/ phyi rol 'khor bar me tog bkram nas nam mkha' na bzhugs pa'i dkyil
<p>104b.6</p>'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod yon phul te/ me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul/ sgeg mo la sogs pa phyi nang gi mchod pas kyang mchod/ glu dang rol mo sogs pa ci nus kyis mchod nas/ sngags pa rang nyid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya'o/ /
<p>104b.7</p>de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor du byas te/ oM dzi na dzika /ces bya ba'i snying po ci nus su brjod nas/ rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa'i snying ga las/ grogs po sprul nas byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur ba bya ste/ mdun du
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>blta bar byas nas phan tshun rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur gyi tshad sboms su sgo'i nyi shu'i cha'i srad bu rdo rje khu tshur g.yon pas bzung la/ phyogs thams cad mnyam par dmigs shing / oM dza dza dza/ zhes bya ba gsum brjod la
<p>105a.2</p>lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ grogs po'i lag tu gtad par bya'o/ /grogs pos rkang pa mdun du bsnur nas/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dza dza dza gsum brjod nas blangs te/ slob dpon nub tu 'dug la kha shar du blta ba dang / de bzhin du lhor 'dug la byang du bltas
<p>105a.3</p>la gnam thig gdab bar bya'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ zhes gnyis kas brjod par bya'o/ /snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du mtshungs pa'i thig kyang de bzhin du gdab bar bya'o/ /slob dpon dang slob ma gnyis g.yas su bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas me'i phyogs su 'dug la byang du
<p>105a.4</p>mngon par phyogs par byas nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar ngos kyi thig gdab par bya'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su gnas nas lhor mngon par phyogs te nub tu thig gdab bo/ /de bzhin du 'dug la shar du phyogs te byang gi thig gdab bo/ /yang me'i phyogs char 'dug la/ nub
<p>105a.5</p>tu mngon par phyogs la lho'i ngos su thig gdab go /de bzhin du 'dug la rlung phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ /yang bden bral gyi phyogs su 'dug la/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su srad bu bre bar bya ste/ cha bzhir bgos te phyed ni nang gi /phyed ni phyi'i sa/ rim pa 'di bzhin du dkyil
<p>105a.6</p>'khor thams cad la thig gdab par bya'o/ /thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi/ /ring thung khyer na na bar 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul slob ma myos par 'gyur/ /des na nan tan thams cad du/ /thig skud las ni 'bad par bya/ /de bzhin du thig gdab par bya ste/ ye shes kyi thig skud kyang snga ma
<p>105a.7</p>bzhin du mchod de/ gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas snga ma ye shes kyi skud pa la yig 'bru ji ltar bkod pa bzhin du/ 'dir tshon la yang dgod par bya ste/ de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ /lcags ni sna lnga'i phye ma ste/ /mkhas pas dkar po la sogs pa'o/ /dad cing
<p>105b</p>
<p>105b.1</p>yon tan ldan pa yi/ /slob mas rin chen phye mas bri/ /rin chen lcags rnams ma 'byor na/ /sA lu btags pa'i phye mas bri/ /tshon rtsi zhib mos sngar bshad pa/ /'byung khungs las byung phye mas bya/ /rdo rje'i mkhas ni sna tshogs kyang / /phye ma'i gor ni sbyar bar bya/ /de ltar rnam pa
<p>105b.2</p>bzhi po ni/ /phye ma'i rgyur ni grags pa yin/ /lcags rnams kun dang rin chen dang / /'byung khungs rnams dang 'bras btags pa/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi las rnams la/ /phye ma don du sbyar bar bya/ dam tshig la ni lcags kyi shing / /rin chen las byung dbang bskur la/ /sA lu
<p>105b.3</p>phye ma zhi ba la/ /khams las byung ba rgyas pa la/ /drag shul spyod pa khyad par du/ /thal ba la sogs bya bar shis/ /phye ma rnams kyi bye brag gi /cho ga'i rim pa bstan pa 'di'o/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis lan bdun bdun bzlas te/ de nas tshon rtsi
<p>105b.4</p>thams cad la/ 'bar ba'i mig gis blta bar bya'o/ /de la 'bar ba'i mig gis blta ba ni 'di yin te/ rab tu myur bar g.yo ba'i mig /mig gi rje ma 'dren pa ni/ /'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su gsungs/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs pa'o/ /mthar yi ge hri dang rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag
<p>105b.5</p>rgyas spang bar bya'o/ /de nas tshon bzang po bya ba'i phyir bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o/ /bden pa gang gis sems can rnams la sangs rgyas rnams sems can du dpag pas/ chags pa mdzad pa'i bden pa de tshon rtsi rnams 'bar bar gyur cig ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
<p>105b.6</p>'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de'i 'og tu rdo rje dril bu blangs te/ dkrol zhing bkra shis kyi dbyangs rnams brjod/ de nas bkra shis kyi 'das pa'i bsam pa btang la/ 'gro ba'i don la dmigs te/ oM badzra tsi tra zhes bya ba'i sngags zlos shing / 
<p>105b.7</p>rdo rje khu tshur g.yon pas/ tshon blangs la dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas g.yas su bskor te/ tshon dgye bar bya'o/ /de nas phyis ci bde bar bya'o/ /tshon dgye ba yang / mnyam dang ma 'dres ma yo ba/ /bar ma chad dang g.yon mi bskor/ sboms su sgo yi nyi shu'i tshad/ /re khA'i rnams
<p>106a</p>
<p>106a.1</p>kyang de tsam bya/ sboms na nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phras na yang ni nor zad 'gyur/ /spro bar gyur na mdza' bshes 'bral/ /bar du chad na mkhan slob 'chi/ /g.yon du bskor na sdug bsngal 'bab/ /de bas tshon rtsi nan tan bya/ /sngon po rdo rje'i rang bzhin te/ /
<p>106a.2</p>gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa dang / /pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin gzhan/ /gzhan ngag mar gad lta bur bshad/ /dkar po nang du shes bya ste/ /'di ni tshon gyi rim par 'dod/ /shar phyogs su ni sngon po che/ /lhor ni ser po legs sbyar ba/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang gi ljang
<p>106a.3</p>gu yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni/ /shel ltar snang ba bla na med/ /rdo rje dril bu rtag 'chang ba/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag legs par bri/ /gsang sngags de nyid yongs zlos shing / /tshon gyis thig ni yongs su dgang / /'di ltar bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshon
<p>106a.4</p>spyi'i rim pa'o// //yang gzhan du na dkyil 'khor sgo gnyis pa'am/ gsum pa phya na rdo rje shugs kyi sngags zlos shing / dkyil 'khor rnams nam mkha' la 'degs shing bzhag par bsams la/ 'jug cing 'byung ba la sngags ni 'di/ oM badzra be ga a kra ma hUM/ zhes brjod
<p>106a.5</p>par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bris zin nas bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ khro bo'i sbyor ba byas la/ bgegs rnams bskrad pa dang bsrung ba bya'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug la bgegs bskrad rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje'i dbus su lha'i 'khor lo
<p>106a.6</p>bzhugs par bsam zhing / oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ zhes brjod do/ /'khor lo rim bzhin bsgoms pa bzhin du/ phyag mtshan dang / sku mdog dang gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa bcug cing / me tog la sogs pas mchod/ lha'i
<p>106a.7</p>sngags re re bzlas/ gtso bo'i sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ de nas byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur ba bya ste/ snying ga las phyung la nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol lo/ /yang rnam pa gzhan du na snying gar bzhag ste/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du byas la/ me
<p>106b</p>
<p>106b.1</p>tog gi phreng ba blangs te/ oM AHhU~M/ zhes bzlas zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi gnas nyid du/ g.yas g.yon nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing / dril bu dkrol la lan bdun bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das la phreng ba dbul bar bya'o/ /rdo rje gar bya zhing bskor
<p>106b.2</p>nas slar phreng ba blangs te/ rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rdo rje slob dpon mnyam par bzhag pas/ shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du kha bltas la yid kyis 'khor lo'i sgo dbye bar bya ste/ de'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje mdzub mo legs par ni/ /
<p>106b.3</p>sbyar la bsdams te bkan nas su/ /rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni/ /sgo dbye ba'i phyogs yin no/ /oM badzra u ta g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra we sha ya hU~M/ 'di ni sgo dbye ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rang gi lus gzugs brnyan gyi rnal 'byor byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
<p>106b.4</p>dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la bsgrub par bya ste/ de'i rim pa ni 'di'o/ /dbang por rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du byas la/ oM dzi na dzika A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ zhes bya bas dgug cing / sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams
<p>106b.5</p>cad na/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dgyes shing nam mkha' khyab par bsams te/ rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par bya zhing / rang rang gi gnas su gzhug par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
<p>106b.6</p>cad dgyes pa dang brtan par 'gyur ro/ /rang dang rnam par snang mdzad dang gnyis su med de grogs ltar gyur/ de ltar sgo la sogs pa la dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes bya bas dgug cing / sgo ba rnams bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de ltar rnam par snang mdzad dang gnyis su med par rnal 'byor
<p>106b.7</p>du byas te/ rang gi snying ga nas 'od zer byung bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsal bar bya ste/ sngar gyi snying ga'i lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha so sor thim par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu gtso bo'i snying po brgya rtsa bzla bar bya'o/ /'khor rnams kyi bdun bdun no/ /snga ma bzhin dam pas
<p>107a</p>
<p>107a.1</p>phyag rgya bzhis gdab par bya ste/ de tsam gyis dkyil 'khor 'grub bo/ /de nas gtso bo'i snying po bzla zhing / dkyil 'khor las 'od zer 'phros pas sems can gyi don byas te/ slar log par rang gi gnas la bzhugs par bsgoms te/ oM baM d+ha badzra ba
<p>107a.2</p>ti tiSh+Tha/ zhes rdo rje bcings ba bsdams te/ oM badzra muSh+Ti baM/ zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sngags bzlas/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'am/ gtso bo'i phyag rgya
<p>107a.3</p>bya ste/ me tog gi phreng ba blangs te/ sngags 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa mdun du bzhag ste/ phreng ba bcing bar bya'o/ /sngags ni oM ma hA su kha badzra oM a mo g+ha sa ma yo da ka sid+d+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba mu kha sau ma na s+yaM da da ku ru ku ru dzaHhUM baM hoH/ 
<p>107a.4</p>zhes bya bas bum pa gnas su gzhag par bya/ bum pa phyi ma rnams la yang rang gi mtshan ma btab la/ spyi'i sngags 'di lan bdun bdun bzlas te/ sngags ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzro da ka hUM/ zhes bya'o/ /so so'i sngags kyis btab ste/ rang rang gi gnas su gzhag par
<p>107a.5</p>bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga bya/ oM bai ro tsa na ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / so so'i sngags lnga dang mchod pa dbul/ de nas snying ga nas 'od zer phyung ste/ lA s+ye la sogs pa bcu drug bskul nas dkyil 'khor la mchod par
<p>107a.6</p>bsam mo/ /spyi'i lha mo'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA hA sa la s+ya ra ti kri Di sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes bya ba brjod de/ de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i chus gnas thams cad bsang gtor bya/ de nas lha bshos
<p>107a.7</p>dang / khur ba sna tshogs dang / 'bras chan dang / btung ba'i bye brag la sogs pa mchod pa'i dngos po ci 'byor pa yi ge oM AHhUM/ gtso bo'i sngags kyis btab ste/ dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas oM bai ro tsa na pU ra pU ra a warta ya hoH/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lha
<p>107b</p>
<p>107b.1</p>thams cad la ras dbul lo/ /de nas yang 'byor tshad kyi bla re dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan la sogs pa yang mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams la dbul lo/ /glu dang / gar dang / rol mo dang / rtsed mo dang / dga' ba la sogs pa'i dngos po dang / ting nge 'dzin
<p>107b.2</p>gyis mchod pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o/ /de nas oM a nut+ta ra sarba pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra ga taM s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags lan bdun brjod pas mchod pa'i rnam par gyur te/ lha rnams mnyes shing byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /de
<p>107b.3</p>nas nyes pa che chung rnams med par bya ba'i phyir/ dril bu dkrol zhing yi ge brgya ba lan bdun brjod cing / dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ rtsa ba'i sgor stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing bzlas pa brgya'am stong ci nus brjod la brtan par bya ste/ gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ 
<p>107b.4</p>sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ thugs rjes dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /de nas sgrub pa'i grogs po dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ rang nyid sgor 'dug nas khro bo'i nga rgyal bskyed de/ snga ma bzhin du gtor ma btang ngo / /de nas nyes pa rnams
<p>107b.5</p>sbyang ba'i phyir/ rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du bya ba ste/ las thams cad pa'i thab khung byas nas/ mar la sogs pa'i sreg rdzas kyis zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon lus bkrus la dris byugs la gos sna tshogs bgo ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba bcing ba dang sug smel
<p>107b.6</p>la sogs pa dri bzang po yang bca'o/ /slob dpon rang nyid dang sgrub pa'i grogs dang / skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pas gar glu dang bkra shis dang rol mo'i cha byad rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis rlob
<p>107b.7</p>par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu thugs dgyes pas spyan mdzes pas gzigs shing byams pa dang / snying rje'i shugs kyis bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs rnams la dgongs shing gzigs par gyur nas/ bka' /drin skyob bo/ /de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la/ ci bde
<p>108a</p>
<p>108a.1</p>bar gnas par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor spyi'i cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bya ste/ slob dpon bdag nyid dang po dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nas/ dbang bskur ba rdzogs kyi bar du bka' nyan par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod
<p>108a.2</p>par bya'o/ /'dod chags chen po kun 'byung ba/ /'khor lo de ni gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /slob ma'i don du grong khyer byas/ /de kho na nyid bden par brjod/ /de nas slob ma yol ba'i phyi rol du bzhag ste/ snga ma bzhin du sdom pa blangs la/ gos dmar po bgos pa dang / mig dang
<p>108a.3</p>gdong g.yogs la las thams cad pa'i chus bsang gtor byas la/ 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /ka s+t+waM su ra pra ti yaM/ slob mas 'di skad lan gdab par bya'o/ /su b+ha go haM ma hA su kha/ de nas shar gyi sgor bzhag ste/ sngags 'di brjod cing phyag byed du gzhug go/ /oM sarba
<p>108a.4</p>ta thA ga ta bai ro tsa na pU dzo pas+tha na ya At+ma nAM naR+Yi ta yA mi/ bai ro tsa na a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ zhes byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya zhing snying gar rdo rje 'di bzhag ste/ sngags 'di smra bar bya'o/ /oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a haM sid+d+h+yi badzra ya tha su khaM/ zhes
<p>108a.5</p>brjod do/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la lag tu gzhag /de nas sngags 'dis bsrung ba bya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bai to tsa na sa pa ri bA ra rak+Sha sarba ye b+h+yaHswA hA/ de nas 'di skad brjod de/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis
<p>108a.6</p>brlabs par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar mi bya zhing / dad pa med pa rnams la yang ma yin no/ /de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bkug ste bzhag nas sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug
<p>108a.7</p>go/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du grub pa thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong
<p>108b</p>
<p>108b.1</p>ba su la yang ma smra shig /khyod dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ta re/ snying gar rdo rje bzhag ste/ oM 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /khyod kyi snying la rab tu gnas/ /gal te gzhan zhig la smras na/ /khyod kyi snying las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas dung chos bzang po'am/ nya
<p>108b.2</p>phyis la sogs pa'i nang du chu blugs la yi ge gsum gyis sbar bar bya ste chu blud par bya'o/ /'di skad brjod de/ 'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ oM badzrod ka Tha Tha Tha/ 
<p>108b.3</p>zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig brtan par gyur nas/ slob ma la 'di skad bsgo ste/ deng phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /ya nga ba ma spangs par dus byas
<p>108b.4</p>nas/ dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/ de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal
<p>108b.5</p>'byor du byas la/ de nas 'od zer byung bas slob ma'i snying gar yi ge raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa/ de'i phyi rol du yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chud pa/ gru gsum gyi nang du yi ge hUM las rdo rje dmar po/ spyi bor yi ge oM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa
<p>108b.6</p>'khor bar bsgom mo/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bya ste/ 'di skad smra'o/ /oM A ye shastu te s+t+wa d+he badzra g+ha mA nut+ta raM/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas sboms pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la me la bor te/ bskor zhing slob ma'i lag tu bzhag nas me tog gi phreng ba yang byin la nga rgyal yang
<p>108b.7</p>bskyed de sngags 'di smras so/ /oM bai ro tsa na A we sha d+hu na d+hu na/ kaM pA kaM pA kaM pA ya pa taM g+h+r-i Na g+h+r-i Na pa ya bai ro tsa na swA hA/ zhes bya bas babs nas lce la a dmar po bsams te/ kye rdo rje rung ngam mi rung smros shig ces bya ba dang / legs nyes kun smra bar 'gyur ro/ /oM b+ha ga
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>bAn bai ro tsa na A we sha tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba sha shwa to me b+ha ba hr-i da ya me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+hi m+me bra yats+tsha sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM ha ha ha ha hoH/ zhes brjod do/ /me tog dkyil 'khor du dbul zhing sngags pra tIts+tsha ho/ /slob dpon gyis phreng ba blangs slob ma'i
<p>109a.2</p>mgo la stobs po che 'di long shig byas la bcing bar bya/ de nas sngags 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM bai ro tsa na sa man+ta tiSh+Tha/ tsak+Shu ne tra pa ha ra mung+g+ha Ta ya te/ sarba a k+Sho badzra tsak+Shu a nut+ta raM/ zhes brjod la gdong g.yogs dgrol te mig la oM re re dang / snying
<p>109a.3</p>gar gtso bor bsam par bya/ de ltar 'bab par ma gyur na/ de nas snying gar hUM 'bar ba dmigs la/ rang nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi nga rgyal bskyed la/ de nyid kyi sngags kyi phreng bas dbab par bya ste/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHoM ta Ta ta Ta/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags 'dis dbab par bya/ /
<p>109a.4</p>de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la kye rdo rje zhes bos la/ ltos shig ces bsgo'o/ /dkyil 'khor dbus nas sgo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bstan par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byed du bcug la/ de nas slob dpon phyag lan gsum du byed du gzhug go/ /
<p>109a.5</p>dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor la smon lam btab nas/ rdo rje slob dpon la phyag lan gsum byas la yon gyi mchog dbul bar bya ste/ ba dang / ba lang dang / rta dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / sa gzhi dang / grong dang / 
<p>109a.6</p>nor dang / ma he rnams dbul bar bya/ bdag dang bu dang chung ma dang / /yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs pas/ /slob dpon mnyes par gyur pa ni/ /las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o/ /shin tu gsang ba'i gzhung 'di nyid/ /rdo rje slob ma
<p>109a.7</p>gsol bya ste/ /de nyid la ni yon gyi mchog /dam pa phul nas gsol ba gdab/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal po la/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ltar/ /yon tan ldan pas brtser dgongs nas/ /dbang rnams bdag la stsal du gsol/ /de nas slob dpon gyis snod du
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>rung bar dgongs nas/ dad pa dang sngags mkhas par mthong nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dang por rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa rnams las/ dung phor bzang po'i nang du cha bsdus te/ de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags kyis snying ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyis nam
<p>109b.2</p>mkha' las lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa gser gyi bum pa thogs pa 'byung bas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing / rang gis kyang dung phor gyi chu 'dis spyi bor blugs shing sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes chu'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas dbu rgyan la sangs rgyas
<p>109b.3</p>lnga bsgoms la/ dar dpyangs dang bcas pa lag tu thogs te/ snga ma bzhin du lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur zhing / sngags brjod la dbu rgyan bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra ba ra da ka badzrA ral+li ho/ /de'i steng du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags bzlas pa'i/ me tog gi phreng ba
<p>109b.4</p>bcing bar bya ste/ 'di ni dbu rgyan dang phreng ba'i dbang ngo / /de nas rdo rje bzung la slob ma'i lag pa gnyis kas bzung la/ sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang gis ni/ /khyod ni deng 'dir dbang bskur 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas de kun nyid/ /rab tu 'grub phyir rdo rje long / /'di ni rdo
<p>109b.5</p>rje'i dbang ngo / /de nas lag tu rdo rje dril bu blangs te/ sngags 'dis/ oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hiShiny+tsA mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes bya bas dril bu lag tu byin la 'di skad brjod do/ /dril bu sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /dkrol ba'i sgra ni shes rab nyid/ /khyod kyis
<p>109b.6</p>brtan par gzung bar gyis/ /byang chub mchog ces sangs rgyas gsungs/ /dngos rnams rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /dam pa'i dngos po med par 'gyur/ /'di ni bdag po'i dbang ngo / /de nas spyi bor
<p>109b.7</p>lag pa bzhag la dbang bskur te/ oM badzra satwa twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi badzra nA ma a b+hi she ka ta/ kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs bya ste/ lag par rdo rje blangs te/ 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis rtag tu bcang bar gyis/ /
<p>110a</p>
<p>110a.1</p>phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /slob mas rdo rje'i rtse mo nas bzung nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ye Sha twaM d+ha ra yA mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje thugs dka' thub pa'o/ /de'i dbang po thob pa'i sngags pas
<p>110a.2</p>las ci byas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag kun ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba yin no/ /sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang sbyin par bya ste/ mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang stsol cig /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid/ /ces bya ba'i bar gyis gsol ba
<p>110a.3</p>gdab par bya'o/ /de nas sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng seng ge'i khri byas pa'i steng du ras la sogs pa'i stan bting la/ de'i steng du slob ma bzhag la/ bgegs gzhom pa'i phyir sngags bzla zhing / slob ma shar gyi sgor gzhag par bya ste/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la
<p>110a.4</p>dbang bskur ba'i yo byad rnams bsags te/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas lag pa gnyis su rang gi mtshan ma 'khor lo dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri sbyin par bya zhing 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa dang / dbral ba dang / gzhig pa
<p>110a.5</p>dang / gsad pa dang / dbyung ba dang / dgug pa la sogs pa las thams cad de ring phan chad gyis shig /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /'di ni 'khor
<p>110a.6</p>lo'i dbang ngo / /de nas me long bstan la/ chos kun gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing dngas la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du byung / /ngo bo nyid med gnas med par/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyam
<p>110a.7</p>med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /de nas ho zhes bya bas mda' gzhu byin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir mda' 'phen du gzhug cing / steng 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go/ /de nas rin po che'am
<p>110b</p>
<p>110b.1</p>gser gyi thur ma thogs la/ slob ma'i mig gnyis su pra bkod la/ /thur ma des mig byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /ling thog rgyal ba ngas bsal mdzad/ oM badzra ne tra a
<p>110b.2</p>ba ra ha ra pa Ta laM hri/ de nas dung byin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ de ring phan chad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pa/ /kun du ma lus gang bar gyis/ /de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje lag tu byin la/ lha rnams dang ni sems can la/ /
<p>110b.3</p>ci dga' bar ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba yi/ long shig rdo rje grub pa'i phyir/ /grub pa chen po khyod kyi las/ /bdud rnams chen po 'dul bar gyis/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang / /shing lham dang ni mgu ling ki / lha dang gnod sbyin mo grub dang / /
<p>110b.4</p>ji ltar 'dod pa grub par gyis/ /zhes bsgo/ /de nas slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du byas la/ mdun na slob ma gnas/ sna bug g.yas pa nas nang du bcug la/ 'od zer gyis dag par sbyangs nas sna bug g.yon pa nas phyir byung la mdun du bzhag ste lung bstan par bya/ 
<p>110b.5</p>de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur g.yon pas snying gar chos gos kyi mtha' ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /oM 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan pa/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /srid pa'i mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro dag
<p>110b.6</p>las bton/ /kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa/ satwa sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu ba swaH// zhes gang lung bstan par byas nas/ de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa rang rang
<p>110b.7</p>gi dam tshig mgrin gcig tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su lung ston par 'gyur ro zhes slob ma la bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la/ rgyal po'i dbang gi tshul gyis dung dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / rnga po che dang / rnga thams cad dang / glu dang
<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>sgeg mo la sogs pa thams cad slob ma'i ba spu'i bu gar sprul pa'i tshul du zhugs nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i glu dang / sngags brjod cing tshig 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dbang bskur chen po yis/ /khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa/ /dam tshig gsum gyi
<p>111a.2</p>gnas las byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyis stsol bar mdzad/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ de nas bkra shis rnams mchod par bya'o/ /de nas chos gos rnams bton te/ me tog la sogs pas mchod/ mchod phyir gdu bu bcas par bya/ /de nas
<p>111a.3</p>bla ma bdag nyid kyis/ /de'i spyi bor gdugs kyang gzung / /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug /spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems
<p>111a.4</p>dpa' dang / /lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis/ /bsgrub bya kun kyang rgyud la sbyor/ /khyod kyi chos la ser sna dang / /sems can kun la mi phan pa/ /nyam nga chen por gyur
<p>111a.5</p>kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o/ /de nas gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ phyag rgya slob ma la sbyin par bya'o/ /phyag rgya khyod la byin gyis brtan par gyur cig /bdag gis phyag rgya blangs pa brtan par gyur/ de bzhin du slob dpon gyis slob ma la lha'i sngags dang / man ngag
<p>111a.6</p>dang / phyag rgya bzhi yan bstan cing gnyi gas sngags bzlas shing / slob dpon gyis 'di skad bsgo bar bya/ khyod kyis phyag rgya la sogs pa mi shes pa su la yang ma smra zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la/ phyag rgya la sogs pa bstan na/ skye bo dad pa
<p>111a.7</p>med pas 'phyas nas nad kyis btab ste/ dus ma yin par shi nas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur la/ bstan pa'i rgyus rang nyid kyang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ ji ltar zhugs pa'i slob ma rnams/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrib pa 'byung / /
<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>di ring sangs rgyas rigs su ni/ /khyed rnams skye bar the tshom med/ /de'i 'og tu dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ /dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang / /byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/ /gnod pa byed la byams sems bskyed/ /rdo rje
<p>111b.2</p>spun la bsnyen bkur bya/ /dad pa can la smad mi bya/ /slob dpon la ni smad mi bya/ /zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/ /bla ma la ni yon yang dbul/ /dngos po khyad par gang dang gang / /bla ma mnyes phyir de la dbul/ /de bzhin bla ma de la ni/ /zad dang phongs pa med par dbul/ /
<p>111b.3</p>bla ma de la brnyas mi bya/ /gal te brnyas par gyur na ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams la brnyas dang mtshungs/ /de yi rnam smin myong bar ni/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i rkyen/ /glen dang dgra dang rkun po dang / /de bzhin gdon dang rims kyis thebs/ /rgyal po'i chad dang phra men dang / /me
<p>111b.4</p>dang chu dang rtag tu dug /bgegs dang bar chad sha 'khon gnyer/ /shi nas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /sems ni khro bar mi bya zhing / /nam yang shes rab nyams mi bya/ /bstir med dmyal ba skrag pa'i gnas/ /de nyid 'dir ni bzlog par bshad/ /des na bla ma smod pa bsdam/ /
<p>111b.5</p>thams cad sdom pas yongs su bzung / /rdo rje slob dpon chen po ni/ /gtsang zhing gus dang dag pa dge /nam yang mi mnyes mi bya'o/ /rang gi dngos po de la phul/ /bla mar phu dud rtag tu bya/ /gal te nyes pa byas na ni/ /tsha ba'i rims ni mi zlogs ltar/ /de bzhin 'gyod
<p>111b.6</p>bshags sbyangs te bsdams/ /khyed kyis rtag tu dam tshig bsrungs/ /'di ni dam tshig sbyin pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu ji ltar zhugs pa'i slob ma rnams/ bza' btung la sogs pas sems dga' bar byas te btang / de'i 'og tu thab khung la rnam par snang mdzad bsams te/ rgyal
<p>111b.7</p>ba'i cho gas mar gyi sreg blugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i thab khung la rang dang slob ma dang / rgyal po dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du zhi ba'i cho gas mar gyi dgang blugs brgya phul te/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod de/ gshegs su gsol
<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su 'dug la/ bstod pa dang / mchod pa dang / phyogs skyong la gtor ma sbyin pa dang / phyag byas te mchod pa phul nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ smon lam btab
<p>112a.2</p>cing snga ma'i phyag rgya bcings shing dgrol bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu blangs la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol bar bsam zhing / ji ltar sprul pa'i 'khor lo rnams snying gar bsdus la/ a kA ro mu khaM
<p>112a.3</p>sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta/ ces brjod cing / oM kr-i to b+ha sarba satwAr+tha/ sid+d+ha ra dad tha ya thA nu ga /gats+tsha twaM bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM/ pu na ra ga pu na ra ga zhes brjod cing / bsrung ba bya zhing gtang bar bya/ sa tshon rnams bsdus la chu chen por dor bar bya/ de nas oM badzra kI la ya sarba
<p>112a.4</p>kalpAn bud+d+ha bud+d+ha sa twen badzra d+ha ra a ye AHhUM hUM/ zhes brjod cing rdo rje phur pa dbyung bar bsam/ phyis seng lding gi phur bu 'dis dbyung bar bya ste/ phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas la mdzub mo gnyis rtser dgug pa bar du bcug la dbyung bar bya'o/ /de nas gtso
<p>112a.5</p>bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis/ dri chab bam 'o mas phur bu bkru zhing / chu des bu ga dgang / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi ba'i lci bas byug /yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni/ /slob dpon dag gis bsdus nas su/ /bdag rang nyid kyis spyad par bya/ /slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung / 
<p>112a.6</p>dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad dag /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad/ /gal te slob mas spyad na ni/ /dam tshig las ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas la 'dug ste/ rang nyid dus thams cad du lha'i ngo bo nyid du dmigs te/ bza' ba dang / btung ba la

<p>116b.3</p>de las ma nyams par/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /sa bon dbus su dam tshig rgya/ /bsam zhing de bzhin sgrub pa pos/ /lha yi rnal 'byor tshul bsgyur te/ /phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin brlabs/ /rlung dang me chu de dkyil du/ /gser gyi sa gzhi bsgom par bya/ /suM las
<p>116b.4</p>ri rab chen po bsam/ /rin chen bzhi las grub pa yi/ /rgya ni yangs pa gru bzhi la/ /de dbus sdig pa sbyong ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor dge ba bsgom par bya/ /b+hUM las gzhal yas khang pa ni/ /mdzes pa brtsegs pa bsgom bya ste/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /twa ra na bzhis brgyan pa
<p>116b.5</p>dang / /mu khyud lte ba rtsibs ldan pa/ /sgo glo sgo khyams thams cad dang / /de dag grwa la bsam pa ni/ /rin chen rdo rje mtshan ma dang / /dril bu dar 'phan do shal dang / /phreng bas rab tu klubs pa dang / /dra ba dra phyed mdzes brgyan pa/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis brgyan pa la/ /gru bzhi pa
<p>116b.6</p>ni bsam par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /pad+ma'i 'og dang seng ge'i gdan/ /de steng zla ba'i dbus gnas pa/ /mi dmigs thugs rje thabs nyid de/ /chos sku mi gnas snying rje'i ngang / /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/ /'gro ba bdag sems don du ni/ /
<p>116b.7</p>'byung ba'i rgyu ni sngags kyi gzugs/ /kun rig rgyal po sprul par bya'o/ /oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po de yis ni/ /gtso bo bdag po rjes dran nas/ /sgrib 'joms rnam dag ting 'dzin la/ /
<p>117a</p>
<p>117a.1</p>snyoms 'jug sngags ni ched brjod bya/ /des ni ngan song gsum po yang / /pad+ma kha bye bzhin du grol/ /de nas bdag gi snying ga ru/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sngags rnams rab tu brjod nas su/ /ngan song sbyong ba nas brtsams te/ /rdo rje dril
<p>117a.2</p>bu'i bar du bskyed/ /bskyed pa'i sngags ni 'di dag go/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes sngags de brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rim pa de yis ni/ /
<p>117a.3</p>lha rnams gang yin dbyung bar bya/ /oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba a pA ya hUM/ zhes pa'i sngags rang gi snying gar bsgom par bya ste/ kun nas 'od zer sna lnga ni/ /rang gi sgo nas dbyung bar bya/ /sngags kyi 'od zer snang ba yis/ /khams gsum 'gro la phog byas pa/ /ngan song sdug
<p>117a.4</p>bsngal zhi bar bya/ /'od de slar yang snying gar 'dus/ /sngags dang 'od zer 'dus byas pas/ /gzugs rdzogs bskyed nas spro bar bya/ /mdun phyogs pad+ma zla ba la/ /de bzhin gshegs pha ngan song sbyong / /nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi don du/ /snying las spros nas gzhag par bya/ /
<p>117a.5</p>zla ba ltar ni snum pa la/ /ba mo'i mdog ltar dkar ba yi/ /sa gnon phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /glang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /gong gi bye brag thams cad kun/ /'od zer 'phro 'di'i sbyor ba yis/ /thugs las byung ba'i lha tshogs pa/ /rang rang sngags las sku sprul bya'o/ /
<p>117a.6</p>oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ya/ sarba a pA yA s+t+waM/ g.yas su rin chen me tog ni/ /mchog sbyin rgya can rta la gnas/ /pad+ma zla ba'i gdan nyid du/ /mdog sngon thugs las spros nas dgod/ /oM sho d+ha na sho d+ha ya sarba a pA ya hriH/ rgyab tu shAkya thub pa ste/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya yang dag
<p>117a.7</p>ldan/ /rma bya'i gdan la yang dag gnas/ /pad+ma'i dbus thugs spros nas dgod/ /oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ya sarba a pA ya aH// g.yon du me tog cher rgyas te/ /sku ljang mkha' lding la gnas la/ /skyabs sbyin rgya can pad zla yi/ /dkyil na thugs las phyung ste gnas/ /hUM trAM hrI aH
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>bzhi po las/ /lha mo spyan dang mA ma kI/ /dkar mo sgrol ma rnam pa bzhi/ /rang gi rigs bzhin dbyung bar bya/ /hUM dzaHhoHd+hu bzhi po las/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po las/ /rdo rje chags pa legs pa bzhi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' khu tshur/ /pad zla'i dbus thugs la ni dgod/ /trAM r+yaM
<p>117b.2</p>b+h+ri hA bzhi po las/ /rdo rje rin chen rdo rje 'od/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan rdo rje bshad/ /pad zla'i dbus na rin chen dang / /nyi ma rgyal mtshan so bsnams pa/ /thugs las phyung nas dgod par bya/ /hriHd+hiHkruM b+ha bzhi po las/ /rdo rje chos dang rnon po dang / /rdo rje 'khor lo smra ba rnams/ /pad+ma
<p>117b.3</p>ral gri 'khor lo ljags/ /thogs nas zla pad gong ltar dbyung / /kaM raM k+ShaM saM bzhi las ni/ /las dang srung dang gnod sbyin brten/ /rgya gram go cha mche khu tshur/ /de kun sna tshogs pad+ma dang / /zla ba'i dbus su shes par bya'o/ /hUM trAM hrIHaHzhes bya bas/ sgeg mo la sogs
<p>117b.4</p>rnam bzhi po/ /phyung nas gra'i cha rnams la/ /pad gnas zla ba'i gdan la dgod/ /spos la sogs pa bzhi po yang / /sgeg sogs rnams dang mthun pas na/ /phyag sogs gdan sogs brtag pa'o/ /oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re
<p>117b.5</p>swA hA/ sngags de yis ni dbyung bar bya/ /byams pa la sogs sems dpa' rnams/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dbus dag tu/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /byams pa 'jam dpal spos glang po/ /de bzhin ye shes tog dang bzhi/ /klu yi me tog gun+d+he dang / /ut+pal spos glang
<p>117b.6</p>rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /bzang skyod don yod mthong ba dang / /blo gros mi zad spobs brtsegs bzhi/ /rin chen 'bar ba pad+ma bum/ /pad tog rin chen brtsegs pa rnams/ /mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren/ /mya ngan kun 'joms dra ba can/ /za ma tog dang lcags kyu dang / /be con
<p>117b.7</p>rin chen dra ba 'dzin/ /zla ba'i 'od dang bdud rtsi 'od/ /nam mkha' mdzod dang kun du bzang / /pad steng zla tshes bum pa dang / /be con snye ma 'dzin pa'o/ /ngan song sbyong dang mun pa sel/ /sdug bsngal 'joms dang srid mtsho sgrol/ /phyag mtshan rdo rje dkar 'dzin te/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dbus
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>na bzhugs/ /rin chen mdzod dang dge blo gros/ /don mthun yid 'ong dran stobs mchog /yon tan rang bzhin rin chen 'dzin/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dbus na bzhugs/ /dge ba'i 'byung gnas legs pa'i tog /srid pa'i mtsho sgrol bde ba 'byung / /gsung gi rang bzhin bde
<p>118a.2</p>ba 'dzin/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dbus na bzhugs/ /brtson 'grus mi ldog yon tan mdzod/ /the tshom yid myur nga ro snyan/ /phrin las rang bzhin rgya gram 'dzin/ /bad gnas zla ba'i dbus na bzhugs/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhi yis ni/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu
<p>118a.3</p>bsnams nas pad zla yi/ /dbus na sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhugs/ /de ltar rnam par bsgom pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ting 'dzin no/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o// //de nas las kyi rgyal mchog ni/ /gsang ba sngags kyi 'od
<p>118a.4</p>zer gyis/ /'gro ba ngan 'gro las skyabs phyir/ /zhe sdang la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /ye shes lnga yis ngang bcom ste/ /dmyal ba yi dgas byol song sogs/ /dkyil 'khor kun du bzhugs pa yis/ /'bras bu ngan song las thar mdzad/ /rigs kyi dbang gis kun rdzob pas/ /so so re re
<p>118a.5</p>gsung ba min/ /des na las kyi rgyal mchog go/ /las kyi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ne rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ bi sho d+ha ne bi sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne
<p>118a.6</p>shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ lha rnams kun gyi sngon du ni/ /sngags de shin tu brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sngags dang phyag rgya rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bshad par bya/ /thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i/ /rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis rlobs/ /dam
<p>118a.7</p>tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /bsngags pa rdo rje las byung ste/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya la gnas pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rig pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa gung gnyis bsgreng / /mthe bong mthe'u chung gnyis gyen brkyang / /mdzub gnyis pad+ma ltar bkug pa/ /ngan song rnam par sbyong ba po/ /de las

<p>118b.1</p>mdzub gnyis rin chen byas/ /rin chen tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo so sor mnyam/ /lhag ma brkyang ba shAkya thub/ /de las lag g.yon dkur byas la/ /mi 'jigs sbyin par bya ba ni/ /phyag rgya 'di ni cher rgyas kyi'o/ /bcings pa mdzub gnyis mig tu bya'o/ /chung ngu srin lag nad
<p>118b.2</p>bu bsnol/ /gung mo mnyam par bsgreng ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni yin par gsungs/ /sbyar ba gung mo gnyis bsgrengs nas/ /mdzub gnyis ngos la sbyar byas nas/ /rtse gsum tshul du byas pa ni/ /mA ma kI yi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las/ /gung mo pad+ma 'dra ba las/ /phyag

<p>118b.7</p>bsrung ba'o/ /de las rtse mo slar bkug ste/ /mche ba ltar byas gnod sbyin no/ /de las mdzub gnyis nang bkug ste/ /rab tu bsdams pa khu tshur ro/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas pa/ /mthe bong gnyis gshibs sgeg mo'i'o/ /de las kha las mdun du ni/ /lag ba brkyang ba phreng ba

<p>119a.1</p>ma'o/ /thal mo sbyar ba kha drung nas/ /phar drang ba ni glu ma'o/ /gar las rdo rje thal mo ni/ /spyi bor bzhag pa gar ma'i'o/ /bsdams pa thur blugs bdug pa ma'o/ /bsdams pa gyen gtor me tog go/ /mtheb bsnyams mdun 'dzin mar me'o/ /rdo rje bsdams

<p>119b.1</p>mo srin lag rtse mnyam bsgreng / /mthe chung gnyis ni nang du gzhug /mdzub mo gnyis ni bkug byas la/ /mthe bong gnyis ni de ngos la/ /bcar ba byang chub spyi yi'o/ /thal mo mnyam du sbyar ba las/ /snying gar bzhag pa nyan thos kyi'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur nang bstan

<p>120a.1</p>kyis dpung par 'dzin/ /khu tshur gshibs te snying gar bskor/ /kha yi thad ka nas drangs dang / /khu tshur gnyis ni gar byas te/ /'gram pa g.yas g.yon gzhag par bya/ /de nas yang bskor spyi bor gzhag /spyi bor ba krol ba las kyi'o/ /khu tshur go cha'i

<p>120b</p>
<p>120b.1</p>de bsgreng / /g.yas pa rtse gsum gtogs 'dod do/ /pi wang g.yon logs yul 'khor srung / /mthe bong mthe chung sbyar byas 'phags/ /mdzub mo zhags pa spyan mi bzang / /mthe bo ne'u le'i sna 'dra ni/ /rnam thos sras kyi yin par bshad/ /g.yon pa thod pa thogs pa ltar/ /
