<p>120b.3</p>'dzin tshul byas te/ /g.yon pa sbrul gyi gdengs kar bya/ /chu lha 'khor bcas phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa snye ma 'dzin pa dang / /g.yon pa mdzub mo bkug pa ni/ /gnod sbyin 'khor bcas phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas thal brkyang byas mthe bo dgug /smrang 'don lta bur bya ba dang / /
<p>120b.4</p>g.yon pa gun+b+he 'dzin pa ni/ /me lha 'khor bcas phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa ral gri 'dzin pa dang / /gung mo srin lag mthil bkug pa/ /bden bral srin po'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas ba dan tshul byas nas/ /g.yon pa pi bang thogs pa ni/ /rlung lha 'khor bcas phyag
<p>120b.5</p>rgya'o/ /g.yas pa phreng ba 'dzin pa dang / /g.yon pa zhags mig ltar byas pa/ /dbang ldan 'khor bcas phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo mnyam du sbyar ba ni/ /pa ba sangs dang mig dmar ro/ /kha thad mdzub bsgreng phur bu'o/ /lag g.yas thal bgrad nyi ma'o/ /zla ba g.yon pa bgrad pa'o/ /
<p>120b.6</p>glang sna chu srin 'dra sgra gcan/ /se gol rtag gtogs lag pa la/ /spen pa dbyug pa 'dzin ltar bya/ /lag pa gnyis kyi mkhrig ma bsnol/ /bkan te g.yas pa steng phyung nas/ /sor mo spro zhing bsdu ba ni/ /rgyu skar spyi yi phyag rgya'o/ /'jig rten pa ni thun mong du/ /thal mo brkyang
<p>120b.7</p>par bya ba dang / /yang na thal mo pad+mar bya/ /'jig rten spyi yi phyag rgya'o/ /gong du ji ltar bshad pa yi/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa ni/ /thugs kar rdo rje bsgom pa ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga'o/ /de nas lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /dkyil 'khor sngags ni bstan bya ste/ /dang por
<p>121a</p>
<p>121a.1</p>bdag byin brlab pa'i sngags/ /rdo rje phyag rgya bcings nas dgod/ /oM sarba bdi badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M/ snying ga mgrin pa dpral ba dang / /smin mtshams mdzod spu rna ba gnyis/ /mgo bo gtsug phud dpung pa gnyis/ /sna dang rked pa pus mo bol/ /
<p>121a.2</p>long bu gnyis dang mig gnyis dang / /gsang ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs/ /oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ya sarba a pA ya a na ya hUM/ /ngan song las 'dren pa'o/ /oM sarba bita sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne hUM/ sdig pa dag par bya'o/ /oM sarba bdi tra tha/ sdig pa dral ba'o/ /oM sho d+ha ne sho
<p>121a.3</p>d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ kun rig gi'o/ /oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ya/ sarba a pA ya hUM/ ngan song sbyong ba'i'o/ /oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ya/ sarba a ba ya/ sarba swa twe b+h+yaHhUM trAM/ rin chen me tog gi'o/ /oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ya/ sarba
<p>121a.4</p>a pa ya bi sho d+ha ne hrIH/ shAkya thub pa'i'o/ /oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ya/ sarba a pa ya ni sho d+ha ya/ tra tha aH/ me tog cher rgyas kyi'o/ /oM sho d+ha ne hUM/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi'o/ /oM sho d+ha ne trAM/ mA ma kI'i'o/ /oM sho d+ha ne hrIH/ na bza' dkar mo'i'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni aH/ sgrol ma'i'o/ /
<p>121a.5</p>sarba bid badzra satwa hUM/ sarba bid badzra satwa dzaHsarba bid badzra sa tra hoH/ sarba bid badzra satwa d+huH/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa legs pa rnams rim pa bzhin no/ /trAM R+YaM b+h+ri hA/ rdo rje rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan bzhad pa rnams rim pa bzhin no/ /hrIHd+hIHkruM b+ha la sogs
<p>121a.6</p>rdo rje chos dang / /rnon po dang 'khor lo dang / smra ba rnams rim pa bzhin no/ /kaM raM k+ShaM saM bzhi las rdo rje las dang / srung ba dang / gnod sbyin dang khu tshur rnams rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro/ /oM sarba bdi ma hA badzro d+b+ha ba dA na pA ra mi ta pU dze hUM/ sgeg mo'i'o/ /oM sarba bdi ma hA
<p>121a.7</p>badzrod+b+ha ba shI la pA ra mi tA pU dze trAM/ rdo rje phreng ba ma'i'o/ /oM sarba bdi ma hA badzro d+b+ha ba k+ShAn+ti pA ra mi tA pU dze hrIH/ glu ma'i'o/ /oM sarba bdi ma hA badzrod+b+ha wa bIR+ya pA ra mi tA pU dze aH/ gar mkhan ma'i'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba a pA ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hu pA ya d+h+yA na pA ra mi tA pU dze hUM phaT/ 
<p>121b</p>
<p>121b.1</p>spos me ma'i'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba a pA ya puSh+pA bi lo ka ni pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dze trAM/ me tog ma'i'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba a pA ya dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri pra Ni d+hi pA ra mi ta pU dze hrIH/ mar me'i'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba a pA ya gan+d+ha bi nA sha ni badzra gan+d+ho pa ya pA ra mi tA pU dze aH/ dri chab ma'i'o/ /
<p>121b.2</p>oM sarba bdi na ra ka A kaR+Sha Ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba na ra ka u d+ha ra ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje zhags pa'i'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba na ra ka ban+d+ha mo tsa ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba na ra ka g+haN+Ta bi sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje dril bu'i'o/ /oM mai tri
<p>121b.3</p>ha ra Na swA hA/ byams pa'i'o/ /oM many+dzu shrI swA hA/ 'jam dpal gyi'o/ /oM gan+d+ha hasti swA hA/ spos kyi glang po'i'o/ /oM dz+nyA na ke tu ba ti hUM/ ye shes tog gi'o/ /oM b+ha dra ba ti ha ra pA la hUM/ bzang skyong gi'o/ /oM a mo g+ha ha ra she hUM/ don yod par mthong ba'i'o/ /
<p>121b.4</p>oM ak+Sha ya hUM karmA ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ blo gros mi zad pa'i'o/ /oM pra ti b+ha ne pra ti b+hAn ku re swA hA/ spobs pa brtsegs pa'i'o/ /oM s+thA me s+thA me ma hA s+thA me pA ti hUM/ mthu chen thob kyi'o/ /oM sarba a pA ya dza ha sho d+ha ne hUM/ ngan song kun 'dren gyi'o/ /oM sarba sho ka ta
<p>121b.5</p>mo nir g+ha te na ma ti hUM/ mya ngan kun 'joms kyi'o/ /oM dz+wa la ni ma hA dz+wa la ni swA hA/ dra ba can gyi'o/ /oM tsan+d+ra bya ba lo ki te swA hA/ zla 'od kyi'o/ /oM a mi ta pra b+ha ba ti hUM/ bdud rtsi 'od kyi'o/ /oM ga ga na lo tsa ne hUM/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi'o/ /oM sa man+ta b+ha dra hUM/ kun du
<p>121b.6</p>bzang po'i'o/ /oM bo d+hi satwa sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mud+ga te swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi'o/ /oM sarba mu ne b+h+yaHpa ri shud+d+he ga ga na sa ma naM swA hA/ nyan thos kyi'o/ /oM na mo bud+d+ha bya ba lo ki te shud+d+ha ga ga na sa ma ye swA hA/ rang rgyal gyi'o/ /oM trai lo
<p>121b.7</p>kya ki ra hUM phaT/ 'jig rten gsum snang gi'o/ /oM trai lo kya da ma ka hUM phaT/ gsum 'dul gyi'o/ /oM trai lo kya nA sha hUM phaT/ gsum 'jig gi'o/ /oM trai lo kya an+ta hUM phaT/ gsum mthar byed kyi'o/ /oM kA na ha ni hUM phaT/ mi g.yo mgon no/ /oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ 
<p>122a</p>
<p>122a.1</p>bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i'o/ /oM kA la daN+Da hUM phaT/ be con sngon po'i'o/ /oM hrIHhUM phaT/ rta mgrin gyi'o/ /oM in+d+rA ya swA hA/ brgya byin 'khor bcas kyi'o/ /oM brah+ma Ne swA hA/ tshangs pa'i'o/ /oM ga Na pa ti hUM/ gtogs 'dod kyi'o/ /oM baiSh+Na bi ye swA hA/ 
<p>122a.2</p>dbang phyug chen po'i'o/ /oM de ba ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ lha thams cad kyi'o/ /oM be+e ba swa da ma tri b+h+yaHswA hA/ gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa'i'o/ /oM be ru Na ye nA ga ga Na b+h+yaHswA hA/ chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa'i'o/ /ku be ra yak+Sha ni b+h+yaHswA hA/ gnod sbyin 'khor bcas kyi sngags so/ / 
<p>122a.3</p>oM ag+na yi ku tsi ku tsi swA hA/ drang srong rnams kyi'o/ /oM nai r+r-i t+ya rAk+Sha sa b+h+yaHswA hA/ srin po 'khor bcas kyi'o/ /oM bA ya be a sU ra ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa'i'o/ /oM ru dra ak+Sha b+hU ta ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ dbang ldan 'khor bcas kyi'o/ /oM pr-i s+thi b+h+yaHswA hA/ 
<p>122a.4</p>sa'i lha mo'i'o/ /oM gra he pra b+hA dz+yo ti sa ya nak+Sha tra ni rnA da ni swA hA/ gza' dang rgyu skar spyi'i sngags so/ /oM ma ho ra ga ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ lto 'phye rnams kyi'o/ /oM kuM b+haN+Da pU ta un+ma dA pa sma ra a ma ostAr ga Ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ 'dre spyi'i'o/ /oM ga ru Da ga Na b+h+yaHswA hA/ nam mkha' lding
<p>122a.5</p>spyi'i'o/ /oM ag+ne swA hA/ me lha'i'o/ /oM ba ru NA ya swA hA/ chu lha'i'o/ /oM bA ya be swA hA/ rlung lha'i'o/ /oM pa Ta la swA hA/ sa bdag go/ /oM sarba de ba ta swA hA/ khyim lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi'o/ /oM hri swA hA/ mkha' 'gro ma'i'o/ /de dag ni sngags su gsungs
<p>122a.6</p>pa'o/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan/ /nyin re ting 'dzin gsum po ni/ /bdag dang lha sbyor bsgom par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid der gsal nas/ /rgyas 'debs bzhi dang ldan pa la/ /dkyil 'khor sgo ni dbye byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su bskyed par bya/ /oM sarba
<p>122a.7</p>bdi badzra tsakra hUM/ 'khor lo dang ldan phyag rgya bya/ /dkyil 'khor bskyed sngags phyag rgya'o/ /de nas gtso bor bdag sbyor bas/ /dpung par se gol gdab byas la/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa spyan drang ngo / /de nas nye reg 'thor 'thung dang / /zhabs bsil ba ni dbul bar bya/ /mchod pa
<p>122b</p>
<p>122b.1</p>rnam pa sna tshogs mchod/ /de rjes bstod pa bya ba ni/ /mnyam med mi g.yo chos mchog can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro sdug sel/ /yon tan dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mnyam nyid dam pa bstod/ /yon tan phra mo tshad med de/ /nam mkha' dang yang bskrun yod min/ /
<p>122b.2</p>dngos grub mnyam med dpe bral ba/ /'gro la nges par stsol mdzad bstod/ /rtag tu dri med thugs rje 'byung / /smon lam sgrub pa 'gag med can/ /'gro ba'i don brtson mtha' yas pa/ /bdag nyid rtag tu snang la bstod/ /tshad med tshad bral yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /bde gshegs
<p>122b.3</p>go 'phang de brnyes kyang / /thugs rje'i spyod pa 'gag med 'gyur/ /bzang po shin tu mchog ldan bstod/ /mchog sbyin nang na mchog brnyes pas/ /kun la dngos grub mchog thob mdzad/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib med pa/ /dngos grub dam pa stsol bstod do/ /
<p>122b.4</p>bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di dag gis/ /lan cig tsam yang bstod byas pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing / /bde gshegs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar ting 'dzin bya ba ni/ lo'am lo phyed zla gcig bya/ /de lhar grub nas rdul tshon brtsams/ /de yis bsod nams
<p>122b.5</p>tshogs bsgoms pa/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas rdul tshon mgo rtsom ste/ /gong du bshad pa'i gnas dag tu/ /sa ni gzung ba'i las bya ste/ /sa bdag sa srung la sogs dang / /sa yi lha mo rnams la ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni sbyin sreg gi /dkyil 'khor bya ba'i
<p>122b.6</p>don du ni/ /dam tshig 'di ni bsgrags par bya/ /sa la rgyu ba'i lha kun dang / /gang zhig sa la brten kun dang / /byams pa'i sems su gnas pa ni/ /kun dga'i don du zhu zhing gnas/ /de nas ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin/ /pus nub tsam du brko byas la/ /gyo mo la sogs bsal bar
<p>122b.7</p>bya/ /spyan dang gnod sbyin 'khyil pa yi/ /sngags kyi chu yis gtor bar bya/ /de ltar sa ni bzung nas su/ /slob dpon khru yis brtag byas la/ /che chung rim pa gang yin pas/ /sa de yang dag gzung bar bya/ /de ni sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas gos rgyan bgos
<p>123a</p>
<p>123a.1</p>byas te/ /dri zhim chu yis lus bkrus la/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin ting 'dzin du/ /zhugs nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i gtso/ /thugs las phyung ste skad cig mas/ /mig la nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/ /rkang pa bor ba rdo rjer bsam/ /lag gnyis rdo rje dril bzung la/ /yi ge hUM gi sgra
<p>123a.2</p>bsgrags te/ /g.yas nas bskor la deng zhes brjod/ /mtshams dang dra ba ra ba dag /bdud dang sdang ba bzlog par bya/ /de nas phur bu byin brlabs nas/ /phur bu sngags kyis gdab par bya/ /de nas skud pa rim lnga yi/ /kha dog bzhin du bsam byas la/ /'khor los sgyur
<p>123a.3</p>bas g.yog la gtad/ /de nas thig skud bsgril bar bya/ /de nas gser gyi gzhong pa ru/ /rigs kyi sngags kyis btab nas su/ /mchod dang bstod pa rdzogs par bya/ /de nas thig gdab brtsam pa ni/ /las dang bya bas gdab pa ste/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags bstan pa/ /
<p>123a.4</p>oM badzra sU tra A kaR+Sha ya maN+Da la hUM/ zhes so/ /gdab pa'i 'gro stangs bskor ba ni/ /rgyud dang man ngag bzhin du bstan/ /byin brlabs byas pa'i gnas de ru/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dbus kyi cha ni gdab bya ba/ /srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /lte bar bcas shing
<p>123a.5</p>rtsibs bcu drug /rim pa gsum dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya/ /sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi ldan pas/ /them skas dang ni 'khor lo dang / /lda ldi la sogs brgyan pa ru/ /seng ge ba glang rnams kyis brgyan/ /de ltar legs par brtags byas nas/ /tshon rtsis
<p>123a.6</p>bri ba brtsam par bya/ /de ltar byas pa'i 'og nyid du/ /de nas sbyor ba gsum bsgoms la/ /lha yi gnas su tsan+dan sogs/ /lha yi gnas ni bya ba'o/ /de la me tog phul byas la/ /rang rang gsang sngags mang bzlas te/ /de nas mchod pa'i rim pas mchod/ /dbus kyi gtso bo'i
<p>123a.7</p>gsang sngags kyi/ /rnam rgyal bum pa gdab par bya/ /de nas phur bu phyang nas su/ /kha dog lngas ni dgang bar bya/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas bri bya ste/ /dkar sngo dmar dang de bzhin ljang / /nang du ser po btang byas la/ /de nas yang ni mchod pa dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'degs
<p>123b</p>
<p>123b.1</p>par bya/ /sor mo gyen du rtse sprad 'degs/ /de yi sngags ni 'di dag go/ /oM sarba bdi a d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ zhes so/ /rdul tshon bri ba'i cho ga'o// //de ltar byas zin 'og tu ni/ /de bzhin mchod pa rnam lnga yis/ /bum pa sta gon gnas par bya/ /bum pa dkar zhing che ba dang / /kha yangs
<p>123b.2</p>legs shing mgrin pa mtho/ /dri chus yongs su bkang nas su/ /kha rgyan yal ga shing gis byas/ /'bru lnga sman lnga rin chen lnga/ /snying po lnga dang ldan par bya/ /me tog phreng bas bcing byas te/ /ras kyis mgul la dkris byas la/ /ku sha sngon pos gdan byas pa/ /gdugs
<p>123b.3</p>dkar gyis ni brgyan pa ste/ /rang rtags mtshan ma bri byas la/ /ba dan lnga dang ldan pa ni/ /go rims bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /til dang so ba spos dang ni/ /tsan+dan me tog dkar po dang / /'o ma yis ni yon chab snod/ /bkang la mdun du gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin spos kyis
<p>123b.4</p>bdug nas su/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas brtan par bya/ /rang rang sngags kyis btab pa yi/ /de kho na yi phyag rgya bya/ /rgyas 'debs bzhi dang ldan pa la/ /nye reg 'thor 'thung yon chab dbul/ /sngags pa rdo rje dril ldan pa'i/ /lag pa g.yas pas reg nas su/ /chu la brgya rtsa brgyad
<p>123b.5</p>du gdab/ /de nas lha de zhu byas te/ /byang chub ye shes chu ru gyur/ /bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'o// //de nas sngags pa grub 'dod pas/ /sbyin sreg las ni brtsam bya ste/ /bcu phyed mchod par ldan pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg brtsams
<p>123b.6</p>par bya/ /rab tu dkar ba'i sa gzhi la/ /rgyar ni khru gang zabs su yang / /sor ni bcu gnyis brkos byas la/ /de dbus rdo rje sor brgyad gzhag /thab khung gi ni steng nyid du/ /sor bzhi rab tu dor byas la/ /'phangs dang rgyar ni sor bzhi yis/ /mnyam par rab tu byas pa la/ /
<p>123b.7</p>rab tu rdo rje rtse gsum mtshan/ /ba yi lci ba ma lhung dang / /sa gzhi dkar bas byug par bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sngags btab pas/ /bgegs ni bskrad cing gsad par bya/ /'o ma yod pa'i yam shing gis/ /gtsubs pa'i me yis sbar bar bya/ /ji ltar me lha spyan drangs nas
<p>124a</p>
<p>124a.1</p>yon chab nye reg 'thor 'thung gnyis/ /gtor nas 'bar la de thim bya/ /phyag rgya 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ /mdun du bzhag la blta bar bya/ /de nas me yi dbus su ni/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab bcings te/ /mdzub gnyis
<p>124a.2</p>mthe'u chung rdo rje sbrel/ /rdo rje rab bsrungs phyag rgyas te/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/ /sngags ni oM sarba bdi badzra tsakra sid+d+ha hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHdang ldan par/ /se gol ldan pas dgug gzhug bya/ /de nas sreg rdzas bstan pa ni/ /nas dang zho dang 'bras yos dang / /
<p>124a.3</p>til dang ku sha sngon po dang / /'bras chan me tog dkar po dang / /spang spos sbrang rtsi mar rnams dang / /mi rus phye mas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rdzas de dag ni dbul ba yang / /rang gi sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad/ /yang na bdun bdun dbul bar bya/ /sgeg sogs mchod pa brgyad dang ni/ /
<p>124a.4</p>de bzhin bcu gnyis mchod pas mchod/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po la sogs pa'i/ /sngags ni ci nus bzlas byas nas/ /gang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /sems can phan don ci 'dod bsngo/ /de nas gzhan yang pha rol du/ /'phos la phan par bya don du/ /sbyin sreg chen po
<p>124a.5</p>brtsam par bya/ /gdams pa'i sngags kyis byin brlabs la/ /thab khung rgyud las gsungs pa ltar/ /che chung rim pa shes byas la/ /ci nus lha ni dgod byas te/ /rten bcas rgyan ldan de dbus su/ /bzhag pa nyid du byas nas kyang / /ci nus par ni sbyin sreg bya/ /dkyil
<p>124a.6</p>'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi rim pa'i cho ga'o// //de ltar dang por zhugs pa nas/ /tha ma slob ma gzhug gi bar/ /zhal bsrol sogs byed dus su/ /bum pa la sogs bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas lho yi phyogs dag tu/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pa yis/ /pad+ma dkar po'i steng
<p>124a.7</p>nyid du/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri bar bya'o/ /de steng slob ma gzhag byas la/ /gong ma'i cho ga ji lta bas/ /bum pa la sogs ji snyed kyis/ /khyad par ci 'dod dbang rnam sbyin/ /de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor du/ /'khor bar bcings pa'i sems can gang / /dkyil 'khor 'di la
<p>124b</p>
<p>124b.1</p>zhugs byas nas/ /ngan song gsum las grol gyur nas/ /dga' ldan gnas su skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas mchod pas sngon bzhin mchod/ /bskyed pa snying gar bsdus nas ni/ /spyan drangs lha rnams gshegs su gsol/ khyed kyis sems can don mdzad pas/ /slar yang gnas su
<p>124b.2</p>gshegs su gsol/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NI Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta muH/ zhes so/ /se gol lan gsum gdab la gshegs/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bsdu bya ste/ /'dod par gyur pa de la sbyin/ /lhag ma chu bo chen por dor/ /dkyil 'khor phul ba'i nor gang zhig /de ni
<p>124b.3</p>slob dpon nyid dbang bar/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /rab tu brdzun med gsungs pa yin/ /cho ga'i rim pa rdzogs pa 'di/ /rnal 'byor rim pa'i rgyud las ni/ /grub ldan lung bstan ma thob kyang / /kun la phan phyir bdag gis byas/ /bla ma nyi ma'i dpal zhabs kyis/ /sgrub
<p>124b.4</p>pa'i thabs su gsungs pa la/ /'on kyang 'di la bdag gis ni/ /de yi bka' la rab brtan brtsams/ /'di yis bsod nams gang thob pa/ /'gro ba 'di dag rtag tu ni/ /'phrul dga'i gnas su skyes nas su/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong
<p>124b.5</p>ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis bsgyur cing bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni maN+Dal
<p>124b.6</p>no pi ka kr-i ba a ba li nA ma/ bod skad du/ /dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thugs rje phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal
<p>124b.7</p>po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kun gyi sku/ /nyon mongs mtha' dag kun bcom nas/ /'gro la thugs rjes spyan gyis rab gzigs la/ /kun nas dang ba'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal te/ skye ba brgyud pa'i sdug bsngal gcod byed pa'i/ /thugs rje phreng mchog dkyil
<p>125a</p>
<p>125a.1</p>'khor cho ga bshad/ /de la bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i rnal 'byor pa snod du gyur pa rnams kyi dam tshig thams cad bsdu bar gyur pas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bsdu bar bya'o/ /de la dang po rnal 'byor pa sems dad pas mchog tu
<p>125a.2</p>gyur pa dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba bsgrub par 'dod pas/ /stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sems bskyed la/ dri la sogs pas khrus byas pas/ chos thams cad bdag med par lhag par mos par bya'o/ /de nas mgrin pa'i phyogs su paM
<p>125a.3</p>las pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la/ de'i lce'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams nas/ /oM badzra dzi hwa/ zhes brjod do/ /yang dag pa gnyis la a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i
<p>125a.4</p>steng du hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po rer gyur par bsams la/ oM badzra hasta/ zhes brjod do/ /de'i rjes la rkang pa'i mthil gnyis su a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ de'i steng du hUM las gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ de nas oM sarba yo ga badzrA ya hUM/ zhes
<p>125a.5</p>pas yan lag thams cad rdo rjer gyur par bsam/ de nas bgegs gzhil bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar 'gyur te/ de la hUM las sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje nyi ma ru bdag nyid sprul la/ rdo rje me'i nyi ma rab tu bsams nas/ khros pa'i sems kyis khro bo ti rIn ti ri'i phyag
<p>125a.6</p>rgya bcing bar bya ste/ de la rdo rje mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba ni/ ti rIn ti ri'i phyag rgya ste/ gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hUM/ zhes brjod par bya zhing / sa 'og bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i gdan phyed du 'dug la/ dang po'i phyag rgya de nyid du bcing ste/ rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar byas la/ 
<p>125a.7</p>dar dpyangs kyis brgyan par bya zhing / oM badzra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsA maM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis mdud cing / snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / ltag pa dang / yang snying ga la sogs par mdud pa las sna tshogs go
<p>125b</p>
<p>125b.1</p>bgo bar byas la/ g.yon pa dkur 'dzin par byas la/ g.yas rdo rje gsor bas bgegs ma lus pa gzhom par bya ste/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM sarba big+h+nAn phaT/ ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas khro bo de nyid kyi phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo rnams nang du 'bar bar bya
<p>125b.2</p>zhing mthe bong de bzhin du bsgreng bas/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na lArka ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ ces pas bgegs kyi tshogs ma lus par bsreg par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste/ oM badzra ne tre sarba big+h+nAM ban+d+ha/ zhes bya bas bgegs
<p>125b.3</p>thams cad bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas mthe bong dang mthe chung so sor rtse mo sprad de/ oM badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+ShaM sarba swA hA/ zhes brjod pas sa 'og bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa las g.yas pa sdigs mdzub tu bya zhing / g.yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul
<p>125b.4</p>du byas la/ khros pa'i yid kyis khro bo de nyid nam mkha'i phyogs su spros pa las/ oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ ces pas steng phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje rtse sprad par byas la spyi bor btsugs nas/ oM druM ban+d+ha/ zhes
<p>125b.5</p>brjod pas/ shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las mkhrig ma gnyis mdud de lho phyogs su bltas te/ oM badzra pra sha hri phaT/ ces pas lho phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings pa las gung mo gnyis rtse sprad de/ srin lag gnyis tshigs
<p>125b.6</p>bar ma bsnol nas mthe chung gnyis brkyang bar byas te/ oM pa tang+gi pa tang+gi ni ra traT/ ces pas nub phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba'i tshul du bya/ mthe bong gnyis kha'i tshul du byas nas/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ 
<p>125b.7</p>zhes brjod pas byang phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sna tshogs kyi bdag nyid las lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad la mthe bong dang mthe chung so sor bsnol/ sor mo lhag ma drag pa so sor rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul las sa la bstan pas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par bya zhing / oM
<p>126a</p>
<p>126a.1</p>badzra Tha Tha Tha Tha/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya mthe chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du byas la sdigs mdzub gnyis bsgreng la phyogs bzhir bskyad pas ra dang po dang / de nyid las sdigs mdzub bzhi pas ra ba gnyis pa bya zhing / oM badzra pra ka ra hUM badzra hUM ka ra
<p>126a.2</p>hUM/ zhes pas rdo rje ra ba bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa rgyas par brkyang ba'i steng du bkab la bskyod de/ oM pany+dza ra Na hUM/ zhes brjod pas rdo rje'i gur du bya ba nyid do/ /de'i rjes la me tog gi phyag rgya'am rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgyas gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa byas la/ rdo rje khu tshur bcings
<p>126a.3</p>pa las mdzub mo dang mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te/ oM sarba bid badzra tsakra hUM/ zhes pa'i sngags lan bdun brjod pas phyogs kun du bskor bas dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par bya'o/ /de nyid snying ga'am khar bzhag la sngags de nyid lan
<p>126a.4</p>brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ de yis dkyil 'khor mngon sum dang 'dra bar bltas la/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa dri dang / kha dog sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gyur pa'i steng du phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems
<p>126a.5</p>dpa' dang / 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / khro bo la sogs pa thams cad de nyid du sprul la/ kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas/ kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs/ /gang phyir ngan song thams cad kyi/ /rgyud ni dag par byin gyis rlobs/ /zhes pas gsol
<p>126a.6</p>ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs sngon du 'gro bas zhabs bsil la ar+g+ha phul te/ nye reg 'thor 'thung byas te/ gdan la brtan par bzhugs te/ thal mo legs par sbyar bas dpral ba'i steng du bzhag ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra tsakra ban+d+ha
<p>126a.7</p>naM ka ro mi/ de nyid las mthe bong g.yas pa rdo rje ltar bsgreng pa snying gar bzung ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes brjod pas shar phyogs nas phyag bya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo rin po che ltar byas pas snying gar bzung la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes brjod

<p>126b.1</p>pas lho phyogs nas phyag bya'o/ /mdzub mo pad+ma ltar byas pas lkog mar bzung ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes brjod pas nub phyogs nas phyag bya'o/ /mdzub mo ral gri ltar byas pa lte bar bzung ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma ban+d+ha naM kwa ro mi/ zhes brjod pas byang phyogs
<p>126b.2</p>nas phyag bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na me tog gi bye brag gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/ thang las skyes pa'am/ chu las
<p>126b.3</p>skyes pa'am/ yid las byung ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ma lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa'i lha
<p>126b.4</p>mo dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes pa la sogs pas mchod pa nyi shu gzhung gzhan dang mthun par dbul lo/ /gzhan yang thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ 
<p>126b.5</p>'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi zhal zas kyi bye brag 'di lta ste/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang myang ba dang / btung ba dang gzhib pa dang / bdud rtsir gyur
