<p>126b.7</p>khyad par thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir dbul bar bgyi'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ra sa A ha ra na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de bzhin du lha dang mi rnams kyi bzhon pa'i bye brag khyad par can rta dang glang po la sogs pa dang skyes pa dang / bud med dang / 'khor lo
<p>127a</p>
<p>127a.1</p>dang / nor bu dang / dmag mi rnams kyis nam mkha' rgyas par lhag par mos par/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sap+ta rat+na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rang gi sems yid bzhin nor bu las byung ba'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad du gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
<p>127a.2</p>ba dan rnams kyis rgyas par lhag par mos par byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsha traM d+h+wa dza pA daM ka pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad du/ ral gri dang / me long dang / me tog dang phreng ba la sogs par rgyas par byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta khaD+ga A
<p>127a.3</p>daR+sha puSh+pa mA le pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad du/ rnga dang cang te'u dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / kar ko ta dang / gar la sogs pas rgyas par byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gI tirba tur ya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de ltar
<p>127a.4</p>mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas sdig pa thams cad yang dag par bshags par bya ste/ pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las mdzub mo gnyis bsnol nas mthe bong gnyis brkyang ste/ lhag ma gsum thal mor byas pas snying gar bzung ste/ 
<p>127a.5</p>phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / gzungs sngags dang / bcom
<p>127a.6</p>ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / 
<p>127a.7</p>rin po che dang / pad+ma dang las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / gzungs sngags dang / bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams
<p>127b</p>
<p>127b.1</p>cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o zhes brjod la/ yi ge brgya pa lan bdun du bzlas par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
<p>127b.2</p>sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams la rgya cher yi rang bar bgyi/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa rnams la/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad du gsol/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ yongs su mya ngan
<p>127b.3</p>las 'da' bar bzhed pa de dag thams cad/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i lam la gnas par bgyi'o/ /de nas gsum la skyabs su gsol ba la
<p>127b.4</p>sogs pa bya ste/ me tog lag par thogs la/ 'di skad ces brjod do/ /bla med bcom ldan rkang gnyis mchog /rdo rje lta bu'i sangs rgyas te/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la/ /bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /rnam par dag pa chags pa mchog /pad+ma lta bu
<p>127b.5</p>dam chos te/ /nges gsung sngags dang phyag rgya la/ /bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /rnam grol gtsang ma tshogs kyi mchog /rin chen lta bu dge 'dun te/ /lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /
<p>127b.6</p>yang dag byang chub skyed mdzad bzhin/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis
<p>127b.7</p>brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar
<p>128a</p>
<p>128a.1</p>bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos
<p>128a.2</p>kyang ma lus gzung / /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /
<p>128a.3</p>bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa'i sems can rnams/ /dbyugs dbyung mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de ltar sdom pa bzung nas/ bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs
<p>128a.4</p>rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi ris su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la bdag nyid dbul gyis/ bdag dus thams cad nas
<p>128a.5</p>rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol lo/ /zhes brjod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du/ lus rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa spros pas so so'i zhabs drung du dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis/ dam tshig chen po'i dngos
<p>128a.6</p>grub bdag la stsal du gsol lo zhes brjod la/ dge ba de yang sems can thams cad dang / thun mong du bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis/ bdag dang sems can thams cad/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i bde ba
<p>128a.7</p>dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi mchog sangs rgyas su tshe 'di nyid la thob par gyur cig ces dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos la/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal la/ sems chen pos dmigs par bya ba dang / de las 'don par 'dod pa'i bla na med pa'i sems dang / 'phags pa'i
<p>128b</p>
<p>128b.1</p>chos kyis yongs su grol ba'i sems mchog tu gyur pa dang / dngos po thams cad la dmigs pa med pa mthar thug pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba tsam dngos po kun gyi mchog tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la
<p>128b.2</p>sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya ste/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti tsit+ta sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA yAr+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ zhes bzlas pas/ lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la/ a las
<p>128b.3</p>zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu rdo rje rtse mor gyur pa rnams kyi steng du bsams la/ de dag gi steng du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sa bon lag pa g.yas pa la bsam pa dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i sa bon lag pa g.yon pa la bsam par bya ste/ de la mthe bong
<p>128b.4</p>gnyis la/ oM zhes bya ba bsam/ mdzub mo gnyis la hUM zhes bya ba bsam/ gung mo gnyis la trAM zhes bya ba bsam/ srin lag gnyis la d+hi zhes bya ba bsam/ mthe bong gnyis la A zhes bya ba bsam/ de ltar de dag yongs su gyur ba las/ rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan
<p>128b.5</p>ma'o/ /de nyid gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das lnga dang / lha mo lnga bsams te/ thal mo sbyar te/ oM a n+yo n+yA nu rA ga sa ma ya hUM/ zhes brjod la/ thabs dang shes rab rjes su chags par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje thal mo sbyar te/ oM a n+yo n+ya s+pha ra s+pha ra a nu bra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA sa ma
<p>128b.6</p>ya hUM/ zhes brjod pas thabs dang shes rab thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis snyoms par zhugs par bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las/ oM a t+yan+ta a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmAHhUM/ zhes brjod pas/ chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres shing thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i bde ba
<p>128b.7</p>chen po la thugs ye shes kyi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs bskyed pa ste/ de la badzra any+dza li bya bas/ rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so/ /oM badzra ban+d+ha/ zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i'o/ /de nas badzra ban+d+ha traT/ ces brjod pas snying gar sdig pa lan gsum dral bar bya'o/ /oM A be sha /zhes
<p>129a</p>
<p>129a.1</p>bya bas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ a zhes pas bdag nyid la ye shes dbab par bya'o/ /phab pa de nyid 'dis brtan par bya'o/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa sha shwa to me b+ha ba hr-i da yaM me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHbadzra muSh+Ti/ zhes bya
<p>129a.2</p>ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badzra muSh+Ti baM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje phyag rgya nang du bcas la/ mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te/ lag pa gyen du 'phangs la/ oM pA baM A kaR+Sha ni bi sho d+ha na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod par bya'o/ /oM
<p>129a.3</p>badzra pA Ni s+pho Ta ya sarba a pA ya ban+d+ha ni pra mo k+Sha Na sarba a pA ya ga te b+h+yaHsarba trA sa nan sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya traT/ ces brjod la gung mo gnyis mnyam par sbyar la/ gzhan ma bzhi po rtse mo sprad de sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad rab tu bsdu ba'i rnam par
<p>129a.4</p>snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ bde bar gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan bdun brjod de/ oM sarba muHzhes pas dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyis ni dngos grub thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i
<p>129a.5</p>bdag nyid can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su 'og min gyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su/ rang gi lha'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su/ rang gi lha'i snying
<p>129a.6</p>po dam tshig gis bris la/ de nyid la mngon par phyogs pa'i lte ba'i dbus su dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa dang / yang de'i steng du yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil
<p>129a.7</p>'khor gnyis pa nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /de dag gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du/ badzra zhes bya ba'i snying po dang / de las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs dang bcas par bsam par bya'o/ /ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa rnams kyi ni rang rang gi snying po las byung ba'i mtshan ma ste/ de dag
<p>129b</p>
<p>129b.1</p>gi dbus su snying po rnams bkod la rang rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya ba ni/ badzro\u0f85haM/ zhes pa nas g+haN+To\u0f85haM/ zhes bya ba'i bar du/ rang rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga'i byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas par bzhugs pa rnams/ rang rang gi phyag rgya
<p>129b.2</p>la bzhugs par bsams te/ badzra tsakra sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na hUM/ zhes pa zlos shing phyag rgya'i gzugs de rnams/ badzra bai ro tsa na ra haM/ zhes pa la sogs pa brjod par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ rang rang gi skur byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur
<p>129b.3</p>bsgoms la/ oM sho d+ha na sho d+ha ne sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne hUM/ brjod la ma hA sa ma ya satwa haM/ zhes pas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings shing sa ma ya haM/ zhes bya'o/ /de nas snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas bzhir rdo rje la sogs pa/ oM sa ma ya sarba/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ zhes
<p>129b.4</p>brjod pas/ byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar 'khor lo'i phyag rgya las byung ba'i badzra tsakra/ zhes pa'i snying pos ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor de ma thag tu sprul la sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings te/ de yis me
<p>129b.5</p>tog gi phreng ba blangs nas/ snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du badzra sa ma ya/ zhes pas 'jug par bya zhing / oM pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ /zhes pas dkyil 'khor du dor bar bya'o/ /de nas oM pra ti gr-ih+Na twa me sarba ma hA ba la/ zhes bya bas phreng ba blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag
<p>129b.6</p>nyid kyi ma rig pa bsal bar bsams te/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /de ring bdag gis mig dbye mdzad/ /rdo rje mig ni bla med pas/ /mig rnams thams cad dbye bar 'gyur/ /zhes brjod la/ mig phye la he badzra pa sh+ya/ zhes brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
<p>129b.7</p>lo thams cad bla mar bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje chu blangs nas/ oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pas/ chu'i dbang blangs nas de nas sangs rgyas dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa'i dbang bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM badzra rat+na
<p>130a</p>
<p>130a.1</p>a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH/ zhes pa'i spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas lngar bde bar gshegs pa lngas dbu rgyan bya'o/ /de bzhin du phyag rgya dang / phreng ba dang / gsung dang / ming dang / las dang / 'khor lo la sogs pa dang / gsang ba
<p>130a.2</p>dang / bde ba chen po'i dbang rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mnos la/ oM hUM/ zhes brjod la/ snying ga la sogs pa'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du go bgo bar bya zhing / dar dpyangs kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /de nas brtul zhugs dang / gnang ba dang / lung bstan pa la sogs pa thams
<p>130a.3</p>cad rgyas par byas nas rang la byin gyis brlabs la/ rnal 'byor chen po la brtson par bya ste/ de la rang gi snying gar zla ba bsams la ma ya A zhes brjod cing / ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa'i gnas su a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ oM sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na hUM/ zhes
<p>130a.4</p>pas mdun gyi nam mkha' bai ro tsa na a zhes brjod la dbab par bya'o/ /badzra be zhes bya ba dang / badzra bai ro tsa na haM/ zhes brjod pas/ phyag rgya dang rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar por bsgoms te/ rang gi gnas su dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig
<p>130a.5</p>gi phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badzra bai ro tsa na Dan+d+re/ zhes bya bas blta bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas/ zla ba grub par 'gyur te/ de'i steng du badzro\u0f85haM/ zhes pa la sogs pas gnas lngar rdo rje la sogs phyag rgyas gyur cing / badzra a pA ya sho d+ha ni hUM/ zhes pa la
<p>130a.6</p>sogs pas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i skur gyur par bsam mo/ /de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badzra satwa A/ badzra rA dza A/ badzra rA ga A/ badzra sA d+hu A/ badzra rat+na A/ badzra te dza A/ badzra ke tu A/ badzra hA sa A/ badzra d+harma
<p>130a.7</p>A/ badzra tIk+Sh+Na A/ badzra he tu A/ badzra b+ha Sha A/ badzra karma A/ badzra rak+Sha A/ badzra yak+Sha A/ badzra san+d+hi A/ badzra lA s+ye A/ badzra mA le A/ badzra gI ti A/ badzra nirti A/ badzra d+hU pe A/ badzra puSh+pe A/ badzra A lo ke A/ badzra gan+d+he A/ badzra aM ku sha
<p>130b</p>
<p>130b.1</p>A/ badzra s+pho Ta A/ badzra A be sha A/ zhes pas snying po phab la/ de nas de dag gyur par gzugs phyag rgya dag ste/ badzro\u0f85haM/ zhes pa nas/ g+haN+To\u0f85haM/ zhes pa'i bar gyis/ rdo rje sems dpa' nas dril bu'i bar du gyur pa'o/ /de nas da nyid so so'i bar phyag rgya chen po'i skur
<p>130b.2</p>bsam par bya ba bzhin/ oM badzra sa two\u0f85haM/ zhes pa nas/ badzra g+haN+To\u0f85haM/ zhes pa'i bar gyis ngan song thams cad dang pos yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa'i gnas su rang gi rigs las nye bar mtshon pa'i kha dog dang phyag mtshan bsnams pas gnas par gyur pa dang / lcags kyu la sogs
<p>130b.3</p>pa'i sbyor bas dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa byas nas so so'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ snying po rnams brjod pas blta bar bya ste/ badzra satwa dr-i sh+ya/ zhes pa nas/ badzra gaN+To dr-i sh+ya/ zhes pa'i bar gyis blta bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi
<p>130b.4</p>lus la phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba bsdus pa las/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rang gi lus la bcug ste/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya ba ste/ badzra tsakra dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /de nas bcom
<p>130b.5</p>ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i snying po lan bdun brjod la/ de bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba dang / rin chen tog dang / shAkya thub pa dang / me tog rgyas pa rnams kyi snying po brjod la sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pas/ oM bud+d+ha lo tsa ni hUM/ zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis snying ga la sogs
<p>130b.6</p>pa'i gnas su byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor chen pos ni gzhal yas khang la sogs pa med pa yang mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed la/ cho ga thams cad spyad par bya ste/ mngon du byed pa pos ni/ de'i rjes la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid las byung ba phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi
<p>130b.7</p>la sbyar bar byas te/ de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa las byung bas na/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcings byas la/ /de nyid lte bar ting 'dzin gnas/ /de las mthe bong mthe chung mdud/ /mdzub mo srin lag rin chen 'dra/ /mthe bong mthe chung pad snying po/ /gzhan
<p>131a</p>
<p>131a.1</p>rnams 'dra ma 'dra ba ste/ /de bzhin ral gri 'dra ba dang / /mdzub mo rdo rje 'dra ba dang / /gung mo dag ni rin chen te/ /srin lag pad+ma 'dra ba las/ /mthe chung ut+pal 'dab 'drar bya/ /mdzub mo rdo rje 'dra ba las/ /de nyid lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug /me tog
<p>131a.2</p>mda' gzhu 'dra ba dang / /legs so zhes par brjod pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yin/ /mdzub mo rin chen 'dra ba dang / /mthe bong gshibs te gzhan rnams bsnol/ /de las srin lag mthe chung gnyis/ /mnyam par gshibs pa rgyal mtshan te/ /de las bskor te kha
<p>131a.3</p>phyogs gzhag /srin lag pad+ma chos kyi ste/ /srin lag ral gri rnon po yin/ /lag gnyis mtheb mdzub zlum po ni/ /'khor lo yi ni phyag rgyar grags/ /srin lag rtse sprad tshigs gnyis dgu /khar gzhag pa ni gzung ba ste/ /mthe bong mthe chung rtse sprad dgyed/ /las kyi rdo rjer
<p>131a.4</p>bshad pa yin/ /de las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang nas/ /mthe bong snying gar brkyang pa'o/ /[(]mdzum [,]mdzub [)]mo gnyis dgu mche ba la/ /mthe bong gung mo kha 'dra ba/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni yin pa ste/ /mthe chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o/ /snying gar
<p>131a.5</p>mthe bong mnyam par gshibs/ /rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba ste/ /thal sbyar kha yi thad kar gzhag /de las bsnol te rab bskor dang / /rdo rje bcings pa kha sbub dang / /thal mo kha phye gyen du 'thor/ /g.yas pa'i mtheb bsgreng g.yon pas 'khyud/ /rdo rje bsdams brkyang dbyug
<p>131a.6</p>pa'o/ /mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa dang / /mtheb mdzub gnyis ni mdud pa dor/ /mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing / /rdo rje bcings pa mdzub mo bsdams/ /rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed pa gsal bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
<p>131a.7</p>pa rnams kyi ljags la chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje la dgod par bya ste/ sarba bid oM/ sarba bid hUM/ sarba bid trI/ sarba bid hrIH/ sarba bid aH/ sarba ne tra A ta ma su kha/ tsan+d+ra pra b+hA ba/ sarba da ro/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a na yA swa/ a ho
<p>131b</p>
<p>131b.1</p>su kha sA d+hu sA d+hu/ su ma hAt+t+raM/ rU po d+yo t+ya/ ar ta pa ti/ ha ha hUM te/ sarba ka ri/ duHkhats+tshed/ bud+d+ha bo d+hi/ pra ti sap+ta/ su pa shi traM/ ni ra bA yat+taM/ sha trUM b+hak+Sha/ sarba sid+d+hi/ ma hA ra te/ rU pa sho b+he/ sro ta su khye/ sarba pU'o/ prah+la da ni/ pha la ga me/ su ti tsi ga /su gan+d+ha gre /
<p>131b.2</p>a ya he dza/ a he hUM hUM/ he phoT baM/ g+haN+Ta a a/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ gung mo sbyar ba byas pa las/ /g.yas pa yi ni gung mo bsgreng / /g.yon pa'i sbu gur bcug nas ni/ /gzhan rnams brkyang pa byang chub mchog /ngan song kun sbyong sa la reg /rin
<p>131b.3</p>chen gyi ni mchog sbyin te/ /shAkya thub pa'i chos bshad mchog /mi 'jigs sbyin pa me tog gi'o/ spyan gyi mig dang 'dra ba ste/ /mA ma kI ni rdo rje 'dra/ /dkar mo pad+ma nyid du bshad/ /ut+pa la ni sgrol mar dgongs/ /rdo rje blangs nas gsor ba dang / /lag gnyis lcags kyu'i
<p>131b.4</p>tshul gnas dang / gzhu 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba dang / /legs pa'i se gol snying gar gnas/ /lag gnyis rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ /snying gar nyi ma rab tu ston/ /g.yon pa'i gru mo g.yas pas gzung / /de las phyir zlog rab tu dgyes/ /shes rab thabs kyi pad+ma dgyes/ /snying
<p>131b.5</p>gar po ti ral gri phyar/ /mgal me lta bu'i 'khor lo bskor/ /rdo rje gnyis ni kha 'gram gnas/ /rdo rje gar gyis bskor nas dgrol/ /spyi bor thal mo mnyam par sbyor/ /go cha'i tshul du bzung nas ni/ /mthe chung gnyis ni mche bar gnas/ /khu tshur gnyis ni dku ru gnas/ /
<p>131b.6</p>phreng ba blangs nas steng du 'phyar/ /de las bi wang mdzub mos bskyod/ /gar ni de las rnam par bzlog /sangs rgyas mchod pa la brtson pas/ /g.yas pa'i mkhrig ma g.yon pas gzung / /g.yon pa snying ga g.yas pa yi/ /mtheb srin me tog dpral bar bzlog /de bzhin
<p>131b.7</p>mig tu yang dag gnas/ /dung phor lta bur dri yis mchod/ /mdzub gnyis lcags kyus mthe chung mdud/ /zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang / /de nyid lcags sgrog tshul du bya/ /zhags pa'i tshul las rgyab gnyis mnan/ /dam tshig 'bebs pa yin par 'dod/ /de nas phyag rgya
<p>132a</p>
<p>132a.1</p>chen po bcing bar bya ste/ de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' bsams la/ thams cad du rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa las/ gong ma lta bu/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang / /sa gnon dang ni mchog sbyin dang / /chos 'chad dang ni skyabs mdzad dang / /spyan
<p>132a.2</p>gnyis rdo rje khar gnas dang / /pad+ma lta bu thal mo dang / /ut+pal lta bu'i sor mo dang / /dril bu dkur gtod rdo rje gsor/ /lcags kyus sangs rgyas kun 'gugs shing / /rdo rje mda' ni bde gshegs 'bigs/ /legs pas sangs rgyas mnyes mdzad cing / /snying po
<p>132a.3</p>yis ni dbang bskur mdzad/ /nyi mas sangs rgyas kun snang ste/ /rgyal sras kyis ni sbyin pa rdzogs/ /bzhad pas ba spu ldang mdzad cing / /spyan gyis gti mug mun pa sel/ /rnon pos shes rab po ti 'dzin/ /'khor los 'khor lo rnam par bsgyur/ gsung bas ljags ni rab tu brkyang / /
<p>132a.4</p>las kyis rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin/ /gsung bas cho ga 'dzin pas mchog /gnod sbyin la ni mche bar ldan/ /khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje bcings/ /sgeg mo rdo rje gnyis dang ldan/ phreng bas rin chen phreng ba 'dzin/ /glu mkhan pi wang rnam par ldan/ /gar ni rdo rje rtse gsum ste/ /bdug pa
<p>132a.5</p>yis ni spos khang 'dzin/ /me tog me tog snod dang ldan/ snang bas mar me sdong bu 'dzin/ /dri ni dung phor yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin lcags kyu zhags pa 'dzin/ /lcags sgrog dril bur ldan pa dang / /phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags/ /de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dngos
<p>132a.6</p>grub la sogs 'byin par 'gyur ba kho na ste/ de'i skad cig rnams la de dag gi skur bsgoms la/ bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams la ni/ sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ zhes brjod pa dang / rig pa'i lha mo rnams la ni/ /su ra ta s+t+waM a haM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dbang
<p>132a.7</p>bskur la sogs pa thams cad bya ste/ dam tshig dam pa mchog gi rdo rje glu/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshigs su bcad pas blangs la mnyes par bya ste/ oM badzra tu Sh+ya ho/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms pa las/ 
<p>132b</p>
<p>132b.1</p>oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes byas la/ de nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skad cig ma la dus 'byor pa ste/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu bsam mo/ /de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa'o/ /de'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor
<p>132b.2</p>dkar po zlum po'o/ /de'i steng na laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ser bo gru bzhi pa'o/ /de'i steng du suM las ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi dang / rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dpag tshad dang rgyar yangs par bsams la/ de'i steng du b+h+rUM dkar po gyur pa las yang dag par byung ba'i dpal
<p>132b.3</p>rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang brtsegs bsgom par bya ste/ gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa rta babs bzhi dang dril bu dang / dra ba la sogs pas yongs su brgyan cing / me tog phreng ba dang / ba
<p>132b.4</p>dan la sogs pas spras pa rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa bsam par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su tsaM ser po las gyur pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa rin po che dang / rdo rjes rnam par spras pa'i 'od sna tshogs dang ldan par bsams te/ de'i dbus su a siM aM las seng ge'i khri bskyed pa
<p>132b.5</p>dang / de bzhin du ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i gnas su/ hUM g+haM hUM las glang po che'i khri dang / rin chen tog gi gnas su trAM a trAM las rta'i khri dang / shAkya thub pa'i gnas su/ haM maM haM las/ rma bya'i khri dang / me tog rgyas pa'i gnas su a gaM a las nam mkha' lding gi khri bsam
<p>132b.6</p>par bya'o/ /de'i dbus seng ge'i khri'i steng du skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/ bsod nams ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed la/ mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du
<p>132b.7</p>byed pa mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid 'di ltar bsam par bya ste/ de nyid thugs rje chen po las byung ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de nyid 'di lta bu
<p>133a</p>
<p>133a.1</p>yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pa ga na ba der gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin nyid kyi
<p>133a.2</p>ched du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya
<p>133a.3</p>snyam/ de nas tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pa'i sngags kyis se gol brdabs pas slong bar mdzad do/ /de nas sad par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta pra Na men badzra ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes pas phyag rgya ste 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
<p>133a.4</p>de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtogs la/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags
<p>133a.5</p>'di dga' bar bzlas/ oM tsit+ta pra ti ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes bya bas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa/ de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi
<p>133a.6</p>sems so sor rtogs pa dang / sems rin po che de nyid snying rje chen pos brgyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba dang / 'di skad gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i
<p>133a.7</p>dkyil 'khor lta bur rtogs so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na/ ji ltar sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur te/ dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no/ /der yang rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sngags zlos shig dang rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>133b</p>
<p>133b.1</p>oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ zhes bya bas shin tu gsal ba'i byang chub sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa las rim gyis 'phel bar gyur pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur ba las/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs
<p>133b.2</p>pa rnams/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba gang lags pa/ de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong lags so/ /de nas shin tu rnam par dag pa spros pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'i sems de nyid la/ dzanyA na ri mi bi dza hUM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi rnam par spros te/ zla ba'i
<p>133b.3</p>dkyil 'khor de las 'od zer rnam par sna tshogs pa byung ste/ de chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas khang du zhugs nas shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sems ri bo lta bur bcom ste slar rdo rje chen po'i gzugs rtse lnga pa gcig tu gyur nas spyi bo nas thugs kar zhugs te/ zla ba'i dkyil
<p>133b.4</p>'khor la rab tu gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon du gyur gyi de legs par sgrubs shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis rang gi snying
<p>133b.5</p>ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ snang bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyis de nas gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag gis mthong ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>133b.6</p>thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rjer
<p>133b.7</p>zhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dbyings rdo rje dbyings zhes rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag legs par mthong lags so zhes gsol to/ /sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>134a</p>
<p>134a.1</p>thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis 'grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos shig /oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta ta thA a haM/ de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs
<p>134a.2</p>pa de dag la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis brlabs la/ mngon par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs
<p>134a.3</p>so/ /de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
<p>134a.4</p>cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pas rang bzhin gyis dag go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rang
<p>134a.5</p>bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to/ /de ltar sems so sor rtogs pa nas brtsams te mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba dang / rin chen
<p>134a.6</p>tog dang / shAkya thub pa dang / me tog rgyas pa rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ de rang gi sems las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam
<p>134a.7</p>pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed/ nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur/ kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos chos kyi ye shes bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir
<p>134b</p>
<p>134b.1</p>snying rje'i mig gis sems can thams cad la bltas pa dang / mi shes pa'i las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis dgug par shes nas bdag 'dir sngar bskyed pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa'i dbus na
<p>134b.2</p>seng ge'i khri de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams las grub pa'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bo bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhi pa'i tshul du bzhugs par gyur par bsgom mo/ /de bzhin du glang po che la sogs pa'i khri'i steng du ngan song
<p>134b.3</p>thams cad sbyong ba la sogs pa yang phyogs bzhi re re gnas par gyur pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dbyings ni bdag go zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o/ /de dag gis ni sbyor ba dang
<p>134b.4</p>po'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas spyi bo la sogs par byin gyis brlabs la/ oM badzra a d+hiSh+ThA na dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gnyis nas/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ zhes bya ba'i snying
<p>134b.5</p>pos sangs rgyas spyan phyung ste/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byas nas/ spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa'i sbyor bas byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin du yang snyan gnyis nas/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ zhes bya ba'i snying po
<p>134b.6</p>las gos dkar mo phyung ste/ rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to/ /zhal nas shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ zhes bya ba'i snying po las/ mA ma kI phyung ste/ rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur to/ /shangs nas sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i snying pos sgrol ma byung ste/ rang gi
<p>134b.7</p>gnas su gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa med pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rje bdud kyi dpung ma lus pa 'joms shing sems can rnams kyi ngan 'gro'i rgyud thams cad gcod par byed pa'i snying po/ oM na mo b+ha ga
<p>135a</p>
<p>135a.1</p>ba ti sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+g+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA baM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang bcas par byung ba dang / des rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams
<p>135a.2</p>spro ba'i phyir phyung nas spros la/ des sems can thams cad kyi snying la zhugs nas sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi rgyud thams cad bcad de/ slar 'dus pa las 'khor lo'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu drug tu gyur nas gnas par bsam mo/ /de nas de rnams las ye shes kyi 'od
<p>135a.3</p>zer byung nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rjer zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga'i gzugs su gnas pa dang / yang sngar gyi thugs ka'i rdo rje'i tshad du gyur te/ de las byung ba'i
<p>135a.4</p>rang rang gi phyag rgya nyid bsdus pa nas gsungs pa'i ched du brjod pa'am/ rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud sh+lo ka stong phrag bco brgyad pa nas gsungs pa'i ched du brjod pa/ e ma ho bdag ni sems dpa' ste/ /mi bskyod rgyal pos byin brlabs shing / /'gro kun don la sems dpa'i phyir/ /rdo rje sems
<p>135a.5</p>dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /ces bya ba la sogs pas ched du brjod pas ched du brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan la sogs pas dbang bskur nas/ gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
<p>135a.6</p>rang rang gi phyag rgya rnam par dag pas gnas par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas gsang sngags chen mo de nyid las sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ e ma ho bdag ni sgeg mo ste/ /rol pa'i
<p>135a.7</p>rgyal pos byin brlabs shing / /yid 'phrog phyir ni rab sgeg pas/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang rang gi ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pas gnas par gyur to/ /sgo rnams su ni gsang sngags chen mo de nyid las rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa spros te/ /e ma ho bdag ni lcags
<p>135b</p>
<p>135b.1</p>kyu ste/ /thugs rje'i rgyal pos byin brlabs shing / /'gro kun ngan song las 'dren phyir/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhes byar brjod/ /ces pa la sogs pa'i ched du brjod pas rang rang gi gnas su gnas par gyur/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas mchod pa thams
<p>135b.2</p>cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri sho d+ha ni d+harmA te ga ga na sa mung+ga te ma hA ya na pa ri gA re swA hA/ zhes brjod pa las rta babs kyi khyams rnams su byams pa la sogs pa bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang rang gi zla ba'i
<p>135b.3</p>dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur pa dang / rdo rje la sogs pa'i dbang gi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya ste/ de la de dag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya las thams cad bcing bar byed pa'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ni lce la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
<p>135b.4</p>las sprul pa'i sngags nyid do/ /las kyi phyag rgya ni de dag gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams pa las/ kun kyang sgeg par ldan pa ste/ /gung mdzub me tog 'dra ba ni/ /byams pa'i phyag rgya yin pa ste/ /g.yon pa dkur btsugs g.yas pa ni/ /gung mdzub mig 'dra don yod grub/ /
<p>135b.5</p>de las mdzub mo lcags kyur bkug /ngan song kun 'dren yin par bshad/ /de las dbyug pa'i tshul byas pa/ /mya ngan kun 'joms yin pa ste/ /g.yon pa lte bar gnas pa ni/ /glang po'i sna 'dra spos kyi glang / /g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas pa ni/ /ral gri 'dzin pa dpa' bar
<p>135b.6</p>'gro/ /g.yon pa snying ga g.yas pa ni/ /steng du snod 'dzin nam mkha'i mdzod/ /g.yon du lag gnyis rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /ye shes tog gi phyag rgya ste/ /lag gnyis dpral bar bum pa 'dzin/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od kyi yin par bshad/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur slar gnas la/ /
<p>135b.7</p>g.yas pa'i srin lag mthe bong gnyis/ /zla ba'i ri mo ltar 'dzin pa/ /zla 'od gzhon nu'i phyag rgya ste/ /lag gnyis snying gar pad+ma 'byed/ /bzang skyong gi ni phyag rgyar grags/ /sor mo rtse bsnol bar phye nas/ /mthe bong bsgreng 'dzin dra ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje rtse gcig snying gar
<p>136a</p>
<p>136a.1</p>gnas/ /rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya ste/ /g.yon pa snying gar khu tshur gnas/ /g.yas pa mchod sbyin blo gros che/ /g.yon pa lte bar gnas nas ni/ /g.yas pa se gol spobs pa brtsegs/ /g.yon pa dku ru gnas nas ni/ /rin chen khu tshur dpung par 'dzin/ /byang
<p>136a.2</p>chub sems dpa' kun bzang gi /phyag rgya dam pa yin par 'dod/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po ni/ /de dag gi phyag mtshan dang ldan pa las rang rang gi snying po/ oM mai tri ya hUM/ zhes pa nas/ oM sa man+ta b+ha drA ya hUM/ zhes pa'i bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin
<p>136a.3</p>gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi ngan 'gro'i rgyun gcod par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi thugs ka nas/ rdo rje ye shes byin gyis brlabs/ /zhes bya ba'i snying po/ oM badzra a d+hiSh+ThA ni dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams dang
<p>136a.4</p>ye shes kyi tshogs lhun gyis grub pa'i ri rab kyi rtse mon khang pa brtsegs pa chen po 'od dang ldan pa'i phyi rol du 'od kyi 'khor lo'i gzugs 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa la/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i nyan thos chen po brgyad dang / ser skya la
<p>136a.5</p>sogs pa'i 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang / stobs po che la sogs pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad dang / seng ge'i mgo la sogs pa pho nya chen po brgyad sprul par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rim pa ji lta bas de'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol la ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams bsam par bya ste/ yul 'khor srung
<p>136a.6</p>la sogs pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin la sogs pa phyogs skyong ba rnams dang / nyi ma la sogs pa gza' chen po brgyad dang / smig drug la sogs pa rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / rgyas pa la sogs pa'i drang srong chen po brgyad dang / sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa 'jig
<p>136a.7</p>rten pa'i rje bo brgyad dang / de dag gi phyi rol du ni 'dzam bu'i gling dang / lus 'phags po dang / ba lang spyod dang / sgra mi snyan dang / 'gro ba drug tu gnas pa'i sa 'og dang / sa steng dang / sa bla'i khams thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pa thams
<p>136b</p>
<p>136b.1</p>cad kyang mi dge ba'i rgyun mtha' dag bral ba las dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang ldan zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis bskul bas mchod pa'i tshogs chen pos mchod cing / thams cad dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rgyas par gyur te/ lag pa'i thal mo
<p>136b.2</p>spyi bor sbyar bas bcom ldan 'das dang / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor la mngon par rdzogs par bsam par bya'o/ /de lta bu las sems can thams cad kyi sems dri ma med pa rab tu dang ba dang ldan pa'i dga' ba chen pos mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
<p>136b.3</p>sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/ /chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med/ /dge 'dun 'dra ba'i zhing de med/ /de phyir gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /de nas sems can thams cad dkon mchog gsum la yang dag par song par byas la/ cho ga thams cad bsdus pa'i mchog la spyad par bya ste/ rang
<p>136b.4</p>gi snying ga la a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la de'i steng du rang gi sa bon las gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su gyur pa dang / de la rang gi sa bon gnas pa'i 'od zer gyis dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ye shes sems dpa'i dbyings
<p>136b.5</p>thams cad bkug la/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas par bzhugs pa la mchod yon gyis zhabs bsil dang / nye reg dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa byas la/ mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas/ lcags kyu la
<p>136b.6</p>sogs pa'i sngags dang / rnal 'byor gyis rang gi lus la yang dag par zhugs par bya ba ni/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas de kho na nyid gcig par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>136b.7</p>thams cad kyi mchod pa mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ oM badzra puSh+pe/ zhes pa la sogs pas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas mA ma kI shin tu mdzes pa 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi mchog tu
<p>137a</p>
<p>137a.1</p>gyur ba bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa phyung ste/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i thugs kar zhugs par gyur pa ste/ e ma bdag ni mchod pa bla na med/ /gang phyir rdo rje rgyal po mnyes gyur pa/ /de las sprul pa'i mchod pa bla med kyis/ /sangs rgyas zhing du
<p>137a.2</p>rab tu rgyas gyur cig /oM satwa badzri hUM/ badzra satwa su saM gra haM/ zhes rang gi rdo rje glu gdung ba dang bcas pas song bar gyur pa ste/ de'i spro ba'i phyag ni lag pa gnyis gzhal yas khang du brtsegs pa las/ de'i dbus na mthe bong dang gung mo bzhi gnyis su med par gcig par byas shing pad+ma
<p>137a.3</p>phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa las rang gi snying gar bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje 'dzin par bya'o/ /de bzhin du mchod pa bcu drug po thams cad la yang rang rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa las gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgyas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i thugs ka
<p>137a.4</p>nas slar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings la mA ma kI gong ma'i rdo rje glus mchod par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas sangs rgyas spyan phyung nas rin chen tog gi thugs kar phul ba las/ e ma rin po che zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i
<p>137a.5</p>glus/ oM rat+na dzi hUM nai tri su satwa saM gwa haM/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas gos dkar mo sprul nas shAkya thub pa'i thugs kar phul nas/ e ma pad+ma'i zhes pa la sogs pa dang / oM d+har+m+ma badzra hUM mu ni su satwa saM gra haM/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
<p>137a.6</p>kyi thugs ka nas sgrol ma sprul te me tog chen po rgyas pa'i thugs kar phul te/ e ma las kyi mchod pa zhes pa la sogs pas/ oM bi sho badzra hUM tA ra su satwa saM gra haM/ ji ltar ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar slar phul ba
<p>137a.7</p>de bzhin du rin po che tog la sogs pas kyang rdo rje'i glu de nyid kyis mchod par bya'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas sgeg mo sprul te/ rdo rje sems ma'i thugs kar sprul pa las/ e ma bdag ni mchod pa zhes pa la sogs pas/ oM lA s+ya su satwa saM
<p>137b</p>
<p>137b.1</p>gra haM/ zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las phreng ba ma dang / glu mkhan ma dang / gar mkhan ma dang / bdug pa ma dang / me tog ma dang / snang gsal ma dang / dri chab ma dang / lcags kyu ma dang / zhags pa ma dang / 
<p>137b.2</p>lcags sgrog ma dang / dril bu ma dang / yang sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa bco lnga sprul pa las rang rang gi ched du brjod pa'i glus rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i thugs kar phul te/ de rnams kyi rdo rje'i glu gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ rA dzA su satwa
<p>137b.3</p>saM gra haM/ oM badzra aM ku sha hUM rA ga su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra a ta ma hUM sA d+hu su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra mA le hUM rat+na su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra puSh+pe hUM te dza su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra pA sha hUM ke tu su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra nai tri hUM hA sa su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra gI ti hUM d+harma su satwa
<p>137b.4</p>saM gra haM/ oM badzra A lo ke hUM tIk+Sh+Na su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta hUM tsakra su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra ban+d+ha ra hUM pA sha su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra nirti hUM pA sha su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra gan+d+he hUM d+harma su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra tA ra hUM yak+Sha su satwa saM gra haM/ oM badzra tA ra hUM sin+ta su satwa saM
<p>137b.5</p>gra haM/ zhes gdung ba dang bcas pas mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis rgyas par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas ye shes kyi 'od zer chen pos dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ rgyal ba thams cad
<p>137b.6</p>skyed par byed pa'i lha mo lngas theg pa chen po'i bum pa bla na med pa'i dbang / oM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ zhes pa la sogs pas bum pa des dbang bskur la/ de bzhin du yang dbu rgyan dang / dar dpyangs dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming dang / brtul zhugs dang / de
<p>137b.7</p>bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI oM hUM trAM hrIHaH/ zhes pas dbang bskur la/ rigs kyi bdag po dang / rigs kyi yum thams cad kyi dpral ba dang / spyi bo dang / lkog ma dang / snying ga rnams su rdo rje
<p>138a</p>
<p>138a.1</p>sems dpa' la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas rigs thams cad la rgyas btab ste/ phyag rgya bzhi la nye bar gnas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+pa nir+ya ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye
<p>138a.2</p>hUM karma badzra a/ zhes pa la sogs pas mchod nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas/ lus thams cad la ye shes kyi 'od zer chen pos gsal bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par gyur pa nyid do// //
<p>138a.3</p>de dag gis ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las ye shes kyi 'od zer dri ma med pa des snang bar byas pa dang / de nas
<p>138a.4</p>bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas/ yang 'od zer byung ba de nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi snying la zhugs so/ /de nas sems can gyi ngan 'gro'i rgyud thams cad bcad nas slar thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa nam mkha'i khams
<p>138a.5</p>thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs su gyur to/ /de'i lte ba la gnas pa byang chub kyi sems rin po che yongs su dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa'i 'od zer la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil
<p>138a.6</p>'khor gyi dbus na ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa bzhi ni rang rang gi phyag rdo rje la sogs pa phyag g.yas pa na bsnams shing / phyag g.yon pa rdo rje'i lcags kyu 'od zer dang bcas pa bsnams pa'i phyag bzhir rdo rje sems dpa'
<p>138a.7</p>la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis yang dag par gnas te/ sems can thams cad la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjes dgug par mdzad pa dang / sems dag pa dang bcas par mdzad pa dang / yid
<p>138b</p>
<p>138b.1</p>dang bar mdzad pa dang / rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba dang / sbyin pa phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa dang / 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la nges par sbyor ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad
<p>138b.2</p>gcod pa dang / bdud dpung ma lus pa rtsad nas 'byin par mdzad pa dang / lkugs pa thams cad smra bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa mdzad pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad srung ba dang / bsrung ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang / lus dang / dag
<p>138b.3</p>dang sems mnyam pa nyid du gcig par mdzad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la sbyor ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / 
<p>138b.4</p>shes rab dang / smon lam dang / thabs rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa la gzhug pa dang / theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyi sems 'jig par mdzad pa dang / rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing
<p>138b.5</p>skye ba med par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa la skyong bar mdzad pa ste/ slar sems can thams cad dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor du bkug ste bcug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
<p>138b.6</p>thugs las sprul pa'i bum pa dang / phyag rgya dang / phred ba la sogs pa'i dbang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bskur bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba las khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sras po nyid du gyur pa ste/ thams cad du yang rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba las kun kyang bskal
<p>138b.7</p>pa 'di snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar mtshan gcig par gyur te/ mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas/ yang de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu/ kye ma rnam snang rdo rje yis/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa ngo mtshar che/ /gang phyir ngan song ltung
<p>139a</p>
<p>139a.1</p>ba yi/ /sems can glog bzhin myur du sgrol/ /zhes yongs su bstod pas bsam par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad nam mkha'i khams mthas gtugs pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho thams cad du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i
<p>139a.2</p>dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan par byas nas gnas par byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ni rab tu gsal ba'i bdag nyid du gnas par gyur to/ /de dag gis ni las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to// //
<p>139a.3</p>de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rtsibs bcu drug pa'i gzugs/ rdo rje'i dbyings chen po ste/ thams cad kyang rdo rje'i khu tshur mkhrig ma bsnol la bzlog cing bzlog pas se
<p>139a.4</p>gol gdab par bya ste/ se gol de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugs su gnas pa las rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yum thams cad/ oM badzra sa mA dzaHshidzaH
<p>139a.5</p>hUM baM hoH/ zhes bya bas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba las rdo rje bsdu bar bya ste/ de nyid du 'khod par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad 'dus par gyur pa ste/ de nyid mchod pa'i tshogs kyis
<p>139a.6</p>rgyas par byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs rdo rje chen po'i lte ba la gnas par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad thugs kyi yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i thig le la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan thams
<p>139a.7</p>cad kyis rgyas par gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu gnas shing / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba thams cad du thogs pa med par gyur pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis gnas par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
<p>139b</p>
<p>139b.1</p>cad kyi thugs kar gnas pa de nyid la sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyis ni bdag nyid kyi sems/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings su gyur pa rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i bdag nyid du gyur to/ /de ltar ji srid du skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid du bsgoms la/ de nas
<p>139b.2</p>rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sbyor bas sngags bzlas par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rig pa chen mo rtsa ba'i sngags zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu byung ba dang / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang rtsa ba'i rig pa
<p>139b.3</p>chen mo de nyid la brten te rang rang gi snying po'i sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsams nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa la brtson par byas na/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi bzlas pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'bum phrag dang / stong phrag dang / brgya phrag la sogs pa bzlas nas mnyam
<p>139b.4</p>par gzhag pa las langs par gyur pa'i tshe mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas kyang bstod par bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te/ rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi bar du phyag rgya
<p>139b.5</p>thams cad bkrol la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya dam pas bkrol zhing / badzra muHzhes pas phyag rgya thams cad nam mkha'i phyogs su bstan la/ rdo rje go cha'i sbyor bas bdag nyid la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i go bgos la yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas dngos grub blang ste/ dge
<p>139b.6</p>ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang bral bar/ dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad dang ldan par gyur nas/ sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad spangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen
<p>139b.7</p>po'i sa la gnas par gyur cig ces dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog lag par thogs pas/ bdag gi phyag rgya sngags rnams dang / /bsam gtan 'khrul dang nyams pa rnams/ /de bzhin lha tshogs nyams pa kun/ /dkyil 'khor bcas pas bzod par mdzod/ /ces bzod par
<p>140a</p>
<p>140a.1</p>gsol la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis rol mo sna tshogs pa nam mkha' las sgrogs pas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /ji ltar mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas
<p>140a.2</p>yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes bya bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// //de nas nyams pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pa mngon par brtson pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams kyi don du
<p>140a.3</p>dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las bya ba nyid de/ de yang re zhig dang por gnas gtsang ma rang gi yid dang rjes su mthun pa rnams su nyi ma bzang po la rab tu zhugs la ba'i rnam pa lnga dang / dri dang byug pa la sogs pas nye reg byas te/ a ga ru la sogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs shing spos kyi
<p>140a.4</p>dkyil 'khor khru drug pa'am/ khru bzhi pa'am/ khru do pa byas pa/ de'i rjes su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa snying dang ze 'brur ldan pa bris te/ de'i steng du bum pa dkar po gcig la rigs lnga'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa rnam par snang mdzad bskyed pa'i nang du/ sman dang / spos dang / rin po che
<p>140a.5</p>dang / 'bru la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa bcug ste/ ras dkar pos mgul la dkris shing me tog phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa bzhag ste/ de'i shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma la bgegs mthar byed kyi bum pa snga ma lta bu bzhag la/ dkar po la
<p>140a.6</p>sogs pa'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas btags te/ mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod nas/ stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ yi ge brgya pas sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa bsgoms la/ mdun gyi bar snang la nam mkha'i khams
<p>140a.7</p>thams cad du khyab pa'i sems las pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma stong dang ldan pas khyab par gyur pa dang / de'i steng du hUM nag po las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od dang bcas pa bsams la/ de gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen por bsams te/ snying ga dang / dbral ba
<p>140b</p>
<p>140b.1</p>dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bo rnams su sangs rgyas spyan dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma rnams sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis rgyas btab la/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa ha/ zhes brjod do/ /de las rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya bcas pas/ oM badzra tsakra hUM/ zhes pa'i sngags
<p>140b.2</p>lan bdun bzlas pas/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus par sprul la phyag rgya bzhis nye bar spyad par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas/ dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang
<p>140b.3</p>du byas la/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya ho a haM/ zhes brjod de/ mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod do/ /de nas mthun pa'i bar du mchod pa dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la/ rgyal po'i ni zla ba gsum pa'am/ blon po'i zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig go/ /
<p>140b.4</p>dmangs rigs rnams kyi ni zhag bdun pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa'i ni ji srid mtshan ma ma byung gi bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga la ni 'bum phrag gam brgya phrag re re'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ni thams cad du de'i dbye ba nyid las shes par bya ste/ tha ma'i tshang la ni nyi
<p>140b.5</p>shu rtsa gcig tu gsungs so/ /de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni rtsa ba'i sngags nyid de/ de bzhin du ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa ni/ oM sarba pA paM/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bskal pa bzang po'i ni/ oM sarba saM skA ra/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po nyid do/ /shar phyogs kyi
<p>140b.6</p>bum pa la ni/ rdo rje dang bcas pas bgegs mthar byed kyi snying po 'bum la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sbyor bas gsang sngags thams cad bzlas par gyur pa dang / de nyid du rnal 'byor pa sems mchog tu gyur pa rnams la/ mtshan ma rnams 'byung
<p>140b.7</p>ste/ de la lha'i bu'am rgyal po la sogs pas 'bras bu la sogs pa byin pa ni rab tu gyur pa'o/ /rang gi ma'am sru mo la sogs pas 'jig rten pa'i kha zas byin pa ni bar ma'o/ /de bzhin du gnyen nam mi gang yang rung bas kha zas ro dang ldan pa'am/ pad+ma'i sdong bus mgo bcings pa ni tha
<p>141a</p>
<p>141a.1</p>ma'o/ /rigs ngan shin tu gnag pa rnams mthong na mi rung bar gyur pa nyid kyis sreg blugs la sogs pa mchod sbyin chen po bya ba nyid do/ /de nas rdo rje bzlas pa rdzogs par gyur pa dang / bum pa de nyid bar snang gi nam mkha' la rdo rje bslang ba'i phyag rgya nyid kyis 'jog par
<p>141a.2</p>nus pa dang / rdo rje dang dril bu bar snang la gnas par byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pa zas dkar gsum la longs spyod pa dang / bud med la sogs pa spangs pas/ nyin mo dang / mtshan mo lan drug gi bar du mchod pa dang / gtor ma byas te bzlas pa yongs su
<p>141a.3</p>rdzogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las thams cad grub pa byed pas mar gyi sreg blugs stong du tshang bar bya ste/ de dag ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// //de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor chen po'i las brtsam par bya ste/ de la rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba
<p>141a.4</p>rnams kyi ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu'o/ /blon po'am tshong dpon rnams kyi ni khru lnga bcu'o/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi khru bcu drug gam/ bcu gnyis su bya ste/ de yang re zhig tshes gcig la sogs pa yar gyi ngo'i nyin par mngon par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs brtag par bya ste/ rgyal po gdug
<p>141a.5</p>pa can nam/ gcan gzan nam chom po'am sbrul la sogs pa brtag par bya'o/ /de nas med par gyur pa dang / sa'i bdag po rnams la sa phyogs der dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs pa'i phyir bslang bar bgyi'o/ /des byin par gyur pa dang yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i
<p>141a.6</p>dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma dang / dug dang ske tshe dang shing tsher ma can la sogs pas thab khung gru gsum pa'i dbus su bgegs thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang yid rnam pa gsum rgyas par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas bdag dang slob ma dang / sa bdag la
<p>141a.7</p>sogs pa'i tshad du zhi ba'i sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /de nas de'i dbus su mtho gang ngam/ khru gang du brkos pa dang / sa dkar snum pa rnams byung ba ni dngos grub bzang por gyur pa'o/ /sa nag po dang / tsha sgo can dang / skra shad dang / rus dum la sogs pa byung na ni sa
<p>141b</p>
<p>141b.1</p>phyogs de spang bar bya'o/ /de nas de'i nang du dri chus bkang nas gom pa bdun phyir bskyed de slar 'ongs pa las chu'i ri mo mnyam pa ni mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /de'i sa phyogs der bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags bzlas pa'i dri chus/ oM sarba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ zhes gsungs la/ mchod
<p>141b.2</p>pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod de/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa las/ lag pa g.yas pa sa la reg par byas te/ oM sarba dr-i D+ho badzra hUM/ rdo rje brtan par gyur pa dang / rang gi mdun du yi ge baM las gyur pa'i bgegs mthar byed kyi ting nge
<p>141b.3</p>'dzin gyis/ lag par ral gri 'dzin cing rdo rje rgya gram pa'i gom pas bgrod par bya'o/ /mtshams rnams su ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog gis 'gro bar bya'o/ /oM badzra lA se badzra phreM kha la hUM/ zhes pa la sogs pa brjod par bya'o/ /khro bo rnams kyi sngags
<p>141b.4</p>ni/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngags kyi tshogs bzhi phyogs bzhir gnas pa'o/ /de nas bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi de nyid phyogs ji lta ba bzhin du mu tig la sogs par byin gyis
<p>141b.5</p>brlab par bya ste/ de dag ni sa'i cho ga bstan to// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod nas lha rnams kyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas/ bdag nyid spro ba bskyed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ de ring bdag
<p>141b.6</p>tshe 'bras bu yod/ /ces pa la sogs pas mchod pa lag pa g.yas par bdug spos thogs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid la byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis dkyil 'khor
<p>141b.7</p>steng gi bar snang la bzhag la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo rdo rje me'i nyi ma'i sbyor bas bgegs bskrad par byas la/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya gnas bzhir byin gyis brlabs par byas te/ shin tu khros pa'i lta bas g.yas pas rdo rje gsor la/ g.yon pas dril bu gsil bas khro bo 'bar

<p>142a.1</p>ba'i lus dang / bskor ba lan gsum bya zhing / 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /bdag rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya ba/ slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya
<p>142a.2</p>ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa/ dpal ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par 'dod pas/ sa phyogs 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / brjod byed
<p>142a.3</p>dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rgan mo dang / bud med dang / g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag thams cad pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje
<p>142a.4</p>'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba chen pos mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lha la sogs pa de dag sa phyogs de spangs nas song bar bsams nas/ yang gong du bshad pa'i khro bo'i phyag rgya dang / stang stabs rnams kyis bgrod par bya'o/ /
<p>142a.5</p>de nas steng rdo rje dra ba la sogs pa byas nas/ oM maN+Da la hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis gsang ba'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor bkug la phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad bkug pas bcug la seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad
<p>142a.6</p>pa la dri dang me tog dmar pos brgyan pa khro bo'i gzugs rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i zhabs dang ldan pa hUM las bskyed la phur bu'i sngags bzlas pas dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams su brdung bar bya'o/ /de nas dri sna tshogs par sbyar ba las/ ba yi rnam pa lngas byugs pa'i dkyil 'khor du lha'i
<p>142a.7</p>'khor lo rim pa bzhin du thig le byas la me tog bkod de/ de'i dbus su 'dug la rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings su gyur nas/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba la sogs pa rang rang gi snying pos bcug la/ ting nge 'dzin gsum mngon du byas pas/ mchod pas yang dag par

<p>142b.1</p>mchod nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chus gdab bo/ /bum pa rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa bcu/ sgo'i phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la/ slob mas gus pa dang bcas pas phyag byas la gsol ba btab ste/ lhag par gnas par bya ba ni/ slob mas

<p>142b.3</p>gsum dag ni 'tshal ba na/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ slob ma'i thal mo nas bzung la/ dkyil 'khor byas la sdig pa bshags par bya ste/ rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
<p>142b.4</p>yi/ /tshe rabs thog mtha' med pa yi/ /lus kyi sdig pa'i las rnams bshags/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi/ /tshe rabs thog mtha' med pa yi/ /ngag gi sdig pa'i las rnams bshags/ /rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ming

<p>142b.7</p>ldan gang dag mi mdzad pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bskul zhing / /mya ngan 'da' bzhed thams cad la/ /mi 'da' bar ni bzhugs par mdzod/ /de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya ste/ 'di skad ces brjod de/ rdo rje slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /deng nas byang chub snying

<p>143a.1</p>po'i bar/ /rdo rje lta bu'i sangs rgyas la/ /bdag ni skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /rdo rje slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar/ /pad+ma lta bu'i dam chos la/ /bdag ni skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /rdo rje slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /deng nas byang

<p>143b</p>
<p>143b.1</p>tog dang / shAkya thub pa dang / me tog chen po rgyas pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rdo rje slob ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la sdom pa stsol ba de ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas
