<p>162a.3</p>'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o/ /rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog /rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs/ /don yod rgyal po rdo rje gtso/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la'o/ /rdo rje chags pa bde ba che/ /rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa/ /bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje
<p>162a.4</p>gzhu khyod la'o/ /rdo rje legs pa sems dpa' mchog /rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che/ /rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la'o/ /rdo rje rin chen rdo rje don/ /rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che/ /nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug /phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying khyod la'o/ /
<p>162a.5</p>rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje 'od zer gzi brjid che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od khyod la'o/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan sems can don/ /rdo rje mchog ni rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje chen po rin chen tog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la'o/ /rdo rje bzhad pa dga'
<p>162a.6</p>ba che/ /rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che/ /mchog tu rab dga' rdo rje ste/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje bzhad pa la'o/ /rdo rje chos rab de nyid don/ /rdo rje pad+ma mchog grub byed/ /'jig rten dbang rab rdo rje spyan/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la'o/ /rdo rje rnon po theg pa che/ /rdo rje ral gri mtshon
<p>162a.7</p>chen po/ /'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo khyod la'o/ /rdo rje rgyu ni snying po che/ /rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po/ /rab skor rdo rje las byung ba/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying khyod la'o/ /rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog /rdo rje bzlas pa rab bsgrub sbyin/ /mi gsung
<p>162b</p>
<p>162b.1</p>rdo rje mchog grub pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la'o/ /rdo rje las rab rdo rje'i bka'/ /las kyi rdo rje kun grub pa/ /rdo rje nges par kun grub pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la'o/ /rdo rje gsung ba bstan pa che/ /rdo rje go cha sra ba che/ /brtson 'grus mchog ni thub dka' ba/ /phyag
<p>162b.2</p>'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs po che/ /rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa che/ /bdud 'joms rdo rje mi zad pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag khyod la'o/ /rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab tu 'dud/ /rdo rje bcing ba rab grol byed/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur
<p>162b.3</p>la'o/ /rdo rje chags pas rab sgeg cing / /rdo rje rol pa brtson byed pa/ /rdo rje kun grub 'gying bar ldan/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje sgeg mo la'o/ /rdo rje rin chen phreng 'dzin cing / /rdo rje dbang bskur kun 'gro ni/ /rdo rje sprin bzhin nor bu 'chang / /phyag 'tshal rdo rje phreng ma lo'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma
<p>162b.4</p>dbyangs mkhan ma/ /rdo rje sangs rgyas nges par bskyed/ /rdo rje chos don rab sgrogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje glu mkhan ma la'o/ /rdo rje gar mkhan 'gying bag ldan/ /rdo rje phyogs 'dus gzugs ldan ma/ /rdo rje las kyi 'khor los sgyur/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gar mkhan ma la'o/ /rdo rje zla
<p>162b.5</p>kham 'od du 'phro/ /rdo rje bdug pa bsil mdzad cing / /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje bdug pa la'o/ /rdo rje me tog rab mdzes ma/ /rdo rje nor bu rdo rje don/ /rdo rje mchod pa bla na med/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje me tog la'o/ /rdo rje snang ba rab rib med/ /rdo rje
<p>162b.6</p>spyan ma dri med 'od/ /rdo rje kun du mun sel ba/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje snang ba la'o/ /rdo rje dad pa sred pa che/ /rdo rje bde gshegs spyan 'dren cing / /rdo rje shugs kyi brtson 'grus che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje lcags kyu la'o/ /rdo rje dra ba don yod stobs/ /rdo rje zhags pas 'jug mdzad
<p>162b.7</p>pa/ rdo rje stobs ni 'jig pa po/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje zhags pa la'o/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin rdo rje'i gtso/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'ching byed cing / /rdo rje phyogs rnams skrag byed pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje lcags sgrog la'o/ /rdo rje shes rab mchog 'chang ba/ /rdo rje bstan pa rab tu
<p>163a</p>
<p>163a.1</p>'joms/ /rdo rje sgra chen sgrogs mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dril bu la'o/ /rgyal sras dpa' 'gro kun du bzang / /zla 'od bzang skyong kun du bzang / /sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang / /'gro ba'i don mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rgyal sras dra ba nam mkha'i mdzod/ /rdo rje
<p>163a.2</p>snying po 'od dpag med/ /mngon dga' mchog tu dpal ldan pa/ /lho phyogs sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rgyal sras gdung sel ye shes tog /blo gros mi zad spobs pa brtsegs/ /rnam dag chen po mchog 'chang ba/ /nub phyogs sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
<p>163a.3</p>rgyal sras byams pa ngan song 'dren/ /spos kyi glang po don yod grub/ /bde ldan sangs rgyas skyong ba po/ /byang phyogs sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces yongs su bstod de/ me tog lag par thogs te yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas la bsreg khang du bor bar bya'o/ /
<p>163a.4</p>de'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes pa sku mdog dmar ser rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs can/ skyabs mdzad
<p>163a.5</p>kyi phyag rgya can/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa cig /ting nge 'dzin gyis spyan drangs te/ ye shes kyi bsreg khang chen por spyan drangs te bzhugs su gsol la/ me tog lag par thogs te/ tshe 'das pa la snying rje chen po bskyed pas/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho
<p>163a.6</p>sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod la/ zhabs bsil dang / 'thor 'thung dang / nye reg dang / gdan phul la/ mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad phul la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya 'thab ste/ bcom ldan gzi brjid 'od dpag med/ /ngan song thams cad kun sbyong
<p>163a.7</p>ba/ bde ba'i stobs ldan thams cad mkhyen/ /thugs rje chen po'i rgyun gyis ni/ /tshe 'das 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /zhes brjod la/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ne rA dzA ya a mu ka yaM badzra a d+hiSh+ThA na dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ zhes pa'i snying po de'i snying gar bsam par
<p>163b</p>
<p>163b.1</p>bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid la sreg rdzas thams cad la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ne rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne shod+ha ne sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba raN bi shud+d+he a mu kaM sarba
<p>163b.2</p>bA paM kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyin sreg bya ba nyid do/ /de nas zhi ba'i phur bu dngul lam tsan+dan dkar po la sogs pa'i shing las sor brgyad du 'dug pa rtse mo zlum por byas te/ de'i ngos la bde bar gshegs pa sras
<p>163b.3</p>dang bcas pa rnams bsams la/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya a mu sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa gang zag de'i sdig pa'i tshogs la btab la/ de nas yu ba tsan+dan dkar po las byas shing mgo bo dngul las byas pa'i tho ba zlum po khru gang ba byas pa ste/ de'i steng du/ oM shaM pa ta
<p>163b.4</p>shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shaM pa ta shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas brdung bar bya ba de kho na'o/ /de nas yang me tog lag tu thogs te/ yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod de/ bzod par gsol la
<p>163b.5</p>mnyes par bya ba nyid do/ /de nas yang rang gi sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs skyong ba rnams spyan drangs nas rang rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /tshangs pa chen po mchog gyur pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon po bdag nyid che/ /'di zhes
<p>163b.6</p>bya ba'i sdig sbyang phyir/ /'bar ba'i khang par sreg blugs bzhes/ /zhes brjod la/ zhabs bsil ba la sogs pas zhabs la/ bsreg pa'i rdzas thams cad la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mchod sbyin chen po'i phyag rgyas gzar bu snying gar thogs la/ oM brah+ma NA ya sarba u pa dra
<p>163b.7</p>ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM in+d+rA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM d+h+r-i ta raSh+ThA ya swA hA/ oM bi rU D+ha kA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM bi rU pAk+ShA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM bai shra ba NA ya sarba u ba dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM in+d+rA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM
<p>164a</p>
<p>164a.1</p>ku ru swA hA/ oM ya mA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM ba ru NA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM ku be+e rA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM ru drA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM ag+na ye sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM rak+Sha
<p>164a.2</p>sa sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM ba ya bya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM tsan+d+rA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM a dI tA ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM b+hU mi pa ti sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM de bI ya sarba u pa dra ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes brjod
<p>164a.3</p>pas dbul bar bya ba nyid do/ /de nas yang rang gi sa bon las 'od zer spros pa las skye ba rnam pa bzhis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad bkug la rang gi gnas su bzhag la ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /hU~M lha klu gnod sbyin srin po mi'am ci/ /dri za mkha' lding lha min lus
<p>164a.4</p>srul po/ /mi'am ci dang yi dgas dud 'gro dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i/ /'gro drug sems can skye bzhis bsdus pa rnams/ /'di zhes bya ba'i rnam smin sbyang slad du/ /rang rang gnas su lhag pa'i bsam pas gnos/ /zhes brjod de/ bsreg pa'i rdzas thams
<p>164a.5</p>cad la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de'i bag chags dang rnam par smin pa sbyang ba'i phyir bsreg par bya ste/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par byas la/ sngags 'di dag brjod do/ /oM AHhUM a ma su ti pre na ya sarba satwA ya a mu kaM sarba karma shAn+tiM ku ru
<p>164a.6</p>swA hA/ oM AHhUM a ma su ti pre na ya sarba satwA ya a mu kaM sarba karma A ba ra Na shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM AH hUM/ a ma su ti pre na ya sarba satwA ya a mu kaM pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas gtor ma rnams la rnal 'byor
<p>164a.7</p>chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la phyogs skyong rnams la byin te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis dngos po rnams bsgyur la tshim par gyur ba dang / ched du brjod pa'i ched du brjod do/ /'jig rten rnams kyi mes po mchog /kha dog ser po spyi
<p>164b</p>
<p>164b.1</p>blugs 'dzin/ /bder gshegs bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa chen po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs na/ /mdog dkar shes rab ral gri can/ /chos kyis chab srid gsal mdzad pa/ /mchog gi brgya byin phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shar phyogs rgyal po
<p>164b.2</p>dri za'i bdag /mdog dkar dgu po rgyud mangs 'dzin/ /kun du bder gshegs bstan pa srung / /yul 'khor srung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lho phyogs rgyal po grul bum bdag /mdog sdo lag na ral gri 'dzin/ /kun du bder gshegs bstan pa srung / /'phags
<p>164b.3</p>skyes po la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nub phyogs rgyal po klu yi bdag /mdog dmar lag na zhags pa 'dzin/ /kun du bder gshegs bstan pa srung / /mig gi bzang la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /byang phyogs rgyal po gnod sbyin bdag /mdog ser lag na be con 'dzin/ /kun du
<p>164b.4</p>bder gshegs bstan pa srung / /glang po'i steng na rdo rje 'dzin/ /shel mdog bstan pa srung bar mdzad/ /khyod ni lha yi rgyal po ste/ /lha yi rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ma he'i steng na thod dbyug 'dzin/ /spug mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni gshin rje'i rgyal po ste/ /
<p>164b.5</p>gshin rje'i 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chu srin steng na sbrul zhags 'dzin/ /khrag mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni klu yi rgyal po ste/ /klu rgyal 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /seng ge'i gdan la dbyug to 'dzin/ /gser mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /
<p>164b.6</p>khyod ni gnod sbyin rgyal po ste/ /gnod sbyin 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyu mchog steng na rtse gsum 'dzin/ /thal mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni 'byung po'i rgyal po ste/ /'byung po'i 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ra skyes steng na hom gzar 'dzin/ /me
<p>164b.7</p>mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni drang srong rgyal po ste/ /drang srong 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mi ro'i steng na ral gri 'dzin/ /chu mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni srin po'i rgyal po ste/ /srin po'i 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sha ba'i steng na ba dan
<p>165a</p>
<p>165a.1</p>'dzin/ /dung mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni rlung lha'i rgyal po ste/ /rlung lha 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shing rta'i steng na pad+ma 'dzin/ /khrag mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni gza' yi rgyal po ste/ /gza' yi 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal
<p>165a.2</p>bstod/ /ngang pa'i steng na ut+pal 'dzin/ /dung mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni skar ma'i rgyal po ste/ /skar ma'i 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phag gi steng na lcags kyu 'dzin/ /sol mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni yi dgas rgyal po ste/ /yi dgas 'khor
<p>165a.3</p>bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /pad+ma'i steng na bum pa 'dzin/ /gser mdog bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /khyod ni nor 'dzin rgyal po ste/ /nor 'dzin 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /lha min mi dang lto 'phye che/ /sha za gshin rje mkha' 'gro
<p>165a.4</p>ma/ /srin po yi dgas nam mkha' lding / /mi'am ci dang dri za dang / /grul bum dang ni srin po dang / /lus srul ma mo'i mdog rnams dang / /bya dang gzhon nu skem byed pa/ /grib gnon dang ni brjed byed dang / /smra byed dang ni phra men ma/ /dud 'gro dmyal ba mi ma yin/ /gdon
<p>165a.5</p>rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang / /gzhan yang skye ba bzhis bsdus pa'i/ /sems can 'gro ba thams cad la/ /mchod sbyin chen po 'di ster bas/ /sems can 'di zhes bya ba yi/ /lan chags thams cad bral bar gyis/ /nang dang sdug bsngal 'khrug pa dang / /dus min
<p>165a.6</p>'chi dang bkra mi shis/ /de bzhin gnod pa sna tshogs dang / /mchod sbyin 'di yis zhi gyur nas/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba dang / /dbang phyug nor ni 'byor pa dang / /lo legs bde ba rnyed pa dang / /nad med pa dang bkra shis shog /de bzhin pha rol tshogs gzhom
<p>165a.7</p>dang / /dgra rnams ma lus gzhom pa ni/ /mchod sbyin 'di yi stobs kyis ni/ /bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub gyur cig /ces brjod de/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags brjod de/ me tog gi phred ba dor bar bya'o/ /de nas pho nya'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ de nas
<p>165b</p>
<p>165b.1</p>rang gi sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba gong du smos pa'i cha lugs ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs su gsol/ zhabs bsil la sogs yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su mchod de/ de nas sreg rdzas thams cad snod gcig tu bsres la/ bdud rtsir
<p>165b.2</p>byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM a mi ta a mi te a mi tod+b+hA be/ a mi ta saM b+hA be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ ga mi ni/ sarba karma kle sha k+Sha/ zhes pas bstan te/ mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sbrel te/ khu tshur bsnol ba'i sdigs mdzub gnyis snying gar bya zhing / oM badzra kro d+ha trai
<p>165b.3</p>lokya bi dza ya da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba tIR+ya ka ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya sarba karma A ba ra Na kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya sarba kle sha A ba ra Na k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ oM trai lokya bi dza
<p>165b.4</p>ya sarba A ba ra Na k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya sarba karma A ba ra Na k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ zhes pa'i snying po brgya phrag stong ngam/ bye ba'i tshad dam/ yang na stong gi grangs sam/ yang na brgya rtsa brgyad pa la sogs pas de'i ming dang bsres pas bsreg par bya ba nyid
<p>165b.5</p>do/ /don de ltar pho nya'i sbyin sreg byas nas tshe 'das pa'i sdig pa bcom pa'i rtags ni/ des rgyud du gsungs pa'i mtshan ma las shes par bya ste/ de yang sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i rtags ni steng du drang por 'bar ba dang / du ba la sogs pas nag nog med pa dang / 
<p>165b.6</p>zlum zhing steng du mi 'phro ba dang / dal gyis glog bzhin du mdangs gsal ba dang / sgra la sogs pa chung bar 'bar ba dang / yang na me lha nyid kyis gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bsreg khang gi nang du gsal bar ston pa na/ rtags de dag gis tshe 'das pa de sems can dmyal ba la sogs
<p>165b.7</p>pa'i gnas nas grol te/ lha la sogs pa'i gnas bde 'gror skye bar shes par bya ba nyid do/ /de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la brten te/ tshe 'das pa'i don du phyogs bzhir 'khor los sgyur ba'i sbyin sreg ji lta ba bzhin du ni/ de nyid tshe dang longs spyod rgyas par bya ba dang
<p>166a</p>
<p>166a.1</p>nad pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa'i tshogs zhi bar bya ba dang / lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum dbang du gyur pa dang / dgra dang ma rungs pa'i tshogs gzhom par bya ba'i don du'o/ /de dag gi rjes la ji ltar gong du smos pa'i bstod pa byas la/ bzod par gsol la
<p>166a.2</p>gshegs par bya ste/ de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ni ting nge 'dzin gyis gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la/ oM shU n+ya tA swa b+hA ba sarba d+harma shU n+ya tA swa b+hA ba haM/ zhes brjod pas thams cad bsdu bar
<p>166a.3</p>bya'o/ /de nas thal bar gyur pa dang / thal ba bsdu ba'i cho ga bya ste/ de la dang por khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs nas/ sa phyogs de'i bgegs bskrad la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i skur bsgom/ rtsa ba'i sngags brgya
<p>166a.4</p>rtsa brgyad btab pa'i rigs lnga'i phyag rgyas rin po che sna lnga'i phye mar byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya bcas la/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra ha hUM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis ras dkar po gtsang ma'i nang du bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas de nyid kyi tshe thal bar gyur pa dang / 
<p>166a.5</p>sku gdung gi las brtsam par bya ste/ de la dang por thal ba dang rus pa phye mar btags pa la/ ga pur la sogs pa'i dri chu la rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab ste ba'i 'o ma dang / mar dang / zho dang / chu dang / lci ba la sogs pa rtsa ba'i sngags 'bum du bzlas pas brdzis te/ de dang
<p>166a.6</p>sa kha dog dkar po la ga bur la sogs pa'i dris bsgos pa dang / 'jim pa legs par bsres la dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs su bya ba'am/ rang gi lha'i gzugs su bya ba'am/ yang na mchod rten gyi gzugs su byas te/ de nas yongs su dag pa'i cho ga bya ba ni/ rnal
<p>166a.7</p>'byor pas srid pa bar mdo'i sems can la ni/ 'di ltar bdun pa gnyis pa la ni dmyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gling bcu drug pa la ro dong zab bu bcas pa'i dbus su gtsug tor dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs la/ de la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mchod la rdzing bu'i nang nas nya
<p>166b</p>
<p>166b.1</p>bton pa ltar/ rtsa ba'i sngags bum pa dkar po la bsngags pas srid pa bar ma do'i sems thig le'i gzugs su gnas pa gdon par bya'o/ /bdun pa gsum pa la yi dgas kyi dkyil 'khor gling bzhi pa'i dbus su gong bu smos pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa la bzlas pa'i thig le'i gzugs
<p>166b.2</p>gdon par bya ba dang / bzhi pa la dud 'gro'i dkyil 'khor gling bzhi pa'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bris pas thig le'i gzugs dud 'gro'i gnas nas gdon par bya ba dang / lnga pa la lha ma yin gyi dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dbus su dkyil 'khor la brten te/ thig le'i gzugs
<p>166b.3</p>lha ma yin gyi gnas nas gdon par bya ba dang / drug pa la mi'i dkyil 'khor gling bzhi pa'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bris la thig le'i gzugs dbul po'i gnas nas gdon par bya ba dang / bdun pa la lha'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bris la/ 
<p>166b.4</p>thig le'i gzugs lha tshe ring po'i gnas nas gdon cing rnam par grol ba la sogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur na/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo srid pa bar ma do'i sems can gyi kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'khor ba las ldog pa'i rgyus 'jug pa yin te/ de'i tshe de'i rigs kyi gtso bo rgyal po la
<p>166b.5</p>sogs pa'i mi'i gzugs byas te/ gzugs de'i snying gar bris pa'i ming dang tsan+dan dkar po dang dmar po bsres pa'i sbyor bas pha dang ma tshogs pa'i tshul byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs la dmigs par byas pa/ de'i skad cig ma la snyoms par 'jug
<p>166b.6</p>pa'i sbyor ba la dmigs pas yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis rang gi pad+mar bcug nas dkyil 'khor du dbang bcu rdzogs par bskur la/ phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su btags te/ me tog gi phreng ba thogs nas/ 
<p>166b.7</p>phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ya thA sa ma yo ga thA
<p>167a</p>
<p>167a.1</p>sid+d+ha swA hA/ oM kA ya bi ya stA ya swA hA/ AHbAka bi ya stA ya swA hA/ hUM tsit+ta bi ya stA ya swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu gnas par bya ba nyid do/ /de nas gzugs de nyid rgyal po la sogs pa'i cha lugs su byas pas/ 
<p>167a.2</p>de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel dang ldan pa'i nang du bcug la lo bzhi'am lnga'am gcig gam/ zla drug gam gsum mam/ gcig gi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags stong ngam/ 'bum la sogs pa bzlas nas der mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la/ 
<p>167a.3</p>zhag re bzhin du mchod rten gyi gzugs la bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya bcas pas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya ba nyid do/ /de nas ngan 'gro las rnam par grol bar gyur pa ni mchod rten 'bar ba dang / gzugs 'dzum pa dang / ga pur la sogs pa dri'i thig
<p>167a.4</p>le'i skud pa dang / bdug pa'i tshe 'od snang ba dang / dri yid du 'ong ba tshor ba dang / sku gdung la sogs pa 'bar ba dang / sa g.yo ba dang / me tog dang / rgyan la sogs pa 'od 'bar ba dang / dung dang pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra grags pa na/ sdig can gang zag de
<p>167a.5</p>ngan 'gro las grol bar shes par bya'o/ /yang sdig pa chen po byas pa'i sems can de nyid ngan song gsum las ma grol ba ni/ rtags dang mtshan ma de dag mi 'byung ba ste/ de la rnal 'byor mchog gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pas yid skyo ba med pas brtse ba chen po bskyed de/ 
<p>167a.6</p>de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsa ba'i rig pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'bum phrag stong ngam/ yang na
<p>167a.7</p>ji srid mtshan ma byung gi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya ba nyid do/ /de'i rjes la bzlas pa'i grangs su thim pa dang / mtshan ma byung ba'i mtshan mo thog thag tu mchod pa dang / gtor ma'i tshogs chen po byas
<p>167b</p>
<p>167b.1</p>te/ mi nyal bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pas/ tshe 'das pa de nyid lha'i gzugs su gyur te/ de la rnal 'byor pas bdag gi don phun sum tshogs
<p>167b.2</p>par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad bcol ba dang / gzhan yang bdag nyid ji lta bur gyur pa'i gtam dang / dam tshig chen po'i dbang gis bdag ji srid 'jig rten 'di na gnas kyi bar du khyod kyis 'jig rten pa rnams kyi don phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
<p>167b.3</p>bdag gi rna lam du sgrogs shig ces brjod la/ me tog gi phreng ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas la spyi bor bzhag ste/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ rak+Shan+tu ma ma sarba sag dza kurban+ti hU~M/ zhes brjod la gtad bar bya ste/ des kyang
<p>167b.4</p>bdag gis khyod kyi bka' ji lta ba bzhin du zhes brjod de/ de dga' zhing mgu nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gal te me'i nang du rtags rnams mthong na ni/ snying las chung dus/ thal ba dang / rus pa dang / bye ma dang / nyungs kar la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
<p>167b.5</p>sngags stong la sogs pa btab nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis de dag gi rdul re re la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal po re rer bsgoms la/ de'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
<p>167b.6</p>phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sngags dang phyag rgya'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis/ rdul 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re rer gyur nas/ 'di gang
<p>167b.7</p>du gnas pa dang / 'di gang la reg pa'i sems can thams cad sdig pa'i lam nas grol nas/ dge ba'i lam la zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ gtor ma dang bcas pa rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo'am/ 
<p>168a</p>
<p>168a.1</p>mtshe'u 'am/ 'bab chu la sogs pa'i nang du dor bar bya'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dri med las/ /bdag gis ro sreg rgyas bshad las/ /bsod nams rgya chen gang thob des/ /'gro kun rdo rje rgyal por shog /slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa/ ngan

<p>168a.3</p>pa ri sho d+ha na ma ra ho ma bid+hi karma kra ma/ bod skad du/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i shi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i las kyi rim pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ ngan song thams cad yongs su
<p>168a.4</p>sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dam tshig la brtan par gnas shing / bla ma dang rje btsun la dbang tshul bzhin du thob pa/ gsang sngags kyi rgyud dang / cho ga'i bye brag la mkhas pa/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa la brtson pa des/ 
<p>168a.5</p>byams pa dang snying rje'i sems kyis/ sems can gang dag shi ba'i dus byas te mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pas ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang / nyam nga ba'i gnas nas 'don cing / mtho ris kyi bde ba la dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ ngan song rnam par
<p>168a.6</p>sbyong ba'i brtag pa las byung ba'i shi ba'i cho ga bya bar 'os so/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa des/ bum pa tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa la/ sems can tshe 'das pa de'i ming dang sngags su spel zhing / 'bum phrag stong ngam/ brgya phrag stong du tshang ba'am/ bye ba'i tshad
<p>168a.7</p>du bzlas na lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas sa'i cho ga bya ba ni/ sa sngon du sbyangs pa'i gnyug ma'am/ lha khang ngam/ mchod rten nam/ gang gi lhas sam/ chu 'gram mam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ der ni sa'i cho ga
<p>168b</p>
<p>168b.1</p>phye mi dgos so/ /de lta bu'i gnas ma rnyed na/ sa'i phyogs brtags par sa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin du byas la/ dkyil 'khor ngos gcig la khru drug pa gru bzhi 'phang du khru gang ba gcig byas pa'i dbus su/ me thab khor khor yug tu khru bzhi pa zlum po/ zabs su khru do pa gcig bya

<p>168b.3</p>'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug par gdab/ de'i phyi rol du gru chad bya/ de'i phyi rol du snam bu gnyis bya/ de nas sgo byang nas tshon 'bras kha dog legs par bsgyur ba/ tshon phyogs dang mdun du snod gtsang ma dris bsgos pa bsogs la/ de mi dmigs pa las yi ge lnga las byung
<p>168b.4</p>ba'i sa tshon bsams la/ ye shes kyi tshon bkug la bstims la tshon phye sna lngas bri ba ni/ me thab kyi re mig gi dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dgod/ shar du rdo rje lhor rin po che/ nub tu pad+ma byad du sna tshogs rdo rje rnams rim bzhin du dgod do/ /mu ran rdo rje rkyang pa rtse lnga
<p>168b.5</p>bas bskor/ de'i phyi rim gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa/ shar gyi rtsibs bzhi la/ rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / mda' dang / mgu bar ston pa rnams dgod/ lho'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ nor bu rin po che dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / yid bzhin gyi nor

<p>170a</p>
<p>170a.1</p>'od mi nus par byas te/ phyogs bcur gdab/ de nas bdag nyid kyi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje A las bsams la/ rdo rje bsdu bas 'phags pa rnams spyan drangs te/ phyag rgya bzhis bzhugs su gsol la/ yon chab la sogs pa mchod pa rnams tshul bzhin du

<p>170a.3</p>nas/ ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lan chags byang zhing / bsod nams kyi tshogs su gyur cig ces brjod de gtang / de nas sngags mkhan gzhan zhig yod na/ bum pa la rigs lnga'i snying po dang / shi ba'i ming spel zhing cung zad bzlas la/ de nas ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags
