<p>170a.6</p>steng non ro bzhag la brtsig par bya'o// //de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ shi ba'i lus la gnas pa dang / khog bsrungs la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bskrad pa ni/ rdo rje gsor zhing na mo badzra satwa kro d+ha a na lArka ma hA badzra kro d+ha/ dra ba dra ba/ bi
<p>170a.7</p>dra ba bi dra ba/ sarba a pA ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ra ha ra/ pra Na na hUM phaT/ ces brjod la bskrad do/ /de nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas la/ oM badzra aM ku sha che ge mo dzaH/ zhes brjod pas/ tshe 'das pa de gang na gnas kyang rung ste/ rang dbang med par lcags kyu can
<p>170b</p>
<p>170b.1</p>gyis bkug par bsam/ oM badzra pA sha hUM gis ro la gshegs pa gzhug /oM badzra s+pho Ta baM gyis bsdams/ g+haN+Ti hoH/ sems ma 'khrugs par dga' bar bya/ de nas ro la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis btab la/ sngon du bzlas pa'i bum pa'i chus bkru/ bkrus pa dang kun
<p>170b.2</p>gzhi'i las dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags gangs kyi rim pa bzhin du gnas pa dag par bsam/ de nas sngags bzlas shing dris byug /de nas sngags kyis btab pa'i ras dkar po kha tshar ma nyams pas dkri/ sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug /me tog gi phreng bas
<p>170b.3</p>kyang ro la gdags so/ /de ni ro la sngags gdags shing byin gyis brlab ste/ gur kum bzang pos bri ba ni/ oM bri ta bri ta sarba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ lus kyi spyi bor gdags so/ /oM tra Ta tra Ta sarba A pa ra Na ni hUM phaT/ ngag ste mgrin pa'i lce rtsar gdags so/ /oM tshin+d+ha
<p>170b.4</p>tshin+d+ha sarba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ yid de snying gar gdags te/ lus ngag yid gsum gyi mi dge ba bcu'i bag chags dag par dmigs so/ /da ni gnas bco brgyad du gdags te/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni sarba karma A pa ra Na bi shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ kun rig
<p>170b.5</p>gi ste dbu la'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni s+tha hUM phaT/ ngan song sbyong ba'i ste mdzod spu la'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba a pA ya sa twe b+h+ya hUM trAM/ rin chen tog gi ste rna ba g.yas pa la'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni hrIH/ shAkya thub pa'i ste rna ba
<p>170b.6</p>g.yon pa la'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya sarba a pA ya traT a/ me tog che rgyas kyi ste mgo bo'i gtsug phud la'o/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ye/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te/ samya k+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba
<p>170b.7</p>karma A ba ra Na bi shod+ha ni swA hA/ rtsa ba'i rig pa ste dpung pa g.yas pa la'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni ha na hUM phaT/ dpung pa g.yon pa la'o/ /oM sarba bid hUM/ sna la'o/ /oM sarba bid phaT/ rked pa la'o/ /oM sarba bid a/ pus mo g.yas pa la'o/ /oM sarba
<p>171a</p>
<p>171a.1</p>bid tra tha/ pus mo g.yon pa la'o/ /oM sarba bid oM/ bol gong g.yas pa la'o/ /oM sarba bid swA/ bol god g.yon pa la'o/ /oM sarba bid a/ long bu g.yas pa la'o/ /oM sarba bid hUM/ long bu g.yon pa la'o/ /oM sarba bid tra tha/ mig g.yas pa la'o/ 
<p>171a.2</p>oM shA/ mig g.yon pa la'o/ /oM b+ha/ gsang ba'i gnas te mdoms su gdags pa ste/ de bzhin yid kyis kyang sngags rnams dgod do/ /de dag gi 'od zer gyis sgrib pa rnams byang bar bsam mo/ /de nas sngags kyis btab pa'i dar la sogs pa'i gos kyis g.yogs
<p>171a.3</p>nas/ rgyan rnams kyis bklubs nas/ stan pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang bcas par bzhag ste/ kha nub tu bstan la gzhag go/ /sngags mkhan bdag nyid kha shar phyogs su bltas la las bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa las kyi bum chus/ thab dang sreg rdzas la sogs pa
<p>171a.4</p>thams cad rnam par bsangs te/ shin tu gtsang ba'i rtswa ku sha'i khres la/ bkra shis kyi skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom mo/ /stong pa'i khyad par las yi ge a thung dur gyur te/ de'i dbus su hUM bsam/ de 'od du zhu ba las dam
<p>171a.5</p>tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje/ rdo rje de'i lte ba yang hUM bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings gang / thams cad bkug ste 'od du zhu ba las/ sgrub pa po bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du sngags 'di brjod pas gyur par bsam mo/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha
<p>171a.6</p>ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ go rims kyis 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul du dbye zhing sngags brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig gi rgyal po sku mdog dung dang kun da ltar dkar ba
<p>171a.7</p>zhal bzhi pa/ phyag gnyis ting nge 'dzin du bsnol ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa cig bskyed de/ de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya ni/ mthe bong gnyis ni skyil mo krung / /mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse mo dgug /gung mo rtse mo mnyam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi
<p>171b</p>
<p>171b.1</p>dbang mo'o/ /sngags ni oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri hUM dza/ oM badzra Ni a d+hi tiSh+ThA ya/ zhes brjod cing snying ga dang lkog ma dang / smin mtshams dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas dbang bskur te rdo rje bcings pa la/ mthe bong gnyis rtse mo can du byas te/ de'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis
<p>171b.2</p>phan tshun ngos sprad de/ rin po che'i rtse mo 'dra bar byas pa ni/ rin po che'i phyag rgya ste/ snying po ni oM badzra rat+na zhes spyi bor rin po che'i dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rang gi lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa chos kyi phyag rgya hUM las bskyed de/ de'i dbus su chos kyi phyag rgya sku bskyed pa'i snying po bsam
<p>171b.3</p>mo/ /de nas rang gi snying gar las kyi phyag rgya rdzogs par byed pa/ sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram yi ge a las bsams te/ de'i dbus su yang a bsam mo/ /de ltar bdag dam tshig sems dpa'i sku bskyed pa rdzogs par bskyed pa des/ rdo rje rab dang dra ba la sogs pas bsrung
<p>171b.4</p>ba'i 'khor lo gsal bar byas te/ las thams cad pa'i bum chus/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ zhes bya bas rdzas thams cad bsangs te/ de nas dngul gyi snod du mchod yon gyi chu dri zhim po'i nang du/ zho dang / ku sha dang / 'bru sna tshogs blugs te g.yon du gzhag /mchod
<p>171b.5</p>pa lnga g.yon du gzhag /rdo rje dril bu g.yon du gzhag /sreg rdzas dang yo byad la sogs pa g.yas su gzhag /mar bzhu ba dang dgang gzar blugs gzar mdun du gzhag /rdzas gzhag pa'i rim pa'o// //de nas mgrin pa'i bu gu las hrIHlas pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa
<p>171b.6</p>bsam/ mdun gyi pad+ma'i lce'i steng du a las zla ba'i steng du hUM bsams te/ de las rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga par gyur te/ de nyid lce la thim pas lce rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga par gyur par bsams te/ lce byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lag pa gnyis la a las zla ba re re bsam/ zla
<p>171b.7</p>ba'i steng du hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed de/ rdo rje lag pa la thim pas lag pa gnyis rdo rje rtse lnga par gyur par byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ lag pa g.yas g.yon steng du ni/ /rdo rje dril bu gzhag bya ste/ /mi dmigs pa las hUM dang a/ /
<p>172a</p>
<p>172a.1</p>hUM las rdo rje bskyed pa dang / /a las dril bu bsam pa'o/ /hUM las bskyed pa'i rdo rje ni/ /yar gyi rtse lnga rigs lngar bsam/ /mar gyi ra ni ye shes lnga/ /yar gyi 'dab brgyad sems dpa' brgyad/ /mar gyi 'dab brgyad sems ma brgyad/ /dbus kyi lte ba
<p>172a.2</p>yi dam lha/ /phyi rol sgo bzhi khro bo bzhi/ /yi dam lha la bsrung bar bsam/ /de ltar bsgoms pa'i khro bo la/ /hUM gi dbyangs 'di blangs byas te/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams mnyes par bya/ /hUM ye shes rdo rje gsor nas su/ /sems can byang chub la ni dgod/ /rnam par dag
<p>172a.3</p>pa'i chos kyi don/ /rdo rje 'chang gis gzung bar bya'o/ /hUM hUM hUM ho ho ho/ de nas rang gi dril bu ni/ /nang gi nam mkha'i khams dag ni/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes yin/ /steng gi pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas spyan sogs bzhi/ /phrin las bzhi yi
<p>172a.4</p>rang bzhin yin/ /mtshams bzhi la ni skul byed dang / /lug rgyud khro gnyer rin chen sgron/ /lte ba shes rab pha rol phyin/ /kun bzang gzugs rdzogs 'od ldan bsam/ /rtse lnga rtsa ba'i 'dab brgyad la/ /sngon bzhin sgeg mo la sogs brgyad/ /rtse lnga nyid ni ye shes lnga/ /
<p>172a.5</p>de lta bu yi dril bu la/ /sngags 'di dag ni brjod nas kyang / /spyi bor dkrol te dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phab la lan gsum dkrol/ /oM badzra ra Ni ta d+harma ra Na ti sam+p+ra ra Ni ta sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra bra tsa li ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA da swa b+hA be hUM hUM hUM ho ho ho swA hA/ shes rab chos kyi dril bu
<p>172a.6</p>'di/ /sangs rgyas thams cad blangs byas te/ /mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems can sangs rgyas don du dkrol/ /de nas gsang ba'i thab khung mi dmigs pa las/ yi ge hUM/ lha'i chos kyi yi ge las thab khung sngar bskyed pa bzhin bskyed la/ de nas hrIHlas pad+ma
<p>172a.7</p>'dab ma brgyad pa bskyed la/ de'i dbus kyi lte ba la yi ge raM 'bar ba las gyur pa'i gru gsum bskyed la/ gru gsum de'i shar la sogs pa'i zur las/ oM AHhUM gsum khams gsum gyi bdag por bsgoms pa las/ 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang / rdo rje rang gi yi ges mtshan pa bskyed
<p>172b</p>
<p>172b.1</p>la/ de'i dbus su raM las byung ba'i me raM dang bcas pa mthong ste/ gong gi phyag mtshan gsum raM dang bcas pa 'od du zhu ba las me 'bar bar bsam zhing / dam tshig gi gsang sngags/ hUM badzra a na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya b+ha smi ku ru sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ rdo rje mi ti'i
<p>172b.2</p>gzugs su gyur te/ de yang sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa/ ral pa thor tshugs dang ldan pa/ g.yas pa na dbyug pa dang / mi 'jigs pa g.yon pa gnyis na phreng ba dang / gun+d+he 'dzin pa/ gos dang / rgyan dang / mchod phyir thogs pa
<p>172b.3</p>dang / thor tshugs dkar po dang ldan pa/ lus kyi yan lag thams cad las/ me lce stong gis 'khrigs shing 'od 'bar bar bsams nas/ de ltar me lha dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed la/ de nas me lha de'i thugs kar khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi ge hUM las bskyed/ de las
<p>172b.4</p>ye shes kyi khro bo lcags kyu la sogs pas bstims nas/ zhabs bsil la sogs pa dbul/ sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod/ de nas rdzas rnams rang rang gi sngags/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lokya bi dza ya swA hA/ zhes pas dbul bstod/ phrin las bcol/ de nas me
<p>172b.5</p>blangs te/ rgyun bzhag gi me'am/ shing 'o ma can las byung ba'am/ bram ze tha mal pa'i me'am/ dka' thub la dga' ba'i khyim nas me blangs te/ las thams cad pa'i snod dang / mchod yon gyi snod gnyis dri zhim pos sbyar ba'i chus bkang la/ mchod yon la rang
<p>172b.6</p>gi rigs kyi lha'i sngags lan bdun bzlas/ las thams cad pa'i chu la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje rtse mo gnyis kyi sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ gnyi ga g.yon du rdzas dgod pa'i dus su gzhag /mchod yon gyi nang du zho dang / ku sha dang / 'bru sna tshogs
<p>172b.7</p>blugs so/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i me la bsang gtor bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol du sprul pa'i me la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang / sngags bzlas shing gong nas 'byung ba'i me dang gcig tu byas la sngags de bzlas pa ku sha'i rtse mos blangs pas lan gsum bsangs la/ shing
<p>173a</p>
<p>173a.1</p>skam zhing gtsang ba'i rtswa dang bud shing bcug la/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM/ zhes sngags bzlas shing / rlung yab kyis me sbar bar bya'o/ /de nas sngar bshad pa'i dam tshig gi me'i dbus su bsams la/ ye shes kyi me sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis spyan drang bar bya ste/ lag pa
<p>173a.2</p>g.yas pa mi 'jigs par byas la/ mthe bong rtse mo srin lag gi drung du btsugs la/ dgug pa'i tshul gyis yang dang yang du bskyed de/ mngon par 'dod pa'i sngags 'di bzlas shing spyan drang ngo / /oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i Shi dwi dza satwa ma gr-i hi a hUM ti ma hA raM a smin san+di
<p>173a.3</p>hi to b+ha ba/ oM b+ha ka ang ye swA hA/ de nas spyan drangs pa'i me la 'thor 'thung byas te/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te/ me lha'i nang du bstim par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba dang / me lta rang gi sngags kyis gdan
<p>173a.4</p>bstabs la/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi sor mo thams cad bkug la/ mthe bong mdzub mo rtse sbyar bas me tog blangs te/ zhabs bsil phul zhing / sor mo rnams brkyang ba ni zhabs bsil gyi phyag rgya ste/ oM pra ba ra sat+ka ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes bya'o/ /de nas mchod
<p>173a.5</p>yon dbul bar bya'o/ /i ma ar+g+ha ma ma ya ta taM kri ta na sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha swA hA/ mchod yon lan gsum dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas lce la rdo rje dkar po rnam par bsams la/ oM dzra la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ ces bya bas me'i chos kyi phyag rgya dgod do/ /de nas snying gar a las byung
<p>173a.6</p>ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po nyid ni me'i las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di yi ge hUM las snying ga'i zla ba rdo rje rnam par bsams te/ sngar bshad pa'i dbyig pa la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i tshul bdag nyid can phyag rgya chen po'o/ /de nas oM rat+na
<p>173a.7</p>a b+hi Shany+tsi/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dbang bskur ro/ /'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong mnyam la bsgreng la/ mdzub mo rtse sbyar te rin po cher bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni/ /
<p>173b</p>
<p>173b.1</p>rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed/ /oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod la/ dam tshig la gzhag par bya'o/ /'di'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje sems ma brtan par byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ gung mo dang sbyar/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis gshibs te/ 
<p>173b.2</p>rdo rje rtse mor bya ba ni/ dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje bsdu bas brtan par byas la/ rdo rje bcings pa yang bsdam par bya zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di dang / oM badzra ban+d+ha hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags dang bcas pas/ bdag gi mngon par 'dod pa'i bya ba 'di
<p>173b.3</p>mdzod cig ces rang gi bsgo ba la nges par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod yon phul la/ las dang rjes su mthun pa'i dri la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcas la/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra ha la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad
<p>173b.4</p>kyis mchod do/ /de nas me lha de'i lce dang / dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi kha la raM rnam par bkod do/ /pus mo gnyis kyi bar du lag pa bzhag nas/ dang po blugs gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs gsum zhi ba la zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul bar bya'o/ /sngags ni oM
<p>173b.5</p>ag+na ye ha bya ka bya ba ha na yA di pyA di bya ba ha na ye swA hA/ zhes pas dbul lo/ /de nas bgegs med pa dang / bgegs dang bcas pa'i mtshan ma ni gzhan las shes par bya'o/ /gal te bgegs yod na bsang gtor bya zhing / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas me
<p>173b.6</p>rnams sbyangs te/ de nyid kyis mar gyi sreg blugs gsum mam/ bdun dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas mar gyi dgang blugs gsum mam/ bdun rang gi sngags/ oM ag+na ye che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes dbul/ de nas yam shing dbul te/ oM badzrA ya swA hA/ yam
<p>173b.7</p>shing gi'o/ /oM ag+na ye swA hA/ mar gyi'o/ /oM badzra sarba pA baM da ha na badzra che ge mo swA hA/ til dang yungs kar gyi'o/ /oM sarba saM pa de swA hA/ zho dang 'bras chan gyi'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras ma grugs pa'o/ /oM sarba saM pa de swA hA/ zas mchog gi'o/ /
<p>174a</p>
<p>174a.1</p>oM a pra ti ha ta badzra swA hA/ ku sha'i'o/ /oM badzra A mu She swA hA/ dUr ba'i myu gu'i'o/ /oM ma hA be ga ye swA hA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM ag+na ye che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ma du ba'i'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma ri ye swA hA/ gro'i'o/ /oM badzra bi dza ye swA hA/ nas so
<p>174a.2</p>ba'i'o/ /oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ sran ma sha'i'o/ /oM ma hA shrI ba he swA hA/ bil ba dang / star kha dang / dzA ti pha la'i'o/ /sngags kyi mjug la/ shAn+tiM ku ru ye swA hA/ zhes brjod de/ 'di ni rdzas dbul ba'i rim pa'o/ /dbul ba'i gnas dang / dgongs pa
<p>174a.3</p>ni man ngag las shes par bya'o/ /me'i dbang du byas pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas me 'bar ba de nyid kyi thugs ka'i rA lto ba'i nang du rin po che'i gzhal yas khang re mig dgu lte ba dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug dang / gru cha dang / khyams
<p>174a.4</p>dang / sgo khyud dang / rta babs dang / them skas la sogs pas brgyan par bsams la/ me'i thugs ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba dang / pad+ma'i steng du lha rnams re re'i sa bon gyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan ma la sogs pa dang ldan par kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la
<p>174a.5</p>sogs pa ste/ bar 'dir sgo dbye/ bdag gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams pa las/ rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po/ oM badzra sa mA dzaH/ zhes brjod cing / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnol te dpung mgor bzhag la/ mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar byas la/ gung mo dang mthe bong
<p>174a.6</p>gnyis gtogs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rang rang gi gnas nas bskul te/ ji ltar bsams pa'i gnas kyi khor yug tu bzhugs par bsam/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis rang bzhin gyi phyi nas 'brang ba'i bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas shar phyogs
<p>174a.7</p>kyi sgor lcags kyu can gyi phyag rgya bcings la/ phyag rgya de nyid shar phyogs kyi sgor lcags kyur gyur par bsams la/ oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ zhes brjod pas/ lcags kyus bkug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so so'i sgo drung du byon par bsam mo/ /lho phyogs kyi
<p>174b</p>
<p>174b.1</p>sgor zhags par gyur par bsams la/ oM badzra pA sha hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ zhags pas drangs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so so'i nang du zhugs par bsam mo/ /phyag rgya de nyid bkrol nas/ nub phyogs kyi sgor lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bcings la/ phyag
<p>174b.2</p>rgya de nyid nub phyogs kyi sgor lcags sgrog tu gyur par bsams la/ oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ zhes brjod cing lcags sgrog bsdams pa'i tshul gyis bdag ji srid 'dod par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbyer med par bzhugs par bsam/ phyag rgya de nyid bkrol nas byang phyogs kyi sgor
<p>174b.3</p>rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ phyag rgya de nyid byang phyogs kyi sgor dril bur gyur par bsams la/ oM badzra A be sha ya hoH/ zhes brjod cing / dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bsams te/ phyag rgya de nyid dgrol lo/ /de
<p>174b.4</p>dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang / bzhugs tshul la sogs pa so so'i lta bas yun ring du blta zhing bsam mo/ /thugs rjes bskul lo thugs mnga' ba'i/ /rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis rlobs/ /dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /bsdams pa rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /
<p>174b.5</p>phyag rgya 'di ni kun rig gi'o/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ thal mo sbyar/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A bar Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes kun la sbyar ro/ /rdo rje bsdams pas gung gnyis bsgreng / /mthe bod mthe chud gnyis bkyed brkyang / 
<p>174b.6</p>mdzub gnyis pad+ma ltar bkug pa/ ngan song rnam par sbyong ba'i'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya sarba a bA ya hUM/ de las mdzub srin rin chen bya/ /rin chen tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya sarba a pA ya sarba satwa b+h+ya hUM trAM/ mthe bong mthe chung so sor mnyam/ /lhag ma brkyang
<p>174b.7</p>ba shAkya thub/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ni hrIH/ de nas lag g.yon bsgyur byas la/ /mi 'jigs sbyin par byas pa ni/ /me tog cher rgyas phyag rgya'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya sarba a pA ya tra tha aH/ bcings las mdzub gnyis mig tu bya/ /mthe'u chung srin lag nang
<p>175a</p>
<p>175a.1</p>du bsnol/ /gung mo mnyam par bsgreng ba ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi yin par gsungs/ /oM sho d+ha ni hUM/ thal sbyar gung mo gnyis bsgreng nas/ /mdzub gnyis ngos la sbyar byas nas/ /rtse gsum tshul du byas pa ni/ /mA ma kI yi phyag rgya'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni trAM/ 
<p>175a.2</p>lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las/ /gung mo pad+mar byas pa ni/ /gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni hrIH/ thal sbyar gung mo gnyis bsgreng la/ mdzub gnyis rgyab sbyar dkris byas te/ /mthe bong gung sbyar ut+pa la/ /'di ni sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM sho d+ha ni aH/ phyag rgya
<p>175a.3</p>rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mdzub gnyis rdo rjer brkyang pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba bid badzra satwa hUM/ de las mdzub mo g.yas bkug pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM sarba bid badzra rA dza dza/ drang bor bcas pa chags pa'o/ /sarba bid badzra rA ga ho/ /
<p>175a.4</p>de las mdzub gnyis slar bkug ste/ /se gol gtogs pa legs pa'o/ /sarba bid badzra swA d+hu d+hu/ de las bar ma tshigs bcag pa/ /rdo rje rin chen yin pa'o/ /sarba bid traM/ de las sor mo 'od zer ltar/ /bkyed pa rdo rje gzi brjid do/ /sarba bid raM/ de las spyi
<p>175a.5</p>bor bzhag pa ni/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan phyag rgya'o/ /sarba bid+hi/ de las phab nas kha ru ni/ /bzhag pa rdo rje bzhad pa'o/ /sarba bid hA/ bcings las mdzub gnyis pa de ltar bya/ /rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /sarba bid hrIH/ mdzub gnyis dang po tshigs bcag pa/ /phyag rgya
<p>175a.6</p>'di ni rnon po'i'o/ /sarba bid d+hI/ mdzub gnyis gdu bu ltar byas pa/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ /sarba bid kruM// de las mdzub gnyis pad+ma yi/ /'dab gnyis byas pa pad+ma'i'o/ /sarba bid b+hA/ de las mdzub gnyis dgye byas pa/ /las kyi rdo rje phyag rgya'o/ /sarba
<p>175a.7</p>bid kaM /de las mdzub gnyis rab bkye ste/ /mgrin par 'khyud pa bsrung ba'i'o/ /sarba bid raM/ de las rtse mo slar bkug ste/ /mche ba ltar byas gnod sbyin no/ /sarba bid k+ShaM/ /de nas mdzub gnyis nang bsdus te/ /rab tu bsdams pas khu tshur ro/ /sarba bid saM/ 
<p>175b</p>
<p>175b.1</p>rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas te/ /mthe bong gnyis gshibs lA s+ye'o/ /oM sarba bid ma hA badzrod b+hA ba dA na pA ra mi tA pU dza hUM/ de nas kha nas mdun du ni/ /lag pa brkyang ba mA le'o/ /oM sarba bid ma hA badzrod b+hA ba shI la pA ra mi tA pU dza traM/ thal mo sbyar ba mA le nas/ /phar drangs pa ni
<p>175b.2</p>kI rti'o/ /oM sarba bid ma hA badzrod b+hA wa k+ShAn ti pA ra mi tA pU dza hrIH/ gar las rdo rje thal mo ni/ /spyi bor bzhag pa na rti'o/ /oM sarba bid ma hA badzrod b+hA ba bI r+ya pA ra mi tA pU dza aH/ bsdams pa thur blugs bdug pa'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha na d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hu pa ya d+h+ya na pA
<p>175b.3</p>ra mi tA pU dza hUM/ thams cad du 'thor me tog go/ /oM sarba bti sarba a pA ya puSh+pa bi lo ki ni pradz+nyA na pA ra mi tA pU dza traM/ mtheb mnyam mdun 'dzin mar me'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba a pA ya dz+nyA na a ba lo ka ka ri pra ni d+hi pA ra mi tA pU dza hrIH/ rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang byug
<p>175b.4</p>dri'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba a pA ya gan+d+ha u pa ya pA ra mi tA pU dza A/ mdzub gnyis bkug pa lcags kyu'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba na ra ka Ak+Sha Ni hUM phaT/ mdzub rtse sprad pa zhags pa'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba na da ka u da ra Ni hUM phaT/ mdzub gnyis 'khyud pa lcags sgrog go/ /
<p>175b.5</p>oM sarba bti sarba na ra ka ban+d+ha mo tsa ni hUM phaT/ rab tu bkod pa'i dril bu'o/ /oM sarba bti sarba na ra ka g+haN+Te bi sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams/ /mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/ /g.yon pa lte bar brkyang ba la/ /g.yas pa rdo rje'i tshul du ni/ /kun
<p>175b.6</p>rig snang mdzad phyag rgya'o/ /ngan song sbyong la sogs pa bzhi/ /sa gnon mchod sbyin ting nge 'dzin/ /mi 'dzin sbyin sogs go rims bzhin/ /'gying bcas rdo rje dril 'dzin pa/ /lcags kyu g.yas kyis 'dzin pa yin/ /mda' 'phangs tshul dang se gol dang / /mdzub
<p>175b.7</p>bsgreng dpral bar 'dzin rin chen/ /khu tshur gshibs pa nyi ma'i'o/ /khu tshur g.yon mdog g.yas gru gzugs/ /kha yi phyogs bzhag bzhad pa'o/ /g.yas kyis g.yon dbye chos kyi yin/ /ral gri gnyis dpung 'dzin rnon po/ /khu tshur snying gar gshibs khyod 'khor/ 
<p>176a</p>
<p>176a.1</p>kha thad nas drangs smra ba'i rgya/ /khu tshur gnyis ni gar byas te/ /'gram pa g.yas g.yon gzhag par bya/ /de nas yang bskor spyi bor bzhag /spyi bor bskor ba las kyi'o/ /khu tshur go cha'i tshul phyag rgya/ /de nas mthe chung mche gnod sbyin/ /khu tshur
<p>176a.2</p>gnyis nas khu tshur rgya'o/ /de las dku gnyis g.yas g.yon du/ /bzhag nas 'gying ba lA s+ye'o/ /phreng ba 'dzin pa mA le'o/ /kha nas ba byung tshul gIrti'o/ /gar du byas pa ni rti'o/ /de las khu tshur thur du ni/ /blugs pa ltar byas bdug pa'o/ /gyen du 'thor ba me tog
<p>176a.3</p>go/ /mdun du gshibs pa mar me'o/ /khu tshur rtse sprad brang la ni/ /byug pa de ni gan+d+he'o/ /mthe'u chung mdzub gnyis so so ru/ /'khyud par byas pa lcags kyu'o/ /de las mdzub gnyis rtse sprad pa/ /gdu bur byas pa zhags pa'o/ /de nas gung mdzub mtheb rtse
<p>176a.4</p>sprad/ /lu gu rgyud ltar byas pa las/ /lhag ma bsdus pa lcags sgrog go/ /de nas mdzub gnyis 'khyud pa las/ /khu tshur mnan bskyod dril bu'o/ /lce la pad+ma'i zla dkyil du/ /gong du bstan pa'i sngags de dag /bkod nas zla ba bya ba de/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar
<p>176a.5</p>rab bstan pa'o/ /ji ltar bstan pa'i bsgoms pa dang / /phyag rgya phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang / /thugs kar rdo rje bsgom pa ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /phyag rgya chen por bstan pa'o/ /'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya ni/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse sprad de/ /
<p>176a.6</p>lhag ma gsum ni rdo rjer bya/ /de ni brgya byin phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa be con ltar byas pa/ /g.yon pa mgo thog bcer byas la/ /gshin rje 'khor bcas phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa zhags pa 'dzin byas te/ /g.yon pa sbrul gyi gdengs kar byas/ /chu lha 'khor bcas
<p>176a.7</p>phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa snye ma 'dzin pa dang / /g.yon pa mdzub mo bkug pa ni/ /gnod sbyin 'khor bcas phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas thal brkyang sbyar mthe bong bkug /smrang 'don lta bur byas pa dang / /g.yon pa gun+d+he 'dzin pa ni/ /me lha 'khor bcas phyag rgya'o/ /
<p>176b</p>
<p>176b.1</p>g.yas pa ral gri 'dzin pa dang / /gung mo srin lag mthil bkug pa/ /bden bral srin po'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa ba dan tshul byas nas/ /g.yon pa btsir ba'i tshul byas ni/ /rlung lha 'khor bcas phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa phreng ba 'dzin pa dang / /g.yon pa zhags mig ltar
<p>176b.2</p>byas pa/ /dbang ldan 'khor bcas phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo mnyam par sbyar ba ni/ /pa ba sangs dang mig dmar ro/ /kha thad mdzub bsgreng phur bu'o/ /lag g.yas thal bgrad nyi ma la'o/ /zla ba g.yon pa bgrad pa'o/ /glang sna chu srin 'dra sgra gcan/ /se gol gtogs
<p>176b.3</p>pa gza' lag ste/ /sben pa g.yon pa 'dzin ltar bya/ /lag pa gnyis kyi mkhrig ma bsnol/ /bkan te g.yas pa'i steng byung nas/ /sor mo bsdu zhing bsnol ba ste/ /rgyu skar spyi yi phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor lha rnams phyag rgyas btab nas/ de nas zhabs
<p>176b.4</p>bsil gyi snod blangs la/ /yid kyis zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o/ /sngags oM pra ba ra sat+ka ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ de nas mchod yon lag tu dbul lo/ /i ma ar+g+haM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ tri lan sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha swA hA/ mchod yon phyag tu dbul bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi
<p>176b.5</p>dbang phyug ma la sogs pas dbang bskur ro/ /mchod pa bya ste/ shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog dang / oM badzra puSh+pe zhes bya ba dang / snying po dkar po'i bdug spos dang / oM badzra d+hU pe/ zhes bya ba dang / ba'i mar gyi mar me dang / oM badzra di pe A lo ke / zhes bya ba dang / 
<p>176b.6</p>ga pur dang / tsan+dan gyi dri zhim po dkar po dang / oM badzra gan+d+he/ zhes bya ba dang / kha zas dkar gsum mngon par bsngags la/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+natwAta/ ces bya bas dbul te/ de dag dang pos bsangs te/ so so las kyi phyag rgya dang bcas
<p>176b.7</p>pas gtugs la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas yang dbul ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya ba'i phyag rgya bzhi'o/ /de nas bdug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ snying po brjod cing mchod pa ni/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ka thur du bstan te bkrol la dbul/ 
<p>177a</p>
<p>177a.1</p>badzra d+hU pe/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis me tog 'thor ba'i tshul du gyen du bstan te bkrol la/ badzra puSh+pe/ zhes bya bas dbul/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mar me'i lce ltar gyen du bzung la/ badzra A lo ke/ zhes bya bas dbul/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byug sbos byug pa'i
<p>177a.2</p>tshul du rang gi lus la bcar te brkyang la/ badzra gan+d+he/ zhes dbul lo/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod par byas te/ las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ rdo rje khu tshur mkhal ltag gnyis su bzhag ste/ lA s+ye'i snying po'i don sems la bsam zhing sems dang par
<p>177a.3</p>gyur pas glo g.yon par mgo bo btud pa ni rdo rje mdzes ma'o/ /sngags oM badzra satwa su saM gra ha da/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rang gi mgo la phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul du byas pa ni phreng ba ma'i'o/ /sngags oM badzra rat+na ma nut+ta raM/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kha nas tshig 'byin pa ltar byas pa ni
<p>177a.4</p>dbyangs mkhan ma'i'o/ /sngags oM badzra d+harma ga ya ne/ rdo rje khu tshur g.yon pa mdun du bkan te bzhag la/ de'i steng du khu tshur g.yas pa kha sbub ste bzhag nas/ ldem bag can du lag pa gnyis phan tshun dkri zhing / g.yon pa'i mdzub mo la sogs pa dgrol ba'i
<p>177a.5</p>tshul du byas te/ de bzhin du g.yas pa khu tshur la sogs dgrol ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/ gar mkhan ma'i'o/ /sngags oM badzra karma ka rod b+hA ba/ da ni mchod pa nyi shus mchod par bya ste/ 'di ni mchod pa nyi shus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la kun du mchod nas/ 
<p>177a.6</p>ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i mtshan ma'i dbus su rang gi chos kyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du bsams te/ yang mchod yon phul la/ 'thor 'thung snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg gi yo byad thams cad bsang gtor byas la/ dgang gzar dang
<p>177a.7</p>blugs gzar lag tu blangs la/ byin za brtag ste/ mar gyis bkang ste sbar zhing / ji snyed pa thams cad me'i zhal du bstabs par bya'o/ /de nas gtso bo la me lha nyid dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal ba lnga dang / sems dpa' bcu drug po rnams la brgya rtsa brgyad
<p>177b</p>
<p>177b.1</p>dbul/ lhag ma rnams la nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul lo/ /rdzas rnams ni gong du rgyas par smos par zad do/ /de nas gong du smos pa'i rdo rje dril bu rnam pa gnyis pad+ma'i lag skor lnga byas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod par bya'o/ /chos nyid ye shes skyon bral ba'i/ /rnam
<p>177b.2</p>par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /ting nge 'dzin ldan phyag rgya can/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun rig la'o/ /me long ye shes rang bzhin las/ /sems can ma lus thams cad kyi/ /ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal sbyong ba'i rgyal po la/ /mnyam nyid ye shes
<p>177b.3</p>yon tan bdag /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen gyis/ /bsam pa thams cad skong mdzad pa/ /rgyal mchog rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /so sor kun rtog gsung gi bdag /gsung rab pad+ma'i kha rgyas pa/ /khams gsum dbugs 'byin mdzad pa po/ /shAkya'i rigs
<p>177b.4</p>dbang khyod phyag 'tshal/ /nan tan ye shes phrin las bdag /sna tshogs sems can sdug bsngal kun/ /ma lus sems ni zhi mdzad pa/ /me tog cher rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /grwa yi phyogs ni kun du yang / /rigs kyi yum gyi sku bstan pa/ /lo tsa na dang mA ma kI/ /dkar
<p>177b.5</p>mo sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /zhes bya ba nas/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur la'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /sgeg mo phreng dang dbyangs dang gar/ /spos ma me tog mar me dang / /dri chab la sogs lha mo brgyad/ /phyi nang lha mo phyag
<p>177b.6</p>'tshal lo/ /de yi phyi rim gnas pa yi/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po la/ /'khor dang bcas pa gnas pa ni/ /mche ba drug pa mdog dkar ba'i/ /glang chen de ni brgya byin gdan/ /rol pas 'dug par gur kum 'dra/ /mtshan ma sha rtsi u pa sI/ /'khor dang
<p>177b.7</p>bcas te phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lho phyogs gshin rje'i rgyal po ni/ /ma he'i gdan can g.yon dkur brten/ /mchan na nag mo 'chi bdag mo/ /be con g.yon 'dzin phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nub phyogs ngos kyi chu lha ni/ /lus mdog dkar zhing 'tsher ba la/ /sbrul gyis
<p>178a</p>
<p>178a.1</p>lus brgyan chu srin gdan/ /zhags pa rin chen bsnams phyag 'tshal/ /byang phyogs gnod sbyin rgyal po ni/ /gser gyi mdog 'dra rin chen dang / /g.yon pa snye ma rta yi gdan/ /mchan na chung ma bsnams phyag 'tshal/ /me gzugs kha dog drug 'dra
<p>178a.2</p>ba'i/ /dkyil na na chung gnas pa yi/ /lus dmar po la ra skyes gdan/ /gun+d+he dbyug 'dzin phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lho nub mtshams kyi bden bral ni/ /yi dgas gdan can dmar nag mdog /me bur ba ni g.yon na 'dzin/ /g.yas pa ral gri 'dzin phyag 'tshal/ /
<p>178a.3</p>nub byang rlung lha'i rgyal po ni/ /nam mkha'i mdog can sha ba'i gdan/ /ba dan gyen du bsgreng ba 'dzin/ /g.yon pa rlung sgye'u thogs phyag 'tshal/ /byang shar 'byung po'i rgyal po ni/ /thal ba'i mdog 'dra rta yi gdan/ /g.yas nyid rtse gsum a 'bra dang / /g.yon nyid
<p>178a.4</p>gun+d+he rag sha phreng / /bgegs gdon rnams la dbang sgyur zhing / /'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de yi phyi rim phyogs bzhi na/ /bar na gza' rnams brgyad gnas pa/ /pa ba sangs dang mig dmar gnyis/ /shar na gnas shing 'khor rnams skyong / /smin
<p>178a.5</p>drug snar ma mgo dang lag /nab so rgyal skag sogs phyag 'tshal/ /phur bu dang ni nyi ma gnyis/ /lho na gnas shing 'khor skyong ba/ /mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni/ /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga la sogs phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zla ba sgra gcan nub phyogs na/ /
<p>178a.6</p>gnas shing rang gi 'khor skyong ba/ /lha mtshams dang ni snron dang snubs/ /chu stod dang ni chu smad dang / /byi bzhin dang ni gro bzhin dang / /nub phyogs gza' skar phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gza' lag spen pa byang phyogs na/ /gnas shing rang gi 'khor skyong ba/ /mon gru dang
<p>178a.7</p>ni mon gre dang / /khrums stod khrums smad nam gru dang / /tha skar dang ni bra nye ste/ /gza' skar tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgo yi dbus su gnas pa gang / /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /dad sogs bsgoms pa las skyes pa'i/ /sgo srung rnams la
<p>178b</p>
<p>178b.1</p>phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ces bstod de/ gang 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams gsol ba gdab pa'o// //bzod par gsol zhing gshegs te/ yi ge brgya pa nus tshad du brjod nas/ /'di skad brjod do/ /cho ga nyams pa gang bgyis pa/ /mgon po bdag la bzod par gsol/ /
<p>178b.2</p>mi shes pa dang ma 'byor bas/ /gang phyir lus can skyabs gyur pa/ /cho ga dman pa bzod par gsol/ /de nas yang ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /dngos grub stsal nas gshegs su gsol/ /sangs rgyas
<p>178b.3</p>yul du gshegs nas ni/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje sems ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas/ sngags 'di brjod cing gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /oM muHzhes bya ba dang / sngags 'dis kyang gshegs su gsol bar bya
<p>178b.4</p>ste/ oM kri to b+ha ba ar+tha satwa ta sid+d+hi ma me dad de yats+tsha nu/ nu na ga ma na yaM tu/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas de'i shar lho mtshams nas/ thab nang gi lus la bcug pa phyir spyan drangs te/ me lha la mchod yon la sogs pa phul te/ yo byad kyi lhag ma rnams kyis lan gsum gsum
<p>178b.5</p>du sbyin sreg byas la/ de'i tha mar yon bdag g.yon du bzhag la/ bsgrub pa'i dngos grub cing 'dod pa gsol ba gdab bo/ /oM ag+na ye ya hi ya hi swa staM tsi pa ra thaM/ sid+d+hi tham ga gats+tsha ha b+hu b+hu ga ta/ zhes brjod cing spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bong slar bkyed cing 'bar
<p>178b.6</p>ba'i me gshegs su gsol lo/ /rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya ba lan gsum brjod do/ /de ltar yi ge brgya pas bshags nas/ yang me thab dang yo byad rnams bsangs nas/ de nas bdag dam tshig sems dpar bsgoms pa'i thugs kar hUM bsams pa las/ bdag nyid
<p>178b.7</p>khro bo phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar gyur te/ bzhin dang cha lugs khro bo'i tshul du bsam/ mdun gyi me thab tu yang yi ge hUM las rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka nas/ oM badzra satwa kro d+ha a na lArka ma hA badzra kro d+ha/ dra ba dra ba/ bi dra ba /bi dra ba/ 
<p>179a</p>
<p>179a.1</p>sarba a pa/ nA sha ya nA sha ya ha ra ha ra/ prA NAn hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i skur gyur te/ sku mdog sngon po zhal bgrad cing mche ba gtsigs pa/ phyag na rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri la sogs pa mtshon cha grangs
<p>179a.2</p>med pa bsnams pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyis smad brgyan pa/ 'khor khro bo mang pos bskor/ rig lngas dbu brgyan pa/ zhabs pad+ma lta bus ro mnan cing thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes sdig pa sbyong bar bsams te/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil la
<p>179a.3</p>sogs pa phul la/ dang por khro bo'i sngags kyis mar dang yam shing phul la/ de nas rdzas rnams gcig tu bsres la/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags btab pa la/ lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la/ mdzub mo bsgreng ste/ brang la dpung pa dam du bcum la/ lag
<p>179a.4</p>pa g.yas sbyin sreg bya ste/ sngags gong du smos pa dang / brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bar bar du ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes brjod cing til bsreg go/ /de nas khro bo gshegs su gsol lo/ /
<p>179a.5</p>bdag nyid phyag rgya dgrol zhing / lus bsrung ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de ltar bsregs nas thal bar gyur pa dang / rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags sam ha ri zhes brjod cing / rus pa dang thal ba rnams bsdus nas/ snod gtsang mar bcug ste/ mchod rten gdab pa'i phyogs su
<p>179a.6</p>gzhag go/ /de nas ga pur la sogs pa'i chu dang / ba'i mar dang / zho dang / lci ba dang / gcin dang / rus pa bsres te/ ngan song sbyor ba'i sngags 'bum man chad bzlas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yang rung ba'i gzugs su gdab pa'am/ yang na mchod
<p>179a.7</p>rten byas te/ mchod rten gdab pa'am/ gnyis gdab pa dang / gsum gdab pa dang / brgya rtsa brgyad man chad gdab pa'i bar du/ gzhan dang mthun pa'i tshul gyis/ sngags dang phyag rgyas btab nas/ sku'am mchod rten gyi spyan sngar/ ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags
<p>179b</p>
<p>179b.1</p>nyis brgya man chad bzlas so/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste mtshan ma de dag ma mthong na/ 'bum phrag stong man chod bzlas shing / ji srid mtshan ma dge ba rnams byung gi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
<p>179b.2</p>mchod cing / rtse gcig pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas brjod bya/ de ltar bzlas pa'i mthar/ mtshan gcig bzlas pa rab tu byas na/ sha bi nges par sdig las grol zhing / mtshan ma bzang po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// //ngan song sbyong
<p>179b.3</p>ba'i rgyal po brtag pa yi/ /shi ba'i don du cho gar gsungs pa bya/ /'gro ba'i don du nyung zad gcig bsdus pa/ /'di yis nyam thag sdug bsngal byang bar shog /bla mkhas pas ston pa'i lung la brten/ /bdag 'dra rtog ges bla ma'i lung thos nas/ /mos dang
<p>179b.4</p>goms pas shi ba'i cho ga byas/ /thams cad bla med byang chub thob par shog /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i lung las/ ro sbyong zhing sreg pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mdo dang bsres nas/ slob dpon
<p>179b.5</p>kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hAka ra barma dang / bod kyi dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na u pA ya nA ma/ 
<p>179b.6</p>bod skad du/ ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la
<p>179b.7</p>phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dam tshig la brtan par gnas shing slob dpon las tshul bzhin dbang thob pa/ gsang sngags kyi rgyud dang cho ga'i bye brag la mkhas shing bdag dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa la brtson pa des byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can
<p>180a</p>
<p>180a.1</p>gang dag 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pas ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa dang / /nyam nga'i gnas nas 'don cing / mtho ris kyi bde ba la dgod pa'i phyir ngan song rnam par sbyong ba'i brtag pa las byung ba'i shi ba'i
<p>180a.2</p>cho ga bya bar 'os so/ /de yang rgyud las/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /de ltar yang ni gsum pa la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab tu brtag /de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te/ /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las/ /de ni myur
<p>180a.3</p>du rnam par thar/ /rim gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes 'byung bas/ ngan song rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhung las smos pa bzhin du bris nas bum pa lnga bzhag pa la rigs lnga so so'i snying po bum pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shi ba'i ro'am
<p>180a.4</p>gzugs brnyan la tshul bzhin du dbang bskur na myur du sdug bsngal las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /thabs gzhan yang rgyud las/ de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur/ /lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang / /mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya/ /
<p>180a.5</p>rang gi lha'am lha gzhan gyi/ /snying po snying gar bris nas kyang / /lha 'dra bar yang sems bskyed de/ /khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes 'byung bas/ shi ba'i ro'am gzugs brnyan ni sngags dang phyag rgyas tshul bzhin du dbang bskur nas lha yin no bar sems
<p>180a.6</p>kyis brtags te/ lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas pa'i dbus su bzhag pa'am/ de ltar ma nus na ni shi ba nyid kyi yi dam gyi lha'am/ ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa lha gzhan gyi snying po ro'am gzugs brnyan gyi
<p>180a.7</p>snying gar bris la/ de lha yin par sems bskyed de/ dur ram mchod pa'i nang du bcug na sdig pa rnams byang bar 'gyur ro/ /thabs gzhan yang rgyud las/ de yi ming nas smos nas ni/ /gur kum bzang pos sngags bris te/ rim gyis 'bum ni tshang tsam du/ mchod rten las
<p>180b</p>
<p>180b.1</p>ni rab tu bya/ /sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir/ /bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya/ /de ni nges par dmyal ba las/ /'di byas pas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /yi dgas byol song sdug bsngal las/ /grol te lha yi gnas su skye/ /zhes 'byung bas/ shi ba'i ming dang rigs lnga'i snying
<p>180b.2</p>po spel zhing gro ga la gur kum gyis bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug cing / tsha tsha 'bum tshang bar gzhung bzhin du gdab/ sdig pa shin tu che na mchod rten bye ba tshang bar btab na ngan song gsum las grol zhing lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /thabs gzhan yang rgyud las/ 
<p>180b.3</p>de yi ming nas brjod nas ni/ /ji skad gsung ba'i sngags bzlas shing / /'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni/ /brgya phrag stong du tshang ba dang / /bye ba snyed du rab bzlas na/ /lha yi gnas su nges par skye/ /zhes 'byung bas/ sngags mkhan nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la/ shi
<p>180b.4</p>ba'i ming dang lha'i snying po rnams spel zhing bzlas brjod gzhung bzhin du 'bum phrag stong ngam/ brgya phrag stong ngam/ bye ba tshang bar bzlas na lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /thabs gzhan yang rgyud las/ de yi ming nas brjod nas ni/ mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya'am
<p>180b.5</p>ni/ /yang na brgya phrag stong du snyed/ /sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni/ /dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi/ /sdig pa de las thar bar 'gyur/ /zhes 'byung bas/ shi ba'i ming dang snying po rnams spel zhing tshul bzhin du sbyin sreg gi las byas te/ grangs 'bum phrag brgya'am/ 
<p>180b.6</p>brgya phrag stong tshang bar bzlas shing sbyin sreg byas na ngan song las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na gzhung nyid las smos pa'i me'i mdog dkar zhing me lce g.yas su 'khyil ba la sogs pa ltas bzang po rnams byung ba'i bar du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /thabs gzhan yang rgyud las/ 
<p>180b.7</p>sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /sbyin sreg rab tu bya ba yin/ /zhes smos pas/ sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol te/ dbang bskur nas me thab tu sbyin sreg bya ba dang / tsha tsha btab nas bzlas brjod la sogs bya dgos te/ 'dir gong gi cho ga'i
<p>181a</p>
<p>181a.1</p>thabs rnam par rgyud nyid las gsal bar rab tu smos so/ /de yang sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas/ dang por shi ba'i ro'am/ gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar shi ba nyid kyi me tog gang la phog pa'i yi dam gyi lha'am/ lha med na ngan song rnam
<p>181a.2</p>par sbyong ba la sogs pa lha gzhan gang yang rung ba'i snying po gro ga la gur kum gyis bris te snying gar gdags/ las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba'i snying po de bzhin du bris nas spyi bor gdags te/ snying gar bris pa'i snying po gang yin pa de lha de nyid du ro de gyur par bsam
<p>181a.3</p>zhing byin gyis brlabs nas/ gtsang ma'i nang du khri'am stegs bu'i steng du kha nub tu bstan la gzhag go/ /sngags mkhan shar du kha bltas nas bdun du maN+Dal byas nas zhi ba dang ldan pa'i mchod pa rnams dgram zhing / mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma cha gnyis tshul bzhin du
<p>181a.4</p>bshams/ 'byor na 'phan gdugs ci 'byor kyang bre/ de nas bdag nyid rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du gzhung bzhin du byas nas bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ phyag byas la mchod pa dbul zhing thugs dam bskul ba dang / dam tshig can rnams
<p>181a.5</p>la gtor ma phul te phrin las bcol ba dang 'gro ba la sbyin pa rgya cher spel bas lan chags bral bar byas pa la sogs pa gzhung gzhan dang mthun par byas nas bde bar gshegs pa de dag gis thugs kar bzlas bya'i yi ge na mo b+ha ga ba te bya ba'am/ oM sarba durga ti/ zhes bya
<p>181a.6</p>ba gang yang rung ba bkod la/ de bzhin du bdag gi snying gar yang bsams te/ gzhung bzhin du zhi ba'i ming dang sngags spel zhing zhag ci nus tsam gyis bzlas brjod bya'o/ /cho ga shes pa gzhan yod na gnas de nyid dam gzhan nyid du zhi ba'i thab khung tshul bzhin du brtsigs nas phyag
<p>181a.7</p>rgya bzhi bkod de/ mchod pa dang gtor ma dang sreg rdzas la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bshams nas mchod pa dang gtor ma tshul bzhin du dbul zhing btang ba dang / sbyin sreg gi cho ga byas pa la sogs pa zhag ci nus kyis bya'o/ /gzhan yang sgrib pa sbyangs shing tshogs bsag
<p>181b</p>
<p>181b.1</p>pa'i phyir mchod rten gdab pa dang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa dang / sbyin pa 'byor tshad btang ba la sogs pa dge ba'i las rgya cher bya bar rigs so/ /de ltar dge ba'i phyogs ci nus pa byas nas/ sa phyogs brtags par sa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin du byas la dkyil 'khor ngos gcig
<p>181b.2</p>po la khru drug pa grub zhi dpang khru gang ba zhig byas pa'i dbus su/ me thab kho ra khor yug tu khru do pa zlum po zabs su khru gang pa/ mu ran 'phang dang zheng sor bzhi bzhi pa zlum por bskor/ lci bas skyang nul legs par bya/ sa dkar pos bsku zhing dris byug /de nas thig
<p>181b.3</p>skud legs pa cig gis tshul bzhin du thig btab nas/ tshon phye sna lngas bri ba ni me thab kyi dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa gcig bya ba ni shar du rdo rje/ lhor rin po che/ nub tu pad+ma/ byang du sna tshogs rdo rje rnams tshul bzhin du bkod do/ /mu ran la rdo rje rkyang pa'i ra ba rtse
<p>181b.4</p>lnga pa'am/ rtse gsum pas bskor ro/ /de'i phyi rim gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug la shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang mda' dang mgu bar ston pa rnams dgod do/ /lho'i rtsibs bzhi la nor bu rin po che dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang yid bzhin gyi
<p>181b.5</p>nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang so'i phreng ba rnams dgod do/ /nub kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la rdo rje pad+ma dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang dung rnams dgod do/ /byang phyogs kyi rtsibs bzhi la rdo rje kha bzhi pa dang go cha dang mche ba dang khu tshur rnams dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim gyi gru chad
<p>181b.6</p>kyi shar lhor smin ma 'degs pa'i tshul dang bdug pa dang / lho nub tu rin po che'i phreng ba dang me tog dang / nub byang du yid du 'ong ba'i glu dang mar me dang / byang shar du gar byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / byug pa rnams dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim snam bu la phyag rgya bzhis gtams pa
<p>181b.7</p>dgod do/ /de'i phyi rim gyi snam bu la shar du rdo rje gdeng po dang zla ba/ shar lhor me thab/ lhor be con/ lho nub tu ral gri// nub tu zhags pa dang / bum pa dang / nyi ma/ nub byang du ba dan/ byang du dbyug pa/ byang shar du mdung rtse gsum pa rnams dgod do/ /de'i phyi
<p>182a</p>
<p>182a.1</p>rim gyi sgo bzhi'i shar du lcags kyu/ lhor zhags pa/ nub tu lcags sgrog byang du dril bu rnams dgod do/ /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan them skas bzhi'i phreng ba dang lda ldi dang do shal dang dril bu dang rnga ma dang seng ge dang ba lang la sogs pas brgyan
<p>182a.2</p>pa bri'o/ /de yang rgyud las khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni/ cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la/ /rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya/ /rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri/ /ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /'jig rten
<p>182a.3</p>gtso la sogs pa bri/ /zhes smos so/ /de ltar sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor smos nas bum pa chus bkang ba/ sman dang 'bru dang rin po che dang mgul chings dang bum pa'i kha rgyan la sogs pa gzhung dang mthun par byas pa lnga yan chad dgod pa dang / lha bshos snod gtsang
<p>182a.4</p>mas bkang ba brgyad dam bcu drug snyed kyi bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang btung ba sna tshogs pa dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang / byug pa dang mar me la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang rgyal mtshan dang / bla re dang gdugs dang ba dan dang
<p>182a.5</p>'phan la sogs pas brgyan pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi me tog sil ma bkram zhing ku shas bskor ro/ /mchod yon gyi gtor ma rgyas par cha gnyis kyang bsham mo/ /de yang rgyud las/ chu sogs bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba dang / /brgyad
<p>182a.6</p>snyed tsam du gzhag bya snyam/ /yang na bcu drug steng du gzhag /bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i bshos/ /me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te/ /bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs/ /gdugs mchog rnams ni legs par brgyan/ /zhes smos so/ /gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi yo
<p>182a.7</p>byad mar khu dang 'o ma dang til dang / nyungs kar dang 'bras chan dang / 'bras so ba dang / dUr ba dang / yam shing 'o ma can dang / dri zhim po las byas pa'i sor brgyad dam/ sor nyi shu bzhi'i bar dang / bud shing 'o ma can skam po zlum po rnams dang / ga pur dang gur
<p>182b</p>
<p>182b.1</p>kum la sogs pa dri zhim pa rnams bsag go/ /de yang rgyud las/ ga pur gur kum la sogs pa/ mar dang 'o ma til bskol la/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang / /dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste/ /'bras chan yos dang dUr ba dang / /sbrang rtsi sha khar mar ldan
<p>182b.2</p>pa/ /brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas pa/ /yam shing la yang de bzhin du/ /zhes smos so/ /de ltar mchod pa'i yo byad rnams bsags te/ bdag nyid rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kun la las thams cad pa'am/ ngan song sbyong ba'i
<p>182b.3</p>sngags kyis gdab/ sreg rdzas kun la yang ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis gdab/ brgya rtsa brgya phrag du mar bzlas so/ /de nas las thams cad pa'am/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad cing mtshams bcad do/ /rdo rje ra ba dang dra ba dang
<p>182b.4</p>phur bu la sogs pa'i sngags sam rgyud dang ldan par bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rjes bsdus pas 'phags pa spyan drangs te/ phyag rgya bzhis bzhugs su gsol nas/ yon chab la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams tshul bzhin du dbul lo/ /de yang
<p>182b.5</p>rgyud las/ cho ga shes par bris nas kyang / /lha rnams mang po spyan drangs nas/ /sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag rgyas/ /ar+g+ha phul bar shes nas kyang / /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni/ /lha yi sbyor bar rab gnas la/ /zhes smos so/ /de nas gtor ma rnams tshul
<p>182b.6</p>bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dam tshig can rnams la gtor ma phul te/ ming 'di zhes bya ba'i sgrib pa sbyang zhing / bdag 'gro ba'i don brtsam pa'i bstong grogs mdzad du gsol zhes brjod do/ /'gro ba spyir gtor ma bsngos nas/ ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lan chags byang
<p>182b.7</p>zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs su gyur cig ces brjod de gtang / sngags mkhan gzhan ma zhig yod na bum pa lnga la rigs lnga'i snying po dang shi ba'i ming spel zhing cung zad bzlas la de nas ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags ci mang du bzlas brjod bya/ gzhan med na bdag nyid kyis bum pa gcig
<p>183a</p>
<p>183a.1</p>la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags ci nus kyis bzlas so/ /de nas bud shing la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis btab la brtsig /ro la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis mang du btab ste/ bye ma'am yungs kar la bzlas shing gtor nas bum pa'i chus tshul bzhin du
<p>183a.2</p>bkrus te ga pur dang gur kum la sogs pa'i dri rnams la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis btab ste ro la byug /gur kum gyis sngags bco brgyad tshul bzhin du bris nas/ dpral ba dang / mdzod spu dang / rna ba gnyis dang / gtsug phud dang / dpung pa gnyis dang / 
<p>183a.3</p>sna dang / rked pa dang / bus mo gnyis dang / bol gnyis dang / long bu gnyis dang / mig gnyis dang / gsang ba'i gnas rnams su gdab/ de bzhin yid kyis kyang sngags rnams bkod de/ de dag gi 'od zer gyis sgrib pa sbyangs par bsams/ ngan song sbyong
<p>183a.4</p>ba'i phyag rgya bcings shing / sarba bid bya ba'i sngags te/ snying ga dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor btags pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags dag par dmigs so/ /de nas ro la ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i gos kyis g.yogs nas/ rgyan rnams kyis
<p>183a.5</p>klubs te/ me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing / sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas kyang bdugs te/ thab kyi dbus su stan dang bcas par bzhag ste/ nub tu kha bstan la bdag nyid shar phyogs su kha bltas te las bya'o/ /de yang rgyud las/ rang gi sngags kyis btab
<p>183a.6</p>pa'i shing / /khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang / /chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas ni/ /bzlas pa'i dri yis byug par bya/ /gos dang rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang / /sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug /me tog phreng la sogs pas mchod/ /
<p>183a.7</p>snying ga lkog ma spyi bo ru/ /sarba bid kyis byin gyis brlab/ /de ltar gzhan du mi dge sngags/ /mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go/ /de nas ngan song sbyong ba'i phyir/ /stan dang bcas te de dbus su/ /gzhag pa nyid du bya ba yin/ /zhes smos so/ /de nas rdo rje chos kyi bzlas
<p>183b</p>
<p>183b.1</p>brjod byas pa'i chus thab kyi nye 'khor dang yo byad thams cad bsangs nas/ sku gzugs la sogs pa mngon du phyogs par rtswa ku sha'i khri la bkra shis kyi skyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor du gsal bar byas la/ rgyun bzhag gi me'am/ dka' thub la dga' ba'i khyim
<p>183b.2</p>nas blangs pa'i me la/ rdo rje chos kyi bzlas brjod byas pa'i me bsangs te thab tu bcug la/ las sna tshogs kyi snying po brjod cing rlung yab kyi rlung gis me sbar ro/ /de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge hUM gzhag ste/ rnal 'byor gsal bar byas nas rdo rje me'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje bcing ba
<p>183b.3</p>dang bsdams pa byas nas/ dam tshig gi sngags/ oM badzra a na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wA la ya/ b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas rdo rje me ma'i gzugs su gyur te/ rid pa ring la gzi mdangs chen po g.yas bgrang phreng / g.yon ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa/ thor
<p>183b.4</p>tshugs ser po can/ mdog dkar zhing snum pa/ me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'od 'bar bar bsams nas mchod yon sngags kyis byin la/ zhi ba dang mthun pa'i dgang gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs gsum sbyin/ de nas yam shing gi thor to gnyis mar la bsres pa bsreg
<p>183b.5</p>ste til mar dang spus pa gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe bo gsum gyis sam/ blugs gzar gyis sreg blugs gsum sbyin/ de nas mchod yon gyi chus kha lag bkrus nas bsang gtor byas te/ 'di skad brjod do/ /drang srong chen po khyod rang gi 'bar ba nyid du bzhugs te/ 
<p>183b.6</p>bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i bar du gnas par gyis shig ces smras nas/ me lha'i gzugs de nyid me'i rang bzhin 'bar ba nyid du bsam mo/ /de yang rgyud las/ de nas byin za dge ba rab sbar la/ /me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i sku/ /zla dkar kun
<p>183b.7</p>da'i bzhin la zhi ba'i lus/ /mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyis me bkug la/ /ar+g+ha dbul bar btag nas de bzhin du/ /blo mchog ldan pa'i dbus su gzugs sogs bzhag /ces smos so/ /de nas sems dpa'i bzlas brjod byas pa'i mchod yon gyi snod g.yon rol du
<p>184a</p>
<p>184a.1</p>gzhag /mchod pa'i yo byad gzhan g.yas rol du gzhag /dgang gzar dang blugs gzar mdun du bzhag nas/ rang gi rnal 'byor gsal bar byas te/ las sna tshogs kyi snying po brjod pas me 'bar ba de nyid kyi nang du rin po che'i gzhal yas khang bzang
<p>184a.2</p>po lte ba dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa dang / gru chad dang / khyams dang / sgo khyud dang / rta babs dang / them skas dang / phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan pa/ dbus su seng ge dang pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan chen po dang gru bzhi dang 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang / 
<p>184a.3</p>gru chad dang sgor pad+ma'i gdan dang / rin po che'i khri'u la sogs pas bkod nas/ bdag gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po/ oM badzra sa ma yA dzaH/ zhes brjod cing / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnol te/ dpung mgor gzhag /mdzub mo
<p>184a.4</p>gnyis lcags kyu ltar byas te/ gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis se gol brdabs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rang rang gi gnas nas bskul te/ ji ltar mchod par bsams pa'i gnas khor khor yug tu bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas shar phyogs kyi
<p>184a.5</p>sgor lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ phyag rgya de nyid shar phyogs kyi sgor lcags kyur gyur par bsams la/ oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ zhes brjod cing / lcags kyus dgug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so so'i sgo drung du bzhugs par bsam mo/ /phyag
<p>184a.6</p>rgya de nyid bkrol nas lho phyogs kyi sgor zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bcings te/ phyag rgya de nyid lho phyogs kyi sgor zhags par bsams la/ oM badzra pA sha hUM/ zhes brjod cing zhags pas drangs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so so'i sgo drung du bzhugs par bsam mo/ /
<p>184a.7</p>phyag rgya de nyid bkrol nas nub kyi sgor lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bcings te/ phyag rgya de nyid dang nub phyogs kyi sgor lcags sgrog tu gyur par bsams la/ oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ zhes brjod cing lcags sgrog bsdams pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid ji srid 'dod par de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>184b</p>
<p>184b.1</p>rnams bzhugs par bsams te/ phyag rgya de nyid bkrol nas byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje dbab pa las kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ phyag rgya de nyid byang phyogs kyi sgor dril bur gyur par bsams la/ oM badzra A be sha hoH/ zhes brjod cing dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>184b.2</p>rnams mnyes par bsams te/ phyag rgya de nyid dgrol lo/ /de dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang bzhugs tshul la sogs pa so so'i lta bas yun ring du blta zhing bsam mo/ /de nas so so'i dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje bcings pa las bskyed de/ so so'i sngags kyi mjug
<p>184b.3</p>tu/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas/ 'phags pa rnams dgyes shing dam tshig skong par bsams te/ mchod yon phul nas bde bar gshegs so zhes brjod cing mchod pa gzhan rnams kyang rim bzhin du dbul lo/ /de nas sreg rdzas rnams la lha so so'i snying po dang / ngan
<p>184b.4</p>song sbyong ba'i sngags bzlas te/ 'od zer kha dog dkar por gyur par bsams nas rdzas re re zhing / oM bai ro tsa nA ya swA hA/ che ge mo zhes bya ba sarba bid ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod cing rdzas rnams bsreg go/ /bzlas pa'i mthar ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnams
<p>184b.5</p>shAn+tiM ku ru zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi lha re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad man chad du dbul lo/ /de nas rdzas dang me thab la sogs pa bsangs te/ ngan song sbyong ba'i lha la sreg rdzas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbul lo/ /de ltar mchod zin pa dang / 'phags pa rnams tshul
<p>184b.6</p>bzhin du gshegs su gsol/ de nas me lha yang thab khung du spyan drangs shing bsams la/ mchod yon la sogs pas mchod cing / yo byad kun las lan gsum dbul lo/ /de nas yang me lha me 'bar ba nyid du gyur par bsam mo/ /de yang rgyud las/ ji skad gsungs pa'i
<p>184b.7</p>yon tan 'dod pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs sogs de ltar spyan drangs la/ ar+g+ha la sogs btab ste de bzhin dbul/ /bde gshegs bsdus pa'i mchod pa gang yin bya/ /de nas bsreg bya bkang ste rim gyis ni/ /rgyal po la sogs brgya rtsa brgyad du btags/ /de nas
<p>185a</p>
<p>185a.1</p>sbyong ba'i sngags kyis rgyal po la/ bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig tu ni brtags/ de nas spyan drangs yo byad lan gsum dang / ar+g+ha la sogs pad+ma dkar zhal mchod/ /ces smos so/ /de nas yang me thab dang yo byad rnams bsangs la/ bdag nyid kyi
<p>185a.2</p>snying gar yi ge hUM bzhag pa las/ bdag nyid khro bo phyag na rdo rjer yi ge hUM zhes pas gyur te/ bzhin dang cha lugs khro bo'i tshul can du bsams la/ me thab tu yang yi ge hUM las rdo rje sems dpar gyur/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka nas/ oM badzra satwa kro d+ha A na lArka
<p>185a.3</p>ma hA badzra kro d+ha/ dra ba dra ba/ bi dra ba bi dra ba/ sarbA pA ya nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ra ha ra prA NA na hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar gyur te/ sku mdog sngon po zhal bgrad cing mche ba gtsigs pa/ phyag na rdo rje dang pad+ma dang / ral gri
<p>185a.4</p>la sogs pa grangs med pa'i mtshon cha bsnams pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyis smad g.yogs pa 'khor khro bo mang pos bskor ba rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs pad+ma lta bus ro mnan cing / thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes sdig pa sbyong bar mdzad par
<p>185a.5</p>bsam mo/ /grub na de'i sku gzugs kyang mdun du gzhag go/ /de nas lag pa g.yon pas khu tshur bcangs la/ mdzub mo bsgrengs te brang la sbyar zhing dpung pa dam du bcum la/ lag pa g.yas pas sbyin sreg bya ste/ sngags gong du smos pa dang / shi pa'i ming
<p>185a.6</p>spel zhing 'bum mam/ bye ba man chad bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bar bar du ming 'di zhes bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'am sgrib pa thams cad/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ye swA hA/ zhes brjod cing til bsreg par bya'o/ /de yang rgyud las/ phyag na rdo rje phyag na pad zhags
<p>185a.7</p>bsnams/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs/ /zhabs kyi pad+mas sdig mnan cing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab rdzogs la/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan mtho/ /bsams sam yang na bris kyang rung / /de yi snying po de bzhin du/ /brgya phrag
<p>185b</p>
<p>185b.1</p>stod dam yang na ni/ /bye ba'i tshad du sbyin sreg bya/ /zhes smos so/ /de nas lha gshegs su gsol te/ bdag nyid lus bsrung ba bya'o/ /de ltar bsregs nas thal bar gyur pa dang / rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags sa ma ha ra NA hUM/ zhes brjod cing / rus pa dang thal ba rnams bsdus nas/ 
<p>185b.2</p>snod gtsang mar bcug ste/ mchod rten gdab pa'i phyogs su gzhag go/ /de nas ga pur la sogs pa'i dri chu dang / ba'i rnam lnga dang rus pa bsres te/ ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i sngags 'bum man chad bzlas la 'jim pa dang bsres la dkyil 'khor gyi
<p>185b.3</p>lha gang yang rung ba'i gzugs su gdab pa'am yang na mchod rten du byas te/ mchod rten gcig gdab pa dang / gnyis gdab pa dang / gsum gdab pa dang / brgya rtsa brgyad gdab pa man chad kyi bar du gzhung dang mthun par sngags dang phyag rgyas tshul bzhin du btab nas/ 
<p>185b.4</p>sku'am mchod rten gyi spyan sngar ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags 'bum phrag nyis brgya man chad bzlas so/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar ba la sogs mtshan ma bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste mtshan ma de dag ma mthong na/ 'bum phrag brgya stong man chad bzlas shing ji srid mtshan
<p>185b.5</p>ma dge ba dag ma byung gi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing / rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas brjod bya/ de ltar bzlas pa'i mthar mtshan gcig tu bzlas la/ rab tu bzlas na/ shi ba nges par sdig pa las grol zhing mtshan ma bzang
<p>185b.6</p>po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de yang rgyud las/ de nas thal bar gyur pa dang / /rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar bya/ /thal ba de yang rus pa'i rdul/ /sngags kyis btab pa'i dri chu dang / /ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas/ /sbyong ba'i sngags
<p>185b.7</p>kyis blo ldan gyis/ /'bum du bzlas pa rdzogs nas ni/ /ga pur dri yis bsgos pa yis/ /'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang / /gzugs su bya'am yang na ni/ /mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la/ /gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam lnga/ /yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/ /sngags
<p>186a</p>
<p>186a.1</p>dang phyag rgyas btab nas kyang / /'bum phrag gnyis kyi bar du bzlas/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam/ /yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum mam/ /dri dang bdug pa 'od kyang rung / /snang ngam yang na ngad ldang ngam/ /lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni/ /sna tshogs
<p>186a.2</p>par ni snang gyur tam/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba dang / /me tog la sogs 'bar ba dang / /dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i sgra/ /dril bu pi wang la sogs rnams/ /ci ste mtshan ma de dag ni/ /sdig can blos ni mi mthong na/ /'bum gyi phrag ni brgyad stong ngam/ /ji srid
<p>186a.3</p>mtshan ma byung bar du/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya/ /de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang / mtshan gcig mi nyal thog mar bzlas/ /de nas de yi sdig pa ni/ /dag pa nyid du nges par mthong / /zhes smos so/ /shi ba'i
<p>186a.4</p>bar du med na cho ga bya ba'i thabs kyang / de yang rgyud las/ yang na med par gyur na yang / /bzlas shing bsgom pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /ming tsam legs par bris nas ni/ /mchod rten phreng bar bya ba dang / /yang na gzugs su byas kyang rung / /sbyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur
<p>186a.5</p>ro/ /gdon mi za bar mtho ris skye/ /zhes 'byung bas/ rus pa med na yang bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du bsgoms shing bzlas brjod bya ba dang / shi ba'i ming bris pa'am/ yang na gzugs brnyan gyi nang du ming rnams kyis bsngags te/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ i tsi pa ra
<p>186a.6</p>Na ma no ma/ zhes bya ba bris nas bcug la/ bum pa dang / sngags dang / phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba dang / sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / thal ba las mchod rten mang po'am/ sku gzugs gdab pa la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i cho ga ltar byas nas/ sgrib pa
<p>186a.7</p>rnams zad nas bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mchod rten nam sku btab pa'i tsha tsha rnams lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas te/ de'i nang du bcug la/ mchod pa dag gis mchod nas/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la mchod bstod gsol/ 
<p>186b</p>
<p>186b.1</p>yon yang phul nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis che ge mo bde 'gro mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces brjod la/ de bzhin du 'gyur ba'am/ yang na tsha tsha btab pa rnams rgya mtsho chen po'am chu klung du dor na gang dag rdul des reg pa thams cad mtho ris thob cing dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis
<p>186b.2</p>che ge mo ngan song las thar bar gyur cig ces brjod na de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes gzhan las bshad do/ /gong du smos pa bzhin cho ga ma nus na thabs gzhan yang rgyud las/ thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs/ /rang gi ming smos sngags btab nas/ bzlas pa byas te song nas
<p>186b.3</p>kyang / /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i klung du dor/ /zhes 'byung bas/ thal ba'am yungs kar ram/ bye ma'am dri la shi ba'i ming dang / sarba bid la sogs pa'i ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags spel nas 'bum man chad bzlas shing btab ste chu klung chen por dor na ngan song las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /
<p>186b.4</p>gong du smos pa lta bu'i ro'i cho ga byas pa rnams kyi yon tan yang / rgyud las de ltar na ni sdig can yang / /ngan song las ni thar bar 'gyur/ /dge ba'i chos ni bskyed pa dang / /byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag /sangs rgyas 'bras bu rgyu ldan pa/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par ldan/ /
<p>186b.5</p>tshul khrims rgyu dang rab ldan pa/ /bzod pa brtson 'grus mnyam gzhag dang / /shes rab rnams kyi rgyu bsgoms pa'i/ /'jig rten bsod nams ldan ci smos/ /myur du de ni ngan song ni/ /bcom par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /ces 'byung ngo / /de yang rgyud las/ dge ba'i
<p>186b.6</p>rtsa ba ma bskyed las/ /med par lta ba gang yin dang / /byang chub lam las rnam ldog pas/ /bstan la zhe sdang gnod byed cing / /sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong la/ /pha dang ma la snying ring zhing / /byang chub sems la brten pa dang / /'dod chags bral ba bsad pa rnams/ /ci ste
<p>186b.7</p>lha rnams med gyur tam/ /sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs/ /shes rab thabs rnams med na ni/ /sdig can de dag mi thar zhes/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /zhes smos mod kyi/ de lta bu'i mi dge ba'i mtshams
<p>187a</p>
<p>187a.1</p>med pa lnga byed pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa yang rung ste/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams zad par 'gyur ro zhes lung gzhan dag las 'byung ngo / /ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyal po brtag pa yi/ /shi ba'i don du cho gar gsungs pa
<p>187a.2</p>las/ /'gro ba'i don du bdag gis nyung zhig bsdus/ /'di yis nyam thag sdug bsngal nyung bar shog /ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i thabs zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon skal bzang dga' bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhas
<p>187a.3</p>pa chen po bla ma ni na shi dang / lo tsA ba dge slong g.yung drung 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na nA ma maN+Da la bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ bcom
<p>187a.4</p>ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtso chen shAkya seng ge la/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma la ni phan gdags phyir/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams
<p>187a.5</p>las btus te/ /ngan song thams cad 'jig byed pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga de bshad bya/ /nyams dga' ba yi sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /bdag med par ni lhag mos pas/ /lkog mar pad+ma rnam par bsam/ /mdun gyi 'dab mar a dang ni/ /
<p>187a.6</p>hUM las zla ba rdo rje ni/ /rtse lnga bsams te de yang ni/ /lce de nyid la thim par bya/ /rdo rje lce ru rnam bsams pas/ /sngags zlos mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /lag pa gnyis su a las ni/ /zla ba hUM las rdo rje ni/ /rtse lnga par ni rnams bskyed de/ /kha dog dkar po bsgom par
<p>187a.7</p>bya/ /lag pa'i dbus su zhu gyur nas/ /rdo rje'i lag par rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje lag pa brtan byas nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed nas brtsams te/ /rdo rje rtse mo mthar thug pa'i/ /kun nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /mkhas pas yongs su
<p>187b</p>
<p>187b.1</p>bsam par bya/ /kun nas yongs su zlum por ni/ /ra ba dra ba byas nas kyang / /slob dpon shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /rdo rje 'og ni bcing bar bya/ /de nas de rjes nyid la ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor nam mkhar
<p>187b.2</p>bsam par bya/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang / /dri dang bshos la sogs pas mchod/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags bya zhing / /de bzhin bsod nams rjes yi rang / /lam ni yang dag bsgom bya zhing / /byang chub sems ni yongs bzung dang / /sdom pa thams cad bzung ba
<p>187b.3</p>dag /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bya/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang / /dri yis rab tu mchod bya zhing / /de bzhin sgeg mo phreng ba ma/ /glu ma gar ma la sogs brgyad/ /mchod pa nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar/ /nam mkha' yi ni phyogs nyid du/ /
<p>187b.4</p>mchod par gyur par rnam par bsam/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /srin po dang ni lto 'phye che/ /'byung po yi dgas sha za sogs/ /thams cad lhags nas mchod par bsam/ /mchod pa kun gyis rab mchod nas/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rjod byed de/ /e ma sangs
<p>187b.5</p>rgyas e sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa mchog mdzad legs/ /ngan song thams cad legs sbyangs nas/ /'gro bas byang chub thob par mdzad/ /'dod dang gzugs khams gnas pa'i lhas/ /thal mo sbyar cing rab btud de/ /'khor los sgyur la phyag byas te/ /de
<p>187b.6</p>nyid du ni mi snang gyur/ /de nas de rjes nyid la ni/ /go rims ji bzhin bsgom byas la/ /snying ga'i dbus su zla ba ste/ /de dbus dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni/ /snying ga ru ni gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kyis/ /
<p>187b.7</p>dgug gzhug bcings la dbang du bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis legs bsres te/ /dkyil 'khor gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni thams cad du/ /rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba/ /de yi dbus su rang gi ngos/ /shAkya seng ge bsgom par bya/ /de nas
<p>188a</p>
<p>188a.1</p>shAkya thub pa yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de dbus ngan song sbyong zhes pa'i/ /gsang sngags gzugs ni rnams bsams la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po rjes dran bya/ /skad cig gis ni sa bon spro/ /de 'og kun nas 'od kyis ni/ /sems can
<p>188a.2</p>thams cad snang bar byas/ /dmyal ba yi dgas byol song yang / /slar yang snang bas khyab par byas/ /de nas 'od kyi snang ba yis/ sems can thams cad ngan song las/ /sngags kyi 'od kyis bkug nas kyang / /sngags dang phyag rgyas dral bar bya/ /de la sogs pa'i sbyor
<p>188a.3</p>ba yis/ /srid gsum dri ma sbyang bar bya/ /'gro ba'i dri ma bral thob nas/ /slar yang 'od kyis snang bar byas/ /sems can thams cad bkug nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya/ /de la chu la sogs pa yis/ /dbang bskur ba ni rim bzhin sbyin/ /de ltar dbang
<p>188a.4</p>bskur tsam gyis ni/ /khams gsum pa yi sems can kun/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas mthong nas/ /mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa/ /khams gsum pa yi 'gro kun gyi/ /ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa/ /shAkya seng ge phyag
<p>188a.5</p>'tshal lo/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rang gi de nyid ston mdzad pa/ /rdo rje gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam pa'i de nyid bsgom pa yis/ /khams gsum la gnas thams cad la/ /dbang bskur rab tu stsol mdzad pa/ /
<p>188a.6</p>rin chen gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /so sor kun rtog rang bzhin can/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pas/ /sems can dbugs 'byin mdzad pa po/ /pad+ma gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can sdug bsngal bsal bya'i phyir/ /bya ba rjes grub rang bzhin can/ /phrin
<p>188a.7</p>las sna tshogs mdzad pa po/ /sna tshogs gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad pa/ /sems can kun gyis 'phags pa yi/ /bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa po/ /gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan rnams/ /sbyin
<p>188b</p>
<p>188b.1</p>pas sems can thams cad kyi/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /gtsug tor rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag /gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas/ /sems can byang chub thob mdzad pa/ /gtsug tor rnon po phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>188b.2</p>khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /gdugs dkar gyis ni rab brgyan pa'i/ /chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma lha mo bzhi po dang / /spos dang me tog mar me dang / /dri yi lha mo phyag
<p>188b.3</p>'tshal bstod/ /dad sogs ngo bo las byung ba'i/ /sgo yi dbus na gang bzhugs pa/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /sgo srung rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag na/ /khyams la sogs par bzhugs mdzad pa/ /rab dga' la sogs gnas mdzad
<p>188b.4</p>gang / /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tshangs dbang drag po zla ba sogs/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /me dang srin po rlung lha dang / /'byung po'i bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang bas/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /dkyil
<p>188b.5</p>'khor gyi ni mdun nyid du/ /bstod pa 'di yis yang dag bstod/ /rang gi lus ni gang yin pa/ /bdag nyid dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag /dang por sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin ni/ /de ltar rnam par bsgom par bya/ /de nas khams gsum ma lus pa/ /stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la/ /
<p>188b.6</p>rlung dang chu yi dbus su ni/ /gser gyi sa gzhi rnams bsams la/ /suM gyi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /ri rab chen po bsam par bya/ /rin chen sna bzhi'i rang bzhin las/ /gru bzhi shin tu rgya che ba/ /de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni/ /ngan song sbyong ba dag bsams te/ /sa bon
<p>188b.7</p>b+hUM las byung ba yi/ /gzhal yas khang brtsegs rnam par bsgom/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa yis brgyan/ /sgo yi logs bzhi thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni

<p>189a.1</p>mtshams rnams dang / /grwa yi cha ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje rin chen dag gis spras/ /dril bu dar dang ba dan sogs/ /chun 'phyang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis spras pa/ /gru bzhi par ni bsam par bya/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su ni/ /seng ge

<p>189a.3</p>ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam dag pa'i/ /shAkya'i rgyal po rjes dran bya/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /gsang sngags kyang ni gsung bar mdzad/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rim gyis rnam par dbye ba ni/ /rgya 'di chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /'khor ba
<p>189a.4</p>thams cad gcod byed yin/ /de yi dpe ni 'di lta ste/ /ji ltar pad+ma la chags pa'i/ /bum pa la sogs bsdams pa rnams/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha bye na/ /bcings pa'i sdug bsngal las thar byed/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /srid gsum 'gro bar bcings ba
<p>189a.5</p>rnams/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid shAkya yi/ /seng ges bcings pa las grol mdzad/ /de nas snying gar zla ba la/ /gnas pa'i sngags rnams brjod nas ni/ /rdo rje gtsug tor nas brtsams te/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du bskyed/ /de la sngags rnams 'di yin no/ /na mo b+ha
<p>189a.6</p>ga wa te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni/ rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shod+ha ni swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya ste/ de nas go rims ji bzhin

<p>189b</p>
<p>189b.1</p>zer slar log pa/ /snying ga ru ni zhugs par bya/ /sngags dang 'od zer 'dres pa las/ /byung ba'i sku ni spro bar bya/ /shar rtsibs pad+ma zla bar bzhugs/ /rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /thugs ka las byung bzhugs par bsam/ /

<p>189b.3</p>par bya/ /oM rat+nod+ma traM/ zhes bya bas gdon par bya'o/ /de nas lho yi rtsibs la ni/ /rin chen gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /thugs ka las ni nges ston la/ /sku mdog sngo zhing shin tu mdzes/ /mchog sbyin pa yi phyag rgyas bzhugs/ /
<p>189b.4</p>khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i/ /sems can kun la dbang bskur mdzad/ /oM pad+mot+ta hrIH/ zhes bya bas gdon par bya'o/ /de nas nub kyi rtsibs la ni/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sa bon las ni byung ba'i sku/ /pad+ma gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /thugs ka
<p>189b.5</p>las ni phyung ste bzhugs/ /sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad/ /sku mdog dmar zhing 'od 'bar ba/ /bsam gtan gyi ni phyag rgyas bzhugs/ /oM bi shwot+ta ma aH/ zhes bya bas gdon par bya'o/ /de nas byang gi rtsibs la ni/ /pad+ma la gnas zla dbus su/ /thugs
<p>189b.6</p>ka las ni yang dag ston/ /sna tshogs gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /sna tshogs pa yi 'od ldan pa/ /'di yi phyag rgya mi 'jigs sbyin/ /'di ni sna tshogs las mdzad de/ /'khor ba las ni sems can sgrol/ /oM gyi sa bon las byung ba/ /gtsug tor gzi
<p>189b.7</p>brjid de bzhin gshegs/ /thugs ka las byung me mtshams su/ /pad gnas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /g.yas pa la ni nyi ma bsnams/ /phyag g.yon dkur ni brten te bzhugs/ /sku mdog dkar dmar 'od zer gyis/ /khams gsum par ni snang bar mdzad/ /hUM gi sa

<p>190a.4</p>mtshan gdugs bsnams pa'o/ /de dag thams cad sna tshogs pa'i/ /pad gnas zla dkyil dag tu bzhugs/ /hUM traM hri a yi sngags kyi ni/ /sgeg mo la sogs lha mo bzhi/ /phyung ste mtshams kyi cha yi ni/ /pad gnas zla dkyil dag tu dgod/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan

<p>190a.6</p>shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga nas mung+ga te ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ sngags 'dis byams pa la sogs pa/ /bcu drug po ni phyung nas su/ /shar gyi logs nas brtsams nas su/ /byang gi sgo yi bar du dgod/ /shar sgo yi ni logs gnyis su/ /byams pa la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /pad
<p>190a.7</p>gnas zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /byams pa mdog sems 'od bzang pa/ /g.yas na klu shing me tog bsnams/ /g.yon na spyi blugs legs par 'dzin/ /byang sems rnam dag 'khrungs las byung / /gnyis pa mthong ba don yod ni/ /

<p>190b.1</p>pad+ma la gnas zla ba bzhugs/ /sku mdog yongs su ser ba nyid/ /g.yas na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /pad+ma'i spyan dang yang dag ldan/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o/ /gsum pa khyab bdag ngan song sbyong / /pad gnas zla ba nyid la bzhugs/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od

<p>190b.4</p>dpa'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /dang po spos kyi glang po ste/ /sku mdog dkar ljang mdzes par snang / /'di yi phyag rgya g.yas kyi ni/ /phyag na dri ni bsnams par mdzad/ /phyag g.yon dkur ni brten nas su/ /sems can thams cad rab grol mdzad/ /byang chub sems

<p>191a.1</p>'khor la/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /dang po'i mtshan ni 'od dpag med/ /de yis 'od kyi rnam par mdzes/ /zla ba'i mdog can shin tu dkar/ /phyag g.yas na ni bdud rtsi yis/ /bum pa yang dag 'dzin par mdzad/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur

<p>191b</p>
<p>191b.1</p>su/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /dzaHyi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /shar du rdo rje lcags kyu ni/ /kun du zla ba ltar dkar ba/ /phyag g.yas kyis ni lcags kyu bsnams/ /hUM gi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ste/ /sku mdog ser zhing 'od 'bar
<p>191b.2</p>ba/ /phyag na zhags pa yang dag bsnams/ /baM gyi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ni/ /sku mdog rnam par dmar ba ste/ /phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams pa yin/ /hoHyi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ni/ /sna tshogs mdog can 'od po che/ /
<p>191b.3</p>phyag na dril bu legs par bsnams/ /sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni/ /sgo bzhi dag tu phyung nas kyang / /pad+ma la gnas zla dbus su/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /de ltar rnam par bsgom pa yis/ /ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyang / /'di ni dkyil 'khor
