<p>191b.6</p>shud+d+ha bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ 'di dag kun gyi sngar gyi ni/ /mdzad pa la ni sngags 'di brjod/ /shAkya seng ge'i dam tshig gis/ /phyag rgya dag ni bshad par bya/ /dbus su ting 'dzin mchog gis ni/ /bzhugs pa dam tshig phyag rgyar bshad/ /rdo rje
<p>191b.7</p>bcing ba dam byas te/ /gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar/ /rdo rje phyag rgya dam byas pa/ /rdo rje gtsug tor phyag rgya'o/ /gung mo de nyid rin chen dang / /gung mo pad+ma lta bu dang / /gung mo de nyid rdo rje las/ /sor mo lhag ma 'bar byas nyid/ /sor mo de nyid 'bar ba la/ /gtsug tor gzi
<p>192a</p>
<p>192a.1</p>brjid phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las ni srin lag dang / /mthe'u chung gnyis ni mnyam ste bsgrengs/ /de nyid mdun du 'bebs pa dang / /de nyid mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /rdo rje dra ba'i tshul du bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya'i sbyor ba la/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje snying gar gzhag /lkog
<p>192a.2</p>mar pad+ma'i zla dbus su/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rnam par bsgom/ /sngar bshad 'byin pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ /bsams nas las kyi phyag rgya bca'/ /ji skad bshad pa'i chos 'khor lo/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya yin/ /sa gnon
<p>192a.3</p>mchog sbyin ting 'dzin dang / /mi 'jigs sbyin sogs rim bzhin sbyar/ /ting 'dzin mchog tu gnas pa ni/ /gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yas pa'i lag ngar dbyug par bsgreng / /ral gri 'phyar dang g.yon sdigs mdzub/ /g.yas pa bteg ste brkyang bar bya/ /lag pa gnyis ka
<p>192a.4</p>bsdus nas ni/ /gdugs dang 'dra bar gzhag par bya/ /sngar ni ji skad bshad pa yis/ /phyag rgya gang dang gang bzhugs pa'i/ /thugs kar rdo rje bsgoms nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen por bsgom par bya/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa yi/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni bcing bar bya/ /sgeg mo la sogs
<p>192a.5</p>rnam brgyad dang / /sgo rnams bsrung ba bzhi po ni/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las mthun pas na/ /de dag khyad par ma bshad do/ /ji skad bsrung bzhin phyag rgya che/ /mkhas pa yis ni bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /phan tshun mnyam par gshibs nas ni/ /mdzub mo dang ni gung mo
<p>192a.6</p>dgug /me tog tshul bzhag byams pa'i rgya/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten la/ /g.yas pa dpung ba'i thad kar ni/ /mdzub mo gung mo brkyang nas mig /'dra bzhag mthong ba don yod rgya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /sor mo gnyis ka brkyang nas ni/ /lcags kyu 'dra bar
<p>192a.7</p>legs bzhag pa/ /ngan song thams cad sbyong ba yin/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa/ /g.yas pa dbyug pa lta bu ni/ /gyen du bsgrengs nas 'jog byed pa/ /mya ngan mun pa kun 'joms pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur lte bar gzhag /lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i/ /sna yi tshul du gzhag pa ni/ /
<p>192b</p>
<p>192b.1</p>spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa/ /g.yas pa ral gri thogs pa yis/ /tshul du 'jog par byed pa ni/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa khu tshur snying gar gzhag /g.yas pa steng skor mkha' mdzod kyi'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /
<p>192b.2</p>rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa lta bu ni/ /g.yon logs su ni 'dzin byed pa/ /ye shes tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bum 'dzin ltar/ /'jog pa 'od dpag med kyi'o/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur brla steng gzhag /g.yas pa'i khu tshur snying gar ni/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung brkyang byas la/ /

<p>193a</p>
<p>193a.1</p>su byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM a pa na ya hUM/ sdig pa thams cad dgug pa'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bita sarba pA paM sho d+ha ni hUM swA hA/ sdig pa thams cad sbyong ba'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bita tra tha/ ngan song thams cad dral ba'i sngags so/ /oM sarba
<p>193a.2</p>bita sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni mu ne hUM phaT/ shAkya thub pa'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid hUM hUM/ rdo rje gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba bita trAM trAM/ rin chen gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba bid hrIHhrIH/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /oM sarba bid aHaH/ sna tshogs gtsug tor

<p>193a.4</p>pa dA na pA ra mi tA pU dze hUM/ sgeg mo'i'o/ /oM sarba bid ma hA badzrod b+ha ba shI la pA ra mi tA pU dze trAM/ phreng ba ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid ma hA badzrod b+ha ba k+ShAn+ti pa ra mi ta pU dze hrIH/ glu mkhan ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bid ma hA badzrod b+ha ba bIr+ya pA ra mi tA pU dze aH/ gar mkhan ma'i
<p>193a.5</p>sngags so/ /oM sarba bita sarba a pa ya gan+d+ha na d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hu pa ya d+h+yA na pA ra mi tA pU dze hUM hUM phaT/ bdug pa ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bita sarba du rga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni kle sha ts+tshe da na puSh+pa bi lo ki ni pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dze trI hUM phaT/ me tog ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bita sarba a pa ya
<p>193a.6</p>bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri pra Ni d+ha na pA ra mi tA pU dze hrI hUM phaT/ mar me'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bita sarba a pa ya gan+d+ha bi nA sha ni badzra gan+d+ha u pa ya bA ra mi tA pU dze aHhUM phaT/ byug pa ma'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bita sarba na ra ka ga te A kaR+Sha Ni hUM dzaHphaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags
<p>193a.7</p>so/ /oM sarba bita sarba na ra ka ud+ha ra Ni hUM hUM phaT/ rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bita sarba a pa ya b+ha na d+ha bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags so/ /oM sarba bita sarba a pa ya ga ti ga ha na bi sho d+ha ni hUM hoHphaT/ rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags so/ /oM mai tri ha
<p>193b</p>
<p>193b.1</p>ra NA ya swA hA/ byams pa'i sngags so/ /oM mo g+he a mo g+ha dan+sha hUM/ mthong ba don yod kyi'o/ /oM sarba a pa ya dza ha sarba/ a pa ya bi sho d+ha ni hUM/ ngan song kun 'dren gyi'o/ /oM sarba sho ka ta mo ni rga te na ma ti hUM/ mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo
<p>193b.2</p>gros kyi'o/ /oM gan+d+ha ha ti ni hUM/ spos kyi glang po'i'o/ /oM shu raM ga me hUM/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i'o/ /oM ga gA ne ga gA na lo tsa ne hUM/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi'o/ /oM dz+nyA na ke tu dz+nyA na bita hUM/ ye shes tog gi'o/ /oM ma ti pra b+ha a mi ta ba ta hUM/ 'od dpag med kyi'o/ /oM tsan+d+re
<p>193b.3</p>tsan+d+re bya ba lo gi te hUM swA hA/ zla 'od kyi'o/ /oM dra ba ti b+ha dra pA le hUM/ bzang skyong gi'o/ /oM dzA la ne ma hA dza la ne hUM/ dra ba can gyi 'od kyi'o/ /oM badzra gar+b+he hUM/ rdo rje snying po'i'o/ /oM a k+Sha ya phu phu a k+Sha ya karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha Na swA hA/ blo gros mi zad pa'o/ /oM pra
<p>193b.4</p>ti b+ha na pra ti b+ha ne kU Te swA hA/ spobs pa brtsegs pa'i'o/ /oM sa man+ta b+ha dre hUM/ kun du bzang po'i'o/ /bskal ba bzang po'i sngags 'di dag /go rims ji bzhin brjod par bya/ /cho ga 'di dag nyid kyi ni/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /'bad pas ting 'dzin gsum ldan
<p>193b.5</p>pa'i/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/ /sgo ni rnam par dbye bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rab brkyang nas/ /mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sprel/ /sgo dbye ba yi phyag rgya yin/ /oM sarba bid badzrod g+ha Ta ya hUM/ sgo
<p>193b.6</p>dbye ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgya bcings la/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par bya/ /oM sarba bid badzra tsakra hUM/ lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rje bcings/ /rdo rje se gol bcas pa yis/ /shAkya'i rgyal po sbyor bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /

<p>194a.1</p>pas/ /'khor lo'i tshogs ni 'khor bcas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na/ /gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bgegs bsal la/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni bcing bar bya/ /'bras yos sogs dang spos chab kyi/ /mchod yon
<p>194a.2</p>dang ni zhabs bsil dbul/ /de nas mchod pa'i yan lag kun/ /spos chab kyis ni bsang btor bya/ /sngar bshad pa yi mchod pa ni/ /sna tshogs pa yis yang dag mchod/ /mchod mthar mnyam med la sogs pa'i/ /bstod pa rnams kyis legs par bstod/ /zla
<p>194a.3</p>ba drug gam lo gcig par/ /de ltar rnam par bsgoms pa yis/ /lha yi snang ba gsal nas ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas de'i sa'i cha gsungs pa ni/ lha khang grong khyer skyed tshal gyis/ /byang shar phyogs ni ji lta
<p>194a.4</p>ba'i/ /sa yi cha ni yongs gzung la/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyang bar bya/ /yang na sngar ni brtags zin pa'i/ /gnas ni sbyang ba bya mi dgos/ /pus mo rked pa lte ba'am/ /lkog ma nub tsam sa brkos la/ /legs par yongs su brtags nas ni/ /thal ba dang ni sol ba bsal/ /

<p>194a.7</p>tsam ni byug pa yis/ /sa yi cha ni yid 'ong bar/ /slar yang zhi ba'i las brtsam mo/ /kun nas yongs su zlum por ni/ /ba yi lci bas legs byugs par/ /dbus nyid du ni bum pa dag /cho ga bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /me yi las ni bshad pa yis/ /zhi ba la sogs las

<p>194b.1</p>rim bzhin/ /thang shing las ni yam shing dag /sor ni bcu gnyis byed du gzhug /til nag po dang nas thug dang / /'bras chan la sogs mar dag byugs/ /sa bdag gnas kyi bdag po dag /slob ma 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /zhi sogs las kyi rim bzhin du/ /sbyin

<p>194b.5</p>bas gdong yang brgyan/ /bgegs kun bskrad pa rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin gyur pa'i/ /snying ga las spros khro tshogs kyis/ /bltas pa tsam gyis de mod la/ /bgegs rnams kun nas tshar gcod pa/ /ma dang Ta las byung ba yi/ /

<p>195a</p>
<p>195a.1</p>de nas phur bu btab nas ni/ /'og gi bgegs rnams zlog par byed/ /oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ /ces bya ba ni phur bu la bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TAM phaT/ kI li kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ badzra kI la ya
<p>195a.2</p>badzra d+ha rdo A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ zhes bya ba ni brdung ba'i sngags so/ /de nas thig gdab brtsam byas te/ /cho ga bzhin du rab tu brtags/ /'khor los sgyur bas btang nas ni/ /gtsug tor bzhi la bskul bar bya/ /de nas bskul ba tsam gyis ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba mchod par bya/ /

<p>195a.6</p>dkyil 'khor dang ni rjes mthun par/ /mkhas pas nges par brtag par bya/ /ser po la sogs tshon sna bzhir/ /go rims bzhin du kha dog sgyur/ /khru brgyad pa la sor gcig tshad/ /gzhan yang khru tshad dag gis bskyed/ /de ltar kun la shes pa ni/ /gnas ni ji bzhin
<p>195a.7</p>brtag par bya/ /slar yang bzlas brjod byas nas ni/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags nyid du/ /oM badzra sU tra A kaR+Sha ya maN+Da la hUM/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/ /bden bral mtshams su gnas nas ni/ /sgrub pa'i grogs kyis lag tu gtad/ /oM badzra sU tra

<p>195b.1</p>A kaR+Sha ya mA ti kra ma hUM dzaHdzaH/ slob dpon shar du kha bltas la/ /grogs po nub tu blta bar bya/ /slob dpon byang du kha bltas la/ /grogs po lho ru blta bar ya/ /me dang byung por kha bltas te/ /shar gyi char ni thig gdab bya/ /rlung dang srin po'i phyogs gnas te/ /nub

<p>195b.3</p>yis/ /phyogs bzhir thig ni gdab par bya/ /gzhan du byas na slob dpon dang / /grogs kyi nyes pa thob par 'gyur/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste/ /sgo khyud kyang ni sgo yi tshad/ /khyams dang 'dra ba cha yi tshad/ /de phyed tshon sna lnga yis/ /rta babs kyis ni tshon gyis/ /

<p>195b.7</p>de bzhin me tog spos me sogs/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bri/ /sgo ni srung ba bzhi po dag /sgo yi dbus su bri bar bya/ /byams pa la sogs bcu drug po/ /shar sogs khyams su gnas par bya/ /sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag tu/ /glang chen dang ni seng ge bri/ /
<p>196a</p>
<p>196a.1</p>rta babs kyi ni ngos gnyis su/ /bkra shis brgyad po yang dag bri/ /shar du dpal be'u 'khor lo bri/ /lho ru pad+ma rgyal mtshan te/ /nub tu gdugs dang bum pa gnyis/ /byang du dung dang nya bri'o/ /'khor yug la ni 'jig rten skyong / /brgyad la sogs pa bri

<p>196a.7</p>la yang dag gnas/ /ba dan rgyal mtshan thogs pa bri/ /byang du gnod sbyin bdag po ni/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra la/ /g.yon na rin chen snod 'chang zhing / /g.yas na rin chen snye ma 'dzin/ /rta dkar gyi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /chung ma dang ni bcas par bri/ /'byung
<p>196b</p>
<p>196b.1</p>po'i bdag po thal mdog can/ /g.yas na rtse gsum a mra thogs/ /g.yon ni spyi blugs ru drAk+Sha/ /khyu mchog stan la yang dag gnas/ /sa yi lha mo gser mdog can/ /pad+ma'i stan la gnas pa la/ /mdun du lag pa gnyis kyi ni/ /bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin par
<p>196b.2</p>byed/ /g.yas phyogs su ni lha ma yin/ /kha dog dmar zhing nag pa la/ /go cha gyon cing ral gri 'dzin/ /nang tshangs 'jam la bri bar bya/ /g.yon phyogs su ni klu bri ba/ /mdog dkar chung mar bcas pa la/ /sbrul gyi gdengs kar bcas pa bri/ /lag na rin
<p>196b.3</p>chen snod thogs pa/ /mchog sbyin gser gyi mdog can la/ /glegs bam dang ni phreng ba thogs/ /g.yon pa mchog sbyin spyi blugs ni/ /'dzin pa nyid du yang dag bri/ /ngang pa nyid du bris nas kyang / /de yis stan du rnam par brtag /g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs su
<p>196b.4</p>ni/ /nyi ma zla ba bri bya ste/ /dbyibs mdog stan dang mtshan ma ni/ /ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol sa yi char/ /dmyal ba brgyad po bri bya ste/ /mnar med pa la sogs pa ni/ /me yi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /bden bral gyi ni phyogs nyid du/ /yi

<p>196b.7</p>dkyil 'khor ba ni thams cad kyang / /lan ni bdun bdun bzlas par bya/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /bza' dang bca' bas rim bzhin mchod/ /mchod pa rnam pa nyi shu yi/ /mchod pa kun du bya ba yin/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang ldan pa'i/ /bum pa gang ba gzhag par bya/ /
<p>197a</p>
<p>197a.1</p>dkyil 'khor pa yi sngags rnams ni/ /bum pa la ni bzlas par bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gsang sngags ni/ /ci 'dod pa yi bzlas pa bya/ /de nas hUM ni bzhi pa yis/ /sngags shes pas ni phur bu dbyung / /de nas phur bu'i khung bu ni/ /tshon sna lnga yis dgang bar bya/ /

<p>197a.3</p>shar gyi phyogs ni dkar po ste/ /lhor ni sngon po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi char ni dmar po ste/ /byang du ljang gu yin par bshad/ /bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan pas/ /'bad de de ltar bri bar bya/ /de nas sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor steng du 'deg par bya/ /
<p>197a.4</p>rdo rje khu tshur gnyis sor mo/ /bkan nas gyen du 'deg par bya/ /oM sarba bid ut+tiSh+Tha badzra hUM/ dkyil 'khor 'deg pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas mchod pa lnga yis ni/ /bum pa sta gon gnas bya ste/ /gsus che kha dog mi
<p>197a.5</p>gnag la/ /mgrin pa mtho zhing kha gyed pa/ /spos chu yis ni bkang ba la/ /ldum bcas lcug mas kha rgyan bya/ /'bru sman rin chen lnga rnams dang / /snying po lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /ras mchog me tog phreng gi mgul/ /bcings pa ku sha gsar pa gzhag /me tog
<p>197a.6</p>phreng ba mdzes pa yi/ /me tog phreng bas brgyan par bya/ /rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan byas la/ /ba dan la yang bsgreng bar bya/ /cho ga rim pa bzhin byas la/ /slob dpon gyis ni gzhag par bya/ /nas dang 'bras yos til dang ni/ /tsan+dan dkar po dang ldan zhing / /me tog
<p>197a.7</p>kun dang 'o mar bcas/ /mchod yon snod du gzhag par bya/ /gser gyi snod du brtags pa yi/ /lha bshos snod ni g.yas su gzhag /spos kyi bdug spos thul ba dang / /sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo / /dzaHhUM baM hoH'i sngags dang ni/ /de nyid kyi ni phyag rgya bya/ /de nas
<p>197b</p>
<p>197b.1</p>sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ /ldan pa'i mchod yon dbul bar bya/ /sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang bas/ /lag pa g.yas pa der gtugs la/ /rang rang gis ni gsang sngags rnams/ /lan ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla/ /bum pa sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //dkyil 'khor gyi
<p>197b.2</p>ni rab gnas pa/ /mar gyi ngo la brtag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni shar phyogs su/ /mchod pa lnga dang ldan par bya/ /khru gang yang na khru do ni/ /thab khung yongs su brtag par bya/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar/ /kha khyer la sogs mdzes par bya/ /phyag mtshan gyi
<p>197b.3</p>ni kha dog sogs/ /mkhas pa yis ni nges par bzung / /sngar ni ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /rnal 'byor gsum ni nges par bsgom/ /de nas dkyil 'khor pa rnams la/ /phyir zlog khrus ni so sor bya/ /'o ma can gyi yam shing la/ /gtsub shing las ni me sbar te/ /me yi lha ni spyan drangs te/ /
<p>197b.4</p>sngar bshad rdzas ni rim bzhin dbul/ /de nas sngar bshad cho ga yis/ /mchod yon bsang gtor snod gnyis gzhag /chu de nyid kyis bsang gtor bya/ /me ni 'bar ba dag la bstim/ /de nas 'khor lo'i rgya bcings la/ /mdun du gzhug par bsam par bya/ /de nas me yi
<p>197b.5</p>dbus su ni/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnam bsam par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mdzub mo mthe chung mdud pa ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes grags te/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /sngags ni oM sarba bid badzra tsakra sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bsdu ba yis/ /
<p>197b.6</p>rdo rje se gol brdab par bya/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ de nas bil ba su mu kha/ /nA ga ge sar pri yang ku/ /til nag dang ni nas thug dang / /'bras chan zho dang bcas pa dang / /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sbrang rtsi mar dang ldan pa rnams/ gtsug tor dgu la rang sngags kyis/ /
<p>197b.7</p>brgya rtsa brgyad ni dbul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor pa yi lhag ma ni/ /so sor sreg blugs bdun bdun dbul/ /sgeg mo la sogs rnam brgyad dang / /de bzhin mchod pa nyi shu mchod/ /dkyil 'khor pa yi sngags shes pas/ /bzlas brjod dag kyang ci nus bya/ /sa
<p>198a</p>
<p>198a.1</p>bdag slob ma zhi don du/ /mthar ni dgang blugs dbul bar bya/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bas/ /ci 'dod pa yi smon lam gdab/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// //lho sgo yi ni sa yi char/ /khru gang ba la gru bzhi pa/ /stegs bu legs

<p>198a.4</p>gyis ni bya ba yin/ /yungs kar me tog dang ldan pa/ /gsang sngags zlos shing brdeg par bya/ /rus pa'am gos sam ming la ni/ /rdo rje chu yis bkru bar bya/ /sdig pa bkru ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /srid gsum dri ma bkru bar bya/ /de la brdeg pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM
<p>198a.5</p>sarba pA paM da ha na badzra hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pa ya/ bi sho d+ha ni badzra hUM phaT/ oM sarba karma A wa ra Ni ni b+haSh+mi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM bruM bi nA sha ya A wa ra Ni badzra hUM phaT/ oM druM bi sho d+ha ya A wa ra NI ni hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la d+ha ka d+ha ka ha na ha na A wa ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM sruM sa ra sa ra

<p>198a.7</p>sarba na ra ga te he tun hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba tiR+ya g+ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ sngags 'dis yang dag brdeg na ni/ /ngan song thams cad rnam par 'jig /bkru ba yi ni sngags gsungs pa/ /na mo b+ha ga wa ti sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya/ 
<p>198b</p>
<p>198b.1</p>ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya k+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A wa ra NA bi shud+d+he swA hA/ 'gro ba yang dag par lam bstan pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni/ oM rat+ne rat+ne ma hA rat+ne/ rat+na saM b+hA ba rat+na ki ra Ne/ rat+na mA la
<p>198b.2</p>ba shud+d+he shud+d+ho ya sarba pA paM hUM/ lam sbyangs pa'i sngags gsungs pa ni/ oM pad+me pad+me ma hA pad+me/ pad+mod b+ha ba su kha ba ti gats+tshan+tu swA hA/ slar yang bkra shis tshigs bcad kyis/ /dus gsum du ni khrus bya'o/ /de nas me tog spos la sogs/ /thams cad kyang ni dbul
<p>198b.3</p>bar bya/ /lam sbyangs pa yi sngags kyis ni/ /me tog char ni dbab par bya/ /de ltar zhag ni gnyis gsum nas/ /zhag brgyad pa yi bar du bya/ /sa bzung nyi ma nas brtsams te/ slob ma gzhug pa'i bar du bya/ /rab tu gnas pa'i dus su ni/ /bum pa la sogs

<p>198b.6</p>tsam gyis/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /'jug pa dang ni mthong ba yi/ /de yi bsod nams tshad med pas/ /dmyal ba yi dgas byol song gi / 'gro ba kun las de zlog nas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum yang na ni/ /dga' ldan gnas su yang dag skye/ /lho
<p>198b.7</p>phyogs kyi sgor bya ba'i cho ga'o// //de nas sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor la/ /mchod pa byas nas rdzogs par bya/ /rang gi bskyed pa snying gar bsdu/ /spyan drangs lha ni gshegs su gsol/ /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzod/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas
<p>199a</p>
<p>199a.1</p>kyang / /slar yang sems can don la gshegs/ /zhes brjod se gol lan gsum brdeg /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twA da muH/ zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bsdus nas su/ /sa tshon chu bo chen por bskyal/ /zhal bsro khung bu dgang ba dang / /

<p>199a.3</p>ston te/ /sa bdag slob ma phyogs skyong rnams/ /zhi bar bya ba'i don du yang / /gong du gsungs pa'i sreg rdzas kyis/ /slob ma'i lag tu bzung nas su/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba'o/ /sems can don sogs bya ba la/ /grogs por gyur phyir lha rnams la/ /gsol
<p>199a.4</p>ba btab nas dge rtsa ni/ /yongs su bsngos nas rdzogs par bya/ /dpal ldan ngan song sbyong ba yi/ /cho ga shAkya mgon gyis gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ma lus pa/ /yongs su nyams par gyur par mthong / /bla ma rdo rje can drin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga sbyar ba las/ /
<p>199a.5</p>bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa/ /des ni sems can ma lus kun/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mnga' brnyes nas/ /sangs rgyas dang ni 'dra bar shog /ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
<p>199a.6</p>rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAR+ya bud+d+ha shrI shAn+ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni maN+Da la bi d+hi kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ ngan song thams cad

<p>199b</p>
<p>199b.1</p>dag gi cho ga dang / /dbang thob dngos grub sgrub pa ni/ /ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyud dag las/ /sangs rgyas mtshan thob bdag gis bshad/ /thun mong khyad par gnas nyid du/ /gdan bde ba la bdag gnas nas/ /lag pa rdo rje byin brlab ste/ /rdo rje'i lce dang bdag med sems/ /
<p>199b.2</p>oM badzra hUM/ oM badzra dzi hA/ oM badzra tsit+ta a/ de nas me ltar 'bar ba bskyed/ /de la byin gyis brlab pa dang / /spyi nas dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /cho ga bsgo bar bya ba'o/ /oM grih+na badzra sa ma ya hUM baM/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM TuM/ de nas rdo rje tho ba
<p>199b.3</p>dang / /khro bo rdo rje me dang ni/ rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya sngags/ /glo bur bgegs ni bsal bar bya/ /oM badzra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ oM badzra ne tri ban+d+ha sarba big+h+nan/ rang bzhin sgeg ni khro brgyad cing / /rdo rje'i can gyi 'og
<p>199b.4</p>tu bcings/ /oM badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarbaM swA hA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed gnod sbyin gnyis/ /steng du rdo rje'i gur du byas/ /oM hU lu hU lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ shar du rdo rje gtsug tor dang / /rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /oM hUM druM ban+d+ha haM hUM/ oM badzra pA sha
<p>199b.5</p>hrIH/ /rdo rje ba dan nub bcings te/ /phyag rgya mdzub mo mthe chung bsgreng / /oM badzra pa taM ke ni traT/ rdo rje dus mtshan byang bcings pa/ /gnod sbyin phyag rgya kha la gzhag /hri badzra ka li ru Ta ma Ta/ rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcings/ /rdo rje khu tshur ri bo 'degs/ /oM badzra shi kha ru
<p>199b.6</p>Ta ma Ta/ khro bo gsum gyi ra ba ni/ /rdo rje las ni rgya gram ste/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad sngon po la/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcing ba'o/ /oM badzra karma hUM/ badzra ban+d+ha baM/ dang por mchod pa bsham par bya/ /de nas gnyis pas bsang ba dang / /gsum pas gzi byin bskyed pa dang / /bzhi
<p>199b.7</p>pas lha ru bskyed pa dang / /lnga pas mang por sprul pa dang / /drug pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i sa gzhi la/ /tshogs bsags dmigs pa'i yul can sprul/ /mchod bsham bdun po bya ba dang / /sems ni rab tu bskyed pa dang / /sdom pa bzung nas
<p>200a</p>
<p>200a.1</p>lus dbul bya/ /gzhan gyi don du tshogs bsags mchod/ /e ma ho sangs rgyas e sangs rgyas/ /e ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa lags/ /gang phyir ngan song bdag cag sbyangs/ /byang chub spyod pa nyid la gzhag /bstod nas lha rnams phyag byas so/ /lag

<p>200a.5</p>sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/ /chos dang 'dra ba'i skyob pa med/ /dge 'dun 'dra ba'i zhing med par/ /gsang sngags 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med/ /shAkya seng ge rtsar gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma la/ /gzi brjid rgyal mtshan rnon pa gdugs/ /sgeg mo phreng ba glu gar dang / /
<p>200a.6</p>spos dang me tog mar me dri/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog sdom/ /rab dga' sa bcu'i sems dpa' ni/ /skal bzangs bcu drug khyams na gnas/ /tshangs pa drag po gnod sbyin klu/ /me dang srin po klu dbang bcas/ /nyi zla sa bdag tshogs ldan pa/ /ngan song sbyong mdzad
<p>200a.7</p>khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mchod nas rdo rje dril ldan pas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun nyid bstod/ /rang lus dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /lus la lha yi dkyil 'khor gnas/ /oM sarba bid a d+hiSh+ThA na dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ gcig tu bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor de/ /thabs kyi ngan song
<p>200b</p>
<p>200b.1</p>sbyong bar bshad/ /phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga bdun/ /rim pa bzhin du bskyed par bya/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngang las ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor chu dang ni/ /sa gzhi rgya mtsho rin chen ri/ /bum pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /gru bzhi rta babs rgyan rnams rdzogs/ /cho 'phrul bzhi
<p>200b.2</p>las byung ba'i tshul/ /shAkya'i rgyal pos 'khor ba sgrol/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra hUM phaT/ pad+ma'i bung ba bzhin grol mdzad/ /rang gi sngags sogs thugs la 'khor/ /oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ thugs ka'i zla ba lnga dang bcas/ /de nas 'khor rnams
<p>200b.3</p>'byung bar byed/ /rdo rje'i gtsug tor sa gnon dkar/ /spro bsdu snying ga'i sngags las byung / /oM sarba a pa ya bi sho d+ha ne badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra hUM phaT/ rin chen gtsug tor mchod sbyin sngo/ /sems can ma lus dbang bskur byed/ /oM rat+not+ta ma trAM/ oM sarba karma A ba
<p>200b.4</p>ra NA ni b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor mnyam gzhag dmar/ /sems can kun la mdzes ston mdzad/ /oM pad+mo t+ta ma hrIH/ oM bruM bi nA sha ya A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ las kyi gtsug tor mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sna tshogs mdog can khong du 'bar/ /oM bi shwat+ta ma aH/ oM
<p>200b.5</p>druM bi sho d+ha ya A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ gtsug tor gzi brjid dkar dmar mdog /nyi ma phyag rnams dku la brten/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la d+ha ka d+ha ka ha na ha na A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ gtsug tor rgyal mtshan dmar zhing gnag /yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /oM hUM phaT sarba
<p>200b.6</p>A ba ra Na ni s+pho Ta yaM hUM phaT/ gtsug tor rnon po mkha' ltar sngo/ /g.yas pa ral gri glegs bam g.yon/ /oM ha ra ha ra sarba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar phyag na gdugs/ /sku yi mdog ni dkar zhing 'bar/ /oM sruM sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra a ba ra Na ni hUM
<p>200b.7</p>phaT/ de nas de dag yo byad bshad/ /bdug spos ma dang me tog ma/ /mar me ma dang dri chab ma/ /oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hu pa ya raM hUM phaT/ oM sarba durga ti bi sho d+ha ni puSh+pa bi lo ki ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya
<p>201a</p>
<p>201a.1</p>bi sho d+ha ni gan+d+ha hUM phaT/ lcags kyu shar la zhags pa lho/ /lcags sgrog nub ste dril bu byang / /oM sarba na ra ka ga ti A kaR+Sha Ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba na ra ka ut+ta ra ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya ban+d+ha mo tsa ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pa ya ga ti ga ha ni hUM phaT/ lha
<p>201a.2</p>mo bzhi dang byang chub sems/ /bkra shis la sogs rgyas bsdus sbyar/ /oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te ma hA nA ya pa ri ba ri swA hA/ de nas byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ /gtso bo dang ni 'khor la bya/ /oM bita sarba A ba ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM traT sarba a ba ra Na ni
<p>201a.3</p>hUM phaT/ oM bi Ta bi Ta pa ya da du na ni hUM phaT/ de nas ngan song sbyang byas nas/ /oM da ha da ha sarba ra na ka ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba tir+ya ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba pre ta ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ bsgom pa sku yi phyag rgya che/ /thugs ka'i rdo rje las kyi rgya/ /
<p>201a.4</p>bcing ba dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ /bzlas pa mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A wa ra Na bi shud+d+ha ne swA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur
<p>201a.5</p>mdzub mo brkyang / /mthe'u chung sprel nas sgo dbye bya/ /oM sarba bid badzrod g+ha ta ye hUM/ rdo rje 'khor lo phyag rgya yis/ /bzhugs pa'i rten yang khyad par bya/ /oM sarba bid oM badzra tsakra hUM/ se gol brdabs nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /byon par 'gyur te gzhan ci smos/ /oM
<p>201a.6</p>sarba bita sa ma ya dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoH/ bstod nas bgegs bskrad bsrung ba dang / /sgo bcad go bgo mchod pa ni/ /las brgyad rab tu bya ba yin/ /de nas bsgom par bya ba yang / /zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong bsgom/ /de nas ldang bar bya ba ni/ /thun bzhir byas te
<p>201a.7</p>rab tu bya/ /zla drug gam ni lha yi gnas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /dang po sa ni btsal bar bya/ /byin chen bkra shis mtshan ldan 'thad/ /sa gnang blang dang mi gnang la/ /rin bcal bden pas bsgo bar bya/ /spyi dang dmigs kyis blang bar bya/ /sa
<p>201b</p>
<p>201b.1</p>yi lha mo sbran par bya/ /sngon 'byung dang ni de rjes 'jug /brtag pa ngan dor bzang la blang / /sa yi pra brtag ro rnams bsal/ /byin gyis brlabs shing dbang du bya/ /sbyang bar bya zhing gter sogs gzhug /sa bzhi gzung bar bya ba ni/ /dngos grub rang gis gzung bar bya/ /
<p>201b.2</p>gtsug tor lha mo bkra shis sems/ /sgo ba rnams la sta gon zhus/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs bsham/ /slob ma phyi nang khrus byas te/ /ku shas gtsang zhing rmi sta gon/ /srung skud bgegs bskrad dngos grub chags/ /tshem shing ngag dag dngos grub dag /rnon po bsrung ba
<p>201b.3</p>bzhad sogs pas/ /byin rlabs zab mos dbugs phyung nyal/ /gser dngul bum pa gas chag med/ /tshad dang mtshan ldan rdzas kyis dgang / /mgul chings kha rgyan gzungs thag bcas/ /phyag rgyas mtshan nas spyan drangs bsgrub/ /rtogs rig tshad med srad bu'i
<p>201b.4</p>thig /ras bral gtsang ma bu mos bkal/ /bsangs nas byin brlabs slob dpon gyis/ /ye shes dam tshig thig rnams gdab/ /rgyud las byung ba'i tshon rnams la/ /byin rlabs sgrub pa smin pa yis/ /thig gdab nas ni phyag rgyas bteg /dam tshig ldan pas
<p>201b.5</p>legs par bris/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bshad pa de/ /'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can/ /lte bar bcas shing mu khyud ldan/ /nang gi rim pa bris nas ni/ /lte ba'i nang du shAkya yi/ /bdag po thub pa gzhag par bya/ /phyag na rdo rje
<p>201b.6</p>stobs chen ni/ /dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri'o/ /rgyab tu 'khor los sgyur ba bri/ /g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug tor can/ /g.yon du rnam par rgyal ba bri/ /gzi brjid phung po me yi phyogs/ /dbang po'i phyogs su gdugs dkar po/ /rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs/ /
<p>201b.7</p>rnam par 'joms pa bden bral phyogs/ /bris nas phyi rol bri bya ste/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs dang ni seng ges brgyan/ /dpa' bo lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu can rnams gzhag /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /bdug pa la sogs
<p>202a</p>
<p>202a.1</p>bri bar bya/ /bum pa dang ni phur pa mda'/ /dar sna ral gri me long dag /gzungs thag rgyal mtshan dUr wa'i gdan/ /ku sha rta babs mchod pa dang / /ras yug slob dpon slob ma'i chas/ /de dag dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /ting 'dzin cho 'phrul
<p>202a.2</p>bsgom pa ni/ /drang zhing sdug pa rab tu dag /nam mkha' dang ni mtshung mnyam pa/ /gnas ngan len pa kun las grol/ /rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i mchog /oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ byams dang snying rje las byung zhing / /sems can la ni phan mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs dri ma/ 
<p>202a.3</p>thams cad dag /zla ba lta bur mthong ba'o/ /oM pra ti tsit+ta be d+haM ka ro mi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa/ /dge ba'i chos rnams kun rdzogs shing / /nyon mongs thams cad rab tu grol/ /snying po dbus na zla chen po/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ /sa dang sa min shin tu
<p>202a.4</p>mkhyen/ /ye shes dag la zag pa med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su blta bar bya/ /oM tsit+ta badzra/ sangs rgyas kyi ni rang bzhin sku/ /mi chod mi 'jigs mi shigs pa/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje'i sku ni bla med pa'o/ /oM
<p>202a.5</p>badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin nam/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran de bzhin te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yi ge 'di/ /phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa yi/ /oM ya thA badzra satwa ta thA a haM/ skye med mtshon pa'i a las ni/ /yig 'bru lnga yi 'phro 'du yis/ /nam
<p>202a.6</p>mkha' rlung dang chu dkyil 'khor/ /sa gzhi me dpung rin chen ri/ /b+h+rUM las bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang / /nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan dang bcas/ /ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin las/ /skyed pa'i byang chub zla ba'i steng / /baM hUM traM bruM raM phaT haM sruM/ du ru a gaM /hUM traM hri a/ hUM hUM traM hri
<p>202a.7</p>hri a a/ i a pa ra pa yaM/ ku ing so a pra/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ thugs kyi ye shes 'bar ba las/ /sku yi phyag rgya rdzogs pa'o/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /oM brid ta brid ta sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /oM tra tha tra tha sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM
<p>202b</p>
<p>202b.1</p>phaT/ rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcas/ /oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya dang / /sngags 'dis lha rnams kun dbang bskur/ /oM hUM oM oM oM trAM oM hrIH/ oM ha/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bsnol nas ni/ /rdo rje
<p>202b.2</p>se gol bkrol bar bya/ /oM badzra sA d+hu pa ri pu ru badzra sa ma ya dzaH/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /dbyangs kyis spyan yang drang bar bya/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ b+ha ga wAn e h+ye hi/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dam tshig phyag rgyas 'byung rgyu bya/ /g.yas pas
<p>202b.3</p>mchog sbyin par byas la/ /g.yon pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings la gung gnyis mnyam/ /mthe bong mthe chung brkyang ba phyag /rdo rje bcings pa gung gnyis mnyam/ /tshigs bcag sor mo gzhan yang 'khor/ /de nyid
<p>202b.4</p>mthe bong mthe chung bkug /rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid 'od zer 'dra ba ni/ /gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid spyi bor bskor ba yi/ /gdugs dkar po yi phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur mdzub gnyis mthe'u chung bsnol/ /mdun nas gyen bskor 'khor
<p>202b.5</p>los sgyur/ /gung bsgreng mdzub mo rtse sbyar bkug /lhag ma 'od 'phro gtsug tor rgyal/ /de bzhin mdzub gnyis rdo rjer byas/ /lhag ma bsdams pa rnam rgyal rgya/ /bsdams pa mdun bzhag bdug pa ma/ /de nyid gyen gtong phreng ba ma/ /mthe bong bsgreng bskor mar me ma/ /
<p>202b.6</p>de nyid byug pa ltar byas dri/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug lcags kyu'o/ /rtse mo gnyis sprad zhags pa la/ /gcig la gcig mdud lcags sgrog go/ /de nyid las sbyin dril bu gnyis/ /dpral bar thal sbyar de bzhin gshegs/ /mgrin par pad+ma gsung gi phyag /thugs ka'i
<p>202b.7</p>thal mo rdo rje phyag /rigs rnams spyir yang phyag bya'o/ /'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas dang / /phyi nang rab tu gsang ba dang / /bsod nams dge dang dag pa'i don/ /bde bar tshim par bya ba dang / /spyi dang so so'i mdor bsdus mchod/ /dgyes pa bskyed de lha rnams la/ /zhal
<p>203a</p>
<p>203a.1</p>phyag sku la so sor bstod/ /chos kyi phyag rgya las byung ba/ /ngan song sbyong ba'i bzlas pa ni/ /spyi'i dang so so gang byed bzlas/ /las kyi phyag rgya las la gzhug /dngos grub thams cad gsol bar bya/ /yongs su bsngo zhing smon lam gdab/ /de nas dri zhim
<p>203a.2</p>dri ma sogs/ /rang gi lus ni bsrungs nas kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin pas zhugs nas ni/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i grong khyer mchog /snying po'i dkyil 'khor
<p>203a.3</p>'di ru ni/ /slob dpon khyod kyis bdag 'jug 'tshal/ /slob mas rgyun bshags bdun pa bya/ /bla mas de la lan byin pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba chen po rigs dag la/ /gsang ba chen po 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /
<p>203a.4</p>slob mas 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /slob mas dbang bskur gsol ba gdab/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ni/ /slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i/ /
<p>203a.5</p>mi ldog 'khor lo sbyor bar ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen por zhugs nas kyang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur te/ /skal ldan chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas gdab pa'i/ /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /
<p>203a.6</p>sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba'i/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /bla mas de la dam tshig stsal/ /dpal ldan ngan song sbyong ba yi/ /rgyud bzhin gsungs pa'i dam tshig rnams/ /'di nas bzung nas byang chub tu/ khyod kyis yang dag bsrung bar bya/ /des kyang ji ltar gnas pa
<p>203a.7</p>yi/ /sdom pa bdag gis bsrung zhes brjod/ /bla mas lha la gsol ba gdab/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di/ /byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing / /dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir yang 'jug par 'tshal/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta yo ga bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA
<p>203b</p>
<p>203b.1</p>mi su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badzra pra tha ya tha su khaM/ de nas lhar ni bskyed byas la/ /mchod pa rnams kyis mchod byas te/ /stod g.yogs dar gyis gdong g.yogs nas/ /bgegs bskrad bdug pa bya ba ni/ /oM badzra rak+Sha hUM/ las kyi bum pa chus gang bas/ /bkrus te dbang du
<p>203b.2</p>bya ba'o/ /de nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ /sgo bzhi dag nas 'jug par bya/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs rigs bzhugs/ /ngas ni khyod la ye shes snang / /de bzhin dngos grub grub byed de/ /de lta bu ni khyod sbyin zhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /snying la
<p>203b.3</p>yang dag zhugs par mdzad/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzra u da ka Tha/ deng khyod lha ni nga yin te/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob/ /dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed/ /nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /slob
<p>203b.4</p>dpon la ni brnyas pa na/ /bde ba spangs nas dmyal bar ltung / /oM di na te na ra kan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /byin gyis brlabs pa rgya chen nyid/ /bdag la rab tu zhu bas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la phob/ /slob ma de zhus bla ma 'di/ /rdo rje dri
<p>203b.5</p>bsgos snying gar gzhag /'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /ye shes rdo rje bla med 'dir/ /de ring nyid du 'bab par shog /oM badzra A be+e sha ya a a/ rdo rje 'chang gi snying gar dbab/ /'bab par byed de ma byung sbyang / /yi ge brgya pas
<p>203b.6</p>brtan par bya/ /legs par dor cig sems dpa' che/ /thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /me tog gang la lhung ba de/ /de nyid khyod kyi rigs kyi lha/ /oM sarba bita pra tits+tsha ho/ /oM pra ti grih+na swa mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ de yi phreng ba mgo la bcing / /rdo rje
<p>203b.7</p>sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed pa la brtson par mdzad/ /mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de/ /rdo rje mig ni bla na med/ /de ring nyid du 'byed par shog /he badzra pA sh+ya phaT/ rdo rjes gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya/ /de nas sgo ba nas brtsams te/ /shAkya seng
<p>204a</p>
<p>204a.1</p>ge'i dkyil 'khor bstan/ /dbab par bya ba gang yin pa/ /de ni nye bar bsdu bar byas/ /de nas dkyil 'khor shar ngos su/ /maN+Dal pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ /yi dam lha bsam dbang bskur bya/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol
<p>204a.2</p>ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis bum dbang bskur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /rdo rje thugs su mdzad du gsol/ /
<p>204a.3</p>oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ zhe sdang khams dag byed pa yi/ /dpal ldan chu yi dbang bskur bas/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /phyag na rdo rje'i dbang thob shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ phal pa'i sa ni gzhom pa dang / /yon tan gzi
<p>204a.4</p>brjid bskyed pa'i phyir/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor rin chen gyi/ /cod pan gyi ni dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu ku Ta ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dpal ldan rin chen cod pan dbang / /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje rin chen
<p>204a.5</p>mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na swa b+hA wa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ nga rgyal khams rnams dag byed pa'i/ /cod pan gyi ni dbang bskur bas/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dbang thob shog /rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang / /
<p>204a.6</p>de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra swa b+ha wa s+t+waM/ chos kyi gsung rab dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje
<p>204a.7</p>gsung du dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta wAka badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ 'dod chags khams rnams dag byed pa'i/ /rdo rje yis ni dbang bskur bas/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang thob shog /badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams
<p>204b</p>
<p>204b.1</p>cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /rgyal ba rgya mtsho mchog tu bshad/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM tiSh+Tha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dpal ldan rdo rje dril bu 'chang / /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas/ /deng bdag byin
<p>204b.2</p>gyis brlabs nas su/ /rdo rje lus ni mdzad du gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha badzra swa b+hA wa a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ phrag dog khams rnams rnam dag cing / /dril bu yi ni dbang bskur bas/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes kyi/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i sku thob shog /karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa
<p>204b.3</p>mAM/ srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal chen po bsal ba'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /shAkya seng ge rtag tu bskyed/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi che ge mo a b+hi Shi ka ta/ gti mug khams rnams dag pa yi/ /dpal ldan ming gi dbang
<p>204b.4</p>bskur ba/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi/ /shAkya seng ge'i sku thob shog /bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag la 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra tsit+ta swa
<p>204b.5</p>b+hA wa sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ga ta ya mi hUM hi hi hi hi hi phaT/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mi phyed pa/ /gsang sngags bla na med pa yi/ /snying po yid bzhin nor bu 'di/ /skyobs pa'i sngags kyis dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ slob dpon dbang bskur
<p>204b.6</p>gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod cing gsol ba ltar/ /bdag kyang gsungs pa'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur bas/ /'gro ba bskyed pa'i gzi brjid can/ /ji ltar ye shes
<p>204b.7</p>'byung gnas gtso/ /slob dpon chen po mi ldog pa'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /srog gcod rku dang 'khrig
<p>205a</p>
<p>205a.1</p>pa dang / /brdzun dang chang ni spang bar bya/ /mi dge ba ni bcu po dag /khyod kyis nam yang ma spyad cig /theg pa dman la mos pa dang / /sems can 'khor ba ma spangs shig /mya ngan 'das la ma chags shig /lha dang mi la brnyas mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs
<p>205a.2</p>pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /'gong par bya ba ma yin te/ /dam tshig 'di dag nyams pa na/ /rdo rje dmyal bar 'tshed par byed/ /de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig /slob ma'i lus la lha bkod de/ /slob dpon byed pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /
<p>205a.3</p>gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung / /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi ya pa ri ti ka a b+hi Shik+ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi
<p>205a.4</p>shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra ni tra a pa ha ra pa TaM laM hrIH/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung / /ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa/ /de ltar
<p>205a.5</p>chos 'di shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /A daR+sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med de/ /bskal pa'i cho 'phrul cir yang ston/ /bdud rigs thams cad pham byed pa'i/ /ye shes kyi ni mda'
<p>205a.6</p>'phongs shig /dz+nyAn kA ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /sku mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /wAka badzra a a/ rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin/ /dag cing gsal
<p>205a.7</p>la rnyog pa med/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin nyid/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs/ a badzra satwa tsit+ta a/ 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul ba yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /di ring
<p>205b</p>
<p>205b.1</p>phan chad 'jig rten du/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pas/ /sems can ma lus blo rnams la/ /kun du ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing / /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyis na/ /'jig rten 'di la rab sgrogs
<p>205b.2</p>shig /'di nas brtsams nas byang chub par/ /sems bskyed tsam gyis don rdzogs te/ /gser gyi gdugs 'dis sems can gyi/ /nyon mongs gdung ba ma lus skyobs/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyang / /phan 'dog drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang / /
<p>205b.3</p>kun du byed la srung bar byed/ /de nas thams cad gzengs bstod la/ /oM 'di de khyod kyi lung bstan yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa kun du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo/ /zhes bya ba
<p>205b.4</p>sid+d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ de nas rjes su gnang ba sbyin/ /oM ngo bo nyid kyi sems can rnams/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de lta de ltar chags la sogs/ /gtsang mas sems can don bya'o/ /de nas dbugs dbyung bya ba ni/ /oM gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir/ /de ring phan chad
<p>205b.5</p>khyod zhugs kyi/ /sdig pa kun las nges grol ba'i/ /khyed rnams der ni legs par gnas/ /bde chen thob pa rnams las ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi smod pa/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /
<p>205b.6</p>srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /khyed rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid the tshom med par thob/ /chos gos nas gzung lung bstan pa/ /oM nga yis 'di ltar lung bstan pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang / /mgrin gcig rdzogs byang lung
<p>205b.7</p>bstan mdzad/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum kun gyi rgyal po che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por ston pa ni/ /de ni bdud las rnams rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas
<p>206a</p>
<p>206a.1</p>nyid/ /de nyid the tshom med par thob/ /de nas rgyal ba'i cho ga ni/ /mdor bsdu rnam par bshad par bya/ /slob ma yongs su gzung ba ni/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ /slob ma'i gdong pa g.yogs pa dang / dam tshig can du byin gyis brlabs/ /
<p>206a.2</p>dngos grub las ni gsol ba gdab/ /dam tshig gnan par bya ba ni/ /me tog lha la dor bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mig ni dbye bar bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lhar zhugs te/ /lha rnams la ni mchod par bya/ /mthong nas dkyil 'khor 'jug pa lnga/ /shar lho nub byang dbus nyid
<p>206a.3</p>du/ /cho ga rnam grangs bcu bzhi ni/ /re re dag la rdzogs par bya/ /sgo bzhi dbus nas gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub don la yid ches 'jug /'jug pa'i skal yod sgo phye nas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /snod du rung phyir phyag 'tshal nas/ /skyabs 'og
<p>206a.4</p>tshud phyir gsol ba gdab/ /gnang bas slob dpon lan byin bya/ /yi ge brgya pas byin rlabs bsdu/ /sgrib pa sbyang ba'i khrus kyang bya/ /de la dam tshig dbog pa dang / /mi 'da' bar yang dam bcas la/ /mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya/ /yongs su bsngo zhing smon lam
<p>206a.5</p>gdab/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor gnas kyi don bshad cing / /phyag rgya lha yi don bshad nas/ /rgyan dang cha rkyen bshad pa'ang bstan/ /bum pa la sogs ji snyed thogs/ /dbang bcu ci dgar bskur bar bya'o/ /spyir sbyin byang chub dbu rgyan dang / /kun
<p>206a.6</p>la dbang bskur 'khor lo bskor/ /las kyi rdo rje rgya gram dang / /sgrib pa 'khru ba'i bum pa dang / /mdzes pa'i me tog phreng ba dang / /zil gnon bzod pa'i cod pan dang / /'da' bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya dang / /thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel dang / /mi 'bral ba yi
<p>206a.7</p>gzungs su ni/ /thun mong min pa'i gsang ba dang / /rdo rje ming gi gsang mchog rnams/ /dbang rnams kun la mchog gyur pa/ /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ rin chen bdun pa rnam grangs pa/ /gang gi rdzas su dper mi bzod/ /gser gyi
<p>206b</p>
<p>206b.1</p>'khor lo dbang byed dang / /glang po rin chen stobs chen dang / /rta mchog rin chen mgyogs pa dang / /nor bu 'od ldan re skong dang / /btsun mo rin chen gzugs ldan dang / /blon po rin chen blo gros dang / /dmag dpon rin chen rdzu 'phrul dang / /de 'dra'i rin chen rnam
<p>206b.2</p>grangs dang / /byang chub yan lag bdun ldan dang / /'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug rkyen/ /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ /de yang longs spyod rkyen du shog /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ nye ba'i rin chen ral gri dang / /byams dang snying rje'i pags pa dang / /'dod
<p>206b.3</p>ldan skyed mos tshal dang ni/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong mnga' gzhu dang / /gos mchog yang dag skyabs ldan dang / /lham mchog 'gro na stabs sdug dang / /tshangs pa'i khab skud bcas pa bdun/ /de yi rdzas mchog rnam grangs bdun/ /rin chen bdun dang nye bar
<p>206b.4</p>grags/ /des kyang longs spyod rkyen du shog /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ bkra shis rdzas su rnam grags pa/ /rdzas rnams kun la bkra shis pa'i/ /mthu stobs sgrub rdzas yungs kar dang / /shin tu gtsang ba'i rtswa mchog dang / /yon tan sdud pa li khri dang / /bcud
<p>206b.5</p>kyi dam pa gi waM dang / /don rnam gsal ba'i me long dang / /chos sgra sgrogs pa'i dung mchog dang / /gzi mdangs bskyed pa'i zas mchog dang / /'bras bu smin pa'i bil ba dang / /bkra shis rdzas kyi mchog 'gyur bas/ /de yang longs spyod rkyen du shog /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa
<p>206b.6</p>a/ bkra shis rdzas su rnams grags pa/ /mtshan bzang kun las bkra shis pas/ /thugs kyi don rtogs dpal be'u dang / /gzhan las dbang sgyur 'khor lo dang / /bdud las rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / /skabs dang ldan pa'i gdugs mchog dang / /skyon
<p>206b.7</p>gyis ma gos pad+ma dang / /sgrib pa sbyong ba'i bum pa dang / /rgya mtshor shugs ldan dung mchog dang / /thabs kyi 'phyo ba'i gser nya dang / /sangs rgyas mtshan du bkra shis pa/ /de yang longs spyod rkyen du shog /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ dbang po lnga yi longs spyod skyon/ /'dod
<p>207a</p>
<p>207a.1</p>pa'i yon tan lnga yi mchog /sdu gu mdzes pa'i gzugs dang ni/ /mjam zhing snyan pa'i sgra mchog dang / /ldang zhing zhim pa'i dri mchog dang / /mngar zhing bcud ldan ro mchog dang / /mnyam zhing 'jam pa'i reg bya dang / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru grags/ /de
<p>207a.2</p>yang longs spyod rkyen du shog /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ ma rig 'byed pa'i gser thur dang / /chos rnams sgyu ma'i me long ltar/ /rkang pa'i 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /dung gis chos kyi sgra 'byin shog /oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ de sogs gzhan yang ci rigs bskur/ /lho sgo'i cho ga bya
<p>207a.3</p>ba ni/ /stegs bu khru gang rnams lngas byugs/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i maN+Dal la/ /bum pa rdzas bcas me tog dgram/ /mtshon cha gdugs dang smyug ma dang / /bdag nyid shAkya seng ge yi/ /thugs kyi mda' lnga 'phros pa yis/ /las dang nyon mongs phyir bzlog pa'i/ /yungs
<p>207a.4</p>kar sngags kyis brdeg par bya/ /ming ngam rus bu rus la brabs/ /oM sarba a pa ya A kaR+Sha na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra pa Ni bi s+pho Ta ya sarba a pa ya ban+d+ha ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarba a pa ya ga ti b+h+yaHsarba satwa sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya traT/ oM sarba bid A
<p>207a.5</p>A bi sha /oM bita tra Ta tshin+da a/ sa ra Na ne hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba tiR+Ya g+ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ lha yi sngags la btags te bya/ /rtsa ba'i sngags la 'di btags nas/ /de nas
<p>207a.6</p>khrus kyis bkru bar bya/ /sarba big+h+nA na/ sarba gra he sarba dz+wa re/ sarba bya d+hi/ sarba u pa dra we/ sarba a kA la mri t+yu pra sha ma na ya/ sarba dur swa b+na dur mi te bya ku la tshe/ shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ nub phyogs bde gnas lam bstan bya/ /lam ni bar chad bsal te sbyang / /zhag ni
<p>207a.7</p>nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /zhag bdun dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya/ /de bzhin bcug ste dbang bskur na/ /ngan song thams cad rnam grol te/ /bde 'gro mtho ris 'jig rten dang / /sa rnams gong mar skye 'gyur te/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs
<p>207b</p>
<p>207b.1</p>rgyas su yang nges par 'grub/ /sngar bzhin las rnams thams cad byed/ /thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyur/ /byabs pas rims nad gdon dug sogs/ /thams cad kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /hUM brjod tsam gyis las rnams 'grub/ /cho ga zhib mo gzhan yang 'grub/ /
<p>207b.2</p>lha klu gnod sbyin srin po sogs/ /ngan 'gro'i dbang du gyur pa yis/ /ro'am gzugs brnyan ming sogs bri/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg dbang bskur grol/ /sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga yang / /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal bri/ /yang na dkyil 'khor tshul bris la/ /
<p>207b.3</p>me tog la sogs mchod pa bya/ /spyan sngar bsnyen pa 'bum byas na/ /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /rdul tshon chur dor dbang yon dbul/ /ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu/ /gtsug tor dgu pa'i cho ga 'di/ /sangs rgyas gsang bas phyi rabs don/ /
<p>207b.4</p>ngan song sbyong ba'i rgyud las mdzad/ /'gro kun ngan song las grol shog /slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sangs rgyas gsang ba dang / many+dzu shrI barma dang / bran ka mu tis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
<p>207b.5\] ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na ma ra ho ma maN+Da lo pa yi ka /bod skad du/ ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ro'i sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams
<p>207b.6</p>cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bder gshegs gtso dang sras po dang po dang / /rgyal sras lhag ma dang ni rigs kyi yum rnams dang / /phyi nang lha mo sgo skyong bcas pa la/ /dngos po kun gyi dang bas phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud las
<p>207b.7</p>btus nas su/ /ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /shi ba'i don du ro sreg thabs/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba'i rim pa la/ /brten te bdag gis bshad par bya/ /dang por bla ma rin po che mnyes par byas nas/ des dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur ba dang dam
<p>208a</p>
<p>208a.1</p>tshig phog nas/ spyi dang khyad par gyi dam tshig la gnas pas sngar rang gi sgrub thabs kyi rim pas bsnyen pa byas pa dang / bzlas brjod byas pas mtshan ma mthong bas/ bdag dang gzhan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba la
<p>208a.2</p>'jug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad bsdus nas su/ tshes grangs bzang dang rgyu skar la sogs bzang po dang / dkyil 'khor sa gzhi mtshan ma blta phyir grogs dang bcas pas de nyid brtag bya ste/ /lha khang tshong dus yul dang grong khyer khyams kyi shar dang byang du
<p>208a.3</p>brtsam par bya/ /yang na sa bzang snum dang zug rngu la sogs nyes med shar dang byang du gzhol/ me tog chur ldan rang bzhin dag par bya'o/ /yang na sngags pa yid gang du dga' bar bya'o/ /de nas gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la lcibs lam lhung bas maN+Dal bya'o/ /dkon
<p>208a.4</p>mchog gsum la phyi nang mchod pa bya zhing 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la gtor ma sbyin de nas sa gzhi gru bzhir bsams la sa bdag bsams te brko/ ston zla gsum la byang du bltas te brko/ /dgun zla gsum la shar du bltas la brko/ /dpyid zla gsum la lho ru bltas la brko/ /
<p>208a.5</p>dbyar zla gsum la nub tu bltas la brko ste lto bar bsams na/ mgo dang rgyab dang 'phong bor ba'o/ /sa'i ro lnga la sogs pa bsal zhing yang ngo / /dri zhim po dang sa bsres pa'am/ dri zhim po dang chu bsres pa la hUM bzlas pas bkang la 'thas par bcags la/ lag
<p>208a.6</p>mthil ltar mnyam pa'i steng du gzhal yas khang rgyan dang bcas pa bsam/ me tog phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan mang po dgong / gtso bo'i bzlas pa byas pa'i sman dang 'bru dang rin po che dbus su gzhag go/ /zug rngu'i nyes pa thams cad ni/ /gal te dbyung bar mi nus na/ /
<p>208a.7</p>lag pa brdab ste sngags 'di bzlas/ /dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ /khang chen brag phug ba lang lhas/ /lha khang la sogs 'bab chu 'gram lngar sbyang mi dgos/ rang gtso bor bsgom zhing khro bo'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad chu dang yungs kar thal ba la bzlas
<p>208b</p>
<p>208b.1</p>te ba'i rnam lngas byug cing dri'i chab kyis gtor/ khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas pa'i sman dang rin chen dbus su gzhug /sa dag par byed pa'i cho ga'o// //de nas rnam dag mos pa yis/ /nang gi khrus kyis dag par bya'o/ /dang po sngags pa bdag gi ngag /dag
<p>208b.2</p>par 'dod pas 'di ltar bsam/ /lce la paM las skyes pa yi/ /pad+ma 'dab gcig bskyed bya ste/ /de steng yi ge a las ni/ /bskyed pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar bskyed/ /rdo rje lce steng thim byas nas/ /rdo rje lce zhes bya ba ste/ /sngags bzlas mthu
<p>208b.3</p>dang ldan par 'gyur/ /lag gnyis mthil du zla gnyis bsam/ /de yang yi ge a las so/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar bskyed/ /shin tu dkar ba lag pa la/ /thim pas rdo rje lag par bshad/ /phyag rgya gang yin bcing bar bya/ /rdor dril g.yon blangs lag bzhag ste/ /
<p>208b.4</p>rdo rje snying rje byang chub sems/ /dril bu stong pa'i bdag tu brtag /de ltar bdag gis bsgom byas la/ /spyi bor dkrol te dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phab la phyogs bcur bsgrags/ /de nas lan gsum gyen 'phyar dkrol/ /de gnyis gcig gis gcig 'khyud de/ /
<p>208b.5</p>rdo rje lan gsum gsor byas te/ /thugs kar brtan pa spyan drang pa/ /dril bu'i sgras ni dgyes pa bskyed/ /de ltar byas na nus pa bskyed/ /gza' skar sogs dus bzang bya ste/ /slob dpon rang lha'i rnal 'byor byas/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug nas su/ /sgrub
<p>208b.6</p>pa'i rim pas bgegs bskrad de/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bya/ /snying ga nas byung dkyil 'khor sprul/ /'khor lo las 'phros sprul pa yis/ /nam mkha'i khams su khyab bsams te/ /de la 'di skad gsol ba gdab/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang
<p>208b.7</p>byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad dang bcom ldan 'das kun rig
<p>209a</p>
<p>209a.1</p>rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcas pa khyed rnams bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la byin gyis brlab cing bsrung ba'i phyir bzhugs su gsol lo zhes bskul te/ snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i dbus su bsdus nas gcig tu gyur
<p>209a.2</p>par bsam/ de nas rang lus lha'i nga rgyal byas la langs te mig g.yon Ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bras bu gnyis la yi ge hUM 'bar ba'i lta bas me ltar 'bar bas rdo rje'i mig a las sna tshogs rdo rje rkang pa'i 'og tu bsam/ rdo rje
<p>209a.3</p>gsor zhing dril bu dkrol/ rgyan cha dang ldan gtso bo'i nga rgyal bskyed/ rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor ba bya zhing dril gsil rdo rje bskor/ /bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i phyir ni mgo mig btud la 'di skad brjod/ slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i
<p>209a.4</p>byang chub rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po ro bsreg hom gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 'dri yis lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
<p>209a.5</p>yi dgas dang / sha za dang / brjod byed dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rnon po dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci dang / /rig sngags 'chang ba grub pa rgan po dang / rgan mo dang / 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /
<p>209a.6</p>de ltar phyag na rdo rje'i bka' thos nas myur du dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro bar sems pa de dag ni phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyis ye shes 'bar ba rab tu rdo rje chen por 'bar bas mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes lan
<p>209a.7</p>mang du brjod/ rang las sprul pa'i khro bo grangs med pa shin tu 'jigs pa phyung ste/ bgegs tshar bcad nas nam mkha' khyab par 'khyil zhing bzhugs so/ /g.yas brkyang la sogs pa'i stang stabs skabs 'dir bya'o/ /gom pa brgyad pa yang bya'o/ /hUM rgyun
<p>209b</p>
<p>209b.1</p>mi chad par bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu bskor ro/ /stang stabs bya'o/ /de nas dbang ldan nas brtsams te skor phyogs su phur ba rnams la bzlas shing / gser gyi sa gzhi la thug pa'i bar du btab par bsam/ oM bai ro tsa na hUM/ sarba big+h+nAn u tsa ya hUM phaT/ de nas rnam par
<p>209b.2</p>snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcas la/ hUM brjod cing nga rgyal bskyed de sngags kyang brjod/ de'i rnal 'byor bya ste/ nam mkha' la ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gang ba'i nga rgyal bskyed la/ grogs po rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri ba'i
<p>209b.3</p>phyir bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams
<p>209b.4</p>cad yang dag spangs/ /kun du bzang po'i sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i mchog ni chos las byung / /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi
<p>209b.5</p>sems chen po/ /rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/ /kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de nas langs la nam mkha' khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA da ya ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes pas zhabs la phyag bya'o/ /
<p>209b.6</p>de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la/ langs la nga rgyal skyed pa 'di brjod do/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug
<p>209b.7</p>rgyal po bdag /phyag na rdo rje ston bdag ste/ /bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag /byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu blangs la/ oM badzra ut+tiSh+Tha/ zhes pas ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol/ yang stang stabs g.yas
<p>210a</p>
<p>210a.1</p>brkyang la sogs pa bya'o/ /sa gzhi rdo rjer gyur par bsam mo/ /gzhal yas khang nam mkha' la dmigs la rdo rje'i mig gis bgegs med par mthong nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo dbye ste/ sngags pas rdo rje rgyu'i gzugs lto ba che ba dbu bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa rdo rje
<p>210a.2</p>dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang ral gri bsnams pa sku mdog ser po bsgoms te de la 'khor lo btsud la lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bkug la/ oM badzra maN+Dal hUM badzra/ zhes pas rdo rje rgyu nyid bsgyur bas sa gzhi grub par 'gyur te de nas 'dis byin gyis brlab par byas/ oM ma hA badzra tsakra
<p>210a.3</p>ut+tiSh+Thi bid+d+ha hUM/ de nas khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar bya/ /'khor lo byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de nas tsan+dan dmar po me tog dmar po dar dmar po'i rgyan dang bcas pa'i phur pa lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung la g.yas pas tho
<p>210a.4</p>ba rgyan dang bcas pas brdung ngo / /dbang ldan nas brtsams te/ oM badzra kro d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn hUM phaT/ phur pa gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM tho ba'i sngags so/ /de nas rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad/ oM AHhUM/ gsum
<p>210a.5</p>gyis phyi rol du 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang rdo rje ra ba dang sa gzhi yang rdo rjer bsam/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'od dang bcas pa bsgom bgegs bskrad cing gtso bo'i sngags dang rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad par bsam mo/ /de nas yi ge laM las byung ba'i sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo bum pa
<p>210a.6</p>lag na thogs pa rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ mchod pa bya zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sta gon du bya'o/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par ni/ /sa dang pha rol phyin
<p>210a.7</p>pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar bya ste dkyil 'khor bri/ sa'i lha mo dga' ba'i mdangs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig zer nas 'og tu thim mo/ /de nas
<p>210b</p>
<p>210b.1</p>rdo rje bsdams pa dang sngags 'dis gzung bar bya'o/ /oM badzra b+ha ba hUM/ zhes brjod do/ /oM badzra d+hi de uta tiSh+Tha/ zhes pas byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas dri bzang po la sogs pas byugs la/ me tog sna tshogs pa chal bar dgram mo/ /dkyil 'khor du lha
<p>210b.2</p>rnams ji ltar gnas pa'i ming brjod de maN+Dal re re bya'o/ /ra ba dang dra ba la sogs pas mtshams bcad nas/ rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil dang yon chab dang mchod pa brgyad dang gzhan gyis kyang mchod bstod pa
<p>210b.3</p>bya ste nam mkha'o/ /bdag rang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug nas/ sgrub thabs nas 'byung ba bzhin du bgegs bsal nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la nga rgyal bskyed de sems dag par bya zhing 'di brjod la/ 
<p>210b.4</p>der du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag ni bsod nams 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par/ /'gyur bar bdag ni the tshom med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas/ /mi ldog par ni bdag 'gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
<p>210b.5</p>su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /
<p>210b.6</p>sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /tshe 'das 'di yi don du ni/ /rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub de ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum brjod pas snga ma
<p>210b.7</p>bzhin bsams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du oM la sogs pa rang rang gi yi ge bkod la/ lha 'khor dang bcas pa so so'i gnas su bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de'i 'og tu nam mkha'i ye shes sems dpa' 'khor dang
<p>211a</p>
<p>211a.1</p>bcas pa dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas te/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang gcig tu bya'o/ /de nas zhabs bsil zhal bsil mchod yon lha so so 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs su gsol te dbul so so'i sngags la/ oM bai ro
<p>211a.2</p>tsa na ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /de la sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga phul la bstod pa dang phyag bya'o/ /de nas gser ram dngul lam zangs las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bya'o/ /ma 'byor na kham pa las bya'o/ /de nyid dngos po med par bsams
<p>211a.3</p>la/ yi ge khaM las byung ba nag po ra ri med pa mgrin pa ring ba/ lto ba che ba mchu 'phyang ba bsgoms la/ de'i nang du hrIHlas pad+ma/ de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du lha'i 'khor lo bsams la de
<p>211a.4</p>rnam par dag par gyur pa las bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsams te/ de nas dri chu blugs la mar dang 'o ma la sogs pa stsal/ sman lnga dang 'bru lnga dang rin po che stsal/ de yang lung las/ bya kri siM ha karni ka /ha sa ha sa de ba ste/ /sman sna lnga zhes bya ba ste/ /las
<p>211a.5</p>rnams kun la 'di dag gzung / /'bras kyi so ba mon sran gre'u/ /nas dang gro dang til dang lnga/ /las kun la ni 'di dag shis/ /shel dang dngul dung byi ru mu tig ste/ /rin chen lnga zhes bya ba yin/ /sman lnga byang chub sems kyi rtags/ /'bru lnga thugs kyi rang bzhin
<p>211a.6</p>te/ /rin chen bde gshegs sku mdog rtags/ /zhes pa'o/ /bum pa la 'khor lo'i bdag po lnga'i mtshan ma la sogs pa lnga dang ldan par bya zhing / dkar po dmar po ser po ljang gu sngon po'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i ras kyis mgul pa bcing bar bya'o/ /ma 'byor na ras
<p>211a.7</p>sar pa zhig gis spyir bcing bar bya'o/ /shing 'o ma can 'bras bu can gyis kha rgyan bya'o/ /gtso bo'i phyag rgya bstan/ yang na rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bstan/ gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /yang na oM badzra u da ka Tha hUM/ zhes bzlas la
<p>211b</p>
<p>211b.1</p>gzhag go/ /me tog dkar po chal par bkram pa ras bting pa'i steng du gzhag go/ /de nas mchod yon chu dang bcas pa la sogs pa bshams la/ mchod pa chen po'i zhag bar du nyin re la lan gsum du ting nge 'dzin dang mchod pa dang bzlas pa bya'o/ /bzlas pa ni
<p>211b.2</p>bskyed pa la'o/ /de nas zhu bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor bskor la/ dang por dbus su de nas so so'i gnas su gzhag go/ /bum pa'i grangs lha grangs ji tsam yod pa de tsam mo/ /ma 'byor na bcu drug las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /de nas las thams
<p>211b.3</p>cad pa'i bum pa la bgegs bskrad pa'i bsngags bzlas te sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa la mchod pa byas te/ phyi rol du byang shar mtshams su gzhag par bya'o/ /'di skad du gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ khyed kyis dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs bar du bgegs mi srun pa rnams su
<p>211b.4</p>srung du gsol lo/ /bum pa sta gon gyi cho ga'o// //de nas phyi rol du song la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor du gnas la/ phyogs skyong gi gtor ma btang ngo / /grub na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas slar dkyil 'khor gyi sar zhugs nas snga ma'i ting nge 'dzin la
<p>211b.5</p>gnas nas lce byin gyis brlab ste/ oM pad+ma sa ra swa ti a pa ra ha ya sho d+hA ya hUM ra d+hi/ des lce byin gyis brlabs nas lag tu bdug spos thogs la phus mo sa la btsugs nas 'di skad gsol ba gdab po/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags rgyal la phyag
<p>211b.6</p>'tshal lo/ /bdag la brtse bar gyur nas su/ /tshe 'das 'di la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /ngas ni dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal/ bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de bas gnang bar mdzad par rigs/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon brtse dang / /
<p>211b.7</p>byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang / /gsang ba'i lha gzhan gang lhags dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / /gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang / /gang du lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag ming 'di la dgongs su gsol/ /
<p>212a</p>
<p>212a.1</p>bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming / /'di zhes bgyi ba ci nus kyis/ /cho ga bzhin du 'dri lags na/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ byin gyis rlob par mdzad du gsol/ /
<p>212a.2</p>ye shes 'bar ba'i bsreg khang 'dir/ /tshe 'das sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /'bras bu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dam tshig rdzogs par mdzad 'tshal gyi/ /sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod/ /sems dpa' chen po phal rnams kyang / /gtso bo'i dam tshig rjes
<p>212a.3</p>dgongs te/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i bsreg khang 'dir/ /tshul bzhin du ni spyan 'dren gyis/ /sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod/ /sder bcas lha klu mthu chen rnams/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du/ /phyogs dang mtshams su spyan 'dren gyis/ /sta gon la ni gnas
<p>212a.4</p>par mdzod/ /rgyu drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i bsreg khang 'dir/ /sbyin pa rgya chen gtong lags kyis/ /sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod/ /sngags mkhan dam tshig rdzogs pa dang / /rdzas dang cho ga ma nyams par/ /tshul bzhin du ni gsal
<p>212a.5</p>lags kyis/ /sta gon la ni gnas par mdzod/ /ces pa lan gsum gus pa dang bcas par brjod/ de nas sems dag pa nas bstod pa dang phyag bya ste phyi rol du byung nas slob ma sta gon la gnas par bya ste/ dang por lus bkru ba dag pa dang / /gtsang ma bgos la
<p>212a.6</p>snyim pa me tog gis bkang nas slob dpon la phyag byas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /dga' chen khyod ni bdag ston pas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag
<p>212a.7</p>la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyid/ /de skad lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la 'di skad
<p>212b</p>
<p>212b.1</p>brjod do/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyi/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyed la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /de bzhin gang dag ma byon pa/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir
<p>212b.2</p>bzhugs pa dag /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bla med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /
<p>212b.3</p>dbung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /rtog pa mang po legs par bsdus nas su/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang pos mnyan par gyis/ /brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/ /bde bar
<p>212b.4</p>gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du bcug ste/ /bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang / /bgyid du stsal dang yi rang ba/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas byang
<p>212b.5</p>chub sems dpa' dang / /rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyi/ /sgom dang bzlas brjod bsod nams tshogs/ /de la bdag ni yi rang ngo / /sems bskyed mngon par sangs rgyas dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs spyod la/ /de la
<p>212b.6</p>bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas rang byung ji lta bar/ /skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar/ /de ring nyid du sems bskyed do/ /mgon po bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /ma lus bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dus
<p>212b.7</p>'di nas ni sangs rgyas bar/ /bla med bdag la gzigs su gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /de nyid bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang / /dge
<p>213a</p>
<p>213a.1</p>ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /nam du yang ni mi gtong ngo / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag
<p>213a.2</p>rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs
<p>213a.3</p>mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung / /las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi
<p>213a.4</p>don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus bzung / /ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi/ /ma bsgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs phyung bgyi/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig
<p>213a.5</p>rten mi ring sangs rgyas myur bsgrubs nas/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/ /bla med byang chub nyid du bsgral bar bgyi/ /de nas gson po la byed na so shing sbyin pa'am/ mchod pa bya ba dang / so shing bor la pra brtag pa dang / dri chus kha lag
<p>213a.6</p>bkru zhing 'thor 'thung bya ba dang / slob ma sems dga' ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o/ /de nas rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i ku sha stan dang sngas byed du gzhug /de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas pa'i srung skud dbung ba g.yon par gdags/ de nas bzhin bzang longs
<p>213a.7</p>shig /sang gi nyin mo khyed rnams kyis/ /thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /grong khyer chen po mthong 'gyur gyi/ /yang mchod pa lnga byas te gtor ma gtang yang na ni dkyil 'khor la phyi nang gi mchod pa rgyas par bya'o/ /gnas de nyid du ku sha'i stan la seng ge'i nyal
<p>213b</p>
<p>213b.1</p>stabs su rmi lam blta ba'i phyir mi smra bar bsam gtan gyis nyal bar bya'o/ /nang bar gab sbas med par rmi lam bstan par bya'o/ /bzang na rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/ /dngos grub 'os pa bstan par bya'o/ /ngan na ba'i rnam lnga la khro bo'i sngags bzlas la 'thung du gzhug
<p>213b.2</p>srung ba bya'o/ /grub na drag po'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas snga ma bzhin du phur bu dang ra ba dang dra ba dang / phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas yi ge suM las ri rab bskyed/ de'i steng du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bsgoms
<p>213b.3</p>te/ de nas sprul pa byung bas srad bu 'dzin par bsams la/ de yang lung las/ nges par dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ su zhig gis ni bya bar nus/ /lha yi rnal 'byor rang gnas na/ /dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur zhing zhes 'byung ngo / /de nas dkyil 'khor thig
<p>213b.4</p>gdab par bya'o/ /las thams cad pa'i bum pas bsang gtor bya'o/ /glu la sogs pa mchod pa rgyas par bya'o/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ srad bu so sor phyogs bzhir slob ma bzhis
<p>213b.5</p>'then la/ dkar po sngon po ser po dmar po ljang gu rnams la/ oM hUM trAM hrIHkhaM/ zhes pa'i yi ge bsams pas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par gyur par bsgom/ mig g.yas g.yon gnyis la nyi ma dang zla ba bsams te/ oM dIp+ta dr-iSh+Tha aM ku sha dzaH/ /zhes pa
<p>213b.6</p>bzlas pas/ lcags kyu 'dra ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin byung nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bskul te ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas gnas pa la/ 'di skad ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /lha tshogs ma lus pa la gsol ba btab la/ zhabs la kye ma bcom
<p>213b.7</p>ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa'i rdo rje srad bu stsal du gsol/ de nas ye shes spyan gyis gzigs nas/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i thugs ka nas byung ste/ lcags kyu 'dra ba'i tshul gyis rang gi lag tu 'ong bar bsam mo/ /rnam par snang mdzad
<p>214a</p>
<p>214a.1</p>mdun du dmigs la/ oM dzi na dzika swA hA/ zhes brjod la bsgril bar bya'o/ /de nas tsan+dan bzang po la sogs pas legs par bskus pa'i gser gyi snod la sogs par legs par bzhag la/ me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de rdo rje mig
<p>214a.2</p>byas la/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la 'di skad gsol ba gdab po/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi don mdzad cing / sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba mdzad pa/ zhal zla ba 'dra bas
<p>214a.3</p>bsil bar mdzad pa rnams dgongs su gsol lo/ /deng sems can gyi don la bab kyis bdag la mthu gtong ba dang byin gyis brlab tu gsol lo/ /dgongs shig rgyal ba thub dbang ji snyed cig /dpag med zhing na bzhugs pa thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la
<p>214a.4</p>byin gyis brlabs pa dang / di ring bdag la btang pa'i dus la bab/ de nas oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /yang na oM AHhUM/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor dri bzang pos byugs pa'i phyi rol 'khor

<p>216b.4</p>sbyor ba byas la bgegs bsrung ba bya'o/ /phyag rgya dgod pa yang rgyud las/ 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya/ /rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /'jig rten gtso la sogs pa bri/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la me thab kyi dbus su
<p>216b.5</p>'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bya/ de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri ba ni phrin las gzhan gyi dbang du byas pa yin/ shar du rdo rje lhor rin po che nub tu pad+ma byang du sna tshogs rdo rje tshul bzhin du dgod/ mu ran rdo rje rtse lnga ba'am rtse gsum pas bskor/ logs la me 'od bri/ nang

<p>217a</p>
<p>217a.1</p>lam rdo rje dang pog phor dgod/ lho nub tu phreng ba dang me tog dgod/ nub byang du pi wang dang mar me dgod/ byang shar du gar byed pa'i lag pa dang yang na rdo rje dang dung phor dgod/ de'i phyi rim gyi snam bu la/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang rdo rje kha bzhi pa bzhi
<p>217a.2</p>bzhi'am gtams par shar nas brtsam la dgod/ de'i phyi rim gyi snam bu la shar du rdo rje gdengs ba dang zla ba shar lhor me thab/ lhor dbyug pa/ lho nub ral gri /nub tu zhags pa dang bum pa dang nyi ma nub byang du ba dan/ byang du be con byang shar du mdung rtse gsum pa rnams
<p>217a.3</p>dgod/ bkra shis kyi lha mo bar bar du spel la dgod do/ /yang na ma bkod kyang mi 'gal sgo bzhir lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu rnams dgod/ gzhan yang seng ge glang chen lda ldi do shal dril bu phreng ba rnams ci rigs dgod do/ /rgyan yang rgyud las/ bya
<p>217a.4</p>dang bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor ma snod rnams bkang ba dang / /brgya snyed tsam du gzhag bya'am/ /yang na bcu drug snyed du gzhag /bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i bshos/ /me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te/ /bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs/ /gdugs mchog rnams kyis
<p>217a.5</p>legs par brgyan/ /zhes 'byung de yang dkyil 'khor du/ bum pa bya chus bkang ba rnams sman dang 'bru dang rin po che dang mgul chings dang / ldum bus brgyan pa gzhung dang mthun par byas la bcu yan chod dgod pa dang / gtor ma'i bum pa lha bshos snod gtsang ma bkang
<p>217a.6</p>ba brgyad dam bcu drug snyed kyi bza' ba dang bca' ba dang me tog bdug pa mar me byug pa brgya'am/ stong ngam/ de las lhag ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa me tog gi phreng ba dang / rgyal mtshan dang bla re dang gdugs dang ba dan dang 'phan la sogs pas brgyan pa dang / dkyil
<p>217a.7</p>'khor mtha' ma me tog sil ma bkram zhing ku shas bskor/ mchod yon gyi bum pa'am gtor ma bcas pa cha gnyis bshams/ bgegs bskrad pa'i phrin las bcol bas byang shar du gzhag /sbyin sreg gi rdzas kyang nub tu gzhag /lha dgod tsam na so so'i snying po bzlas/ 
<p>217b</p>
