<p>290b.3</p>tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir blo gros chen po legs so zhes bya ba yin no/ /gzhung las/ cho ga 'di ni dge bar smras/ /zhes bya ba nas/ bshad pa la ni mngon par bstod/ /ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor
<p>290b.4</p>bas/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la 'dzem pa med par spyod/ shes rab dang thabs kyi spyod yul yang ngo bo nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo/ sems can thams cad kyang mos shing dad par 'gyur ba'i chos chen po yin
<p>290b.5</p>pas dge bar smras so zhes bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang phyag na rdo rje bsnams te/ shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du zhugs nas/ mdo sde zab mo 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor
<p>290b.6</p>mdzad pa'i tshul du bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya'o/ /chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid yin gyis kyang kun rdzob tu rgyu dang 'bras bur sbyar ba ste/ de bas na mdo sde'i don 'di bstan pas thob pa'i shes rab bskyed de chos nyid
<p>290b.7</p>kyi rig pa la brten nas bsam pa'i shes rab kyis don gang yin pa la gzhig par byas nas mnyam par sbyor ba'i don la bsgoms na/ 'bras bu byang chub kyi rig 'dzin la sogs te bla na med pa'i sa man chad dngos grub ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te 'bras bu yod pas sems can kun kyang
<p>291a</p>
<p>291a.1</p>dam pa'i chos spyod pas 'di la 'jug cing sgom par 'gyur bas 'dul ba'i mchog ces bya'o/ /mnyam par sbyor ba'i sgo yangs pa 'di la kun kyang mos shing dad par gyur la longs spyod dang ldan bzhin du bla na med pa thob par 'gyur bas thob pa'i rgyal po ste/ shes rab
<p>291a.2</p>dang thabs gnyis mnyam par spyod pas lhag pa'i chos gud na med pas sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i sa che ba las bsgrub tu med pas bla na med pas bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can gang yang rung ste/ dam pa'i chos spyod lam 'di la nyan pa dang sems pa dang bsgom pa la sogs te nan
<p>291a.3</p>tan du byed pa la ni gdon dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad kyis spyod pa'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang 'tshe bar byed mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par bya ba dang / dngos grub dam pa ci 'dod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kun gyis ring por mi thogs par ster bar
<p>291a.4</p>'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yang mi 'gal bar myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa'i chos chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sbyor ba byin gyis brlabs pas gsang ba'i don 'di
<p>291a.5</p>yang rdo rje can gyis grub par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po'i chos yangs pa shin tu rgya che la longs spyod dang ldan bzhin du grub pa'i chos bshad pa 'di la don chen po yod par mthong nas mngon par dga' zhing bstod do/ /gzhung las de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba nas/ 
<p>291a.6</p>swa badzra oM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni khams gsum thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba yin pas gsang ba'i chos nyid pas na stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor ba spros pa med pa bde ba chen po'i don yod pa
<p>291a.7</p>mnyam par sbyor ba mi gtong ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa chos yangs shing rgya che ba'i sgo 'di thog ma dad pas rtsom pa nas zhugs nas mjug bla na med pa thob kyi bar du nyon mongs pa med par sgrib pa thams cad spangs pas na thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus kyi khyad par med par dus thams cad du bde ba mnyam
<p>291b</p>
<p>291b.1</p>pa'i chos gsungs so/ /mur thug la sogs pa chos zab mo'i don ma mthong ba stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos nyid mi shes pa rnams kyis ni dka' thub pa nyon mongs pa spyad kyis kyang 'bras bu bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /des na spyod pa kun las 'phags
<p>291b.2</p>pa'i chos kyang thugs rje can gyis bstan par zad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid kyi ye shes gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor bas longs spyod dang ldan zhing / bla na med pa'i dngos grub thob pa sems can thams
<p>291b.3</p>cad kyang byang chub tu sgrol bar byed pas thog ma dad pa la zhugs nas tha ma bla na med pa la sgrol ba la thug gi bar du dus thams cad du bde bas 'dod chags chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i
<p>291b.4</p>spyod yul du bstan nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba las longs spyod tshad chen po dang ldan zhing bde ba 'di yang thams cad chos kyi dbyings la khyab te/ don
<p>291b.5</p>dam pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su mnyam par sbyor bas bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos grub dam pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub
<p>291b.6</p>pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i phreng bas khams gsum gyi rgyal por dbang skur bar byed pas na rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam par sbyor bas khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po
<p>291b.7</p>byed pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dag pa'i spyod yul la dgod pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i nang na gnas shing sems can gyi don la brtson kyang 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pas mi chags pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das te/ sems can thams cad kyi don chu'i rgyun dang 'dra ba'i
<p>292a</p>
<p>292a.1</p>las 'jug cing dngos grub dam pa thams cad thob pa'i las spyod pas na las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yang / dkyil 'khor la lar ni lngar gsungs la/ la lar ni bzhir gsungs/ la lar ni gsum du gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 
<p>292a.2</p>dkyil 'khor lngar gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / las kyi rigs te 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang yon tan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang yum lnga'i don bstan to/ /dkyil 'khor bzhir
<p>292a.3</p>bstan pa ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsdus te dkyil 'khor bzhir bstan to/ /gsung rab kha cig las dkyil 'khor gsum du bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nang du rdo rje rigs bsdu/ las kyi rigs kyi nang du rin po che'i rigs sdud pa dang / 
<p>292a.4</p>chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ 'di ltar gsungs pa/ de ci dang 'dra zhe na/ phyin ci log gi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod yul 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gsum byung ste/ sems can nyon mongs pas bcings pas 'khor ba'i nang du sdug bsngal ba yang lus dang
<p>292a.5</p>ngag dang yid gsum 'khrul pa'i dbang gis gyur to/ /phyin ci log med stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i dag pas lus rdo rje zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyag rgya chen po dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /ngag rdo rje ste don dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang
<p>292a.6</p>mthun pas de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /yid rdo rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yin pas na sems can gyi don bya ba sna tshogs mdzad pa dngos grub kyi las thams cad mngon par spyod pa'i dbang du byed cing las rnams la spyod pas
<p>292a.7</p>de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rigs gcig tu bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid gsum rdo rjer 'gyur bas 'dod chags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid du gyur/ zhe sdang ni
<p>292b</p>
<p>292b.1</p>de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur/ gti mug ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur pas na 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid du bshad pas nyon mongs pa'i chos zhes gzhan gud
<p>292b.2</p>na med pas chos so cog thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin yin par mngon no/ /dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi dbus lnga dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub pa'i ye shes dang spyod yul sngar so sor 'gyur te/ gcig tu na spyod yul gcig las med pa ma yin gyi/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
<p>292b.3</p>la yang rigs kyi lnga char gyi mtshan nyid yon tan dang spyod yul dang tshogs shing dang ldan pas ming tsam du dkyil 'khor yang lnga'i mtshan nyid du dbye bar zad do/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ste chos kyi dbyings nyid yin/ rigs kyi yum dang gtso bo nyid las sprul to/ /mchod
<p>292b.4</p>pa'i lha mo bcu drug kyang rigs kyi yum las gzhan ma yin no/ /swa badzra oM zhes bya ba'i swAM ni dpal dang ldan pa'am bkra shis pa'i mtshan nyid/ badzra ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid/ oM ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba nas swa
<p>292b.5</p>zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha mi dad pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos don ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i chos/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings las tha mi
<p>292b.6</p>dad pa'i phyir don thams cad bsgrub par gsungs te/ swA hA zhes bya ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bkra shis kyi don yin/ hUM dang phaT ces bya ba ni mngon spyod dang dgug pa dang 'jigs par bya ba'i don yin te/ 'di rigs kyi yum gyi chos thams cad dge zhing bkra shis par gsungs pa'i phyir zhes
<p>292b.7</p>brjod do/ /gzhung las/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /zhes bya ba nas dngos grub kyi phyogs kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ rigs kyi yum gyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba la
<p>293a</p>
<p>293a.1</p>mkhas pa'i mchog thob par 'gyur zhing / sems can 'khor ba'i mtha' med pa de srid du don mdzad pas na de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgya chen po 'di la don chud mi za ba mkhyen nas
<p>293a.2</p>tshigs bcad du bstod pa yin no/ /'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir mtha'i mtha' yang med de/ ji tsam du 'khor ba mtha' med pa'i bar du stong pa nyid dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni de dang mnyam par sbyor ba ma yin no/ /de ltar 'khor ba mtha' med pa'i don la sems dang
<p>293a.3</p>po bskyed pa nas zhugs pas ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyis kyang thog ma snying rje chen po dang smon lam chen pos sems can gyi don la 'jug par bya ba'i shugs kyis sems can gyi don tshul rgyun dang 'dra bar mdzad pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang rang bzhin du phung po'i
<p>293a.4</p>lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bar mi mdzad do/ /shes rab ces bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa yin te/ pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid de/ de shes rab dang dbyings gnyis su sbyor te mnyam par gyur pa'i dus na/ 
<p>293a.5</p>shes rab dang yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /thabs ni shes rab dang pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid la byang chub kyi sems skyes te/ sems de las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
<p>293a.6</p>thams cad kyi mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa bskyed pa dang / dngos grub dam pa thams cad bskyed pa dang / sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byas pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs su 'brel pa thabs kyis gzung ba'i shes rab pas shes rab kyang thabs shes rab kyis gzung
<p>293a.7</p>ba'i thabs pas na thabs kyang shes rab ste/ de ltar shes rab dang thabs dus thams cad du mnyam pa'i dus na ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa pas chos so cog thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas na rang bzhin med pas dag par 'gyur/ ji srid du sems can 'khor ba'i mtha'
<p>293b</p>
<p>293b.1</p>med pa'i bar du 'jig rten gyi sdig pa'i chos thams cad dang / 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur gyis rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pas na de bas na sems can thams cad kyang mnyam par sbyor ba la 'dzud cing sgrib pa med par byed pa'i phyir/ ji srid 'khor ba de tsam gyi bar
<p>293b.2</p>du sems can 'dul zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed do/ /chos thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa med de ci la yang mi gnas pa'o/ /nam mkha' zhes bya ba yang sems can phyin ci log gis las kyi 'bras bu la nam mkha' yang dngos po mi snang ba'i phyir
<p>293b.3</p>med par 'dzin gyis/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ste mnyam pa'i dus kyi nam mkha' la ci zhig med na med ces bya ste/ med par lta ba yang mi 'byung bas na de bas na nam mkha' la yang mtshan grub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos so cog thams cad kyang nam mkha' bzhin te grub pa
<p>293b.4</p>med pas mnyam/ rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur bas na kun gyi mchog mngon pa nyid rdzogs zhes bya'o/ /dper na pad+ma tshogs kyis bsgyur yang sman gyi kha dog gis mi 'gyur ba bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gnyis su med pa'i mnyam par sbyor bas 'gro
<p>293b.5</p>ba la phan pa'i don byed kyi nyes pas 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa mnyam par sbyor bas longs spyod chen po'i nang du bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i don byed kyang rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul du gyur pas na longs spyod chen po dang yang mi
<p>293b.6</p>'bral ba'i phyir na don che/ stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mnyam par sbyor ba la gnas pas sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ni bde ba che ste/ de ltar na spyod pa la bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su rdzogs te/ sku gsum lhun gyis grub pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam
<p>293b.7</p>par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pas na sems can gyis hA zhes bya ba ni chos rgya chen po 'dis sems can smin par 'gyur bas dga' ste dgod pa'i tha tshig go/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mnyam par sbyor ba'i chos ni
<p>294a</p>
<p>294a.1</p>nyan pa la sogs te bsgom pa nan tan chen por byas na bde ba thams cad thob pa dang dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i don ni rtag tu bshad pa dang mthun no/ /gzhung las/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas de bzhin
<p>294a.2</p>gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi mig chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par
<p>294a.3</p>dag pa yongs su ston pas na/ oM ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir thog mar 'gro zhes bya'o/ /de man chad ni tshig gi mjug rgyan te/ yi ge'i nang nas dngos su zer bar zad do/ /zhal nas gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni ma rab kun la bka' yis kyang tshig go cog gi don de ni de bzhin
<p>294a.4</p>gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no bar gzhung las mngon sum du gsungs pa'i phyir sems can gyi phyir bstan pa rnams ma nor ba tsam mo/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul brgya lnga bcu ba'i 'grel ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na mi tras mdzad pa
<p>294a.5</p>rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sha tAk+Sha ra bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /de bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang / /khams gsum rnam rgyal nyid dang ni/ /
<p>294a.6</p>de bzhin spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /mkha' snying rdo rje khu tshur dang / /'jam dbyangs chos kyi 'khor lo can/ /mkha' mdzod de bzhin gnod sbyin dang / /bsdus pa dag tu yongs su bsgrags/ /zhi ba mdung gis mtshan dkyil 'khor/ /ma mo ming po'i dkyil 'khor dang / /sring mo
<p>294a.7</p>rnams kyis bshad pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor bcu dang lnga rnams ni/ /pha rol phyin drug las bshad de/ /pha rol phyin pa'i sgo nas gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje can de nyid/ /de bzhin bde bar gshegs pa'i dang / /rdo rje me ltar 'bar nyid dang / /'jig rten dbang dang mkha' snying po/ /
<p>294b</p>
<p>294b.1</p>bsdus dang ming po'i gang yin dang / /sring mo lha dang klu dag go/ /lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gzhan dag kyang / /de bzhin mchog gyur bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje can dang rgyal nyid dang / /rdo rje me 'bar pad+ma gnyis/ /rin chen ming po sring mo dang / /klu dang sdug bsngal grags bsdus pa/ /'di
<p>294b.2</p>rnams nyid kyis ras ris rnams/ /gong nas gong du bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje can dang bde gshegs nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten dbang / /mkha' snying bsdus par bshad pa ste/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag tu bshad/ /dpal mchog dang po'i gsum pa las/ /de ni dkyil 'khor bshad bya ste/ /
<p>294b.3</p>rdo rje can bde gshegs pad+ma/ /mkha' snying ming po'i dkyil 'khor dang / /sring mo klu dang sdug bsngal grags/ /gsum pa bcu par bshad pa yin/ /ras ris lnga pa snang bar grags/ /lha mo lnga yi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /bsdus pa nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /dpal mchog dang por
<p>294b.4</p>bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje rnam snang nyi ma dang / /'jig rten dbang dang mkha' snying dang / /ming po rnams dang sring mo klu/ /sdug bsngal gdon dang bsdus pa'o/ /ras ris dkyil 'khor lnga rnams dang / /bzhi pa dag tu yongs su bsgrags/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni 'byung ba yi/ /mdor
<p>294b.5</p>bsdus nas ni bshad bya ba/ /grangs ni bdun cu rtsa dgu ste/ /'di la rnam rtog bya mi dgos/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi grangs byas nas/ /da ni da lta nyid du yang / /phyag rgya'i dum bu bsdus pa dang / /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /dang po phyag rgya chen po nyid/ /de bzhin gnyis
<p>294b.6</p>pa dam tshig ste/ /gsum pa chos kyi rgyar grags pa/ /bzhi pa las kyi rgya nyid do/ /rgya yi dum bu bsdus pa can/ /skye med nyid du shes bya ste/ /gang gi mchog tu gtsor grur gang / /phyi nang thams cad yang dag 'dus/ /'di yi legs sbyor gtso bo yang / /da ni ma lus bshad
<p>294b.7</p>par bya/ /gang zhig gang dang yang dag sbyor/ /phyag rgya rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya che dang las su grags/ /yang dag sbyor bar bshad pa yin/ /dam tshig rgya dang chos kyang ni/ /'degs pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod/ /'di dag nyid kyi bsdus pa dag /ci 'dra ci phyir bshad bya
<p>295a</p>
<p>295a.1</p>ste/ /phyag rgya che dang yang dag sbyor/ /las kyi phyag rgyar bshad pa yin/ /gang phyir bsnams pa med na ni/ /nga rgyal 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ /phyag rgya chen po bsten mi 'gyur/ /chos med par ni bsgrub bya yis/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bsten med pas/ /gang zhig
<p>295a.2</p>bsgrub par bya sngags la/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod bya/ /lus ni gnas pa med pa dang / /dngos po med cing mtshan med la/ /skye ba med pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang po zla ba byung ba la/ /de 'og yi ge'i gzugs can te/ /yi ge las ni mtshan ma byung / /
<p>295a.3</p>mtshan las rdo rje 'dzin rang nyid/ /me long mnyam nyid ye shes dang / /so sor rtog dang bya ba'i bzhi/ /rnam par dag pa'ang nam mkha' ste/ /dngos med gnas pa lnga pa yin/ /phyag rgya chen por sar gyur cing / /chu nyid dam tshig yin par bshad/ /chos kyi phyag rgya me nyid de/ /rlung ni
<p>295a.4</p>las la rnam par gnas/ /'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yang dag sbyor/ /de bzhin khams dang skye mched dang / /rgyu dang mi rgyu sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin sa dang pha rol phyin/ /'di dag thams cad stong pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba rnam pa bzhir/ /mdor bsdus na ni 'byung 'gyur bas/ /de bas de
<p>295a.5</p>dag nyid du dgrol/ /las ni chos la dgrol bar bya/ /chos kyang de bzhin dam tshig la/ /dam tshig kyang ni rgya chen la/ /rgya chen zla ba stong pa la'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' snying rdo rje/ /lce la yang ni rtse gsum pa/ /bzhi pa'ang sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig yin par bshad/ /
<p>295a.6</p>gang gis bzhi po 'di dag gi/ /sbyor ba yang dag mi shes par/ /spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid/ /de las dngos grub rgyab kyis phyogs/ /dam tshig ye shes sngags rnams kyi/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mtshan ma nyid/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /bzlas brjod kyang ni 'di ltar bya/ /nyon
<p>295a.7</p>mongs thams cad zlog byed pa'i/ /yi ge brgya ba dang por brjod/ /thog ma dbus dang tha mar yang / /byin rlob byed pas bzlas par bya/ /bdag la byin rlob byed nyid dang / /tshe yang ring bar 'phel byed cing / /rgya rnams brtan por byed pa dang / /sku gsung thugs rnams sgrub pa po/ /oM badzra
<p>295b</p>
<p>295b.1</p>satwa zhes brjod pa/ /gsang sngags rgyal po mchog gis bstod/ /theg chen mngon du phyogs rnams la'ang / /khyab bdag ye shes lnga rang bzhin/ /gzugs dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /mchod rten dkyil 'khor brtag pa yang / /yi ge brgya sngags gcig 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i bsod
<p>295b.2</p>nams yod ma yin/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod pa las/ /bsod nams gang zhig legs gsungs pa/ /rdul phran gyi ni grangs snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis brgyan pa yin/ /gang zhig sa ma ya dang ni/ /ma nu pA la ya zhes brjod/ /rjes su bdag bsrungs shes pa ni/ /thams cad kyi
<p>295b.3</p>ni thun mong gis/ /lha rnams nye bar ston pa yin/ /badzra satwa twe no dang / /pa tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba dang / /dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba dang ni/ /su toSh+yo me b+ha ba nyid/ /a nu rag+to me b+ha ba/ /su poSh+yo me b+ha ba dang / /khams gsum sarba sid+d+him+me/ /pra yats+tsha sarba karma su/ /tsa zhes legs par brjod pa dang / /
<p>295b.4</p>me tsit+taM shre yaHku ru/ /hUM dang ho'i thog mtha' can/ /yi ge ha ha bzhi po brjod/ /b+ha ga bAn ni bdag gam kun/ /sarba ta thA ga tra nyid/ /badzra mA me muny+tsa dang / /badzrI b+ha ba bzhi pa yin/ /ma hA sa ma ya satwa/ /AHnyid kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /de bas kun du khyab pa nyid/ /gsang
<p>295b.5</p>sngags rgyal 'di bla med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni/ /yi ge brgya zhes bshad pa yin/ /ji srid dpal mchog dang po dang / /dpal ldan de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud/ /rnal 'byor rgyud dang bya ba nyid/ /mdo dang rtog pa gnyi ga las/ /dngos grub bsgrub par brtson pa las/ /
<p>295b.6</p>gsang sngags rgyal po gsungs pa rnams/ /der ni bzlas pa'i bsod nams gang / /de 'dir yi ge brgya pa yin/ /'dir bshad pa/ badzra satwa rdo rje can/ /sa ma ya rdor rgyal po nyid/ /ma nu pA la chags pa ste/ /tiSh+Tha badzra dag legs pa/ /dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rin chen/ /su toSh+yo me b+ha ba gzi/ /
<p>295b.7</p>a nu rag+to rgyal mtshan no/ /su toSh+yo me b+ha ba bzhad/ /sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha rdo rje chos/ /sarba karma su tsa me rdo rje rnon po/ /tsit+taM shre yaHku ru rgyu/ /hAM dang ha bzhi rdo rje smra/ /ho b+ha ga bAn ni rdo rje las/ /badzrI b+ha ba rdo rje srung ba/ /sa ma ya gnod sbyin/ AHni khu tshur shes par bya/ /'dir
<p>296a</p>
<p>296a.1</p>bshad pa/ oM ni rig pa b+ha ga ste/ /hUM ni rdo rje gyur pa yin/ /ha bzhi dag ni ye shes te/ /nam mkha' rnam dag lnga pa'o/ /shug rag twa tse pi sha na/ /tsi taM nyid ni lnga pa'o/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan par ni/ /'di dag nyid kyis shes par bya/ /byang chub sems ni
<p>296a.2</p>gnas med pa/ /de ni bskul ba nyid du bya/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod nas su/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni spro bar bya/ /shes rab thabs dang ror ldan pa/ /ru d+hi rar bcas blangs nas ni/ /yi ge brgya pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /bcu drug rtsibs can rim gsum bri/ /lte bar rdo rje rgya gram bri/ /phyogs bzhi
<p>296a.3</p>dag tu ha bzhi bri/ /bsgrub bya dngos su chud byas la/ /de nyid gsum ni bri bar bya/ /rtsibs la yi ge brgya pa yis/ /bcu drug rkang par byas pa bri/ /dang po bskor ba'i nang du ni/ /yi ge ma mo lnga bcus bskor/ /gnyis pa la ni 'dod rgyal bri/ /gsum par gtso bo gnod mdzes kyi/ /
<p>296a.4</p>gro ga'i gzhi'am ras la bri/ /gi wang dag gam snag tsha yis/ /bcu bzhi dag la bris nas ni/ /gser gyis legs par g.yogs par bya/ /gal te bdag nyid dpal 'dod na/ /mchod cing rtag tu bcang bar bya/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya pa 'chang / /dus min 'chi ba nyid dang ni/ /nad
<p>296a.5</p>dang mya ngan 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya pa 'chang / /dbul dang sdug bsngal sogs mi 'byung / /rgyal po'i sgo ni cher mchod cing / /dgra rnams kyang ni zad par 'gyur/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /yi ge brgya pa gang zhig 'chang / /bu 'dod pas ni bu rnyed cing / /nor
<p>296a.6</p>'dod pas ni nor thob 'gyur/ /yul med pa ni yul thob cing / /bu mos khyo ni dam pa rnyed/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas la rab dang / /de bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub la/ /gal te tshe ni ring 'dod na/ /yi ge brgya pa bcang bar bya/ /som nyi yid gnyis rnam spangs nas/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya
<p>296a.7</p>'chang ba/ /tshe 'dir bde bar 'gyur ba dang / /shi 'phos bde ba can du 'gro/ /gang zhig don ni rgyas pa dang / /dad dang ldan zhing dbang po thul/ /bla ma la gus dul ba dang / /phrag dog chags pa spangs la sbyin/ /gal te tshe 'di ring 'dod na/ /chad lta khros bcas sgyu can dang / /bra ya
<p>296b</p>
<p>296b.1</p>can dang gdug can la/ /sngags pas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /mi gtsang thams cad za ba'am/ /dgra yi nang du phyin na yang / /gtsang mar gyur pas rab mchod la/ /yi ge brgya pa bcang bar bya/ /gnod mdzes mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ /bum chu la brgyar bzlas nas su/ /dad dang ldan la
<p>296b.2</p>byin na ni/ /tshe dang nad med 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'phrog cing dpal bskyed la/ /sdig pa thams cad bzlog pa ste/ /ngan 'gro thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/ /yi ge brgya pa bcang bar bya/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya pa 'chang / /dag byed bkra shis dpal dang ldan/ /bgegs
<p>296b.3</p>rnams thams cad 'jig par byed/ /lha rnams kun gyi byin gyis rlob/ /zas dang de bzhin chang rnams la/ /yi ge brgya pa bzlas na ni/ /bdud rtsir byed pa'i mchog yin te/ /dug rnams ma lus sel bar byed/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya pa 'dzin/ /mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro langs dang / /
<p>296b.4</p>grib gnon dang ni brjed byed kyis/ /'tshe bar byed par mi nus so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis ni/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags gsungs te/ /bdud rtsir byed pa nyid dang ni/ /rga dang na dang 'jig byed pa'i/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas sngags zlos pa/ /ltung ba che
<p>296b.5</p>dang ldan rnams kyang / /sangs rgyas nges par mthong bar 'gyur/ /g.yul du rgyal mtshan la btags te/ /yi ge brgya pa mchod byas nas/ /rgyal po'i mdun du bzung na ni/ /dgra las rgyal zhing pha rol thub/ /g.yul sogs 'jigs pa mi bzad la/ /mtshon gyi char 'bab 'khrug pa ru/ /
<p>296b.6</p>pha rol gnod pa byas na ni/ /rgyal 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa yis/ /mtshon cha gzhon pa lam 'jug dang / /rtsed mo glu gar dga' ston cher/ /'byor pa bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags yi ge brgya bzlas na/ /blun po blo ni 'phel 'gyur la/ /skal
<p>296b.7</p>ngan rnams kyang skal ldan 'gyur/ /byur dang sdug bsngal rnam par 'jig /gal te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na/ /dam tshig spyod pa la gnas shing / /gsang sngags yi ge brgya bzlas pa/ /sngags pa yis ni rtag tu bya/ /dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dus dag dang / /sgrub pa ras ris bri ba dang / /
<p>297a</p>
<p>297a.1</p>rkang bsku mig sman sa 'og la/ /gus pas yi ge brgya pa bzlas/ /gsang sngags yi ge brgya bzlas pas/ /tshul 'chal brtul zhugs can 'gyur zhing / /bcings pa 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/ /bud med nyid kyang skyes par 'gyur/ /yi ge brgya ba zhes bya ba/ /rang
<p>297a.2</p>bzhin gyis ni grub pa ste/ /lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / /shes rab pha rol phyin 'bras mnyam/ /sems rtogs par ni gang gsungs dang / /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /gang yang rdo rje'i bdag nyid gnas/ /ji bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
<p>297a.3</p>nga rgyal dang / /me long la blta sngon 'gro dang / /dbab dang brtan par bya ba dag /thams cad yi ge brgya pas bya/ /yi ge brgya pa zlos byed cing / /sems dang mkha' la bzhag na ni/ /dag pa'i shel dang 'dra ba yi/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid
<p>297a.4</p>ni/ /mngon sum yi ge brgya nyid de/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis gzugs pa yin/ /tshe dang mdog dang gzi bskyed cing / /lus ni zhi dang rgyas par 'gyur/ /ji srid nyi zla skar ma gnas/ /de srid lus ni brtan par byed/ /gang zhig yi ge brgya pa
<p>297a.5</p>bsgrub/ /srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing / /dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang / /lha gzhan dag la phyag mi bya/ /yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par mthu/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dang / /'dra ba ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /nad ni chen por 'byung ba
<p>297a.6</p>dang / /mu ge dgra dang 'thab pa dang / /tshe dang gnod byed grib mas phog /yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya/ /bdud kyi las nyid byung ba na/ /yi ge brgya pa bris nas ni/ /rgyal mtshan la ni btags nas su/ /phyogs kun du ni bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skur/ /bdag nyid
<p>297a.7</p>yongs su bsams nas ni/ /rnga chen dag ni brdungs nas su/ /gu gul gyis ni bdug par bya/ /gang du spyod pa'i gnas las ni/ /dgra bo nges par 'byung ba dang / /der ni bdud rnams 'jig 'gyur ba'i/ /dngos grub yi ge brgya pas bya/ /lcags las khru gang tsam gyis ni/ /zhi ba'i spos
<p>297b</p>
<p>297b.1</p>khang byas nas su/ /yu ba rin chen rdo rjes brgyan/ /kha ni sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /snod nyid kyi ni nang dag tu/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i pad+ma bya/ /de yi dbus su bri ba ni/ /rdo rje rtse gsum pa nyid de/ /drag cing 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs/ /bsreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur mchog /ha ha zhes
<p>297b.2</p>bya'i sgra yis 'khrugs/ /ba yi mar dang yang dag ldan/ /sa ni legs par brdungs nas su/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i pad+mo ni/ /bris nas sngags pas 'dab brgyad dang / /dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje bri/ /spos dang me tog rnams dang ni/ /zho dang bu ram kha ras mchod/ /ba yi rnam lngas
<p>297b.3</p>bsang bya zhing / /sha ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /'bru rnams kun dang ldan pa dang / /til dang ma sha yang dag ldan/ /'byung po thams cad tshim byed pa/ /phyogs rnams kun du gtor bar bya/ /gang zhig khyim der gnas pa yi/ /'byung po ring du song nas ni/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni phyin
<p>297b.4</p>nas su/ /ha ha zer zhing sems med gnas/ /ji srid nyi zla gnas kyi bar/ /khyim dang grong rdal ljongs rnams su/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'byor pa dang / /bya ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bsnyems pa yis/ /phyogs rnams kun du song nas ni/ /skad gdangs che
<p>297b.5</p>ba dag gis ni/ /yi ge brgya pa'i sngags zlos shing / /g.yas kyis rdo rje bsor byas la/ /g.yon gyis de bzhin dril bu gzung / /a mr-i ta hUM zhes brjod cing / /rtag par phyogs su tsham ngam bya/ /de 'og rdo rje bsdams pa yis/ /yu ba nas ni bzung nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
<p>297b.6</p>bsgyings pa yis/ /gsang sngags yi ge brgya pa bzlas/ /rig 'dzin 'dis ni zhi ba la/ /'byung po bzlog pa'i phyag bya zhing / /gdon rnams ma lus rnam 'jig phyir/ /zhi ba'i mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /gtso bor gyur pa brgya nyid ni/ /lus nyid la ni rten byed pas/ /des na 'di yi
<p>297b.7</p>ming gi gtso/ /rgyud 'dir yi ge brgya par bshad/ /mtshams med lnga dang ldan pa yang / /yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba'i/ /mtshan mchog gang gis thos gyur pa/ /ngan 'gro kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /gang la dmigs te gsang sngags ni/ /yi ge brgya zhes bya ba bri/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang
<p>298a</p>
<p>298a.1</p>nyid ni/ /'chi bdag sgor bzhud bsnams nas byon/ /glegs bam la ni bris nas su/ /de bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni/ /dbus su ga bur bcug nas bcang / /khyim du dus gsum dag tu mchod/ /de ni dbul por mi 'gyur la/ /nad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / /yams
<p>298a.2</p>dang gnod byed nyid dang ni/ /'chi bdag la ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /gang zhig gsang sngags rgyal po 'di/ /lus dang ngag sems dang ba yis/ /mos pas mnyam gzhag bzlas na ni/ /sangs rgyas mchog nyid thob par 'gyur/ /de ni dus byed gyur pa na/ /dur khrod kyi ni sems can rnams/ /
<p>298a.3</p>gang zhig dri ni snom byed pa/ /bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs can 'gyur/ /mthar ni thar par gzhol 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /las rnams thams cad byed 'di nyid/ /bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed/ /
<p>298a.4</p>zhi dang rgyas par byed pa dang / /tshe ring mngon par 'phel bar byed/ /gro ga'i gzhi la bris nas ni/ /gang zhig 'phral la 'chang byed pa/ /tshe zad gyur pa'ang bde bar ni/ /lo ni sum brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /'dir bshad pa/ oM badzra satwa rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas so/ /sa ma ya rdo rje rgyal
<p>298a.5</p>po'i sgo nas so/ /ma nu pA la ya rdo rje chags pa'i sgo nas so/ /badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha rdo rje legs pa'i sgo nas so/ /dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rdo rje rin chen gyi sgo nas so/ /su toSh+yo me b+ha ba rdo rje gzi brjid kyi sgo nas so/ /a nu rak+to me b+ha ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi sgo nas so/ /su poSh+yo me b+ha ba rdo rje bzhad pa'i sgo nas so/ /sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha rdo rje chos kyi
<p>298a.6</p>sgo nas so/ /sarba karma su tsa me rdo rje rnon po'i sgo nas so/ /tsit+taM shre yaHku ru rdo rje rgyu'i sgo nas so/ /hUM ha ha ha ha rdo rje smra ba'i sgo nas so/ /ho b+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rdo rje las kyi sgo nas so/ /mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba rdo rje srung ba'i sgo nas so/ /ma hA sa ma ya satwa rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sgo nas so/ /AHrdo rje khu tshur gyi sgo nas so/ /yi ge brgya pa bshad
<p>298a.7</p>pa las/ /bsod nams legs par gang bsags pa/ /des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gyur cig /yi ge brgya pa'i bshad pa la/ /slob dpon pad+ma'i rdo rje lcags kyus stong phrag brgya pa las ji snyed pa rnams brjed du dogs nas bris pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po'i sngags/ yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //
<p>298b</p>
<p>298b.1\] ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sha tAk+Sha ra bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ yi ge brgya pa'i cho ga /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sa phyogs der sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun gyi bar snang la dmigs
<p>298b.2</p>te/ de rnams la dang por mchod pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / lam la gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas/ de'i 'og tu bdag dang dngos po thams cad mi snang
<p>298b.3</p>par byas shing sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du bsgom mo/ /oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA wa shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ de nas oM tsit+taM pra ti bya d+haM kA ro mi/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis a yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs can bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pAd yA mi/ 
<p>298b.4</p>zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis de nyid spro bar bya'o/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ zhes bya bas hUM las byung ba nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par gnas pa'i rdo rje bsams la/ de nas rdo rje'i gzugs de las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus pa dang / rdo rje dang zla ba yongs su
<p>298b.5</p>gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams par sngags 'dis bdag nyid bsam par bya'o/ /satwa sarba ta thA ga ta ta thA ma haM/ de'i 'og tu hUM las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bsams la/ de'i steng du sna
<p>298b.6</p>tshogs rdo rje/ de'i lte bar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par bsam mo/ /shar phyogs su mi bskyod pa/ lhor rin chen 'byung ldan/ nub tu 'od dpag tu med pa/ byang du don yod grub pa'o/ /shar lhor rdo rje sems ma/ phyag gnyis pa sku mdog nag po/ phyag g.yon pa dkur brten pa/ 
<p>298b.7</p>phyag rked par 'jog pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /lho nub tu rdo rje rin chen ma sku mdog ser ba phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yon pa dkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na rin po che bsnams pa'o/ /nub byang du rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dmar ba/ phyag gnyis
<p>299a</p>
<p>299a.1</p>pa phyag g.yon pa dkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /byang shar du rdo rje las ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yon dkur brten pa/ phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /'khor lo'i dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te bskor phyogs
<p>299a.2</p>su rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rtsibs bcu drug la bsam par bya ste/ de la rtsibs kyi dbus su thams cad kyang sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bya'o/ /de la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog ljang gu g.yon pa bsnyoms pas dkur
<p>299a.3</p>brten pa/ phyag g.yas na rang gi thugs kar rdo rje bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyal po sku mdog ser po rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje chags pa sku mdog nag po phyag na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje legs pa sku mdog margad lta bu/ phyag
<p>299a.4</p>gnyis kyis legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa'o/ /rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma sku mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /
<p>299a.5</p>rdo rje rgyal mtshan sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje bzhad pa sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar po phyag gnyis kyis so'i phreng ba gnyi ga dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje chos sku mdog dmar skya phyag
<p>299a.6</p>g.yon pas pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yas pas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'byed pa'o/ /rdo rje rnon po sku mdog gur kum gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa phyag g.yas kyis ral gri 'phyar ba'o/ /rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can
<p>299a.7</p>chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje smra ba sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yon pa na dung bsnams pa phyag g.yas pa lce'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje las sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams nas spyi bor 'jog cing gar mdzad pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje srung ba sku mdog
<p>299b</p>
<p>299b.1</p>ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po phyag gnyis kyis mche ba gnyis rang bzhin gyis thad kar bsnams nas gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsnams pa dang ldan
<p>299b.2</p>par bsam mo/ /de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya ho/ /haM zhes bya bas bdag nyid la bltas la/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes bya ba 'dis mdun du ye shes sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsgoms la/ sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ zhes bya ba 'dis snying gar bcug
<p>299b.3</p>ste/ bdag dang mi gnyis pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom mo/ /de nas yi ge hUM las byung ba rdo rje 'od dang ldan pa'i tshul can gyi lce bsam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyi bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang cod pan gyi dbang dang / phreng ba'i dbang dang / rdo rje'i dbang
<p>299b.4</p>la sogs pa rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /yi ge brgya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ak+Sha su tra lak+Sha Na/ bod skad du/ bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la
<p>299b.5</p>lha mo sangs rgyas spyan mas zhus pa/ bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i don ci lags/ /mchog gi dbang phyug gis gsung du gsol/ rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa/ lha mo nyon cig rab tu bshad do/ /khyod kyis zhus pa de brjod par bya'o/ /de thams cad kyi gtam bshad do/ /sems can thams cad la
<p>299b.6</p>phan pa'i don du'o/ /mi spang ba'i sems kyi sdom pa de bzhin du bsod nams dang ye shes mi spang ba thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bzlas pa'i phreng ba 'di'o/ /gang la bzlas pa'i phreng ba la dad pa mos pa gus pas gzung ngo / /sdig pa thams cad spong ngo / /sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur
<p>299b.7</p>ro/ /gang du bzung na mgrin pa dang lag pa'i rtsa bar ro/ /des ni bya ba thams cad 'grub par nges so/ /bzlas pa byas pas lha mo dang dpa' bo nges par grub pa rab tu ster ro/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis thob pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam par 'byung ngo / /byis pa gzhon nu rnams kyis sdig pa
<p>300a</p>
<p>300a.1</p>mang po byas pa dang / thams cad spangs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rkang pa gcig pa'i bzlas pa'i skud pa 'dzin pas/ bzlas na lha'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /phyed kyi tshad kyis bzlas na des lha dang lha mo'i bde ba mthong ngo / /mang ba yis bzlas na brdzun pa'i ngag spangs
<p>300a.2</p>pa'o/ /dung gi la bzlas pa'i yon tan gcig 'byung ngo / /lung tang la bzlas pas yon tan gnyis 'byung ngo / /lcags la bzlas pas yon tan gsum 'byung ngo / /de la la bzlas pas yon tan bzhi'o/ /nor bu mu tig byi ru la bzlas pas yon tan bcu dran no/ /dbang po'i dmigs
<p>300a.3</p>la bzlas pas yon tan bcu 'byung ngo / /pad+ma la bzlas pas yon tan bye ba'o/ /yon tan bye ba ru drAk+Sha la'o/ /bo de tsi la bzlas pas bcu drug dang 'dra bar dus 'das pa yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo / /bzlas pa phreng ba'i yon tan 'di dag rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o/ /mkhas
<p>300a.4</p>pas lhag pa dang chad par mi bya'o/ /lhag pa chad pa la bgegs chen po 'jug go/ /des na mnyam par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i dus song nas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /sdigs mdzub snying gar byas te mdzub mos bzlas na bgegs bkug nas tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gung mos
<p>300a.5</p>bgrangs pas the tshom med par dngos grub 'byung ngo / /srin lag gis bgrangs pas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub 'grub bo/ /mthe chung gis bgrangs pas sha za dgug pa dang bskrad pa 'grub bo/ /mdo 'dzin la bskor zhing bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta sa
<p>300a.6</p>ra he ta dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sna kru bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ sku khrus [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]cho ga /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po rnal 'byor pa man ngag thob pas rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
<p>300a.7</p>pas/ rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo thob pa'i phyir bsod nams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas la sku khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de la 'di'i cho ga ni/ ci 'byor zhing gang thob pa'i me tog bdug pa mar me dri mchog zhal zas dang / na bza' rgyan sogs mchod yon bum par 'bru lnga ni nas gro so ba til sran ma/ bo ga
<p>300b</p>
<p>300b.1</p>ling dang / yungs kar dang star ka shri pha la go yu dzA ti pha la la sogs pa dang / sman lnga ni ha sa de ba kaN+Da ka ri gr-i ha de ba ba la mu tra la sogs pa dang / dri zhim po'i sman dang dri zhim po'i mar khu mar zho dang 'o ma dang / ma su ra'i phye ma dang / gro bag phye dang / dar kha dog lnga pa'i 'phan dpyangs la
<p>300b.2</p>bum pa byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bya'o/ /de'i cho ga 'di'o/ /mdun du gang yin pa'i kha dog la sogs pas maN+Dal bya'o/ /g.yas su ci 'byor pa'i rdzas bzhag la/ de nas maN+Da la sngon du bum pa bcu'am lnga'am gcig gi nang du srog chags med pa'i dri zhim po'i chus yongs su gang ba 'bru
<p>300b.3</p>dang bri ha de ba la sogs pa gos phrog can gyis mgrin pa bcings la/ g.yon du snod cig yang dag par gzhag go/ /mchod yon gyi snod dri zhim po'i chu dang zho dang bo ga ling dang sman dang yungs kar dang ko su ma dang go yu rnams yang dag par bshams la/ yi dam gyi lha'i sngags nyi shu rtsa
<p>300b.4</p>gcig bzlas la/ de nas las thams cad pa'i snod g.yas su dri zhim pa'i chus yongs su gang ba gzhag go/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags kyang bzlas te'o/ /de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par zla ba rdo rje la sogs pa'am/ skad cig mas bsgom pa'i rim pas rdzogs par bya'o/ /pad+ma
<p>300b.5</p>lnga la hUM gyur pa las rdo rje hUM gis mtshan pa las 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhug par bya'o/ /de zhu bas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ rdo rje dril bu bsgying bas 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ snying gar zla ba rdo rje hUM gi rnam pa'o/ /
<p>300b.6</p>yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan bsam gtan bya'o/ /de bzhin du bum pa rnam par snang mdzad/ rin chen 'byung ldan/ snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub pa/ spyan ma/ mA ma kI/ gos dkar mo/ sgrol ma bdud rtsi 'khyil pa mtha' mar rdzogs pa ni
<p>300b.7</p>phyag gnyis pa zhal gcig pa rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rang gi sa bon dang mtshan ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g.yon brkyang ba'i bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sdigs mdzub dang rdo rje bsor ba bsgom mo/ /yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod cing sor mo'i rdo rje dang / 
<p>301a</p>
<p>301a.1</p>yi ge gsum gyi me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ de nas dril bu'i sngags kyis mchod/ de la sngags ni/ oM AHhUM/ oM badzra g+haN+Da ra Na ra Na pra raN pra ra Na saM pra ra Na saM pra ra Na/ sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsa li ta ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA sra b+hA ba bi shud+d+he badzra hr-i da ya
<p>301a.2</p>san+to Sha ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nyid g.yas pa'i sor mos rdo rje dang spos khang bzung la g.yon pas dril bu dkrol lo/ /yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod do/ /oM badzra d+h+r-i ka AHhUM swA hA/ oM dzi na dzika AHhUM swA hA/ oM rat+na d+h+r-i ka AHhUM swA hA/ oM A ro li ka AHhUM swA hA/ oM badzra
<p>301a.3</p>d+h+r-ika AHswA hA/ oM ru ru spu ru dzra la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM shaM ka ri shIn+taM ka ri go tra ni ga te ga te ku tra ni swA hA/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Ti ka ro Ti bi ri swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+tA badzrA NA na mo/ badzra kro d+hA ya ma hA daM Sh+T+rot+ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya a si
<p>301a.4</p>mu sal pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM badzra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya sarba bi g+h+nAM bi nA ya kaM ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI ba tIn+ta ka ra ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /de nas sngags 'di rim
<p>301a.5</p>pa ji lta bar rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i bum par mchod yon me tog la sogs pa sbyin no/ /sngon du brjod pa'i dril bu dkrol zhing sbyin no/ /snang gsal mar me dri mchog zhal zas kyis gang ba'i snod sbyin no/ /de nas g.yon pa'i dril bu dkur brten la g.yas pa'i sor mo rdo rje dang bcas pa'i
<p>301a.6</p>rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya bum pa'i steng du yang dag par bzhag la yang me tog la sogs pas mchod do/ /zhu ba'i bsam gtan gyi bum pa byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas thang sku la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das ma'i yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam mo/ /khrus kyi las kyi yo byad
<p>301a.7</p>dang / shis pa'i cho ga ni snod kyi stegs gru gsum pa'i shing bzhag la/ de'i gru la chang pa gnyis dang me'i snod dang mar me gsum bzhag la sngon du g.yas/ yungs kar las bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis mngon par bsngags te/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ sngags 'dis
<p>301b</p>
<p>301b.1</p>me'i nang du blugs la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis bsnyen la lan gsum bskor te phyi rol du dor ro/ /bsang gtor gyis khrus bya ba'i thabs ni/ de bzhin du me tog la sogs pa la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bsang gtor gyis gtor te/ bsang gtor gyis me long legs par phyis la/ oM
<p>301b.2</p>'di ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen/ /bla na med pa'i skyes bu dang / /'dul ba'i kha los sgyur ba dang / /lha dang mi yi ston pa ni/ /sangs rgyas
<p>301b.3</p>bcom ldan 'das nyid do/ /de dag la 'dir mchod pa'i rdzas rnams dang / khrus kyi yo byad thams cad thogs te sngon du mchod pa lngas mchod do/ /rim pas 'dag pa'i tshal dang so shing dang bum pa'i chus bkru'o/ /zho dang 'o ma dang 'bru lnga dang po ga ling dang star ka la sogs pa'i 'bras bu dang / sman
<p>301b.4</p>lnga dang de bzhin du sman thams cad dang / rin po che dang gur kum dang dri bzangs thams cad do/ /der rdzas rnams te bum pa'i chus bkru'o/ /oM rang gi rdzas dang sna na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hri ya bri he hUM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ chus
<p>301b.5</p>bkru ba'i sngags so/ /las thams cad pa'i bum pas bya'o/ /de nas lha la dbang bskur chen po bya ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags phreng rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo'i sngags brjod cing / de bzhin bltams pa rtsom dus su/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /
<p>301b.6</p>lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /bdag gis de bzhin khrus bya'o/ /zhes pas so/ /yang dag par rgyal ba'i bum pa la me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ yi ge brgya pa dang de bzhin du badzra d+h+r-i ka la sogs pa dang / oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ye hri bi hUM/ zhes pas dbang bskur ro/ /
<p>301b.7</p>de nas dri zhim po'i bdug pa la ras dag pas bdug ste/ me long gi chu dag par bya'o/ /dri zhim pa'i rdzas kyis me long la maN+Dal lnga'i mtshan ma byas te/ der me tog bzhag ste gzhug par bya'o/ /dril bu dang bdug spos thogs ta sngon du mchod pa'i bdug pa dang me tog la sogs pas
<p>302a</p>
<p>302a.1</p>mchod pa bya ste lha bshos kyi snod dbul lo/ /yi dam gyi lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa la zhal zas la sogs pa'i mchod pa phul la gtor ma sbyin no/ /bstod pas bstod de me tog dor te gzhag go/ /sems can gyi don du bsod nams bsngo'o/ /de nas gshegs su gsol lo/ 
<p>302a.2</p>'di ni khrus kyi cho ga'o// //paN+Di ta sa ra he ta dang / lo tsA ba nag tsho dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsai t+ya bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>302a.3</p>gang gis sku gsum brnyes te 'gro don mthar phyin pa/ de la phyag 'tshal nas ni de nyid bsgrub bya'i phyir/ rang gis rtogs pa gtsor byas lung kun tshul mi 'gal/ /rnal 'byor gzhung lugs mchod rten bshad par bya/ de la dang por gnas dben pa yid du 'ong bar byi dor byas la ji skad
<p>302a.4</p>bshad pa'i sa sbyang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga byas te/ der stegs bu ji ltar mos pa byas la ba'i lci ba dang tsan+dan dang gur kum la sogs pa ci 'byor ba'i dri zhim po'i chus skyang nul byas te me tog gi sil ma bkram/ nye 'khor spos chus chag chag gdab/ bla re dang 'phan la sogs pa dag dang rol
<p>302a.5</p>mo'i rnam pa dag dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dag dang / mchod pa'i bye brag rnams 'byor tshad bshams la gzhag /gzhan yang mchod rten nam tsha tsha'i yo byad skol phor dang / sku gdung dang / rtsa ba'i snying po'am rten 'brel gyi snying po dang / gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs
<p>302a.6</p>dang / 'bru mar ga bur la sogs pa dri zhim pos bsgyur ba dang / phag ze dang gang gi don du bya ba'i ming dang / me tog la sogs te mchod pa lnga dang / 'khor lo la sogs pa dag kyang bshams te gzhag /tsha tsha 'debs pa'i slob dpon la sogs pa kun kyang ji skad gsungs pa'i khrus
<p>302a.7</p>dag byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgo ba dang rgyan gyis brgyan te/ shar dang nub gang bde bar stan bting ste sdig pa bshags pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / sdom pa gzung ba dang / phyag bzhi pas phyag bya ste/ cho ga'i rim pa rang gi lugs bzhin byas la
<p>302b</p>
<p>302b.1</p>mnyam par bzhag nas rtag tu byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis mchod rten gdab par bya'o/ /mchod rten gdab pa'i sa gar brko ba'i gnas der brtag cing byin gyis brlabs te bgegs bskrad pa dang / gtor ma byin te tshon skud la sngags/ oM badzra su tra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ ces bya ba dang rdo rje'i skud
<p>302b.2</p>par bsams la/ sa khyon ci ran tsam tshon skud kyis bskor te/ seng ldeng ngam lcags phur byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang sngags bzlas te gdab bo/ /oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ phur bu'i sngags de lan bdun bzlas la dbus dang phyogs bzhir gdab bo/ /yungs kar
<p>302b.3</p>dang spos chu bsres la sngags bzlas la phyogs der gtor ro/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgya bya'o/ /de nas ci tsam 'dod pa'i sa de dag brko'o/ /sngags la oM badzra kha na kha nA ya hUM phaT/ ces brjod do/ /sa gzhi de nyid rin po cher gyur par bsam mo/ /de nas brkos te
<p>302b.4</p>cho ga pa dang hUM bzhis phur bu thams cad bton la/ oM ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur bu bkrus te bu gar blugs so/ /sa blangs pa rnams kyang phyogs gcig tu snod gtsang ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ sa brdung ba'i tho ba
<p>302b.5</p>la rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags/ oM badzra mud+ga ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ ces brdung ngo / /de nas 'jim pa spru pa'i tshe spos chu la/ oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ ces bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te byin gyis brlabs la spos chu de a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ de'i
<p>302b.6</p>'od zer gyis spos chu nyid khyab par 'khyil nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la sbru'o/ /sngags la oM badzra pra marda nA ya swA hA/ zhes pas so/ /de nas 'jim pa de la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo bang bar bkan la mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe bos
<p>302b.7</p>mnan te/ sor mo gsum nas re tsam phye ste gzhag pa'i steng du lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo kha spub la/ g.yon pa ltar byas te 'jim pa'i steng du bzhag la rig pa chen mo'i sngags/ oM suk+Sh+me suk+Sh+me suk+Sh+ma a nu ga te nir ku le ni rba Ni sarba bud+d+ha yA nu ga te ya sho ba ti ya sho dzi ni d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ d+harma
<p>303a</p>
<p>303a.1</p>rA dza ba shi te/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la byin gyis brlabs pas de las ye shes kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas sems can gyi don byas te slar bsdus bas 'jim pa de nyid rin po che sna lnga'i gong bu'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam/ de
<p>303a.2</p>nas 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags la/ oM badzrod b+hA bA ya swA hA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas pas ye shes lnga'i 'od zer gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu mtha' yas par 'phros shing khengs te 'gro ba mang po'i don byas nas/ slar 'dus pa 'bi 'bi'i nang du zhugs te thim par gyur pas/ ye shes lnga rgyas te
<p>303a.3</p>shel sgong dag pa ltar bsam mo/ /rang rang gi sa bon gyis seng ge la sogs pa dang / rin po che'i gdan dang nyi zla dang pad+ma'i gdan khrir phyogs phyogs su gdan bshams la/ de rnams kyi dbus su sa bon gyi yi ge dang 'byin pa'i yi ges rang rang gi sgrub thabs las ji skad gsungs pa dang / 
<p>303a.4</p>ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa dang / rnal 'byor gsum gyis rdzogs pa phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rim pa bzhin du rang rang gi sgrub thabs las bstan pa ji bzhin du byas te/ tsan+dan gyi lde gus thig le zlum por byas la byin gyis brlab pa ni hUM dmar po las ye shes kyi me
<p>303a.5</p>dbung rab tu 'bar bas de nyid du rab tu sbyangs te/ gzhi de yang rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsam mo/ /de nas re re'i gdan du yang pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam mo/ /de'i dbus su gong du bshad pa ltar lha re re nas rang gi rtog
<p>303a.6</p>ba las 'byung ba ltar bzhugs su gsol te dam tshig sems dpar byas la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyang phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas snying gar zla ba'i
<p>303a.7</p>dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsams la/ ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / bde bar gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa sprin phung ltar mu 'byam par 'phro shing / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don
<p>303b</p>
<p>303b.1</p>mdzad cing byin gyis brlabs nas slar 'dus te/ dam tshig sems dpa' de nyid la thim par bsam mo/ /de nas mchod pa lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag par mchod nas/ lha so so'i bstod pa re re nas byas la so so'i phrin las dang dam tshig gi sgo nas smon lam gdab bo/ /de
<p>303b.2</p>la 'di nyid kyi cho ga'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ 'bi 'bi'i nang du lha so so'i snying po/ /oM hUM trAM hrIHaH/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang snying po gong ma gnyis bcug la/ sngags badzra d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he dz+wa la swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes de de'i nang du zhugs
<p>303b.3</p>par bsam mo/ /de nas skol phor du yungs mar ram til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags oM a ra dze bi ra dza swA hA/ zhes gsum brjod pas byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bsam mo/ /de nas skol phor du gzhug pa'i sngags/ oM badzra d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ thabs dang shes
<p>303b.4</p>rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings su bsam mo/ /de nas brdung ba ni/ oM badzra mud+ga ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM/ gong ma'i snying po gnyis kyang brjod la/ dbyung ba'i sngags oM d+harma ra te swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / thabs dang shes
<p>303b.5</p>rab 'brel pa las chos kyi skur grub par bsams te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma kA ya ma hA su kha su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de las gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis byung bas 'gro ba'i don bsam gyis mi khyab par bsams te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sam+b+ho ga kA ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta nirma Na kA ya sa
<p>303b.6</p>ma ya s+t+waM/ de la dang por mchod rten ni chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes smos te/ sa dang rdo dang shing dang gser dngul la sogs pa dag las sems can gyi rtsol bas bsgrubs te/ dbyibs kyi bye brag tu byas pa de dag ni gzugs brnyan zhes gdags te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhung dag las/ 
<p>303b.7</p>chos kyi sku ni sku med nam mkha' 'dra/ /zhes 'byung ste/ brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin yang chos thams cad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i don gyis mchod rten gyi dbyibs lta bur grub pas/ des na chos kyi sku ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de la chos kyi sku zhes 'dod
<p>304a</p>
<p>304a.1</p>do/ /de bas na 'di ltar snang ba ni gzugs brnyan yin par shes par bya'o/ /yang na gzugs 'di ltar grub pa ni sku gsum gyi tshul yin te rmang dge ba bcu dang / bang rim dang po nas kha khyer gyi bar du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / srog shing shes pa
<p>304a.2</p>bcu'i bar du rgyu'i chos bsod nams kyi tshogs yin te sprul ba'i sku yin pa dang / 'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / char khebs thugs rje chen po dang / zla tshes byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa dang / me long ye shes gzhi
<p>304a.3</p>dang / tog mngon par shes pa drug dang / dar gyi cod pan dang gdugs kyis chos kyi skur mnga' gsol te chos kyi rgyal por gyur pa dang / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyan chen po ste/ nam mkha' lding gi kha nas byung ba ni thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang ye
<p>304a.4</p>shes kyi shugs mnga' ba dang / ba dan chos kyi grags pa chen po dang / dril bu snyan pas phyogs bcur khyab pa dang / rdo rings mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pa dang / them skas srung ba med pa gsum mam so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'am rnam par thar pa bzhi ste/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
<p>304a.5</p>dang smon pa med pa dang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pa'i lam mkhyen pa dang / dril bu tshangs pa'i dbyangs sam gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pas de dag ni 'bras bu'i chos ye shes kyi tshogs yin pas chos kyi skur bstan pa dang / a ma la sar rin po che'i phreng
<p>304a.6</p>ba dang / gzhan yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis sbras pa mdzes pa dang blta bas chog mi shes pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tshim par byed pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste de dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos te/ nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa spyi
<p>304a.7</p>la bstan pa'i tshes shin tu rgya che ba'o/ /de bas na 'di ni sku gsum gyi dam tshig gi sems dpar byas la dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dam/ dkyil 'khor gang dang gang la mos pa'i lha rnams sku gsum brnyes pa'am/ ldan pa de dag gi sku gsum ye shes kyi sems dpa' chos
<p>304b</p>
<p>304b.1</p>kyi dbyings nas spyan drangs te/ bstims nas bsgrub pa ni lcags kyu la sogs pa sngags dang phyag rgya dang gong du bstan pa'i sku gsum gyi snying pos bya'o/ /srog shing gi sngags la/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ sems can thams cad shes pa bcu dang ldan par gyur cig /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan
<p>304b.2</p>pa dam pa'i chos yun ring du mi nub par gyur cig /sems can thams cad lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas kun du bzang po'i smon lam la 'jug par gyur cig /'khor lo'i sngags la/ oM pra marda na ye swA hA/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ma
<p>304b.3</p>'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum thob par gyur cig /rnam par thar pa brgyad thob par gyur cig /ye shes bzhi dang ldan par gyur cig /dar gyi cod pan gyi sngags la/ oM pa kaM pa la swA hA/ sems can thams cad dus dang rnam pa thams cad du dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa mchod
<p>304b.4</p>pa dang bsnyen bkur gyi rnam pa mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de dag gi mchod rten dang sku gzugs dang gsung rab la sogs pa yang dag pa la mchod pa byed par gyur cig /ba dan gyi sngags la/ oM pA taM ke swA hA/ sems can thams cad chos kyi grags pa dang snyan pa bsam
<p>304b.5</p>gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig /chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi sngags la/ oM kum+b+hi ra d+h+wa dza swA hA/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba mi spong ba'i bdud bzhi las rgyal zhing chos mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du gyur cig /gdugs kyi sngags la/ oM pra ma na ye swA hA/ sems can thams cad bla
<p>304b.6</p>na med pa'i skyabs dang ldan zhing chos kyi rgyal po chen por gyur cig /me tog gi phreng ba'i sngags la/ oM rat+na mA le traM/ zhes bya ba'am/ na maHshre ya d+hA nu ga ta pra tiSh+Tha ta/ puSh+pe ke ta be ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM duSh+pe swA hA/ sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe
<p>304b.7</p>byad du ldan te blta bas chog mi shes pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par gyur cig /gdan dbul ba'i sngags la/ oM sun+da ri dza ye swA hA/ sems can thams cad gdan gyi khyad par stobs bcu dang ldan la glang po che'i gdan dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa seng ge'i gdan dang / rdzu 'phrul
<p>305a</p>
<p>305a.1</p>gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa rta'i gdan dang / dbang bcu dang ldan pa rma bya'i gdan dang / thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shugs dang ldan pa'i nam mkha' lding gi gdan dang / dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin du byung ba rin po che'i gdan dang / chags pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa pad+ma'i
<p>305a.2</p>gdan dang / thams cad du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan thob par gyur cig /de nas mchod rten la na bza' gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he d+harma te swA hA/ gzhal yas khang du gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra ku Ta ga ra ye
<p>305a.3</p>swA hA/ bzhugs su gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swA hA/ zhes brjod pas/ rin po che'i gzhal med khang chos kyi dbyings zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs par bsams/ de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya bcings la dbur bzhag ste dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /
<p>305a.4</p>sngags la oM badzra b+hA tu a d+hi tiSh+Tha hUM/ de ltar dbang bskur bas de'i ngo bo nyid du brtan par gyur pa yin no/ /de ltar mchod rten gdab pa yang sngar bshad pa ltar rim pa bzhin bya ste/ dang por mnyam par bzhag ste/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ 'gro ba mtha' dag
<p>305a.5</p>dang gang gi don du bya ba de la byams pa dang snying rjes 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /ngo mtshar chen po grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ngo / /bdud la sogs pa pas kyi
<p>305a.6</p>rgol ba bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad pham par bgyi'o/ /sems can rnams nying mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal bar bgyi'o/ /nga rgyal gyi ri bo bsnyil bar bgyi'o/ /skye ba'i ljon shing rtsad nas gcod do/ /'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlag go/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal
<p>305a.7</p>bar bgyi'o/ /ma dad pa dang phyi rol bdag dang lta ba phyin ci log pa dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la gzud cing dad par bgyi'o/ /las kyi chu bo bzlog par bgyi'o/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho bskam par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi sgron ma rab tu sbar bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /bzod pa dang
<p>305b</p>
<p>305b.1</p>des pa la gzud par bgyi'o/ /bsam gtan gyi bde ba la cher stsal to/ /'dod chags kyi me dpung zhi bar bgyi'o/ /zhe sdang gi mtshon rnon po bcil bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba la gzud do/ /phrag dog gi 'tshub ma zhi bar bgyi'o/ /ser sna'i mdud ba dgrol bar bgyi'o/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi
<p>305b.2</p>bar bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa ma mchis bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba chen po'i grong khyer du 'jug cing gnas par bgyi'o/ /de bas na bdag la las kyi dngos grub mchog stsal nas gnang ba dam pa mdzad du gsol/ de nas gong du bshad pa ji bzhin du byas la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la
<p>305b.3</p>sogs pa dag dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas te/ tshul bzhin du so so'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang / sngags dang phyag rgya dang cho ga go rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten rang bzhin gyis dag cing gsal ba de dag gi bum pa'i dbus su
<p>305b.4</p>gong du smos pa'i snying po gang yang rung ba bcug la de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer grangs med pa 'phros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku grangs med pa'i sprin phung gis nam mkha'i mtha' klas shing chos kyi dbyings mur thug par brgyan zhing bklubs par gyur nas 'jig rten thams cad byin gyis
<p>305b.5</p>brlabs te 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus de nyid kyi dbu'i spyi gtsug dang thugs kar thim pas bsgrub par bya ba de'i las dang nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag ste/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par bsams la/ oM sarba ta
<p>305b.6</p>thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta ma hA sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod do/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bya ba'am/ phyag rgya bzhis brtan par byas te/ dung phor gyi nang du dri spos sna tshogs dang / 'bras yos dang 'o mar ldan pa'i mchod yon gsol te/ ar+g+ha'i phyag rgya'i
<p>305b.7</p>steng du dung phor bzhag la yon chab kyi nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis yon chab nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la/ so so'i rigs kyi snying po bzlas la dbul lo/ /oM a mr-i te ar+g+haM d+hU pe pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes lan gsum spyi bor bzhag ste sbreng ngo / /
<p>306a</p>
<p>306a.1</p>'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig /phyag rgya rgya mtsho sprin nyid kyi dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste ye shes kyi 'od zer 'dus pa'i sku nang du thim zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas mchod pa lnga dang mchod pa nyi shu dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa
<p>306a.2</p>brgyad kyis mchod pa dang / mchod pa thams cad rnam par sbyang zhing dag par bya ba'i sngags/ oM sarba pU dza A yu swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / oM las byung ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyang sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas te dbul lo/ /de nas rdo rje dang dril bu blangs la bstod pa bya'o/ /'gro ba rgyu lnga'i
<p>306a.3</p>'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gyis gzir 'gro gzigs nas/ /thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'joms mdzad pa/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can smin cing grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sems can khams na bzhugs
<p>306a.4</p>pa'i spyod gyur kyang / /chags pas ma gos pad+ma ltar dag pa/ /'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sems can bkres pa chos kyis phongs gyur pa/ /ma rig thibs po'i nang du song ba rnams/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis tshim mdzad pa/ /ye shes sgron ma khyod la phyag
<p>306a.5</p>'tshal lo/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa la/ /thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab grur zhugs nas/ /zhi ba rin chen mchog gling skyel mdzad pa/ /kun gyi ded dpon khyed la rnam par 'dud/ /sems can las kyi chu bos bdas pa rnams/ dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad
<p>306a.6</p>cing / /'phags lam yan lag brgyad la sbyor mdzad pa/ /gsung gi mnga' bdag khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas smon lam rgya cher gdab po/ /bdag cag gis che ge'i don du chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bzhengs su gsol te/ mchod cing bstod de bsgrubs pa la sogs pa dag pa'i rtsa
<p>306a.7</p>ba 'dis che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad 'khor bas mtshams sbyor ba'i bag chags thams cad rtsad nas gcod de sku gsum yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /mchod rten gcig byas pas kyang che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshe rabs bye bar bsags pa'i sdig pa
<p>306b</p>
<p>306b.1</p>thams cad byang bar gyur cig la sogs pa smon lam gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bya'o/ /de ltar mchod rten grub pa'i rtags gsungs pa/ de nas mchod rten 'bar 'gyur tam/ /yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum mam/ /dri dang dud pa 'od kyang rung / /snang ngam yang na ngad ldang ngam/ /lha la sogs pa'i
<p>306b.2</p>rnam pa ni/ /sna tshogs bar snang snang gyur tam/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / /me tog la sogs 'bab pa dang / /dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i sgra/ /dril bu pi wang la sogs rnams/ /ci ste mtshan ma de dag ni/ /sdig pa'i blos ni ma mthong na/ /'bum gyi phrag ni brgya stong ngam/ /
<p>306b.3</p>ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas pa bya/ /de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang / /mtshan gcig mi nyal thog thag bzlas/ /de nas de yi sdig pa ni/ /dag pa nyid du nges par mthong / /zhes smos so/ /mchod
<p>306b.4</p>rten cho ga bdag gis cung zad tsam/ /byas la bsod nams rnam pa ci yod pa/ /des ni 'gro kun skye shi rgyun bcad de/ /bla med sku gsum rdzogs te sangs rgyas shog/ //bi ma la uShiNA Sha'i gzungs las mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang bsdebs te slob dpon zhi ba'i snying pos
<p>306b.5</p>mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ akA+o b+h+ya sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /dal 'byor
<p>306b.6</p>theg chen rigs chen dang / /snying rje shes rab yon tan dang / /byams dang snying rje ldan pa dang / /dad cing bla ma la gus pas/ /skyabs su sor zhing sems bskyed pa/ /dam tshig sdom ldan dbang thob pas/ /las dang cho ga shes nas ni/ /dgon pa'i gnas dang grong gi mthar/ /las bya
<p>306b.7</p>bde ba'i stan 'dug nas/ /khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos can gyis/ /rang lhar gsal ba'i thugs ka ru/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng du hUM/ /de nas 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /bla ma dang ni mi bskyod pa/ /spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la/ /bdun po rnam par dag par bya/ /tshad med bzhi dang ldan
<p>307a</p>
<p>307a.1</p>par bsgom/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni/ /b+h+rUM dang baM las sna tshogs bsgom/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rang gi sa bon dbus bsams nas/ /dam tshig dag dang phyag rgya dag /bsam zhing de bzhin nyid du
<p>307a.2</p>sbyar/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bsgrub par bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo/ /g.yon pa mnyam gzhag rdo rje dang / /g.yas pa sa gnon tshul can no/ /rgyan dang ldan par rang nyid bsgom/ /thugs kar pad zla'i steng du ni/ /de steng rang gi sa bon dang / /
<p>307a.3</p>phyag mtshan phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/ /rang nyid mi 'khrugs par bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas bzhi po phyogs dang bstun/ /rang rang phyag rgya ldan par bsgom/ /hUM las 'od 'phros pad+mo yi/ /'dab ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad/ /phyag mtshon brgyad las sku bskyed do/ /rtsa sngags brgyad po brjod pa
<p>307a.4</p>las/ /dri za'i phyogs su pad+ma can/ /sku mdog dkar mo dpal be'u bsnams/ /me yi phyogs su 'jigs byed ma/ /sku mdog dkar mo 'khor lo bsnams/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su rnam rgyal ma/ /sku mdog sngon po rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /bden bral phyogs su mdangs ldan ma/ /sku
<p>307a.5</p>mdog sngon mo gdugs bsnams pa/ /kU yi phyogs su 'od ldan ma/ /sku mdog dmar skya pad+ma bsnams/ /rlung gi phyogs su dkar sham ma/ /sku mdog dmar skya bum pa bsnams/ /gnod sbyin phyogs su dri med ma/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'bud dung bsnams/ /dbang ldan phyogs su yid gzhungs
<p>307a.6</p>ma/ /sku mdog ljang gu nya bsnams pa'o/ /sgo ma bzhi po 'dod lha ste/ /phyogs dang bstun zhing phyogs skyong dang / /gzhal yas rim par bsgom par bya/ /de ltar dam tshig lha bskyed de/ /thugs ka'i rdo rje'i hUM las ni/ /'og min gnas su 'od 'phros pas/ /mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi
<p>307a.7</p>bor bsam/ /rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgoms bstims la/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /lha yi go rims ji bzhin bar/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /yang na rang nyid lhar bsgoms la/ /mi 'khrugs mdun du bsgom par bya/ /gzungs drang pa yi ting 'dzin ni/ /thugs
<p>307b</p>
<p>307b.1</p>las 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /de nyid sum brtsegs rang rang gzhan/ /lha dang bum pa mchod rten gtor/ /bum pa mchod rten la sogs nang / /rgya mtsho zla ba pad+ma la/ /lha bskyed ye shes bstim par bya/ /dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /bdag la rab tu dgongs par mdzod/ /oM ak+Sho b+h+ya dza/ a big+h+nAM
<p>307b.2</p>ta kr-i ta hUM phaT/ thal sbyar sor gnyis phyir bskyed de/ /ta thA ga to ta b+ha bA ya swA hA dzaH hUM baM hoH/ de nyid gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /mchod bstod la sogs dbul bya ste/ /oM ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha puSh+pe/ d+hU pe/ A lo ke / gan+d+he/ ni bi d+h+ye shab+da/ ba liM ta pU ja khA hi khA hi/ chos nyid mnyam pa'i
<p>307b.3</p>dang las ma g.yos kyang / /thugs rjes rtag tu mya ngan mi 'da' zhing / /phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtor ma mgron du dmigs la bsngo/ /sgra dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol/ /yan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum/ /
<p>307b.4</p>rang don du ni bsnyen pa yin/ /grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i bzlas pa ni/ /ngag dang shib bu rdo rje'i bzlas/ /yid kyis bzlas pa byas pa bzhi/ /me dang sgra dang sgra mthar gsum/ /brjod pa med pa'i bsam gtan te/ /thun gsum dag tu bzlas pa bya/ /gtong ma
<p>307b.5</p>mchod bstod gtor ma btang / /ye shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsdu/ /de ltar thun gsum sbyor ba yis/ /bsnyen pa sngon du song ba dang / /gang 'dod dngos grub bab pa'i phyir/ /de nas las la sbyar bar bya/ /bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar/ /brtson 'grus chen po'i me
<p>307b.6</p>lces sdig sgrib sreg /pad+ma'i drod la char chu yis/ /kha zum 'od kyis 'byed pa dang / /nyi ma me shel me 'byung bzhin/ /mi yi lus la dngos grub ster/ /mi gnas bsod nams ster bar byed/ /sgra yis thar pa ster bar byed/ /'di ni yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu
<p>307b.7</p>kun gyis bkur bar 'os/ /ngan song rnams las thar lam 'dis sgrub bo/ /rang gzhan mdun du bsgoms kyang dngos grub ster/ /mgon po mi 'khrugs pa yi ni/ /sgrub pa'i thabs mchog 'di bris pa'i/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las 'di yis/ /bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad ni/ /myur ba
<p>308a</p>
<p>308a.1</p>nyid du sangs rgyas nas/ /'gro la phan phyir chos ston zhing / /sems can sdug bsngal las grol shog /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa slob dpon dI baM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul
<p>308a.2</p>khrims rgyal bas bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ ]@/ mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs// @##/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub po dam tshig ldan pa yis/ /dgon pa'am grong mtha' la sogs par/ /khrus byas gtsang mar yongs
<p>308a.3</p>byas te/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas nas/ /rang lhar gsal ba'i thugs ka ru/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng du hUM/ /de las 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /bla ma dang ni mi bskyod pa/ /spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa las/ /bdun po rnam par dag pa bya/ /tshad med bzhi dang ldan par ni/ /chos rnams
<p>308a.4</p>thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom par bya ba yin/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /rang rig sa bon de dbus su/ /bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya bca'/ /de nas rang gi sa bon dang / /phyag mtshan phyag rgyas de byin brlab/ /de rnams gyur pa mi 'khrugs pa/ /zhal
<p>308a.5</p>gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo/ /g.yon pa pad gzhag rdo rje dang / /g.yas pa sa gnon tshul can bsgom/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /rang nyid rang lhar bsgoms nas ni/ /mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi bor bsgom / /rang lus mi 'khrugs
<p>308a.6</p>bsgoms la bstim/ /thugs kar pad zla hUM las ni/ /dbus su mi 'khrugs pa nyid bsgom / /phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi bsgom bya/ /mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa dang / /gnyis su mchod bstod gtor ma sbyin/ /de ltar thun bzhi'i rim pa ni/ /bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis/ /gang
<p>308a.7</p>'dod pa yi don du ni/ /sgrub pa las la sbyar bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// //
<p>308b</p>
<p>308b.1\] #]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba karma A wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ni maN+Dal bi d+hiH / bod skad du/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden par gsungs la phyag 'tshal te/ /dkyil
<p>308b.2</p>'khor cho ga bri bar bya/ /gang du las ni yod gyur na/ /las kyi cho ga rnams med pa/ /de ni spyi yi rgyud dag las/ /gsungs pa'i cho ga mkhas pas brten / /dkyil 'khor sum stong dag dang ni/ /lnga brgyar gsungs pa gang yin pa'i/ /spyi yi cho ga bshad par bya/ /yid dang mthun pa'i
<p>308b.3</p>gnas dag tu/ /sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson pa/ /snying rje ldan pas dbang bskur ro/ /grangs sam dus sam mtshan ma'am/ /bsnyen pa tshul bzhin byas pa yis/ /sa yi cho ga tshul bzhin bya/ /lha dang bum pa lhag gnas dang / /gson gshin slob ma gang rung bas/ /bdun
<p>308b.4</p>po rnam par dag pa dang / /skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sbyin par bya/ /so shing srung skud ku sha dang / /chos bshad pa ni byas kyang rung / /gtad dang drag po'i las dang ni/ /sbyang dang byin rlabs bya mi dgos/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi thig btab la/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa khru
<p>308b.5</p>do bri/ /dkyil 'khor lhag ma'i tshad dang ni/ /ci 'dod pa ni nyid du bri/ /yo long nga[#\u0f74] dag gis kyang / /bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /phyi nas gcig nyid kyis kyang ni/ /tshig rkyang du ni bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun du zlum por bya/ /de nas phyogs mtshams spyod pa dang / /
<p>308b.6</p>'dod pa'i lha rnams bri bar bya/ /so so'i sngags kyi rim pa bzhin/ /de nas spyan yang drang bar bya/ /bdag po rnams kyi snying po yis/ /de yi 'og tu mchod par bya/ /bum pa gang ba de steng du/ /cho ga bzhin du rdzas gzhag go/ /las kun byed pa'i dkyil 'khor de/ /bsang ba gsang ba'i
<p>308b.7</p>bdag po gsung / /dkyil 'khor 'di ni kun bris nas/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa dang / /sgrub pa po ni dbang bskur ba/ /dkyil 'khor 'di dag nyid du bya/ /mchod pa la sogs thams cad kyang / /rgyud las bshad pa bzhin du bya/ /zhes bshad pas 'dir khyad par ni/ 'dab ma

<p>309a.1</p>brgyad ba dbus su ni/ /rdo rje chen po bri bar bya/ /'dab ma brgyad la bkra shis brgyad/ /shar du dpal be'u 'khor lo ste/ /lho ru pad+ma rgyal mtshan gnyis/ /nub tu gdugs dang bum pa ste/ /byang du dung dang nya bri'o/ /phur ba ra ba dra ba gzhag /srung ba rtsa ba'i sngags sam
<p>309a.2</p>ni/ /yang na de yi snying pos bya/ /bla re ba dan sku gzungs sogs/ /mchod dang gtor ma la sogs dgram/ /'bru sman rin chen lnga ldan pa'i/ /bum pa de yi dbus su gzhag /khrus dang chos gos ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag pas/ /bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor
<p>309a.3</p>bsrung / /shaM gis thams cad stong pa las/ /baM mam b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang / /de nang pad+ma zla dbus su/ /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs bskyed pa las / /pad 'dab brgyad la lha mo brgyad/ /pad+ma can dang 'od can ma/ /mdangs ldan ma dang dri med ma/ /dkar dang dmar dang sngo dang ljang / /
<p>309a.4</p>dpal be'u pad+ma gdugs dang dung / /dbang po gshin rje chu bdag dang / /gnod sbyin phyogs su bsgom par bya/ /'jigs byed ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dkar sham ma dang yid gzhungs ma/ /dkar sngo dmar skya ljang ba'i mdog /'khor lo rgyal mtshan bum pa nya/ /me dang srin po rlung lha dang / /dbang
<p>309a.5</p>ldan ngos su rnam par bsam/ /kun kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /zla ba'i rgyab brten rin chen brgyan/ /g.yon pa thams cad dku la gtad/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyi sngags/ /oM maM ga la shrI yaM dza da ma dza swA hA/ oM maM ga la pad+ma swA hA/ oM maM ga la tsha traM swA hA/ oM maM ga la shaM kha swA hA/ 
<p>309a.6</p>oM maM ga la tsakra swA hA/ oM maM ga la d+h+wa dza swA hA/ oM maM ga la ka la sha swA hA/ oM maM ga la mang+h+ya swA hA/ spyan drang bstim dang mchod bstod bya/ /de yi snying ga'i zla ba la/ /gsang sngags dmigs te ci nus bzlas/ /mchod dang bstod dang gtor ma gtang / /khrus byas brtsam pa'i slob ma

<p>309b.1</p>cing / /sbyin pa dri yi legs bsgos pas/ /khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar pha rol phyin drug la/ /gson po bkra shis rdzas brgyad bri/ /rak+Sha zhes pas bsrung bar bya/ /a pa na yas byar par bya/ /mchod rten rab gnas tsha tsha gdab/ /ngan pa bzlog la las 'di bya/ /'di ni
