<p>309b.3</p>bzang po mthong bar shog /slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrubs thabs bzhugs// @##/ /mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan nyid
<p>309b.4</p>ldan pa'i bum pa la/ /brdeg dang bdug dang mtshan ma dgod/ /nang du bcud rnams blugs la yang / /mgul ching kha rgyan la sogs bcas/ /maN+Dal me tog bcas pa'i steng / /bzhag la mchod sogs rim bzhin bsham/ /bdag dang gnas sogs bsrung byas la/ /mchod pa bsangs
<p>309b.5</p>shing byin gyis brlab/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsams nas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod pas/ /bum pa sbyangs te baM las bskyed/ /rgya mtsho pad+ma zla stengs su/ /mi 'khrugs rgyal po spyan drangs la/ /bgegs bskrad rgyas btab mchod yon sogs/ /phul te dzaHhUM baM hoHsaM
<p>309b.6</p>dgug /gdan la bzhugs gsol mchod bstod bya/ /'phro 'du tshul gyis bzlas brjod bya/ /brgya stong la sogs ci nus par/ /byas te mchod bstod gtor ma gtang / /de ltar thun dang sbyor ba yis/ /ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bya/ /khrus kyi dus su bum nang lha/ /mchod bstod byas te
<p>309b.7</p>mkha' la bzhugs/ /de yis dbang bskur bsams la bkru/ /rang nyid lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /rgyun gcod sngags la che ge mo/ /sarba pA baM zhes sogs pa'i/ /brjod cing bum pa'i chu rgyun gyis/ /bkru zhing de nas rma bya yi/ /sgro yis byab cing a pa na/ /zhes sogs brjod pas mi mthun
<p>310a</p>
<p>310a.1</p>phyogs/ /bsal bar bsams la slob ma de/ /mdun du gnas pas maN+Dal bya/ /bla ma la phul bla ma yis/ /srung skud srung 'khor gdags pa dang / /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas bsrung / /lha la mchod bstod bzod par gsol/ /gtor ma byin la phrin las gzhol/ /
<p>310a.2</p>smon lam btab la gshegs su gsol/ /a k+Sha ro yi sngags brjod cing / /maN+Dal mchod pa me tog bsdu/ /'di yis yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ /mi mthun phyogs sel 'dod pa 'grub/ /slob dpon dpa' bo rdo rje mdzad pa'o/ /rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ /

<p>310a.4</p>su song zhing sems bskyed ba/ /dam tshig sdom ldan dbar thob pas/ /las kyi cho ga shes nas ni/ /dgon pa'i gnas sam grong gi mthar/ /las byas bde ba'i stan la 'dug /khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos can gyis/ /bdun po rnam par dag pa dang / /tshang med bzhi sogs ldan par

<p>310a.7</p>nas/ /de nyid gsum sogs rang dang gzhan/ /bum pa mchod rten la sogs nang / /rgya mtsho pad+ma zla ba la/ /dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'dis/ /bdag gi mchod pa bzhes nas kyang / /mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM big+ha nAn+ta
<p>310b</p>
<p>310b.1</p>kraMta hUM phaT/ /thal sbyar sor mo gnyis phyir bskyed/ /ta thA gto d+b+ha bA ya swA hA/ /dzaHtUM baM hoHsa de nyid gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /mchod dang bskyed dang bzlas ba bya/ /sgra dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol/ /lan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum/ /gzhan don bsnyen pa byed pa ni/ /
<p>310b.2</p>dus dang mtshan ma'o/ /dngos grub bsgrub bya'i bzlas pa ni/ /dag dang shib bu rdo rje bzlas/ /yid kyi bzlas brjed bcas pa bzhi/ /me dang sgra dang sgra mtha' gsum/ /brjod pa med pa'i bsam gtan te/ /thun gsum dag tu bzlas pa dang / /bstod nas mchod par gtong ma gtang / /ye
<p>310b.3</p>shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsdu/ /mi gnas bsod nams ster bar byed/ /sgra mthar thar ba ster bar byed/ /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa byon nas zhes pas rang lhar bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pas spyan ng+rang ba dang / /mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / bzlas pa dang / bsgom pa byas
<p>310b.4</p>pas dngos grub stsol bar gyur pa'o/ /chos nyid mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos kyang / /thugs rjes gtan mya ngan mi 'da' zhing / /phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar/ /
<p>310b.5</p>brtsom 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig pa sreg /nyi ma me shel zhugs la me 'byung ltar/ /mi yi lus la dngos grub stsol bar mdzad/ /'di ni yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu kun gyis bkur bar 'os/ /ngan song rnam sel thar lam 'dis 'grub bo/ /rang gzhan mdun
<p>310b.6</p>du bsgoms kyang dngos grub ster/ /mgon po mi 'khrugs pa sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon dzi tA ris mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma gnyan gyis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//[ ]@##/ /mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs// @##/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
<p>310b.7</p>sgrub po dam tshig ldan pa yis/ /dgon pa'am grong mtha' la sogs par/ /khrus byas gtsang mar byas pa yis/ /las byas bde ba'i stan la 'dug /rang lhar gsal ba'i thugs ka ru/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng du hUM/ /de las 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /bla ma dang ni mi bskyod pa/ /
<p>311a</p>
<p>311a.1</p>spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la/ /bdun po rnam par dag pa bya/ /tshad med bzhi dang ldan par ni/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rang gi sa bon de dbus su/ /bsams
<p>311a.2</p>nas dam tshig phyag rgya bca'/ /de nas rang gi sa bon dang / /phyag mtshan phyag rgya de byin brlab/ /de rnams gyur pas mi 'khrugs pa/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo/ /g.yon pa pad gzhag rdo rje dang / /g.yas pas sa gnon tshul can bsgom/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin
<p>311a.3</p>du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /rang nyid rang lhar bsgoms la ni/ /mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi bor bsam / /rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgoms la bstim/ /thugs kar pad zla'i hUM las ni/ /dbus su mi bskyod pa nyid bsgom / /phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas bzhi bsgom bya/ /
<p>311a.4</p>mchod dang bstod dang bzlas pa bya/ /sgra dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol/ /yan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum/ /gzhan dang rang don bsnyon pa ni/ /grangs dang sus dang mtshan ma'o/ /dngos grub bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /ngag dang shib bu rdo rje bzlas/ /yid de brjod dang bcas pa bzhi/ /
<p>311a.5</p>me dang sgra dang sgra mthar gsum/ /thun gsum dag tu bzlas par bya/ /gnyis ni mchod bstod gtor ma sbyin/ /de ltar thun gsum sbyor ba yis/ /bsnyen pa sngon du rab song bas/ /gang 'dod dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de ni las la sbyar bar bya/ /pad+mo'i 'od la char chu yis/ /kha zum
<p>311a.6</p>'od kyis 'byed pa'am/ /nyi ma me shel mi 'byung bzhin/ /mi yi lus la dngos grub ster/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten du ni myur ru sangs rgyas shog /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston byed cing / /sems can sdug bsngal gzir las sgrol bar shog /
<p>311a.7</p>bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//[ #]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ho ma bi d+hiH / bod skad du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga /bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin sreg chen po'i rim pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni/ /thab
<p>311b</p>
<p>311b.1</p>khung zlum po khru do bya/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bri/ /yang na ma bris pa yang rung / /bud shing brtsigs te sreg rdzas bsog /mchod dang gtor ma la sogs dgram/ /bla re bris pa'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste bsgom/ /rab tu rdzas la brab brdeg bya/ /me sbar me lha bskyed pa
<p>311b.2</p>ni / /raM las me lhar drang srong ni/ /bgrang phreng ril ba phyag na 'dzin/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che/ /me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /dgang blugs zhal zas bzhes slad du/ /'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /oM ag+na ye dz+wa lA ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ gnyis su med
<p>311b.3</p>par bstims pa la/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes/ bsangs te mar gyi dgang blugs dbul/ /mchod bstod sreg rdzas rim par dbul/ /de nas mchod bstod me lha ni/ /gshegs pa'am 'bar ba'i rnam par ro/ /de nas pad+ma zla ba la/ /dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur
<p>311b.4</p>gshegs bcom ldan 'dir/ /bdag la mchod yon bzhes nas kyang / /mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM big+ha nAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ thal mo sbyar la mdzub gnyis dgyed / /oM ta thA ga tong+b+ha bA ya swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni/ /mar dang gro dang sran ma
<p>311b.5</p>dang / /zho dang sman dang dUr wa dang / /ku sha yam shing me tog dang / /til dang yungs kar la sogs bsreg /thams cad rgyun gcod sngags kyis bya/ /khyad par las su bya ba ni/ /til dang yungs kar dag la ni/ /brgya'am stong ngam khri ru bsreg /sdig sgrib sbyong ba'i las su bstan/ /
<p>311b.6</p>de nas mchod bstod gtor ma gtang / /bsngo dang bzod par gsol te gshegs/ /rdzas lhag me yi lha la dbul/ /mchod bstod bzod par gsol te gshegs/ /khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol / /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar
<p>311b.7</p>yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /dman pa bsdu zhing a kAr bzlas/ /ji ltar grags pa'i bkra shis brjod/ /me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin/ /rang gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur/ /sbyin sreg gi cho ga dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /
<p>312a</p>
<p>312a.1\] ]@##/ /'phags pa rdo rje chos kyi ni/ rnal 'byor gcig pa sgom pa'i thabs/ /kun dga' snying po'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /rang la phan phyir 'di brtsam mo/ /de la rnal 'byor pa gang zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang thob pa/ rig
<p>312a.2</p>pa'i sdom pa yongs su bzung ba/ ri bo'am nags sam/ chu 'gram mam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas/ dang por re zhig bdag med pa la lhag par mos pas nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la
<p>312a.3</p>lkog ma'i phyogs su yi ge hrIHlas pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams pa'i lce'i pad+ma'i 'dab mar hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la/ badzra dzi hwa zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis su yang a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bsams la/ de gnyis kyi steng du hUM
<p>312a.4</p>gnyis las rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsam zhing lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyang rtse mor bsams la bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas yi ge hUM las rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams te/ khro bo ti rIn+ta ri'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hUM baM/ zhes brjod la/ oM
<p>312a.5</p>badzra dz+wa lA na lArka hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings mthe bong gnyis gshibs te bsgreng bas sor mo'i steng nas dgab pa'i tshul du gzhag pa 'di ni ti rIn+ti ri'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis spyi bo nas brtsams nas phyogs bzhir rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blangs nas/ 
<p>312a.6</p>oM TuM zhes pa'i yi ge gnyis kyi go chas go bgos la/ oM badzra dz+wA lA na lArka hUM/ zhes brjod cing g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bsor zhing bgegs thams cad la bsnun par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs bsreg par bya ste/ 
<p>312a.7</p>hUM badzra a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ ces brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas te/ mthe bo rdo rjer 'greng ba 'di ni me'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te mthe'u chung gnyis
<p>312b</p>
<p>312b.1</p>lcags kyur sprel la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu bsgreng ba ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang / oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA ba ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ ces bya ba'i sngags dang bcas pas rdo rje'i
<p>312b.2</p>ra ba dang dra ba rnams bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / oM badzra tsakra hUM zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mdzub mo mthe bong rdo rjer mdud/ /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes grags te/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /'dis phyogs
<p>312b.3</p>thams cad du g.yas phyogs nas bskor bas dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul bar bya'o/ /'di nyid khar bzhag la blta bzhin du rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor blos mngon sum lta bur dmigs
<p>312b.4</p>la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra ban+d+ha nAM ka ro mI/ de nas phyag bzhi bya ste 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba la lus thams cad phab ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pas+thA nA ya At+ma nAM ni R+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA
<p>312b.5</p>ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas lho phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag ste dpral ba sa la reg par byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She ka ya At+ma nAM ni R+yA ta yA mi badzra ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /
<p>312b.6</p>de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag ste kha sa la reg pa dang / oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra warta nA ya At+ma nAM niR+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra warta ya mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas byang phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab nas
<p>312b.7</p>snying gar sbyar la spyi bo sa la reg par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karmA Ne At+ma nAM niR+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / mchod pa nyi
<p>313a</p>
<p>313a.1</p>shus yang dag par mchod pa dang / bdag dbul ba dang / sems bskyed pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / sdom pa la gnas pa'i bar du byas la/ de nas lag pa g.yas pa'i gung mo la oM mdzub mo la hUM/ srin lag la trAM/ mthe'u chung la hrIHmthe
<p>313a.2</p>bo la aHbsam zhing / g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams la yang de bzhin du bkod de/ g.yas par gnas pa'i sa bon rnams la ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skur bsam mo/ /g.yon pa la gnas pa'i sa bon rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i skur bsams nas
<p>313a.3</p>phan tshun thabs dang shes rab dag bcas pa'i mngon par 'dod pas thal mo mngon du phyogs par byas te/ a n+yo n+ya a nu ga tAHsarba d+harmaH/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas sor mo rnams shin tu yang bcer te/ lha de rnams lha mo de dag gi thugs kar zhugs par bsams la/ a t+yan+ta a nu bra
<p>313a.4</p>beSh+TAHsarba d+harmaH/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas/ thal mo dam du bsdams pa las/ /sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mo bka' stsal te/ /rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams/ /badzra any+dza li zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so/ /badzra ban+d+ha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste/ badzra
<p>313a.5</p>ban+d+ha traT ces brjod cing snying gar lan gsum dral bar bya'o/ /badzra A be sha zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas aH/ zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o/ /dbab pa de yang 'dis brtan par bya'o/ /tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba shA shwa to me b+ha ba hra da yaM me a d+he
<p>313a.6</p>tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ /badzra muSh+Thi/ zhes bya bas dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti baM/ de yi rjes la/ oM sarba a pA ya A karA Na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ ces bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas ngan 'gro thams cad dgug
<p>313a.7</p>par bya'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas su/ /legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni/ /ltung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o/ /oM badzra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya ban+d+ha na ni pra mo k+Sha ya/ sarba a pA ya ga ti b+h+yaH sarba satwA ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya traT/ ces brjod cing sdig pa dral
<p>313b</p>
<p>313b.1</p>ba'i phyag rgya bcings la sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba bsdams byas te/ /gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas ni/ /tha ma bzhi yi rtse mor sbyar/ /sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin/ /de nas mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams badzra muHzhes brjod nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o/ /
<p>313b.2</p>de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su rang gi snying po badzra d+harma zhes dam tshig gis bris la chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nyid dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur par bsams la/ yang de'i steng du de nyid dang / 
<p>313b.3</p>yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa lta bu yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i gzugs can gnyis pa nyid du bsam mo/ /de las byung ba gang yin pa de la ni yang de'i tshe snying po dang bcas pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang bcas pa bsam mo/ /de nas de las byung ba
<p>313b.4</p>ni rang gi phyag rgya pad+mo'o/ /de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i dbus su rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya ste pad+mo\u0f85haM/ zhes brjod do/ /rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings phyag rgya la zhugs par bsams la bsnyems pa dang
<p>313b.5</p>bcas pas rdo rje bsor zhing badzra satwa haM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi sngags badzra d+harma zhes brjod pas rang gi lha rdo rje chos sku mdog dmar skya sangs rgyas thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ stod dang smad pa ti'i tshi gu mnabs pa/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis thugs kar pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin
<p>313b.6</p>cing phyag g.yas pas kha 'byed pa'i tshul du mdzad pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par rang nyid bsams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /ma hA sa ma ya satwA haM/ rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya'o/ /sa ma yo\u0f85haM/ de
<p>313b.7</p>nyid kyis snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la rang gi snying po badzra d+harma dang sngags oM badzra d+harma hrIHzhes bya ba yang bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas sa ma ya aHzhes brjod de/ 
<p>314a</p>
<p>314a.1</p>mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprul la badzra d+harma a/ zhes bya ba 'dis de'i steng du pad+mar bdag nyid dbab par bya'o/ /de nas pad+mo\u0f85haM/ zhes pad+ma'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsgoms la/ pad+ma de nyid badzra Ne tro\u0f85haM/ zhes zlos shing rdo rje chos su bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes sems
<p>314a.2</p>dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang / snying po de rnams kyis de nyid du dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya'o/ /badzra aM gu sha dzaHbadzra pA sha hUM/ badzra s+pho Ta baM/ badzra g+haN+De hoH/ de rnams kyi las kyi
<p>314a.3</p>phyag rgya ni/ mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni/ /mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che/ /mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub/ /rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyems te mnan/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa las/ mthe bo gnyis gshibs te mdzub
<p>314a.4</p>mo gnyis bkug la pad+ma lta bu dang / badzra d+harma dr-i sh+ya zhes bya ba 'dis blta bar bya'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas/ /rang gi lus la rab tu bsgom/ /yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod pas rang gi lus la dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba
<p>314a.5</p>dang dbang du bya'o/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas/ rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM brjod/ der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom/ /badzra d+harma zhes bya ba'i snying po dang / oM badzra d+harma hrIHzhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya ste/ de nas lce la rdo rje bsams la sarba kA ri zhes
<p>314a.6</p>chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya'o/ /de nas snying gar zla ba la rdo rje sna tshogs bsams la/ las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gar byas nas g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yas pas pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul du mdzad pa ni las kyi phyag
<p>314a.7</p>rgya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsams la sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan dang / bzhugs tshul la sogs ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba la ni su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi lus la rdo rje bsdu ba'i
<p>314b</p>
<p>314b.1</p>phyag rgya bcings te/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod de/ yid kyis legs par sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya/ /de nas sbyor ba 'dis/ de rnams kyi rang gi dam tshig dang / chos las dang / phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dam tshig
<p>314b.2</p>gi phyag rgya bcings la/ badzra d+hA tu dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas badzra d+hA tu/ zhes lan gsum brjod la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA yo ge shwa ra hUM/ zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags lan gsum brjod par
<p>314b.3</p>bya'o/ /de bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /badzra d+hA tu dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ zhes bya ba dang / badzra d+hA tu zhes bya ba spyi'i snying po lan
<p>314b.4</p>gsum brjod par bya zhing / oM badzra satwa hUM/ zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa'i snying po dang / oM badzra rat+na trAM/ zhes bya ba rin chen 'byung ldan gyi snying po dang / oM badzra d+harma hrIH/ zhes bya ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po dang / oM badzra karma AH/ zhes bya ba don yod grub pa'i snying po yang lan
<p>314b.5</p>gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje bsdams pa ltar byas la/ gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng / /gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i yin par bshad/ /gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang / /gung mo pad+mo 'dra bar dgug /sangs
<p>314b.6</p>rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /de bzhin mdzub gnyis bkug pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba la ni/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ljags la chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya ste/ badzra dz+nyA na zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnams
<p>314b.7</p>kyi phyag rgya yin no/ /snga ma bzhin du ljags la rdo rje bsams la sbyar ro/ /de nas/ las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gnyis su dbye/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /de nas bcing bar rab tu bshad/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni/ /
<p>315a</p>
<p>315a.1</p>g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba yi sa reg pa/ /rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o/ /tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni snying
<p>315a.2</p>gar sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni sku mdog dkar po seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa bsnams pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ dar la'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs mnabs pa/ rin po che'i
<p>315a.3</p>cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhal bzhi pa/ zhal dkar po shar phyogs su gzigs pa'o/ /de bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa yang sku mdog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar
<p>315a.4</p>po dang / ljang gu'o/ /gdan ni glang po che dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding la go rims bzhin du rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs bsdams pa/ nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs
<p>315a.5</p>kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig pa'o/ /de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas ni spyi gtsug yin no/ /mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa'i gnas ni snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bo rnams yin no/ /de nas rdo rje
<p>315a.6</p>sems ma'i phyag rgya dang / satwa badzri a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM zhes bya bas snying gar byin gyis brlabs la/ snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su de bsam par bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya dang / rat+na badzri a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM zhes bya bas rdo rje rin chen ma ni dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rdo rje rin po
<p>315a.7</p>che'i rnam par ro/ /rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya dang / d+harma badzri a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM zhes bya ba dang rdo rje chos ma ni lkog ma'i phyogs su rdo rje pad+ma'i rnam par ro/ /rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgya dang / karma badzri a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ zhes bya bas rdo rje las ma ni spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang ldan par
<p>315b</p>
<p>315b.1</p>bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra d+harma sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ badzra d+harma ya twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su poSh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ma m+me muny+tsa/ 
<p>315b.2</p>badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH zhes bya ba yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas pas brtan par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor sprul la/ sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod de/ rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de nyid kyi gung mo gnyis kyis phreng ba blangs te/ sa ma ya
<p>315b.3</p>hUM/ zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya zhing / phreng ba de yang / pra tI ts+tsha badzra hoH zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi spyi bor dor bar bya'o/ /de nas phreng ba des/ oM pra ti gr-ih+Na twaM mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o/ /
<p>315b.4</p>de nas oM satwa swa yan te tsak+Shu g+ha Ta na/ tad pa ru ta g+ha Ta ya ti sarba k+Sho/ badzra tsak+Shu ra nut+ta ra/ he badzra pa sh+ya/ zhes bya ba 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o/ /yang rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings te/ tiSh+Tha badzra/ 
<p>315b.5</p>zhes zlos shir snying gar dkrol bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la/ badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes bya ba 'dis chu'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang
<p>315b.6</p>phyug ma la sogs pas blang bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ spyi gtsug tu oM las rnam par snang mdzad bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra d+hA twI shra ri hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ yi ge hUM las dpral ba'i
<p>315b.7</p>steng du mi bskyod pa ste/ oM badzra badzri ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya bcings la/ yi ge trAM las rna ba g.yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /oM rat+na badzri ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ yi ge hrIHlas rgyab tu ni 'od dpag tu
<p>316a</p>
<p>316a.1</p>med pa'o/ /oM d+harma badzre Ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la yi ge a las don yod par grub par bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /oM karma badzri ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdo rje thal mo rab bcings la/ /mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la/ /mdzub
<p>316a.2</p>mo'i rtse mo bkug nas ni/ /gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya/ /gung mo gnyis ni rin chen 'dra/ /pad+mor srin lag mthe'u chung gung / /lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang / /zhes bya'o/ /de'i rjes la oM TuM zhes bya ba
<p>316a.3</p>dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snying gar mdud pa bcing ba'i tshul gyis go bgo bar bya zhing de bzhin du mgrin pa dang / ltag pa dang / yang snying ga dang / nu ma'i bar dang / yang snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang rgyab dang / dpral ba'i steng du bzhag /dar dpyangs bcings pa'i tshul du byas

<p>316a.5</p>a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba blang par bya'o/ /rdo rjes rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba yang rdo rje de rang gi mgo la bzhag la/ oM badzra satwa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba 'dis blang bar bya ste/ rang gi ming
<p>316a.6</p>yang gang yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twAM d+ha ra yA mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi

<p>316b.1</p>par mchod de/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu blangs la/ g.yas pas rdo rje gsor zhing / rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /Tak+ki hUM dza/ yang rdo rje de rab gi snying gar stod pa'i tshul gyis 'jog cing / Tak+ki dzaHhoH/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /yi ge hUM nyid kyis gzung bar byas la/
