<p>320a</p>
<p>320a.1</p>dag la dpyad par bya/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'gro ba ma lus rang bzhin mtshon/ /gzugs brnyan chu zla smig rgyu zhes/ /rtogs par bya phyir sbyang bar bya/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thugs kyi ye shes mtshon pa'i phyir/ /mkhas
<p>320a.2</p>par rin chen la sogs pas/ /sa gzhi snying po can du bya/ /'phan phran nyid la skal bzang dang / /bkra shis tsa ka lis brgyan pa/ /nyi zla pad+mas mtshon pa yang / /gtso bo dag la dpyangs pa'o/ /yon chab bdug spos dri chab bre/ /me tog mar me khal dag dang / /lha bshos khur ba lha
<p>320a.3</p>grangs so/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi bu ram mar/ /bre re btung ba bca' ba'i tshogs/ /gtor ma'i rgyu cha sna tshogs dang / /'byung po'i kha zas bsog par bya/ /gzhan yang zhi ba'i mchod rdzas ni/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras yos 'bras/ /nas dang gro dang ga pur rnams/ /bul gang yin no nas
<p>320a.4</p>thug dang / /'bras chan ma du bre gang shis/ /gzhan yang rgyas dbang drag po yi/ /thug pa thams cad bre re'o/ /gzhan ma kun la phul re'o/ /lha bshos khur ba dog gu rnams/ /lha grangs bzhin du bsog par bya/ /pad+ma lhor bting ku sha nub/ /khri ni shar te gru gsum byang / /las
<p>320a.5</p>bzhi'i gdan ni dgod par bya/ /rnam par rgyal lam khro phyogs hom/ /spyan sogs yum bzhis lhag chad 'bum/ /dbang po zhi bzla ba 'dra/ /dbang po rgyas pa pad+ma 'dra/ /dbang po dbang ni nyi ma 'dra/ /dbang po drag po dud pa 'dra/ /dbyig pa bgrang phreng spyi blugs gzung / /dang po ting 'dzin
<p>320a.6</p>gyis bskul nas/ /bum pa zla ba pad+ma dang / /btud pa'i mdangs ldan bsil byed yum/ /bdud rtsi'o ma bu ram zho/ /bkang ba'i bum pa so so la/ /rin chen 'phan byang gdugs ldan te/ /rnam snang mdzad dang gsum dag gis/ /zhabs kyi drung du gzung ba dang / /khams gsum sems
<p>320a.7</p>can thams cad kyi/ /las dang sdug bsngal zhi bar byed/ /oM ga na ga ga ne lo tsa ne/ tsa le tsa le tsu na te/ ga tang gu tang shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ dpal rtse rnon po rtse gsum pos/ /dug gsum 'joms pa'i las rnams mdzod/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyang ba dang / /btab pas gshegs
<p>320b</p>
<p>320b.1</p>chags brlab par byed/ /hom zlum lham pa zla gam e/ /rdo rje pad+ma mda' gzhu dang / /rtsang thod rgyan gyis mdzes rgyan gdengs/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag lha rnams mchod/ /yaM baM e yi dkyil 'khor drang / /phying bu'am ni dar gtsang 'bob/ /du yod pa la zung re'o/ /yam shing
<p>320b.2</p>dkar ser dmar nag la/ /khung ni khyad par rang sor gcal/ /brgyad dang bcu drug nyi shu'i gzhi/ /bud shing khru gang do gsum mtshungs/ /sbom phra sngags mkhan [(]mdzum [,]mdzub [)]mo tsam/ /zhi ba yi ni lha grangs bzhin/ /yam shing mdzub gang bcag khru gang / /brkyang khru gang du shes par
<p>320b.3</p>bya/ /bud shing khru gang do bzhi ni/ /rgyas pa yi ni lha grangs bzhin/ /dbang gi yam bud zhi ba'i tshad/ /drag po'i yam bud rgyas pa'i tshad/ /zhi ba'i dris bsku rgyas sbrang rtsi/ /dbang btsag tsan+dan bsres pas bsku/ /drag po khrag spos bsres pa bsku/ /zho can ser skyur rtsub shing la/ /
<p>320b.4</p>sor bzhi yar rtse ral gri bzhin/ /rting zlum zur bzhi zor 'dra dang / /zur gsum rdzu thur tshad du bya/ /lo ma sor bzhi so so'i shing / /sor gnyis rtsa ba bshus lha grangs/ /thab kyi bye brag che chung las/ /zho can ser skyur rtsub shing la/ /yu ba sboms su mthe bong tsam/ /srid du khru do gang phyed gang / /
<p>320b.5</p>sor bzhi bskyur khar nas sor gcig /zabs sor gnyis la so so'i dbyibs/ /de dbus gtso mo'i phyag mtshan bri/ /kha ran phyogs bzhir phyag rgya gzhag /bar bar rdo rje pad gzhu/ /thod pas mtshan pa dgang gzar bya/ /srid khru gang la dkyus sor gnyis/ /zabs su sor gcig de'i dbus su/ /
<p>320b.6</p>gtso bo'i phyag rgyas mtshan blugs gzar/ /blugs gzar steng phub mdun du gzhag /zho can ser skyur rtsub shing la/ /mdud pa dag la gtso yum dgod/ /rtsibs la 'khor gyi yig 'bru dgod/ /rked mdud sgo ba khru khyud gang / /rtse mo ya ma baM e phaT/ /gtso bo'i phyag mtshan spyir bris te/ /rtsibs
<p>320b.7</p>la chos kyi sig 'bru 'bar/ /khru gang tshad bya srid du'o/ /spom phra mtho gang sor bzhi bya/ /dkyus sor bco brgyad zabs su ni/ /sor ni brgyad pa de dbus su/ /ri rab rgya mtsho bri bar bya/ /ngos la ri bdun mtsho yang dgod/ /so so'i gtun gyi kha ran la/ /rdo rje pad gzhu me 'od 'bar/ /thod rtsang me
<p>321a</p>
<p>321a.1</p>'od 'bar gling mtsho/ /ji bzhin dkyil 'khor dag la'ang brgyan/ /las bzhi sngags pa'i chas gos ni/ /thugs kyi ze'u ldir stod g.yogs dang / /brjid pa'i chos gos smad dkris dang / /gar gyi gtsang gos so so'i mdog /g.yab mos spyan 'dren phyag mtshan ni/ /
<p>321a.2</p>so so'i kha dog dar dag la/ /ba dan bzhi yang dar 'drar bya/ /dkar po ser po dmar nag la/ /ho ma'i 'gab ma 'khor ba'o/ /dri zhim ser skyur rtsub shing gi/ /sa phyogs de dag nye ba ru/ /shing gi lha ste mdog dkar la/ /rin chen sna tshogs dri zhim bcas/ /phul la snying rje byams bsgoms
<p>321a.3</p>la/ /rten 'brel brjod de rin phul la/ /me yi phyogs nas gcad par bya/ /srid du ho ma gyur mnyam la/ /sbom phra khru gang yod pa'i shing / /bzhi gnyis sum gnyis mchog tu gces/ /gzhan yang ro bsregs shing dag la/ /sbom phra khru do yod pa yi/ /shar nub gnyis su re re
<p>321a.4</p>yang / /srid du mchod snam yang na ni/ /dngos grub gsol bsgor gzhab shing gnyis/ /shing rgyu phra sbom do dang gsum/ /theg pa'i khyad par bstan pa ni/ /kri yog ma hA yo ga gsum/ /gang gi sgor zhugs de lhas sbyang / /goms pa'i dbang du shes pa mchog /rim pa gsum du shes
<p>321a.5</p>par bya/ /de steng khang pa lus mgo tshad/ /phrag non bzhi yang bzhir dmigs la/ /'tshogs nas shing gi bdag po la/ /mchod pa gtor ma sna tshogs ni/ /stegs bu khru gang pad+ma bre/ /de dbus shing la 'bag bris gzhag /las kyi skal ldan gang dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor chen por
<p>321a.6</p>'jug pa ni/ /yo byad thams cad tshang ba mchog /che chung mang nyung rgyu las tshad/ /ci yod yid 'ong mdzes pa dgram/ /de dag byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal dang / /bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byin gyis brlab/ /oM badzra kro d+ha trai lokya bi dza ya/ oM AHhUM/ a a A/ 
<p>321a.7</p>bla re gtsug tor rnam rgyal brlab/ /oM AHhUM/ oM AHhUM A/ ba dan 'phan tsho des byin brlab/ /oM gtso bo'i sa bon/ oM AHhUM A/ gdugs ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar brlab/ /oM suM oM AHhUM/ rgyal mtshan ke tu des byin brlab/ /oM rat+na ke tu oM AHhUM/ lnga ldi so
<p>321b</p>
<p>321b.1</p>so las rigs brlab/ /oM sarba karma trai lokya bi dza ya oM AHhUM/ tshon sna bde gshegs lnga yis brlab/ /de yang dkyil 'khor gang yin nyid/ /ser po oM oM oM A hUM/ bsgyur te smon lam gdab par bya/ /dkar po oM hUM oM AHhUM/ nag po oM swa oM AHhUM/ dmar po oM oM aM
<p>321b.2</p>AHhUM/ ljang gu oM ha oM AHhUM/ srad bu gang yin gtso bos brlab/ /oM oM oM AHhUM/ rta babs phyag rgya bzhis byin brlab/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHoM AHhUM/ mda' bzhi rdo rje chags pas brlab/ /oM badzrar ga oM AHhUM/ ral gri rdo rje rnon pos brlab/ /oM pad+ma tik+Sh+Na oM AHhUM/ phur bu
<p>321b.3</p>khro bo lngas byin brlab/ /oM a par tsi ta/ ya man+ta ka h+ya gr-I ba a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ ma hA b+ha la oM AHhUM/ bum pa gang yin yum gyis brlab/ /oM d+hA tu shwa ri oM AHhUM/ 'gab 'khor srung ba chen mos brlab/ /hUM hUM hUM a pra ti ha ta oM AHhUM/ do shal gtsug tor rgyal bas brlab/ 
<p>321b.4</p>oM trAM oM AHhUM/ dril bu ku lan d+ha ras brlab/ /oM ku lan+d+ha ri pradz+nyo ba ba ba sho yo ga shu dz+nya oM AHhUM/ rnga yab rgyal po bzhis byin brlab/ /oM dr-iSh+Ta raSh+Ta bi ru snya ka/ bi ru pak+Sha/ be shra ba Ne/ oM AHhUM/ nor bu kun gyi yon tan brlab/ /oM sarba rat+na ku la oM AHhUM/ me long rdo rje
<p>321b.5</p>sems dpas brlab/ oM badzra satwa A daR+sha oM AHhUM/ spyan snying sangs rgyas spyan gyis brlab/ oM bud+d+ha sarba ku la tsit+ta dz+nyA na oM AHhUM/ nyi zla thabs dang shes rab brlab/ /oM srur+ya tsan+d+ra du na pradz+nyA oM AHhUM/ btung ba mA ma kIs byin brlab/ /oM rat+na badzra oM AHhUM/ bdug pa me
<p>321b.6</p>tog dri chab me/ /oM badzra d+hu pe puSh+pe A lo ke gan+d+he oM AHhUM/ lha bshos khur ba bca' ba'i tshogs/ /ku lan d+ha ras byin gyis brlab/ /oM badzra ku lan+d+ha ri oM AHhUM/ phung po lnga nyid rnam grol lngar/ /bsgyur zhing oM skan d+ha shu da nya oM AHhUM/ 'o ma la sogs mngar gsum ni/ /mA
<p>321b.7</p>ma kIs ni byin gyis brlab/ /oM mA ma kI oM AHhUM/ gtor ma thug pa grangs ldan brlab/ /oM swasti badzra oM AHhUM/ 'bru rnams mA ma kIs byin brlab/ /oM mA ma kI oM AHhUM/ 'bras yos ma du gos dkar mo/ /oM pad+ma badzri oM AHhUM/ ga pur sman rnams las thams cad/ /
<p>322a</p>
<p>322a.1</p>oM badzra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li oM AHhUM/ gtsang 'bob sangs rgyas spyan gyis brlab/ /oM laM ke shwa ra ti d+hA tu oM AHhUM/ yam shing bud shing thams cad ni/ /me lhas byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM ag+na ye oM AHhUM/ shag te'u shug te'u cang te'u sogs/ /
<p>322a.2</p>sangs rgyas spyan gyis byin gyis brlab/ /oM mUM badzra oM AHhUM/ zangs phye ske tshe til la phug /kro ti shwa ri sangs rgyas spyan/ /oM kro ti shwa ri swa ta badzri oM AHhUM/ tsher te'u la sogs mA ma kI/ /oM mA ma kI oM AHhUM/ dgang gzar gang yin yum gyis brlab/ /blugs
<p>322a.3</p>gzar gang yin yab kyis brlab/ /phur bu gang yin gtso 'khor khro/ /gtun khung gang yin de yum 'khor/ /mda' gzhu ma mo tsau ris brlab/ /oM badzra tsau ri oM AHhUM/ gzhan rnams bdud rtsi 'khyil pas brlab/ /g.yab dar rlung lhas byin
<p>322a.4</p>gyis brlab/ /oM badzra ba ya bya oM AHhUM/ zhal kham mA ma kIs byin brlab/ /sreg shing b+h+rUM gyis brlab par bya/ /oM b+h+rUM e baM ma yA sbyar/ /oM AHhUM/ chas gos 'bru lngas byin brlabs gzhag /ku sha bting ba'i stan steng du/ /sngags g.yog shar bltas nyal du gzhug /lha
<p>322a.5</p>rnams kyis ni legs dgu ster/ /byin gyis brlab pa ma byas na/ /las rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ /yang na rnam rgyal lam bdud rtsi/ /'khyil pa nyid kyis brlab kyang rung / /dkyil 'khor ci yang bzhengs pa la/ /phrin las bzhi yi hom ldan bya/ /
<p>322a.6</p>yang ni ting 'dzin bye brag las/ /las bzhi'i cho ga rdzogs pa mchog /cho ga ma tshang las mi 'grub/ /de phyir sta gon rdzogs par bya/ /u dum+bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /ston pa po ni shin tu yang / /de bas kyang ni 'jig rten du/ /'byung ba yang ni shin tu dkon/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ston pa dka'/ / 
<p>322a.7</p>dam pa'i chos ni ston srid kyang / /gsang sngags ston pa shin tu dka'o/ /gal te gang sngags ston kyang rung / /dkyil 'khor du ni 'jug pa dka'/ /bskal bar yang ni sngags spyad pa'i/ /las dbang gis ni deng mthong nas/ /rgyal po yang ni ma yin yang / /rgyal po nyid ni chen por gyur/ /
<p>322b</p>
<p>322b.1</p>bde gshegs rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /yon tan gyi ni mchog kyang 'thob/ /tshe ring zhing ni longs spyod kyang / /phun sum nyid ni tshogs par 'gyur/ /las rnams kun ni thams cad kyang / /btang snyoms pa ni yan lag go/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las dag dang / /cho 'phrul bzhi yi che ba dang / /gang zhig dkyil 'khor
<p>322b.2</p>nang gzhug pa/ /gsum po de ni gzhan don gsungs/ /dang po las gsungs rim pa ni/ /tshes grangs chos klog gzhi bdag dang / /srad bu tshad ldan bgegs bsal bsrung / /thugs dam bskul g.yog dbang bskur sbyang / /rang bzhin thig gdab slar bsdu dang / /tshon dgye phyag rgya rgyan rnams
<p>322b.3</p>dgod/ /gsum lnga bdun dang bcu gcig dang / /bcu gsum bco lnga yar gyi shis/ /zhi dang rgyas pa mchog tu bshad/ /bcu bdun nyi shu gnyis brgyad do/ /dbang dang drag po'i dkyil 'khor mchog /dus dang mtshan ma kri ya'o/ /nyi ma dge zhing rgyu skar bzang / /mtshan ma'i sems
<p>322b.4</p>rtog mi dmigs pa/ /de ni chos dbyings gnas pa yin/ /de ltar dus dang mthun pa dang / /phyogs bzhir dge bsnyen gtsang sbra can/ /sha dang chang bcad bud med spangs/ /tshul du shis pa rgyun mi bcad/ /shar du sdud pa tshigs su bcad/ /lhor ni bzang po spyod pa'o/ /nub tu snang
<p>322b.5</p>brgyad gsang ba'i mdo/ /byang du gser 'od dam pa gdon/ /gus par mchod cing bden pa bklag /tshon sna lnga skud bu mos bkal/ /de nyid kyis ni brgyar bzlas te/ /rgyu bzang tshad la phebs pa dang / /bzang po'i lta stangs sbyar nas ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /lag
<p>322b.6</p>na rdo rjes bgegs bskrad bya/ /srung ba chen mos bdag gzhan bsrung / /phyogs bcu gtso la sogs pa yi/ /thugs dam bskul nas srad bur thim/ /de lta'i rigs bzhi'i thugs las phyung / /gtso bo gang yin thugs zhugs phyung / /de nas gtso bo gang yin gyi/ /sangs rgyas zhing
<p>322b.7</p>rnams sbyang ba dang / /myur du sems can don bsgrub dang / /las kyi dngos po gang byed pa'i/ /las rnams ma lus khyod kyis byos/ /las kyi rdo rje don yod grub/ /kha dog sna tshogs byung ba la/ /oM AHhUM swA hA/ karma zhes ni dbang bskur ro/ /bdag nyid shar lho mtshams
<p>323a</p>
<p>323a.1</p>'greng ste/ /sngags g.yog byang shar mtshams su ni/ /pus btsugs thal sbyar 'dug pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor gang bzhengs las rnams ni/ /gang bzheng gtso bo'i bka' bzhin du/ /las kyi byed por bdag gyur pas/ /thams cad ma lus bdag gis bgyi/ /
<p>323a.2</p>de nas thub dbang bskul byas nas/ /de nas sbyang bar bya ba ni/ /bdag po gang yin ting 'dzin las/ /yi gyis phrag dog gtor lud dkyil/ /de na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar/ /'od 'phros dngos po'i mtshan ma bsregs/ /bdag nyid yi ge khar gyur gtso/ /mnga' bdag de yi byin brlabs chu/ /rgyun
<p>323a.3</p>gyi khams dag de nyid rang / /de yi byin brlabs yon tan bcu/ /de mthu las byed las rnams 'grub/ /mkhas pas thig btab tsa thI'i dmigs/ /lha mos gshegs bskul skud la thim/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur/ /lte ba'i thad kar thal bkan la/ /g.yas pa bkan gzhag
<p>323a.4</p>mtheb ngos sbyar/ /de nas sbub ldog nam mkhar gdab/ /lan gcig gnyis gsum btab pa'i mthus/ /rang bzhin byon dang ting 'dzin gsal/ /ngan song gsum bde zhus bshad bstod/ /mchog gsum lha tshogs mchod phyag 'tshal/ /oM b+h+rUM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko\u0f85haM/ 
<p>323a.5</p>zhes pas rang bzhin thig gdab bya/ /bdag nyid shar lho mtshams song ste/ /las bdag byang shar mtshams 'dug ste/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ /dam tshig bskul dang las bya'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM/ tshad ldan sngags g.yog med phur chogs/ /
<p>323a.6</p>sems can don byas bdag nyid kyi/ /slar yang thugs kar bsdu bar bya/ /oM badzra saM ha ra Na hUM hUM hUM/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni/ /yon tan phrin las rigs lnga yi/ /gtso bo gang yin de nyid la/ /gsang gsum zhes su bsgrags pa'ang mchog /tshon ni dri dang pa tsan dang / /
<p>323a.7</p>rin chen phung po gsum du bstan/ /yon tan sku 'dra las thugs bzhin/ /dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba yin/ /'khor lo rdo rje ra ba ni/ /phye ma dkar pos nyis rim bri/ /lhas kyi lha las ma gtogs pa/ /phal pa dang ni bsrung bkra shis/ /phye ma dkar bo chig rkyang bri/ /sgo yi tshon sna
<p>323b</p>
<p>323b.1</p>pany+tsa'o/ /gnyis pa tri la sgo gong brtsig /rkyang bris phyag rgya dgod pa yang / /gtso bo gzugs la 'khor phyag rgya/ /phal la sogs pa yig 'bru'o/ /tha mal pa dag thig le'o/ /tshon la sogs pa'i las rnams kun/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas bya bar shis/ /dbang
<p>323b.2</p>ldan 'dren pa'i lha dbang phyogs/ /tshon ni nang nas dgye bar bya/ /de nas phyag rgya nor bu bum/ /dgod pa nyid du bya ba yin/ /gzungs thag slob dpon gzung ba shis/ /de 'og tshon rnams rim gyis gtang / /de nas phyag rgya'am yig 'bru gzhag /thog mar sgo yi tshon dgye nas/ /de
<p>323b.3</p>'og sgo yi phyag rgya dang / /glang seng rnams kyang dgod par bya/ /maN+Dal thams cad byi dor ni/ /dang po ba lci de 'og tu/ /rnam lngas bskus nas de 'og tu/ /dri yi chus ni byug par bya/ /tshon dgye dus su thugs dam bskul/ /sems can khams ni zhi byed pa'i/ /'di ni chos dbyings ro
<p>323b.4</p>yin pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te/ /de bas bdag gis bka' bzhin du/ /tshon 'gyed pa yi las bgyid na/ /rgyal ba kun byin dbang bskur cig /phyag rgya dgod phyir thugs dam bskul/ /sku gsung thugs rtags mtshan ma 'di/ /'gro la phan phyir dgod do zhes/ /
<p>323b.5</p>sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te/ /rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur cig /rgyan rnams dang po nor bu ste/ /de la sogs pa dgod par bya/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po ches/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /sngags rnams gong ma de las ni/ /tiSh+Tha badzra bsnan par
<p>323b.6</p>bsams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyu las byas/ /kha dog dbyibs su ldan pa yi/ /shes rab yum gyi bum pa 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /rten gyi 'bras bu mtshon 'brel rtags/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas/ /thugs rje gzungs thag chen po yis/ /dkyil
<p>323b.7</p>'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /phrin las yon tan lhun grub pa'i/ /bla re kun bzang dang nyid rtags/ /'bras bu rtags kyi phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i/ /sku yi phyag rgya mtshon mdzad cing / /mtshan dang dpe byad
<p>324a</p>
<p>324a.1</p>'phan chen gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /nyon mongs gdung ba sel byed pa'i/ /gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu bar ldan/ /skyabs chen byams pa chen po yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /nyon mongs bdud las rgyal mdzad pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rgyal mtshan te/ / 
<p>324a.2</p>rtags kyi rgyal mtshan chen po 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /phrin las cho 'phrul bzhi bzhi yis/ /las rnams rgya mtsho rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /snyan pa'i ba dan gsung sgrogs pas/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel pa'i rtags/ /kha dog sna
<p>324a.3</p>lnga 'bar ba yi/ /lhab lhub lda ldi chen po yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /thugs rje gzungs thag ye shes bzhis/ /sangs rgyas bzhi yi phrin las thugs/ /thugs rje srad bu 'phel gzungs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhis/ /
<p>324a.4</p>'gro ba'i don rnams rdzogs mdzad pa/ /dri zhim rta babs phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /mgo rmongs 'khyams pa'i mun sel mdzad/ /gti mug go bral shes rab mdas/ /gting dbugs byang chub lam 'god pas/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /
<p>324a.5</p>'khor ba'i dra ba chags pa'i rgyun/ /mtha' gnyis gcod mdzad byams pa'i mgon/ /shes rab rtags kyi ral gri 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /khro gtum rngam pa'i tshul 'chang bas/ /log par lta ba'i zhe sdang 'dul/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i kI la yas/ /dkyil
<p>324a.6</p>'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /mtshan ma'i yul rnams sel mdzad cing / /srung dang mtshams kyi las mdzad pa/ /'gab 'khor srung ba chen po 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus pa'i/ /dpe byad rtags kyi do shal chun/ /yid 'ong me tog 'bar ba
<p>324a.7</p>yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa'i rtags/ /rin chen mchog gsum mtshan brjod pa'i/ /gsung dbyangs drug cu ldan dril 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /mtshan ma'i bag chags kun sel ba'i/ /dus gsum sangs
<p>324b</p>
<p>324b.1</p>rgyas thams cad la/ /rgyal chen bzhis phul mchod mchog gis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan 'dra ba yi/ /rang bzhin dag pas rtog pa med/ /ma rmongs ston pa'i me long 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /zhi ba'i mtha' la mi
<p>324b.2</p>gnas shing / /'jig rten kun dang mthun 'jug rtags/ /thabs dang shes rab nyi zla 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /gzhan yang mchod pa'i rgyan 'os dang / /lha bshos phyogs kyi gtor ma yis/ /rgyu drug 'gro tshim byed mthu yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis
<p>324b.3</p>rlobs/ /gnyis pa bdag zhugs cho 'phrul gyis/ /che ba'i don thabs bstan pas 'dzin/ /ting nge 'dzin dang byin gyis brlab/ /dbang bskur mchod pa'i cho 'phrul lo/ /bdag nyid dang po rnal 'dug dang / /ting 'dzin zhugs pa rnam gnyis so/ /bdag shar sgor 'dug 'dzin pa la/ /dam
<p>324b.4</p>bca' dbang thob snying rje yis/ /thabs dang shes rab don byed par/ /'phags pa kun mkhyen spyan drangs la/ /oM AHhUM swA hA lnga yis/ /byin gyis brlabs la swas dbang bskur/ /phyag rgya'i go cha haM gi bgo/ /tuSh+ya hoHdang san+d+hi tiSh+Tha dang / /ya thA badzra satwa tiSh+Tha taM a haM baM/ /dgongs pas grub
<p>324b.5</p>pa zhugs dang bskyed/ /de nas khro bos bgegs mtshams bcad/ /zhugs pas de bzhin nyid kun snang / /rgyu las 'byung ba rim la bskyed/ /de steng gzhal yas khang rgyan ldan/ /nang du gdan dag bskyed pa'i steng / /'khor lo yid 'ong gru chad dang / /sgo dang sgo khang bya dang bcas/ /sems can
<p>324b.6</p>pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan/ /ci rigs par ni mdzes par bya/ /de steng sems nyid dag pa yis/ /rgyu las chos nyid mngon byang chub/ /de gzugs zla ba yig 'bru dang / /phyag mtshan dang ni sku rdzogs pa/ /'bras bu dang ni bskyed pa lnga/ /stong pa'i cho 'phrul lnga rgyu lnga/ /chos nyid rgyu las rnam snang
<p>324b.7</p>mngon byang chub/ /gzugs brnyan zla ba mi bskyod mngon byang chub/ /yig 'bru rin chen 'byung ldan mngon byang chub/ /phyag mtshan snang ba mtha' yas mngon byang chub/ /gzugs sku don yod grub pa mngon byang chub/ /snang ston sra brtan sreg byed dang / /gyes 'dzin shugs bskyod zad
<p>325a</p>
<p>325a.1</p>par lnga/ /nam mkha' sa me chu rlung gi/ /de yi byin rlabs thams cad mngon byang chub/ /rgyu las bag chags gnas gyur chos dbyings bskyed/ /zla ba kun gzhi gnas gyur me long bskyed/ /yig 'bru nyon mongs gnas gyur mnyam sems bskyed/ /phyag mtshan yid
<p>325a.2</p>gyur so sor rtog sems bskyed/ /sku ni sgo lnga bya ba nan tan bskyed/ /rtag chad gzung 'dzin bdag gzhan bya ba grub/ /chos nyid rgyu las rnam snang mngon bstan pas/ /bsam gtan tshul te sangs rgyas rjes dran sku/ /oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro yA mi/ e ma'o/ /don dam rang bzhin spros med
<p>325a.3</p>sems kyi dbyings/ /rgyal ba rgyal mtsho'i thugs dang ye nas mnyam/ /mngon par byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /chos dbyings nyid mi gnas ji bzhin dang / /gzugs brnyan zla ba mi bskyod mngon bstan pas/ /ye shes tshul te dge 'dun rjes dran sku/ /oM bid+d+hi tsit+ta tsan+d+ra ut+pA da
<p>325a.4</p>ya mi/ e ma'o/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen yongs rdzogs pa/ /zla ba nya ba bzhin du snang ba ste/ /kun du bzang po ye nas dag pa'i don/ /mngon par byang chub rang bzhin 'od kyang gsal/ /yig 'bru rin chen 'byung ldan mngon bstan pas/ /sbyin pa'i tshul te gtong ba rjes dran sku/ /
<p>325a.5</p>oM hUM swA aHha tiSh+Tha e ma ho/ /ma rig sel cing yang dag rig bskyed pa/ /gsung gi rang bzhin che ba'i byin rlabs te/ /gsang ba bsgrub pa'i mchog tu bsngags pas na/ /don gyi snying po spros med byang chub dbyings/ /phyag mtshan so so mtha' yas mngon bstan pas/ /tshul khrims tshul
<p>325a.6</p>de gnyis rtog chos dran sku/ /tsakra badzra rat+na pad+ma karma swA b+hA wa At+mako\u0f85haM/ e ma'o/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thugs nyid ye shes lnga yi rtags su snang / /mi g.yo mi ldog mchog gi rang bzhin pas/ /ji bzhin mnyam pas byang chub chen po'i ngang / /skur gyur gzugs
<p>325a.7</p>las don yod skur ston pas/ /brtson 'grus tshul te lha rjes dran pa'i sku/ /oM hUM swa AHha ya tha satwa tiSh+Tha taM a haM/ e ma'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /ma skyes ye shes mnyam pa nyid/ /thabs la mkhas dang thugs rje yi/ /de nyid phyag rgya chen por snang / /sngags ni
<p>325b</p>
<p>325b.1</p>sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/ /tshigs bcad don grub rtog tshad gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /dgyes pa'i phyag ni spyi bor gzhag /byin gyis brlab phyir oM AHhUM/ /dbang bskur swa 'bar rin po che/ /yongs su grub dang gzhan dbang dang / /kun brtags pa ni thams
<p>325b.2</p>cad la'o/ /yongs su grub pa zhes pa ni/ /rnam snang mdzad chen de nyid do/ /gzhan dbang rjes su bstan pa ni/ /sangs rgyas mang pos sngags gsungs rtogs/ /kun brtags zhes su bstan pa ni/ /'og min gnas dang ri rab zom/ /rdo rje gdan la sogs ston pa'o/ /'khor rnams
<p>325b.3</p>thams cad sgo mdun bskyed/ /'bras bu lnga ni yongs su grub/ /bskyed pa gzhan dbang yin par bshad/ /ston pa'i cho 'phrul kun brtags so/ /snyan gsan gsol spyan drang la gzhug /dam tshig phyag 'tshal mchod bstod chos/ /byang chub sdom go byin rlabs dang / /mtshams bcad
<p>325b.4</p>dam tshig dbog rig bya/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams na/ /rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas/ /mgon po dam can ji snyed po/ /thams cad kun nas dgongs su gsol/ /gnyis med rnam dag dbyings mchog na/ /mnyam nyid gnas pa de bzhin gshegs/ /bskul
<p>325b.5</p>pa'i sa la bzhengs nas kyang / /sems can don la rab brtson pa'i/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /byang chub sems dpa' lcam dral dang / /khro bo khro mo la sogs kun/ /rgyud lnga'i sems can sbyang ba dang / /khyad par bdag dang yon bdag dang / /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin
<p>325b.6</p>rlob don/ /rang bzhin rdzogs chen bzhugs gnas nas/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan gzhal yas 'dir/ /thugs rjes byon dgongs spyan 'dren spyon /e h+ye hi bud+d+ha d+hA twI shwa ri bo d+hi satwa sarba sa mA dzaH/ chos dbyings nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa na/ /rgyal ba'i bzhugs
<p>325b.7</p>gnas khyad par can/ /rab 'byams mchod pa'i bklubs shing ni/ /nyi zla pad sogs gdan steng nas/ /mi mjed 'dzam gling 'jig rten 'dir/ /bkra shis dpal mchog gzhal yas khang / /bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/ /'gro ba'i don phyir spyan 'dren na/ /dus gsum/ 
<p>326a</p>
<p>326a.1</p>gshegs pa'i 'jig rten sgron/ /thugs rje dam can smon lam gyis/ /sems can don phyir chos sku las/ /gzugs sku longs spyod rdzogs skur snang / /thugs rjes sprul skur gshegs pa bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor ma nyams dam pa 'dir/ /byin gyis rlabs kyis gshegs
<p>326a.2</p>su gsol/ /dkyil 'khor gang lhags lha tshogs kun/ /tshom tshom mtshams bsdebs spyan drangs la/ /stobs bcu'i rtsal 'chang mi yi seng ge spyon/ /gti mug mun sel 'jig rten sgron ma spyon/ /nyon mongs nad sel sman pa'i rgyal po spyon/ /bdud rigs pham mdzad thar pa'i
<p>326a.3</p>lam ston spyon/ /dbang mdzad rgyal po 'dir spyon mchod pa bzhes/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs ma lus gnas 'dir spyon/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yang dag spyan 'dren bstan pa'i bdag /gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pas/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la brtan par gyur/ /e
<p>326a.4</p>ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rin chen zhags pa dam po'i bdag /rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kun/ /slar yang bdag gis drang bar bgyi/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /pad+ma lcags sgrog dam pa'i bdag /bcings pa kun las grol ba rnams/ /sems can don du bcing bar
<p>326a.5</p>'dod/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rgya gram dril bu dbab brtan bdag /kun gyi chos bdag gyur pa yang / /bran du yang ni gyur cing zhugs/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye hi b+ha ga bA na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoHsa ma ya dzaHhUM/ oM la sogs pa'i lha rnams sngags/ /rting la a ka dzas
<p>326a.6</p>brgyan cing / /so sor sku gsung thugs kyi lha/ /ma lus pa rnams spyan drang ngo / /mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang / /rgya gram 'khor lo bskor du gsol/ /mgon po thugs rje cher ldan pa/ /
<p>326a.7</p>thams cad kun mkhyen rgyud rig pas/ /'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad du gsol/ /gtor ma las rnams kun gyi mchog /las kyi sna la bstan pa ni/ /shar du bstan pa bsrung ba la/ /lhor ni srid pa mnyam pa yin/ /nub tu klu gdug bzlog pa'o/ /
<p>326b</p>
<p>326b.1</p>byang nas las la gzhug pa'o/ /de nas so sor srung mtshams gcad/ /e h+ye his bos las la gzhug /byin gyis brlab byas mchod bstod cing / /smon lam gdab cing slar gting gtong / /lag pa'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /snying po 'jug la gdags pa ni/ /badzra satwa sa ma yaM karma/ /gdags
<p>326b.2</p>shing dbyangs dang sbyar ba'o/ /thugs brtse phan pa'i dgongs pa can/ /ji ltar phrin las bcol ba bzhin/ /'khor ba yun ring de srid du/ /don rnams mdzad cing brtan por ni/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /snying po 'jug la gdags pa ni/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM tiSh+Tha badzra
<p>326b.3</p>A gats+tsha dzaH/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pA da ban+da na ka ro mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pA sha At+ma nAM ni R+yA ta yA mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi ShekA ya/ At+ma nAM ni R+yA ta yA mi/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pU dza
<p>326b.4</p>pra brta na ya At+ma nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma bra brta ya mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne/ At+ma nAM niR+yAta yA mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ de nas mchod pa'i rim pa ni/ /dang po sbyin sreg las bzhi ste/ /de nas lhag pa'i mchod skyabs gsol/ /de nas thun mong mchod
<p>326b.5</p>rnam lnga/ /de nas bstod pa'i mchod pa'o/ /de nas mchod sprin bya ba bshad/ /de kun ngag yid gdungs dbyangs mchod/ /mchod pa'i dang po 'di yin no/ /de 'og rdzas kyi mchod pa la/ /sbyin sreg mchod sbyin rnams kyi mchog /sdeb sbyor mchog ni nyi ma'i lha/ /mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste/ /rgya
<p>326b.6</p>mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog /zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso/ /nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso/ /bsgrub pa'i mchog ni gsang sngags te/ /las kyi mchog ni rnam bzhi'o/ /gnas kyi mchog ni dkyil 'khor bzhi/ /steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang / /'gro ba'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa/ /lha dang bcas pa'i
<p>326b.7</p>'jig rten na/ /smra ba'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bstan pa'i mchog ni rdzogs chen po/ /rdo rje rgyud du bsngags pa yin/ /bzlas pa'i mdun dang bar skabs dang / /de bzhin bzlas pa'i 'og tu yang / /sngags pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ /thams cad du yang bsngags pa yin/ /sbyin sreg
<p>327a</p>
<p>327a.1</p>byas nas bzlas bya ba/ /dang por shin tu 'dod pa yin/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg 'brel pa ni/ /de ni bar du 'dod pa yin/ /bzlas pa'i mjug gi sbyin sreg gang / /de nas shin tu gtso bar bshad/ /dang pos bu lon rtog pa bsal/ /bar du lha rnams tshim bya'i phyir/ /tha mas
<p>327a.2</p>lhag chad bskangs pa'i don/ /baM gyis tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /dang byams yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /las rnams brtsam par byas nas ni/ /gtum chen rngam po'ang lhan ner 'gyur/ /lha rnams dkar po byams dang ldan/ /zlum po dkyil
<p>327a.3</p>'khor rtsibs brgyad par/ /lha rnams 'khor bcas brgyan par bzhugs/ /ho ma mchog zlum gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje pad+mas rab brgyan te/ /phur pa dkar po drug btab par/ /yid la shin tu gsal byas te/ /byin za dge ba rab sbar bstan/ /yam shing dkar po rnams kyi me/ /rab sbar rdo rje
<p>327a.4</p>khro bo yi/ /ngang byams gzhag ste snyoms zhugs la/ /til bsregs bzhin du sdig bsregs shing / /che ge sarba pA paM da ha na hUM phaT dz+wa la raM/ /shar lho kha khyer de nyid la/ /dam tshig nyid kyi raM spros te/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi zla dkar bzhin/ /zhi ba'i lus dang lta ba'i thabs/ /skyin
<p>327a.5</p>chen dkar po'i gdan bzhugs bsam/ /ye shes ag+ne'i thugs dam bskul/ /oM na mo badzra pA Na ye/ na mo dz+nyA na ag+na ye de ba dz+wa la raM/ lan gsum brjod pas zhal phyogs shing / /spyan gzigs thugs dgongs de nyid la/ /dam tshig pa yi lcags kyu bcas/ /gnyis min dbyings
<p>327a.6</p>las bskul pa yi/ /ye shes drang srong chen po nyid/ /sngon gyi smon lam thugs rje yis/ /byin gyis brlab phyir gshegs su gsol/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+yi he/ oM badzra ha ri bi ga /pa ta tsi ba lo ke ti/ ya sha de hi de ba bta ye swA hA/ na mo badzra pA Na s+ye/ oM dz+nyA na ag+na ye/ ki li ki li/ 
<p>327a.7</p>dan+te la po tra/ i ha i ha A gats+tsha hUM ta sha nA ya swA hA/ ye shes me lha byon nas ni/ /dam tshig bskyed dang gcig gyur nas/ /mdun du bzhugs pa de nyid la/ /gnyis med drang srong ag+ne la/ /bdug spos chur byas bsang ba ni/ /stong gsum kun du dri mchog 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /spos
<p>327b</p>
<p>327b.1</p>lnga sman sbyar chu gtsang rgyal ba'i khrus/ /ye shes sprin phung mkha' las cher 'bebs pas/ /mi gtsang dri ma'i tshogs kun dag gyur cig /swa b+hA ba sarba d+harmAHshud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ dag pa nyid du byas nas kyang / /mchod pa lnga yis mchod de gzhag /gnyis min drang srong ag+ne la/ /bdug spos me
<p>327b.2</p>tog me dri bshos/ /yon bdag don du 'bul lags na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM na mo dz+nyA na sa ma ya satwa ag+na ye d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke gan+d+he/ A ha ra sarba d+harmAHpU dza pany+tsa swA hA/ de nas mchod bstod shing rta la/ /bzhugs pa nyid du bya ba'am/ /kha khyer
<p>327b.3</p>bzhag la las mchod bstod/ /de nas me yi dngos nyid pa'i/ /rang bzhin rnam rgyal khro bo phyogs/ /de la sogs pa gong nyid du/ /spyan drangs mdun du gsol bsgoms la/ /ting 'dzin gsal bas de nyid sbyang / /rnam par rgyal ba bos nas ni/ /gzugs brnyan shar g.yas sam
<p>327b.4</p>dpral ba'i/ /rnam rgyal de yi lus gnyis gcig /de nyid na ni bzhugs par bsam/ /dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs khams gsum rnam rgyal gtso/ /'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs nas ni/ /sreg blugs zhal zas ba ges me sbyangs/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye hi/ oM tre+e
<p>327b.5</p>lokya bi dza ya sa ma ti mu dra hUM phaT/ A gats+tsha/ de ltar spyan drangs de nyid kyis/ /gdan mchog dam pa bstab pa ni/ /me tog lag tu thogs nas ni/ /mya ngan mi 'da' thugs rje'i ngang / /nyon mongs mi spong gos pa med/ /ma chags rang bzhin dag pas na/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs
<p>327b.6</p>su gsol/ /pad+ma ka ma la ye s+t+waM/ de ltar gdan la bzhugs pa yang / /yang dag nyid du dag mod kyi/ /dri ma'i mtshan ma med mod kyang / /'jig rten srid zhu'i tshul gyis su/ /phyag dang zhal ni bsil mdzod cig /A ha ra bi shud+d+he swa b+hA ba/ de nas mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal
<p>327b.7</p>gyis/ /che ge mo yi sdig bshags nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbang bskur te/ /yang dag nyid du sgrub pa la/ /bar chad byed pa'i log rtog ni/ /gnod sbyin skar ma gdong la sogs/ /chad pas bcad cing bka' phab ste/ /bka' 'am sngags kyi tshig tsam gyis/ /zhi ba
<p>328a</p>
<p>328a.1</p>la sogs rnam bzhi ni/ /bran bzhin du ni byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir dang po khro bo mchod/ /de phyir rnam par rgyal sogs la/ /mar khu shag te'u shu tse'u 'di/ /yon bdag don du 'bul lags na/ /thugs rjes dgongs la bzhes du gsol/ /snying ga'i thad nas dbul
<p>328a.2</p>bar bya/ /oM trai lokya bi dza ya kro d+ha ya dI bya dI bya na pU dza ye swA hA/ lag g.yas mtheb srin nyi ma a/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /blangs te sku gsung thugs mnyes phyir/ /mchod pa'i gnas dang mchod rdzas dang / /mchod mkhan nyid las byang chub sems/ /dkar po shel dag
<p>328a.3</p>byung ba yis/ /gang la dmigs pa der bstims pas/ /las dang nyon mongs bag chags zhi/ /khro rgyal khams gsum rnam rgyal la/ /mngar gsum 'o thug nas kyi thug /'bras bu lag pan 'bras yos dang / /'bru sna lnga la sogs pa 'bul/ /bdug spos me tog me dri bshos/ /oM
<p>328a.4</p>trai lokya bi dza ya kro d+ha ya d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke gan+d+he A ha ra sarba d+harmAHpU dza pany+tsa swA hA/ a dI bya dI bya ti ye swA hA/ de nas bstod pa'i mchod pa ni/ /rdo rje dril bu dbyangs ldan la/ /sku yi 'gying 'gyur dang bcas par/ /zhi rgyas gnyis las rdor dril nang / /dbang drag rdor dril phyir bskor gsil/ /ye shes
<p>328a.5</p>bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /ma rig 'dod pa'i bdud khams thams cad sreg /sprin gnyis 'thibs bzhin khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal/ /zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms/ /dpa' bo chen po dba' mtshan stag lpags can/ /log 'dren srin po bgegs kyi
<p>328a.6</p>mtha' gnon pa'i/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dug gsum 'joms mdzad pa/ /khams gsum sems can ngan 'gro las sgrol ba/ /mdog sngo rdo rje pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ khams gsum rnam rgyal che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal sogs/ /me nyid sbyang ba'i las
<p>328a.7</p>mdzod bzhugs/ /tiSh+Tha badzra/ khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyis/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gdab/ /dum bur byas la tshogs la bstabs/ /oM trai lokya bi dza ya kI li a mr-i ta bany+tsa pU dza swA hA/ bde gshegs
<p>328b</p>
<p>328b.1</p>khro chen rnam par rgyal/ /thugs rje che dang bdag 'brel pas/ /gzhal yas nyid du bzhugs nas kyang / /me nyid sbyang ba'i las bcol ba'o/ /de nas lag g.yas kha phar bstan/ /g.yon pa tshur bstan mkhrig ma bsnol/ /mtheb gnyis mthil gzhag sor brgyad bskyod/ /oM kI li kI
<p>328b.2</p>la badzra bi ma la rau tri pra kr-i ti/ ma hA kro d+ha badzra ya na dza ha gr-ih+Na ta hUM phaT/ sbyong ba'i las ni lha tshogs kyis/ /mdun du bya bar yang dag bshad/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum po ste/ /sbyar dang spyan drang gdan dag dang / /mchod pa la sogs rnam rgyal bzhin/ /mgon po thugs rje cher ldan pa/ /
<p>328b.3</p>thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho yon tan gzhi/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dag pas 'dod chags bral ba'i rgyu/ /dge bas ngan 'gro las sgrol zhing / /gcig tu don dam mchog gyur pa/ /zhi gyur chos la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /grol nas grol
<p>328b.4</p>ba'i lam yang ston/ /bslab pa dag la rab tu gus/ /zhing gi dam pa yon tan gzhi/ /dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bla med dkon mchog gsum po yis/ /zhi ba la sogs grub par gsol/ /bde bar gshegs so dkon mchog gsum/ /khyod kyis byams pa'i las
<p>328b.5</p>kun mdzad/ /dang ba'i yid kyis bskyed pa yi/ /gzhal yas nyid du gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma ya hi ga dza/ me lha gnyis ni spyan drang ba'i/ /mdun du kI lis me nyid sbyong / /de nas g.yas pa'i mthe bo yis/ /mthe'u chung mdung tshugs g.yabs nas ni/ /dad pa dang ni
<p>328b.6</p>dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs zhes ni bos nas ni/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye hi/ ma hA b+hU ta de ba ri Shi/ dwi dza sa ta ma ni/ hi twa a hu ti ma hA raM/ asmi san+ni hi to b+ha ba/ ag+na ye A gats+tsha/ ha bya ka bya ba ha nA ya swA hA/ de nas bzhugs par bya ba ni/ /lha yi drang srong kun dang ni/ /sreg sbyin
<p>328b.7</p>btab par khas 'ches pa/ /thugs rje dam tshig brtan pa ni/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /ag+na ye sa ma ya s+t+waM tiSh+Tha/ swa b+hA wa bi ga ta bi dza lo hi ta A kA sha dI pa ya shud+d+he swA hA/ phyag zhal bsil ba byas nas ni/ /gnyis min drang srong me lha la/ /shag te'u la sogs
<p>329a</p>
<p>329a.1</p>bdun gsum dbul/ /oM raM raM ag+na ye ha bya ka bya dI bya dI bya na ya pU dza swA hA/ d+hu pe puSh+pe A lo ke g+han+d+he pU dza pany+tsa swA hA/ de nas rdo rje dril bur bcas/ /'gying 'gyur bcas la bstod pa ni/ /tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras/ /me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog /'byung
<p>329a.2</p>po yongs la bskyab pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis sku sprul la/ /rig par grub pa'i drang srong mchog /nyon mongs sreg pa'i shes rab 'od/ /bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar/ /mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan/ /thabs kyis sprul pa'i theg pa bcibs/ /bgrad
<p>329a.3</p>phreng 'dzin cing rig sngags gsung / /bdud rtsi bcud ldan g+hun+de bsnams/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs la bsil/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral tshangs par spyod/ /'jig rten gnas kyang mya ngan 'das/ /zhi ba brnyes kyang thugs rje che/ /de la bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /ag+ne chen po'i thugs
<p>329a.4</p>dam bzhin/ /me nyid ye shes mer byin rlobs/ /las kyi lha rnams mchod pa yi/ /sreg rdzas stobs pa'i las mdzod bzhugs/ /shing rta gcig la bzhugs gsol la/ /phyogs mtshams lha la bskor zhing mchod/ /ag+na ye ging ka ra pU dza tiSh+Tha/ las kyi lha rnams
<p>329a.5</p>mchod pa yi/ /me sbyang spyan drang gdan dbul bsil/ /las brtan phyag mchod bstod dang dgu/ /nang ston mchod rten chos nyid mkha'/ /chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal rnam par snang mdzad la'o/ /sra brtan rdo rje
<p>329a.6</p>gzugs brnyan sa/ /me long ye shes thugs kyi sku/ /sa gnon chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal sems dpa' mi bskyod la'o/ /sreg byed rin chen yig 'bru me/ /mnyam nyid ye shes yon tan sku/ /mchod sbyin chen po'i phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal 'byung
<p>329a.7</p>ldan dpal khyod la'o/ /dgyes 'dzin pad+ma phyag 'tshal chu/ /kun rtog ye shes gsung gi sku/ /chos sgrogs chen po phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal snang ba mtha' yas la'o/ /shag bskyod rgya gram sku ste rlung / /nan tan ye shes phrin las sku/ /skyabs mdzad chen po'i
<p>329b</p>
<p>329b.1</p>phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal don yod grub pa la'o/ /baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du 'brel bsdams bskyod/ /bcings 'gyur bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo/ /thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la/ /
<p>329b.2</p>mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum po/ /ngos su lha rnams 'khor bcas bsgom/ /btab na gdug rtsub zhi bar 'gyur/ /kI li kI li shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lha yi grub pa bsgom bya ste/ /byams bcas zhi ba'i tho ba yis/ /brdungs pas gdug rtsub
<p>329b.3</p>zhi bar 'gyur/ /sham+ba ta shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ dngul phye 'bras chan dkar po la/ /'o mas sbyar ba'i gtor ma yis/ /thams cad ma lus zhi bskongs nas/ /gtor mas gdug rtsub zhi bar 'gyur/ /s+pha ra Na shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ las rnams bya ba'i don bstan pa'i/ /bdag nyid byams
<p>329b.4</p>pa chen po can/ /dkyil 'khor hom khung mchod rdzas tshogs/ /dkar po nyid du bsgom par bya/ /lha rnams thams cad dkar po ste/ /sku yi gzi 'bar yon tan brjid/ /thams cad kun kyang 'tsher zhing zhi/ /byams par bcas pa'i lag pa nas/ /gtong ba thams cad byang chub
<p>329b.5</p>sems/ /rgyun mi 'chad par kun khyab sgom/ /drang ba zhi 'gyur phur bu rgyas/ /brdungs pas dbang mdzad gtor ma drag /de ni spyi yi las su gsungs/ /phyogs bcu gdug pa ma lus kun/ /gdug pa'i sems ni rab bor te/ /lhan ne dkar po'i 'og tu 'gyur/ /bde ldan byang
<p>329b.6</p>chub 'od 'phro 'bar/ /'jig rten gsum dang 'das gtum la/ /'bru lnga byams ldan byas nas ni/ /gsol ba gdab par bya ba ni/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dri za grul/ /lto 'phye dang ni nam mkha' lding dang 'dab/ /lus sru la srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang / /sa'am mkha' la gnas
<p>329b.7</p>pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad g.yog 'khor tshogs dang bcas pa rnams/ /de rnams sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dad byams yid kyis lha rnams mchod byas te/ /lha yis byin brlabs sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis/ /las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi gyur cig /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ 
<p>330a</p>
<p>330a.1</p>oM AHma hA shIn+taM ka ra shIn+taM ka ra pra sha ma d+harma nirdza ta/ a b+hA ba d+harma satwa/ bra ba ta shIn+taM/ shi baM ku ru swA hA/ de ba shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ nA ga shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ rAk+Sha sa shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ yak+Sha shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ gra ha shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ mi tsi mi tsi shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ gung ing shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ 
<p>330a.2</p>ra tang ra tang pra tang pra tang shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ /ka rA lan bi ra lan shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ bi ha sa nan shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ i ba nan shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ na mo shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ a nr-i su du pre tri shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ gung ka ri kung ga ri shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ mi tsi mi tsi ra ra sraM sraM/ gaM gaM guM guM/ aM aM iM iM a a ra lan
<p>330a.3</p>shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ shi dur na mye tre shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ de nas las sbyar rnam rgyal thabs/ /phyag mtshan nam mkhar phyar nas kyang / /gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun/ /skad cig yud la zhi mdzad de/ /zhi bar gyur pas dbyings su rol/ /bde bar gshegs
<p>330a.4</p>so bcom ldan 'das/ /dad pa'i yid kyis bskyed pa yi/ /gzhal yas nyid du re zhig gshegs/ /slar yang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs/ /de bzhin lha tshogs mang po kun/ /go rims de bzhin las bya'o/ /me yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /
<p>330a.5</p>snying rje dga' bas mchod byas nas/ /las rnams brtsam par byas nas ni/ /tshe dang longs spyod dpal 'phel 'gyur/ /puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tshe ba la/ /dga' chags yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /las rnams brtsam par
<p>330a.6</p>byas nas ni/ /thams cad ma lus dbang du 'gyur/ /e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /btang snyoms khros pas mchod sbyin bya/ /las rnams brtsam par byas nas ni/ /thams cad ma lus brlag par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rgyud
<p>330a.7</p>las byung ba'i las/ /sdig pa sreg dang tshe 'phel hom/ /srung dang ro sreg sgrub pa kun/ /cha shas tsam du bstan pa ni/ /hUM gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /ye shes tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /haM gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /raM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
<p>330b</p>
<p>330b.1</p>mchog /dkyil 'khor hom gyi tshad bstan pa/ /gsung gsum dkyil 'khor tha ma 'bring / /rab ni bcu gnyis dgu dang bdun/ /khru gang thams cad sgo gang bya/ /yan lag thams cad tshad bstan pa/ /de khru gang nas brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid dpag tshad thug gi bar/ /'dul
<p>330b.2</p>ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis/ /yang na tshad la nges pa med/ /hom khung tha ma 'bring dang rab/ /khru gang khru do khru gsum ni/ /'byor pa'i dbang bya pad zla kham/ /gru gsum dang ni 'khor lo rtsibs/ /brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i 'od/ /dkar po dgod de dbus rdo rje/ /rtse lnga shar ro rin chen lho/ /
<p>330b.3</p>nub tu pad+ma byang rgya gram/ /de steng kha 'khor sor bzhi rdo rje ra/ /sems dpa' sems dpa' pad+ma dang khong yon/ /'jig rten pa ni ci rigs mdzes par bya/ /nub phyogs 'dug ste zhi las bya/ /bram ze'i khyim du yang dag bshad/ /lho phyogs rgyas pa nub tu dbang / /byang du drag po
<p>330b.4</p>hom du bshad/ /dkyil 'khor drug gam yang na ni/ /grong khyer phyi rol rje'u rigs dang / /rgyal rigs smad 'tshong dmangs ma'i khyim/ /sngags pa nub dang lho shar byang / /'dug la mchod pa'i don dag ni/ /gang gi gtso dang thabs dang ni/ /shes rab tshul du ldan pa'i
<p>330b.5</p>don/ /hom khung dag gi bye brag kyang / /de ci rigs par bya ba bshad/ /de la sogs pa gtso yum ni/ /khung gi mthil du lhag par dgod/ /me 'od ngos la rdo rje kha/ /'khor rnams phyi rol yang dag dgod/ /ro sreg maN+Dal khru bcu gnyis/ /khru bzhi pa na khru do thabs/ /brko
<p>330b.6</p>ba'i dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad pa la'ang byang chub kyi/ /mchod rten kun rig phyag rgya sogs/ /rigs bzhi dang ni yum bzhi'o/ /de mtha' rdo rje rtse lngas bskor/ /kha la me 'ong bri bar bya/ /de mtha' pad+ma pad+ma la/ /sems dpa' bskal bzang la sogs rnams/ /bri
<p>330b.7</p>bya gro la lha mo bri/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams kyang / /phyi rim phyogs phyogs dag tu bri/ /gzhung dang 'gal byas nyes sdig bshad/ /sdig pa chen po skur btab yin/ /ston pa'i bstan dang dge ba'i las/ /pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang / /mched dang lcam dral
<p>331a</p>
<p>331a.1</p>rnam lnga yin/ /dge ba mi dge mi dge dge/ /rgyal ba'i chos la skur btab yin/ /sdig can de ni mi thar zhes/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i thub pas gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor 'jug 'byung byed pa'i phyir/ /ri mo'am yang ni de bzhin gzhan/ /ci bgyi tshad med bzhi bsgoms te/ /sha
<p>331a.2</p>dang chang dang sgog btsong dang / /rku dang bud med spyad byas na/ /de ni yan lag skur btab yin/ /de las bshags pa byar yod thabs/ /ji bzhin dam la gnas byas sam/ /theg chen sde la mchod byed na/ /sdig can de ni myur du grol/ /pha ma gsad dang 'phrog bcom dang / /chos kyi
<p>331a.3</p>mkhan po gsad pa dang / /dam tshig lung dang shes rab rgyud/ /man ngag dbang gi slob dpon gsum/ /snying nas smad cing gsad pa dang / /theg chen sde la gnas pa yi/ /mched dang lcam dral dbyen byas shing / /dam las log cing 'khus pa ni/ /de ni mtshams med lnga zhes bya/ /de kun
<p>331a.4</p>dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra bar/ /las bzhi sdig bsreg byas bcug na/ /sdig can de yang myur du 'grol/ /sngags dang phyag rgya yig 'bru rnams/ /lhag dang chad par byas pa ni/ /de dang nye ba'i sdig pa yin/ /ci phyir dbyings dang rnam thar gyi/ /sgo rnams gzhan du gyur pas na/ /bskal par
<p>331a.5</p>brjod kyang dngos grub ni/ /thob par mi 'gyur dpa' bos gsungs/ /shes bya'i sdig pa thams cad ni/ /mi shes sdig las bcur 'gyur che/ /shes bya'i sdig bshags thams cad la/ /'bum lnga dag gis 'byang ngo zhes/ /tsha tsha bskor ba phyag dang ni/ /srog 'don mdo sde lnga dag las/ /'bum
<p>331a.6</p>'bum dag tu gsungs pa yin/ /de nas sdom pa gnas pa yin/ /mtshams med lnga la sogs pa yi/ /sdig can de dag rnams dang ni/ /skad cig yud tsam smra mi bya/ /shes nas dam tshig gang nyams pa'i/ /de yi sdig pa brjod mi lang / /gso la nye bar mi brtson na/ /de dag dang yang smra
<p>331a.7</p>mi bya/ /skad cig yud tsam smras pas kyang / /don gyi dngos po gang yin spangs/ /dmag la sogs don gcig pa bzhin/ /de yi bshags pa rgyud lngas so/ /bus 'gros thal 'bud tsher lcag dang / /'greng phyag srog sdom dag gis so/ /lhag dang chad pa'i kha bskong ni/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po
<p>331b</p>
<p>331b.1</p>mnyes pa dang / /tshe rabs slob dpon pha ma dang / /slob ma'i sdig zhi dbang bskur dang / /mtha' yas sems can don byas pas/ /de yi sdig pa nges 'byang ngo / /ho ma bzhi yi gtso bo gang / /sreg rdzas bdun gsum nyi shu gcig /mnyes par bya phyir dbul bar bya/ /de nas tshe rabs slob dpon don/ /
<p>331b.2</p>dkon mchog gsum la bdun gsum gsum/ /dbul ba nyid du bya bar bshad/ /tshe rabs pha ma'i don gyi phyir/ /rigs kyi gtso bo rnams la'o/ /de nas slob ma rim gyis ni/ /bgegs bsal phyir ni spos chus bkru/ /de nas g.yon phyogs tsog pur gzhag /lag g.yas slob dpon
<p>331b.3</p>lag g.yon gyi/ /byams par byas pas bzung nas ni/ /gtso bo dag gi sngags bdun bzlas/ /de nas sdig pa zad bya'i phyir/ /rigs yum lnga la bdun bdun no/ /de yis dbang bskur bsrung bar 'gyur/ /mtha' yas sems can don slad du/ /lha rnams kun la dbul bar bya/ /de dag bkra
<p>331b.4</p>shis bya ba'i phyir/ /yum bzhi gzungs kyis bya ba ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni tshim byed ma/ /dbang po zhi ba zla ba 'dra/ /bstod tshig gis bskul sngags brjod bya/ /de nas bshags pa gus par bya/ /de nas sngags pas kha phyogs nas/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ 
<p>331b.5</p>dr-iD+ho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su poSh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga wAn sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH rigs ldan dbye zhing brjod nas ni/ /skar ma rab rib mar me dang / 
<p>331b.6</p>sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang / /rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bur/ /'dus byas chos kyang de ltar blta/ /de ltar bsdu ba byas nas gzhag /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /bltas te lhag pa'i mchod pa dbul/ /e ma bdag nyid slob bcas pa'i/ /dri zhim ngo bo thams cad kun/ /sngon 'das
<p>331b.7</p>dbyings kyi d+hU par ni/ /byin rlabs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /de bi puSh+pe pU dza ho/ /e ma bdag nyid slob bcas pa'i/ /gsal dro ngo bo thams cad kun/ /byon ma rag ston A lo ker/ /byin rlobs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /de bi A lo ke pAdza ho/ /e ma bdag nyid slob bcas pa'i/ /rlan
<p>332a</p>
<p>332a.1</p>bcas dri zhim thams cad kun/ /ma byon kun gyi gnas der ni/ /byin rlobs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /de bi gan+d+hi pU dza ho/ /de ltar mchod nas skyabs gsol ba/ /dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rten nyid de/ /rnam dag sku las ting 'dzin dag pa'i sku/ /sprul sku phyag rgya mtshon pa'i lha tshogs kyi/ /
<p>332a.2</p>grags pas 'jig rten gsum bkang lham me ba/ /mgon po mchog nyid la ni skyabs su mchi/ /smra bsam brjod med gsung gi sprul pa'i tshogs/ /mtshan nyid so so ye shes kun ston pa/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yum/ /dam chos mdo sde bzhi la skyabs su mchi/ /rab tu
<p>332a.3</p>lam stor 'khor bar mig zum pa'i/ /'gro ba skyabs med kun gyi pha ma mdzad/ /phrin las bzhi yis rtse gcig don mdzad gtso/ /theg chen dge 'dun tshogs la skyabs su mchi/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la/ /gus dang bcas pas phyag byas mchod/ /gtsang zhing gtsang mar bsham
<p>332a.4</p>pa'i rdzas/ /khrus byas gdugs tog me dri bshos/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la 'bul/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga gan sa ma ye swA hA/ oM bi shwa bi shud+d+he swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+harma twA nu ga te swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ma hA mai tre byut+ka Te swA hA/ na maHsa
<p>332a.5</p>man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ dartse s+pha ra Na a ga sa ga nai d+ha rA ya swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bi shud+d+he gan+d+hod+b+ha ba ya swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a ra ra swa ra ra ka ra ra ba liM te ma ni swA hA/ snang stong mchod rten chos nyid mkha'/ /chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal rnam
<p>332a.6</p>par snang mdzad la'o/ /de lta'i yon tan bcas pa la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byams pa'i mchod/ /spos kyi sprin lding bdug pa 'phro/ /gtsug tor rgyal ba gdugs kyis khebs/ /byams pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /badzra d+hU pe mchod pas rol/ /rin chen 'byung ldan snying rje'i mchod/ /ut+pal
<p>332a.7</p>mthing ga me tog thod/ /rin chen zla gam 'od du sbyor/ /snying rje thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /rat+na puSh+pe mchod pas rol/ /snang ba mtha' yas dag pa'i mchod/ /dbal gyi sgron ma phyag na bsnams/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan rab 'bar 'dzugs/ /dga' ba thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /pad+ma
<p>332b</p>
<p>332b.1</p>A lo mchod pas rol/ /don yod grub pas btang snyoms mchod/ /tsan+dan bdud rtsi char 'bebs ma/ /dkyil 'khor gtsang ma'i thig ler 'bebs/'bebs/ /spos spar thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /karma gan+d+he mchod pas rol/ /de ltar rigs la nye ba'i gzugs/ /mchod pa phul ba'i lan dag tu/ /
<p>332b.2</p>rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtogs pa'i yul/ /dung mdog sgeg mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems dpa' dkar po'i ye shes 'bebs/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes la/ /badzra lA s+ya mchod pas rol/ /rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam pa'i yul/ /yid bzhin rin chen gtsug 'bar ma/ /'jam
<p>332b.3</p>dpal rnon po'i dngos grub 'dzin/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la/ /rat+na mA le mchod pas rol/ /snang ba mtha' yas mkhyen pa'i yul/ /pad+ma dbyangs mkhan rma bya'i mgrin/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi shes rab bskyed/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la/ /pad+ma gI ti mchod pas rol/ /don yod grub pa las kyi
<p>332b.4</p>yul/ /gar mkhan 'gying ma gzi dang ldan/ /las kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgyur/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes la/ /karma nirti mchod pas rol/ /de ltar gzungs kyis mchod byas nas/ /rigs bzhi tshad med bsdu ba bzhis/ /mchod phyir dpal gyis gsungs pa'o/ /sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags/ /byams pa chen po'i ngo bo
<p>332b.5</p>nyid/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba rnam dag la/ /badzra aM gu sha yi mchod pas rol/ /don mthun phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags/ /snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /rin chen phyag rgya shes pa la/ /rat+na pA sha'i mchod pas rol/ /don spyod phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags/ /dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /shes rab sgron ma mdzad pa la/ /pad+ma s+pho
<p>332b.6</p>Ta'i mchod pas rol/ /snyan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags/ /btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /mchod rten chen mo kun rig la/ /karma gan+d+he'i mchod pas rol/ /de ltar tshad med mchod byas nas/ /rigs rnams byin gyis rlob pas mchod/ /zhe sdang ma skyes rdo rje dam tshig ma/ /ye shes me long pha rol phyin pa'i ngang / /
<p>332b.7</p>gnyis med rgyas 'dabs drin lan phyag rgya ma/ /satwa badzra dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /nga rgyal bdag med rin chen dam tshig ma/ /ye shes mnyam nyid pha rol phyin pa'i ngang / /mi 'gyur rmongs med drin lan phyag rgya ma/ /rat+na badzra dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /'dod chags mi dmigs chos kyi dam tshig ma/ /ye shes
<p>333a</p>
<p>333a.1</p>kun rtog pha rol phyin pa'i ngang / /mi rtog za byed drin lan phyag rgya ma/ /pad+ma badzri dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /phrag dog ma grub rgya gram dam tshig ma/ /ye shes nan tan pha rol phyin pa'i ngang / /mi skye tshe 'phel drin lan phyag rgya ma/ /karma badzri dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /de ltar byin
<p>333a.2</p>rlabs mchod byas nas/ /rgyan gyi mchod par gsungs pa ni/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba 'khor bcas ni/ /mchod gnas dam pa dpal gyi zhing / /yid du 'ong ba'i mchod sbyin dang / /rol mo sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang / /bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang / /me tog phreng dang bdug spos sogs/ /mar me
<p>333a.3</p>byug pa la sogs pa'i/ /mchod sprin sna tshogs phyogs bcur sprul/ /mchod sprin rig sngags bden pa dang / /nam mkha' mdzod sngags ting 'dzin mthus/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams su/ /mchod sprin sna tshogs bklubs gyur cig /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ badzra sa ra pra
<p>333a.4</p>mar+b+ha ni ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaMka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzre badzre ma hA badzre/ ma hA te dza badzre/ ma hA bI R+ya badzre/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta badzre/ ma hA bo d+hi sa man+to ba saM gra ma Na badzre/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shwa d+ha ni badzre swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tat+khaM ut+ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ de nas yum
<p>333a.5</p>lnga la brten mchod/ /shes rab dbyings phyug rigs yum lnga/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs la byin rlob cing / /thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur mas/ /'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad du gsol/ /shes rab dbyings ma rigs kyi yum lnga ste/ /chos dbyings ye shes mkha' sogs gsal ba la/ /gsang chen
<p>333a.6</p>bde ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i ngang / /thabs ltar rol cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ /yum rnams dag la mchod thabs ni/ /sgrub mchod bcu drug gzhung bzhin bya/ /bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyi/ /chos dbyings ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen bud+d+ha lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par mkhas
<p>333a.7</p>dbang bskur/ /bde gshegs kun gyi yum chen mo/ /phyag 'tshal kun du bzang mo la'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /me long ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen badzra lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par sas dbang bskur/ /rdo rje rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas spyan khyod la'o/ 
<p>333b</p>
<p>333b.1</p>bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan gyi/ /mnyam nyid ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen rat+na lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par mes dbang bskur/ /rin chen rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal na bza' dkar mo la'o/ /bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas kyi/ /kun rtog ye shes chen po'i yul/ /
<p>333b.2</p>yum chen pad+ma lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par chus dbang bskur/ /pad+ma rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal mA ma kI la'o/ /bcom ldan don yod grub pa yi/ /nan tan ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen karma lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par rlung dbang bskur/ /las kyi rigs gtso mang po'i
<p>333b.3</p>yum/ /phyag 'tshal dam tshig sgrol ma la'o/ /de nas sems dpa' bcu drug kyang / /ci rigs pa'am yang na ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yis mchod/ /de nas lA s+ya la sogs brgyad/ /phyi nang gnyis kyi lha mo dam tshig ma/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi ye shes gsal ba la/ /rol pa chen pos mchod pas gtso
<p>333b.4</p>bo yis/ /dgongs pa skongs la 'gro ba'i don rnams mdzod/ /ye shes dus bzhi gzungs nye gzungs/ /sprul sku 'khor bar mi ldog cing / /mya ngan 'das la mi chags pa'i/ /don rnams mdzad cing brtan por bzhugs/ /rdo rje sgeg mo byang chub sems kyi ngang / /mchog sbyin smon byed gzi brjid 'bar cing sdud/ /
<p>333b.5</p>mdog dkar gser gyi khu tshur dkur brten te/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje smon byed sgeg mo la'o/ /rin chen dpal phreng gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin/ /yid bzhin mchog 'byung gzi brjid 'bar zhing skong / /sngo bsangs rin chen phreng bas re 'dod skong / /phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi char 'bebs phreng ba la'o/ /pad+ma dbyangs
<p>333b.6</p>mkhan gsung rab rgya mtshor sgrogs/ /snyam pas yid 'phrog gzi brjid 'bar ldan skong / /mdog dmar gser gyi pi wang phyag na bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal thabs kyi yid 'phrog gI ti la'o/ /las kyi gar mkhan phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol/ /gzugs mdzes bskyod pas rol mo phyogs bcur mdzad/ /mdog
<p>333b.7</p>ljang sna tshogs skur ston gzi brjid 'bar/ /phyag 'tshal ba'ang mdzes spyod ni rti la'o/ /spos kyi sprin ldang bdug pa 'phro/ /kun du tshim byed dri bsung tshim/ /mthing skya gser gyi spos phor bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal rnam dag bdug pa la'o/ /lta mdzes rin chen phung po 'gro/ /byang chub yan lag me tog
<p>334a</p>
<p>334a.1</p>brgyan/ /mthon mthing me tog gzhong bu bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal skyon med me tog la'o/ /'od gsal 'phro bas kun du khyab/ /gti mug 'thibs po sel mdzad pa/ /dmar skya chos kyi mar me bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal sgron 'bar mar me la'o/ /tsan+dan bdud rtsi char 'bebs ma/ /
<p>334a.2</p>bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings/ /ljang sngon dung phor phyag na bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal reg bya dri chu la'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bskal bzang dang / /phyogs skyong bcu dang bkra shis brgyad/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'gugs byed dang / /rin chen zhags pa gsol ka dang / /pad+ma lcags sgrog pho nya'i las/ /rgya gram
<p>334a.3</p>dril bu shes rab mchog /dpe med rgyal sras rang rgyal dang / /dgra bcom rgyal chen lha chen dang / /lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang / /lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding / /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /sa bdag gza' skar rig 'dzin dang / /srin po log 'dren sha za dang / /rgyud drug dag gi mthu can sogs/ /thams cad ci rigs pa
<p>334a.4</p>yis mchod/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po de nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor lha yi ting 'dzin zhugs/ /lce thog a las zla dkyil steng / /oM bsgoms rdo rje ye shes bsams/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bsgoms nas ni/ /chos kyi phyag rgya can gyis ni/ /slob ma de la bshad par bya/ /oM d+harma hUM d+harma trAM d+harma hrIHd+harma AHd+harma/ sa ma ya s+t+waM d+harma/ 
<p>334a.5</p>a na ya sa d+harma/ a haM su khaM d+harma/ sA d+hu sA d+hu d+harma/ su pa ha swA d+harma/ ru pu ho de d+harma/ a tha pra ba ti d+harma/ ha ha hUM ha d+harma/ sarba ka ri d+harma/ duHkha ts+tshe da d+harma/ bud+d+ha po d+hi d+harma/ pra ti shap+da d+harma/ su ba shi s+t+waM d+harma/ ni ba ya d+harma/ sha traM b+hak+Sha d+harma/ sarba sid+d+hi d+harma/ ma hA ra tI d+harma/ rU pa sho b+he d+harma/ shU rod tra pai d+harma/ sarba pu dze
<p>334a.6</p>d+harma/ pra ha da ni d+harma/ pu te d+harma/ tsa kri d+harma/ su gan+d+ha ni d+harma/ a ya hi dza dza d+harma/ a ya hi hUM hUM d+harma/ me spo Ta baM baM d+harma/ g+haN+Da a a d+harma/ de ltar lha tshogs sku gsung thugs/ /dkyil 'khor gang yin thams cad kyi/ /so so'i snying po tha mar ni/ /d+harmas btags la brjod pas ni/ /lha rnams thugs dgongs
<p>334a.7</p>dngos grub stsol/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/ /sdom pa yi ni dam tshig dang / /dag pa'i chos rnams sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed bcas pa yi/ /rnam pa gsum dang ldan par bshad/ /rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya bcas/ /oM badzra ka ba tsa rak+Sha a d+hi tiSh+Tha haM/ de nas sku gsung
<p>334b</p>
<p>334b.1</p>thugs byin brlab/ /kA ya oM wAk+ka AHtsit+ta hUM/ 'khor lo phyag rgya ting 'dzin sngags/ /bar du gcod pa bsal bar bya/ /oM dz+nyA na tsakra phaT/ nga yis bshad phog thams cad ni/ /dam pas gsungs pa'i tshig yin pas/ /khyod kyang de las ma 'da' shig /oM badzra sa ma ya haM tha/ byang chub rigs can nyid du ni/ /
<p>334b.2</p>sngags 'di brjod par gyur pa'o/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta a sa me ma hA sa ma ya swA hA/ hUM hUM hUM/ gsum pa dkyil 'khor 'jug gzhug pa/ /slob dpon zhugs dang slob ma 'jug /bshags pa lhag chad kha bskang ba/ /mthun par slar gshegs gsol dang lnga/ /las bzhi mchod nas bdag nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sems
<p>334b.3</p>kyis nam mkha' la/ /bteg nas byang chub sems kyis ni/ /zhugs pa nyid du thub pas gsungs/ /bdug spos lag tu thogs nas su/ /blo gros ldan pas lha rnams la/ /gus pas gsol ba legs par gdab/ /de 'og sgo bzhi dbye bar bshad/ /zhugs la gnyis su med bsgoms la/ /'gro ba dran pa'i las
<p>334b.4</p>bya'o/ /bcom ldan nam mkha'i sangs rgyas kun/ /thugs rje chen po mthu ldan lags/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan lhas/ /bdag la dbang mchog deng stsol cig /dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lo bshad/ /de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas bka' yi dkyil 'khor du/ /
<p>334b.5</p>bdag nyid dad pas 'jug lags na/ /dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das/ /bsod nams can du bdag nyid gyur/ /sngon gyi las kyi 'brel pa lags/ /thugs rjes sras su dgongs par mdzod/ /At+ma ko\u0f85haM maN+Dal sarba A be sha
<p>334b.6</p>swa b+ha wa/ /rdo rje mdzub sogs legs par ni/ /sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su/ /khros nas rab tu dbye ba ni/ /sgo dbye ba yi mtshan nyid do/ /gnas rab sgo bzhi zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog bzhis/ /sngon med dus nas bcad lags na/ /tshad med bsdu rgyas rigs bzhi yi/ /thugs rje thabs las sprul
<p>334b.7</p>pa yi/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu phyag rgya mchog nyid kyis/ /deng nyid thar sgo dbye ru gsol/ /oM badzra rat+na pad+ma karma kro d+ha g+ha Totas ma ya tsa tur/ pra be sha bi kran smA ra Na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen dang / /pad+ma rgya gram shugs kyis ni/ /rab tu brgal te zhugs nas ni/ /
<p>335a</p>
<p>335a.1</p>gnyis su med par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /snying rje slob ma la sogs la/ /lha mo sprul sras bsgom byas drang / /de nas sngags g.yog dag gis ni/ /slob ma'i las rnams brtson bya ba/ /phyag 'tshal gsol 'jug khrus bkra shis/ /dam bca'
<p>335a.2</p>me tog dor mig dbye/ /slob dpon lan stsal lhas dbang bskur/ /dam tshig dbog dang dbang bskur dang / /smon lam lha ngo bstan yul dbul/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o/ /de nas shar sgo dag tu ni/ /bdug spos lag tu thogs nas su/ /shar phyogs mngon
<p>335a.3</p>dga'i pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /ngag yid dang bas gus phyag 'tshal/ /lho phyogs dpal ldan pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan la/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /ngag yid
<p>335a.4</p>dang bas gus phyag 'tshal/ /nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas la/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /ngag yid dang bas gus phyag 'tshal/ /byang phyogs gser mdog pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan don yod grub pa la/ /skal
<p>335a.5</p>ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /ngag yid dang bas gus phyag 'tshal/ /bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /ngag yid dang bas gus phyag 'tshal/ /bdag ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
<p>335a.6</p>yin pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje bla na med pa 'di/ /di ring bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /bdag ni dam tshig rin chen te/ /rin chen 'byung ldan yin pa'i phyir/ /rin chen bla na med pa 'di/ /di ring bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /bdag ni dam tshig pad+mo ste/ /snang ba mtha' yas
<p>335a.7</p>yin pa'i phyir/ /pad+mo bla na med pa 'di/ /di ring bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /bdag ni dam tshig rgya gram ste/ /don yod grub pa yin pa'i phyir/ /rgya gram bla na med pa 'di/ /di ring bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /bdag ni dam tshig 'khor lo ste/ /rnam par snang
<p>335b</p>
<p>335b.1</p>mdzad yin par grags/ /'khor lo bla na med pa 'di/ /di ring bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /shar phyogs mngon dga'i pho brang 'dir/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed de/ /dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis dad pas 'jug par bgyi/ /lho phyogs dpal
<p>335b.2</p>ldan pho brang 'dir/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed de/ /dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa 'phyir/ /bdag gis dad pas 'jug par bgyi/ /nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'dir/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed de/ /dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis dad pas
<p>335b.3</p>'jug par bgyi/ /byang phyogs rnam dag pho brang 'dir/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed de/ /dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis dad pas 'jug par bgyi/ /bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'dir/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed de/ /dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i
<p>335b.4</p>phyir/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /phyogs bcu rnams su lta ba'i phyir/ /mtha' las 'das pa gnas par bgyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' me long yul/ /kun bzang phyag rgya'i bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /zhe sdang rnam smin
<p>335b.5</p>dag gyur cig /rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam shes yul/ /na bza'i phyag rgya'i bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /nga rgyal rnam smin dag gyur cig /snang ba mtha' yas kun rtog yul/ /mA ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub
<p>335b.6</p>sems rtags chus/ /'dod chags rnam smin dag gyur cig /don grub nan tan ye shes yul/ /sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /phrag dog rnam smin dag gyur cig /rnam snang chos dbyings ye shes yul/ /spyan gyi
<p>335b.7</p>phyag rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /gti mug rnam smin dag gyur cig /mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis dang / /dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis
<p>336a</p>
<p>336a.1</p>gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni ding 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan rgyan gyis brgyan byas shing / /yang dag 'byor ba'i sbyin pas sbyin mdzad mi slu ba/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis
<p>336a.2</p>des kyang ding 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig /bsam gtan dam pa ting 'dzin pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing / /tshe grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs
<p>336a.3</p>gyur cig /sems can don phyir las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing / /'gro ba thams cad bcings pa bcings las grol gyur pa/ /thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig /rnam par snang mdzad
<p>336a.4</p>ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan/ /zla ba nya 'dra sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar 'byin pa/ /dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur shog /yan maM ga lan/ /shu b+ha sha man+to/ /sa ya dzi na ta ka sha s+ye a
<p>336a.5</p>k+Sho b+h+ya rA dza/ bi shi na ta s+ye/ sarba kun/ maM ga la s+ye/ naM maM ga la da/ b+ha ba tu shAn+te/ ka sa pradz+nya sta ban+tu t+yaM/ ya maM ga lan/ ma ni ku lan hi na bu ha ra/ pa ba shu sha sha tsi na se ta no to ne/ kha la na pi pi pu ti na/ tan maM ga lan/ tan maM gA lan b+ha ba tu shAn+te/ /
<p>336a.6</p>ka ra na bad h+yaM yan maM ga lan/ a ga ni/ A yur byid ta sa s+ye/ ma ne bu ra ta li yas s+ye/ gArna badzra/ pa ri ga te s+ye/ ta thu ga te smi/ tan maM ga lan/ b+ha ba tu shAn+te/ kar nar+ya phaT traM/ yan maM ga lan/ ma ma mu ne pa ra sha s+ye/ a mog+ha si d+d+hi sa twa twa ra gar ma na nai/ b+hu
<p>336a.7</p>na sha ba na/ sha ta le s+ye yo tsi ta man sa sa s+ye mu na sa s+ye/ ban+d+ha b+ha b+ha mye bya/ tan maM ga lan/ b+ha ba tu shAn+te/ rna ta t+yaM/ yan maM ga lan/ sa ka la mA tor ta sa s+ye/ bai ro tsa na s+ye/ be ra ta nyi rna/ ma hA ra rna ba s+ye/ ma hA ra rna b+hu ra ra rna/ tsa tra b+hu she he ban+ta ka s+ye/ tan maM ga lan/ 
<p>336b</p>
<p>336b.1</p>b+ha ba tu shAn+te ka ra ta ban+t+yaM/ de la de bzhin gshegs gtso dang / /chos rnams kun la dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje rigs gtso chen po dang / /khams gsum bdag por dbang bskur ro/ /rin chen rigs gtso chen po dang / /lha mis mchod par dbang bskur ro/ /pad+ma'i
<p>336b.2</p>rigs gtse chen po dang / /chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ /las kyi rigs gtso chen po dang / /las bzhis gzhan don spyod dbang bskur/ /bkra shis brjod pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'jig rten dag tu mi rnams kun/ /grags pa rnam spel bgegs kyang
<p>336b.3</p>med/ /sems nyid bde 'gro nges byed la/ /mthar yang nges pa kho nar ni/ /zhi ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /de nas dam bca' bya ba ni/ /dpa' bo chen po rgyud dag pa'i/ /sdom pa legs par blang bar bya/ /de la sdom pa'i yon tan ni/ /dang po sdom pas rgyud
<p>336b.4</p>gnyis sbyong / /tha ma'i sdom pas lha min sbyong / /rdo rje rin chen pad+mo yi/ /sdom pa yis ni ngan 'gro sbyong / /de bas sdom pa mnos pa mchog /de 'og dam bca' yang dag bya/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /
<p>336b.5</p>dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed brtan par bzung / /de ni spyi yi tshul khrims so/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen
<p>336b.6</p>po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin ni lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs
<p>336b.7</p>mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spong ngo / /
<p>337a</p>
<p>337a.1</p>sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /de nas shar sgor gnas pa de/ /na bza' stod smad dar dmar dkri/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyar 'char/ /bcug la lag tu rin chen dang / /me tog phreng ba la sogs thogs/ /gdong
<p>337a.2</p>g.yogs dar dkar gyis g.yogs nas/ /a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra a ba tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ sngon gyi tshe rabs grangs med nas/ /dge ba'i las kyis bsnyen pa'i lha/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gang yin pa/ /da lta nyid du 'bab par shog /sangs rgyas dngos grub
<p>337a.3</p>thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas kyang / /'gro la phan pa'i gtse chen gyis/ /sman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM badzra pra tIts+tsha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bo d+hi tsit+ta pU dza ho/ me tog rin chen la sogs pa/ /gang la bab pa rigs kyi lha/ /
<p>337a.4</p>gtso bo rigs de bsgrubs na ni/ /dngos grub myur ster the tshom med/ /de nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /rin chen lhar bcas blangs nas ni/ /slob ma'i spyir bzhag thim gyur nas/ /mi gnyis gcig pa'i ltar bsams nas/ /oM sa ma ya hr-i da ya me/ oM AHhUM/ a b+hi
<p>337a.5</p>Shiny+tsa AH da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /khyod ni theg chen 'di nyid la/ /gsang ba chen po'i snod du gyur/ /rnyed pa mnyam med di ring rnyed/ /thob pa mnyam med di ring thob/ /dam tshig gong 'og ma 'da' zhig /bla med byang chub chen po 'thob/ /oM
<p>337a.6</p>badzrA ha s+yod+g+ha Ta ya hUM/ oM badzra pra be sha hUM phaT/ slob dpon lan gnyis dbyangs sbyar te/ /rdo rje phyag rgya legs bcas la/ /nga ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di/ /di ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a
<p>337a.7</p>a/ nga ni dam tshig rin chen te/ /rin chen 'byung ldan yin par grags/ /rin chen ye shes bla med 'di/ /di ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /oM rat+na sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ nga ni dam tshig pad+mo ste/ /snang ba mtha' yas yin par grags/ /pad+mo ye shes bla med 'di/ /di ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /oM pad+ma
<p>337b</p>
<p>337b.1</p>sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ nga ni dam tshig rgya gram ste/ /don yod grub pa yin par grags/ /rgya gram ye shes bla med 'di/ /di ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /oM karma sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ nga ni dam tshig 'khor lo ste/ /snying po'i 'khor lo yin par grags/ /'khor lo ye shes bla med 'di/ /
<p>337b.2</p>di ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /oM tsakra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a sa ma ya hrIHtha/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam las 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub/ /ci ste dam tshig 'das na ni/ /de ma thag tu bkas
<p>337b.3</p>nas gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang / /bdun brgyud rigs ni brlag par mdzad/ /de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang / /sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'/ /shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya/ /ma byin par yang blang
<p>337b.4</p>mi bya/ /brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams/ /dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba min/ /chang ni btung bar mi bya zhing / /sha la sogs pa bza' mi bya/ /sems can gnod pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin te/ /dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang / /dus kun du ni
<p>337b.5</p>byang chub sems/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /lha dang bla ma de bzhin no/ /sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang / /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /lha la phul ba'i rnying pa dang / /de yi grib ma 'gom mi bya/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin no/ /sngags
<p>337b.6</p>dang lha la smad mi bya/ /gdon gyi las sogs bya ba min/ /mu stegs can la'ang smad mi bya/ /mdor na yid gnyis dogs mi bya/ /bdag gi de nyid sngags dang ni/ /thams cad 'dra bas de bzhin no/ /de nas dbang mchog bskur ba ni/ /pash+tsi ma yi
<p>337b.7</p>phyogs dag tu/ /khru gang ba yi dkyil 'khor la/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /tshon ni dmar pos legs bris la/ /bkra shis brgyad kyi phyag rgya dgod/ /dbu rgyan cod pan me tog phreng / /phyag rgya bzhi dang rin chen bdun/ /gser byas thur
<p>338a</p>
<p>338a.1</p>ma 'khor me long / /dung dang bkra shis ras thogs gzhag /bdug spos ras sar gdugs sham can/ /rnga yab bsil yab zho phor gang / /bum pa bzhi sogs mi res gzung / /mchod pa la sogs bkra shis brjod/ /
<p>338a.2</p>oM b+h+r-i ta b+h+r-i ta sarba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM tra Ta tra Ta sarba A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ bi dra ba bi dra ba sarba a pa ya tang dwa na hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ /de nas thur ma me long dung / /'khor lo rtsa ba'i yig 'brus bskur/ /phreng ba
<p>338a.3</p>bum pa nyan pa dang / /gsang sngags phyag rgya cod pan dang / /'khor bsgyur ming dbang dbu rgyan dang / /las dang bcu'o gzungs rje'o/ /bcu gsum pa ni nor dbang bskur/ /'khor lo rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /sa bcu kun la dbang ba
<p>338a.4</p>dang / /theg pa mtha' dag ston pa yi/ /chos kyi rgyal po chen por shog /glang po rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /theg pa kun gyi don rtogs nas/ /stobs bcu kun la dbang thob cing / /byang chub 'bras bu thob par shog /rta mchog rin chen
<p>338a.5</p>bstabs pas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi'i dbang thob nas/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho rgal ba yi/ /thar pa'i 'bras bu thob par shog /nor bu rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs/ /dpe byad mtshan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /
<p>338a.6</p>gser gyi sku mdog thob par shog /dmag mi rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /mi 'jigs bzhi yi dbang thob nas/ /phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa'i/ /go cha chen po bgos par shog /blon po rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /sum cu rtsa gsum
<p>338a.7</p>dbang phyug rje/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i brgya byin gyi/ /lha yi rgyal po thob par shog /btsun mo rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /shes rab yum gyi dbang thob cing / /skye 'gag med pa'i don rtogs nas/ /bla med 'bras bu thob par shog /de
<p>338b</p>
<p>338b.1</p>bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa yi/ /nyon mongs sel ba'i grub rdzas dpa' bo 'dis/ /bar chod bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rnam 'jig cing / /skye 'grub mchog thob deng 'dir bkra shis shog /ji ltar lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ /byin
<p>338b.2</p>gyis brlabs pa'i rtsa mchog pu ta na/ /dUr ba'i gdan la bzhugs nas bdud btul ltar/ /deng 'dir bkra shis phun sum tshogs par shog /ji ltar sngon gyi drang srong a ga stas/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyugs kyi dngos grub 'di/ /khyim bdag dbang phyug
<p>338b.3</p>che la byin pa yis/ /skye dgu'i gsos gyur bcud ldan bkra shis shog /rdo rje dang ni rin chen chu skyes dang / /de bzhin las kyi sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i/ /li khris 'jig rten gsum po dbang bsdus shing / /dngos grub mchog thob ding 'dir bkra shis shog//
<p>338b.4</p>ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dung / /na ra ya nar dung sgra bsgrags pa ltar/ /bu khyod dam pa'i chos sgra rab sgrogs shing / /'gro ba 'dren mdzad deng 'dir bkra shis shog /chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu sta/ /smig rgyu lta bur yang dag
<p>338b.5</p>rtogs pa'i mthus/ /ma rig mun sel ye shes thob gyur nas/ /dngos grub mchog thob deng 'dir bkra shis shog /ji ltar glang po chen po a ga ta'i/ /gi'u wang srog gi dbang por gyur pa ltar/ /de bzhin bu khyod tshe srog 'dzin gyur nas/ /dngos grub
<p>338b.6</p>mchog thob deng 'dir bkra shis shog /ji ltar rgyu dang sa bon chung ba las/ /'bras bu cher smin shing thog bil ba ltar/ /de bzhin bsod nams rgyu tshogs chung ngu las/ /'bras bu bla med byang chub thob par shog /gtsug tor spyan ljags go chas bskur/ /
<p>338b.7</p>lag gnyis bcings te gung gshibs bsgreng / /mdzub gnyis bkug sbyar gtsug tor ro/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM hUM hUM hUM/ lag gnyis bcings te gung srin lag /brkyang ste mthe bo nang bcug mig /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ga na ba ra la k+Sha Na/ gu ru na ma
<p>339a</p>
<p>339a.1</p>ya ta thA ga ta tsak+Shu swA hA/ lag gnyis thal mo khong stong sbyar/ /mdzub gnyis dkris la srin lag gtugs/ /mthe bo gnyis gshibs ljags su bshad/ /na maHsa man+ta bu d+d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga ta dzi hwa sarba d+harmA pra ti tiSh+Tha/ lag pa gnyis
<p>339a.2</p>ni khong stong sbyar/ /mdzub gnyis ngos nas dkris pa ni/ /go cha'i phyag rgya zhes su bshad/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ pra tsaN+Da badzra la bi yu ra hUM/ de nas slob ma'i thog dag tu/ /gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu ba can/ /theg chen chos kyi ngo bo ste/ /nyon mongs
<p>339a.3</p>gdung ba sel byed pa'i/ /dbang mchog dam pa bskur bar bya/ /sum cu rtsa lngas legs dbang bskur/ /de nas dge pa sgo bzhi nas/ /sgra yi rjes su legs sbyar zhing / /blo dang ldan pas smon lam gdab/ /shar phyogs sgo la pU rbas bsdu/ /sngon dang thog ma phur pas bsdu/ /
<p>339a.4</p>de mthun rdo rje sems la sogs/ /sgrib gnyis byang bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /de bzhin slob ma tshogs rdzogs nas/ /me long ye shes thab par shog /lha sgo dak+Shi Na sa bsdu'o/ /sbyin gnas la yang dak+Shi Na bsdu'o/ /nub sgo pash+tsi mas bsdu'o/ /phyi ma ma 'ongs pash+tsi
<p>339a.5</p>bsdu/ /byang sgo ut+ta ra yis bsdu/ /thugs rje gzungs la ut+ta ras bsdu/ /gong gi rigs dang ye shes drang / /sngon gyi smon lam ston bstan pa/ /dri ma med pa'i dpe bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor rang bzhin lha dag kyang / /ci rigs par ni bstan par bya/ /tan+t+ra rgya
<p>339a.6</p>mtsho dbyings kyi gting rum nas/ /don mchog cha shas btus pa'i nying khu ste/ /sbyor ba'i lam rgyud phyogs 'grol 'brel pa yi/ /mchog thob rnam snang mdzad kyi zhal mthong shog/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po s+thi ra ma ti sa yo ga'i gzhung rgyud phyi nang las nges don
<p>339a.7</p>mdor bsdus te mdzad pa/ rgyan dam pa'i le'u bam po gcig tu byas pa rdzogs so// //cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis skad phyi mo dang gtugs pa'o// //
